messages.content: Book thief/forger sells a fake book to a Nazi through a female agent. A detective tries to uncover who the forger is and gets in the middle of a three way struggle for rare books and revenge in a public library.
A Korean immigrant in L.A. encounters difficulties when he refuses to join the all-Korean gang in his highschool.
An over credulous best-selling author finds herself contemplating suicide after her son is kidnapped by a Russian businessman attempting to collect a debt from her recently deceased husband.
Accounts the friendship of four friends (Rat, Mole, Badger, and Toad) whose adventures test the very fiber of their loyalty.
6 kids take the adventure of a lifetime and must learn to work together to save Christmas.
Two thugs harass assault, steal, murder, Marie-Ange, a jaded, passive hairdresser, joins them as lover, cook, and mother confessor, on her own search for seemingly unattainable sexual pleasure.
The Desert Song is a 1929 American Pre-Code operetta film directed by Roy Del Ruth and starring John Boles, Louise Fazenda, and Myrna Loy.

Vincent's life is on hold until he finds his wife's killer. Alice, his neighbor, is convinced she can make him happy. She decides to invent a culprit, so that Vincent can find revenge and leave the past behind. But there is no ideal culprit and no perfect crime.
James "Biggles" Bigglesworth ones again travels time to save the day.
Depicts the lives of children of the coastal hills and pastures who work as shepherds from an early age to earn a living.

A rickshaw driver's wife and his rich client are secret lovers, and they decide to get rid of him without being implicated, so they hire a powerful sorcerer to kill him, but the sorcerer's colleague intervenes to protect him.

To protect Morrowland from another threat, Jim and Luke have to set off on a dangerous journey. On their adventure, Jim's most fervent wish might also come true: to find out the truth about his mysterious origins.
An enterprising ex-convict overcomes tragedy by designing a modern-day guide to success for a society that failed him.

A dentist obsessed with young women in various uniforms stalks two sisters. The oldest sister is romantically pursued by a thug that was just released from prison. The dentist also has the hots for her and the two paths eventually cross.
A millionaire disappears after a blackmail attempt by criminal, The Panda. His sister tries to help the police find him and deal with an aftermath of murder and mystery.
This is an action film following the adventures of Naya The Golden Dolphin Princess and her mission to save the Earth.
A greedy husband (Hayayee) is found to be cheating on his wife, who immensely adores him. With the help of her friends, she plots revenge on him.
A lawyer's wife starts an affair with a mobster but is confronted by his other flame who ends-up murdered and the adulterous wife is set-up to take the blame for the killing.
A mass shooting survivor seeks vengeance on the perpetrator at large.

A stunning turn of events in a sordid story leads TV tabloid newshound Lorenzo (Ivan Martin) down a path toward a mystical realm in director Loren-Paul Caplin's intriguing tale. While ...                See full synopsis »
A sheltered young loser goes on the worst blind date ever when he and his date must cover up the accidental murder of a crooked cop.

When Maya, a headstrong little bee, and her best friend Willi, rescue an ant princess they find themselves in the middle of an epic bug battle that will take them to strange new worlds and test their friendship to its limits.
Dena and the Baron battle gangsters on the streets of downtown Cleveland in a quest for $100,000, leading to many murders, double crosses and a final foot chase.
A young couple need easy money. A few friends join them to plan a kidnap, but nothing goes right when some of them go after revenge and betray each other.
Based on the young adult novel 'The Lunch Witch' by Deb Lucke.

While Batman deals with a deformed man calling himself the Penguin wreaking havoc across Gotham with the help of a cruel businessman, a female employee of the latter becomes the Catwoman with her own vendetta.
A man will do anything to save his wife in the term oil of the future.
With a little mountain magic, sometimes it pays to horse around!

Kristian is a fragile 8-year-old boy. He meets 10-year old Jarka who lives in the same housing. Pushed by her desire to form a family, Jarka creates one with Kristian when she finds herself giving shelter to two abandoned twin babies.
A man orders some "animal ambrosia" so he can turn into animals and be able to watch naked women.
A group of steelworkers look to save Chicago residents from a mile-high structure that is on the verge of collapsing.
Izo, a Ronin, and Raiden, an orc, work to bring a young elf girl and the wand she carries to the land of the elves in the north.
When the eyewitness to a brutal murder decides not to testify, the actual murderer chooses to finger him as the murderer and claim eyewitness status for himself.
A girl name Summer is reunited with her childhood best friends and crush during a summer where secrets and tragedies are revealed while three guys vie for Summer's love.
A down-on-her luck prostitute embarks on a wild adventure that puts her in contact with the Mafia.
A tough, hard-driving business tycoon suffers a broken leg and is left to die in the desert by his scheming wife and her greedy lover.
Chulbul Pandey invites a fresh trouble when he kills the brother of a notorious politician and the former swears to wreak havoc in his life.
A man who can not laugh gets help by a psychiatrist.
A story of an old man and a dog.
Terence McDonagh is a drug- and gambling-addled detective in post-Katrina New Orleans investigating the killing of five Senegalese immigrants.
In medieval France, some villagers challenge a man's claim of identity when he (as he says) returns home from some time in the army.
When Syamsul sees his family die at the hands of the diabolical Topeng (Mask), he amasses a team of powerful Silat warriors to destroy his siege in Api city.
The funny misadventures of a taxi lady whose life is turned around when her father passes away and has to deal with life and it's lunatics without his advice.
The youngest one of the Seven Fairies falls in love with a poor decent young man named Dong Yong, but the love between a mortal and a fairy is not allowed by the laws of God in heaven.

Alisa Freyndlikh and Andrey Podoshian star in this enchanting retelling of Hans Christian Andersen's classic fairy tale. When a handsome prince tries to find his princess bride, he searches high and low, only to discover love at his doorstep.
A crew decides one of their own must pay as the woman he brutally attacked, fights to keep her mind, her life and her marriage together.

Sara -a young refugee on the run- befriends a young lost dragon, and teams up with a nerd and do battle with school administrators, the police, and gangs of bullies as their attempt to return the dragon becomes the adventure of a lifetime.
The evil witch Erla makes life difficult for Hui Buh and his niece, the little witch Ophelia. After her mother is captured, she seeks Hui Buh's help with a valuable book of spells.
They first met at an alumni event. The first meeting was very memorable for the dreamer Ann and the mysterious Geez.
The story will focus on Kung Fury's universe with no real connection to the short movie other than the lead character.
A motley crew robs a bank.

El Beat is a cross-platform experience, telling the story of Benkos Biohó, enslaved African and founder of the first free town in the Americas. It is a tribute to the African diaspora and the Black Power of Latin America.

Prabhu, the son of an honest police officer lands up a job but on the condition that would make him cough up 50,000 rupees. To get over the situation he kidnaps the daughter of a minister but falls in love.
Story of two starcrossed lovers who are not destined to be together; based upon the novel of the famous bengali novelist Humayun Ahmed.
A corrupt Sheriff's department in a rural mountain town comes undone when an unintended witness throws a wrench into their shady operation.

Based on the 1970 animated film, follows a family of Parisian felines who must team up with a smooth-talking tomcat to try to make it back home after their owner's jealous butler kidnaps them and leaves them in the country.
A cop wants to eradicate all the criminals and make the country a better place to live. Although he faces many obstacles in his path of righteousness, he does not give up.
After his release from prison, An ex mob hit man must do everything in his power to stay alive and defend his family against a retaliating crime syndicate.

The London Lad, The Angel from Cali and The New York Jock collide in the city of unrequited dreams, in pursuit of True Romance, as they fight to defy a life of Coulda Woulda Shoulda's, in this unique Romantic Dramedy.
A long-awaited sequel to the internationally acclaimed full-throttle splatter sci-fi action horror "Meatball Machine".

A drug dealer starts trafficking girls to pull his gang out of debt. When a British black-ops mom comes after her daughter, all hell breaks loose. Can she save her daughter before she's smuggled into Mexico?
Two School body decide to form their own soccer team to go against their rootless principle and after they hire their coach things goes crazy and magical.
An anthology of short films from female filmmakers about lesbian and LGBTQIA+ relationships.
A dynastic struggle between the collateral branches of the Kuru clan, the Kauravas and Pandavas, for the throne of Hastinapur leads to the Kurukshetra War.

Jonas(11) wants to visit his cool grandpa for a summer of fun on the river, but his mom has other plans. Undeterred, Jonas takes off on an adventure of his own in this tale of rebellion, friendship, catastrophe and, ultimately, redemption.
A young girl's love for a tiny puppy named Clifford makes the dog grow to an enormous size.
Three friends take a dark journey into murder, mayhem and movie-making in this raw and unflinching experimental feature film.
Inhaling a hallucinogenic drug can give the impression that the woman looks exactly like his ex-wife, but Paul discovers the scam and tries to rescue the kidnapped woman.
During an intense hostage situation, an ex-con comes face to face with the father of the boy he accidentally killed.
Xiaofei is going out with his school friends on a Enviroment protection in the nature. But after they fall a sleep by rain drops they turn back in time 40 years and learn lessons of nature.
About a group of three friends that choose to rob the neighborhood drug dealer to make some fast money.

Rick has always been in love his friend Lisa, and in another universe Lisa has always been in love with her friend Rick. A connection is made across these universes; Rick and Lisa vow to help each other win the hearts of their counterparts
An Indian adaptation of Jane Austen's "Sense and Sensibility" focusing on two sisters of opposing temperaments.
A 10-year-old boy faces off against his bullies.
It's the story of a naive man who came from village to city to buy a minibus and got scammed by a master swindler.
Eeswar is a motherless child who hates his father for remarrying after his mother's death. He falls for a local politician's daughter which lands him in trouble.

After beating the 'Beasts', the 'Wild Things' won every game. In the final match they must win to claim the Freestyle Soccer Cup, they battle the 'Wolves of Ragnarok'. They travel to them, but the wolves have a secret weapon

Will and Maura decide to come to Ireland with their daughter and live on Maura's ancestral estate. But soon weird happenings around the house lead a local priest to confess that Maura's ancestors practiced black magic.

Louisa Artemyeva is a singer, Prima Donna of the Opera theater for many years. One day she began to lose, one by one, everything in her life: her job, her man, her young admirer... She stays alone. What she will do?

Surrounded by three overprotective brothers, a little sister can only dream of getting in a relationship with the boys' best friend, and as a result, their reluctance will soon drive him into the arms of another woman. But, can love wait?
Left for dead, a woman stumbles into the infamous desert crossroads and strikes a deal with the Devil to hunt down the Cartel who killed her husband and unborn child.
AN EX-CONVICT'S YEARNING FOR REVENGE DISSOLVES WHEN HE FALLS IN LOVE WITH A NUN.

A team of criminals attempts to steal a valuable case from another organization, but many of the crew have alternate motives. Meanwhile, a former assassin is attempting to track down her old team in the hopes of bloody revenge!
Welcome to MYSTEE MAGIC...A Galactic Adventure Story with Science and Magic, Robots and Dragons, Romance and Galactic Conflict.
In St. Tropez, French gendarme Cruchot and his men battle petroleum-drinking, human-looking, metallic aliens.
Jim is a test pilot. His wife Ann and best friend Gunner try their best to keep him sober. But the life of a test pilot is anything but safe.
An honorably discharged soldier returns home to New Orleans, hoping to break away from his upbringing as a trained prostitute, but his brothel-madam mother has other expectations.
Two brothers fight each other for control of 1950s Cuba as a lurking guerrilla army closes in on Havana.
Dahari treated Fariman's youngest son with suspicion that Fariman was not his real son but that his wife had an affair with a corporate member.
An aging widow from New York City follows her daughter to Los Angeles in hopes of starting a new life after her husband passes away.
Hector Flector fights his way through through the mists of crime to solve a double murder.
A brother and sister learn to use their martial arts to protect the ocean they love.
A coming of age story involving young love and a mysterious music, coming from a crystal radio left as a memento by an absent father, that leads a young heroine deep into a hidden world.
The adventurous journey of the prince Yashodhavardhana to save Padmavathi from a wicked wizard and also to bring back his father's vision.
During the Sino-Japanese War, a young army nurse gives sympathy to her patients and falls in love with an impotent doctor who's addicted to morphine.
An astronaut prepares for a one-year mission aboard the International Space Station.
Four kids travel through a wardrobe to the land of Narnia and learn of their destiny to free it with the guidance of a mystical lion.
Based on true stories from the book "#1 Son and Other Stories" written by Michael Jason Marcus.
A knight returning to Sweden after the Crusades seeks answers about life, death, and the existence of God as he plays chess against the Grim Reaper during the Black Plague.
Yarina, the Daughter of sect leader Miro, embarks on a dangerous journey in a time of war.

Kevin, Sam and Rob are founding members of a theoretical group which pulls off heists. Leo, a gangster, blackmails them into pulling off a real multi-million dollar heist. Now it's up to them to get out alive.
A man obsessed with his mother's homemade food and controlled by his inner demons. What he feels; thinks and what his actions lead him is 'BEYOND BLUE'
A hapless loser assumes the identity of an amnesia victim without knowing that he is an assassin.
The plot is being kept under wraps.
The story of Wilbur Whateley and his attempt to bring into this world a vast, earth threatening entity.

Since her father died, 16-year old Juliet and her stepmother and two stepbrothers struggle financially to keep their ranch. But Juliet has a secret that could keep the ranch open: her horse, Horatio, can talk.
Suffering from amnesia and struggling with repressed memories, a law school student engages in a dangerous proceeding against mobsters, putting her own life and her family's in jeopardy.
Piet and the crew find an old chest in the ocean. They try to open it but can't. But when day turns to night it opens revealing their worst nightmares.

Alesha Popovich has to catch Tugarin Zmey and bring back the stolen money money with the help of a talking Horse (which talks all the time and has an opinion on everything), a wise granny, a donkey and a beauty Lyubava.
Despite the increasing reality of military invasion, an American family struggles to keep up an illusion of normalcy.

This movie contains four separate stories, each by a different director. They are all ghost stories, including themes such as death wishes, prison, and alcoholism. Good and evil women play prominent roles in the various tales.
Sexy reporter Valerie March goes undercover inside Sugar State Woman's Prison to expose a prostitution ring run by the sleazy and seductive warden.
After a diamond heist goes fatally wrong, four criminals hide out in a disused building. As they wait for their boss to appear, they try to work out who is to blame.
Vanesha had the chance to kill her boyfriend, Arya. Arya, however, did not recognize her and confess that they never had a relationship.
A police officer tracks down a cyber criminal that hacks the passwords of innocent people in order to destroy their lives.
A wicked sorceress in the Cave of Evil creates a magic pin which will make children stop studying and only play.
A German Shepard named Rain is trained to fight in the Vietnam War and his intelligence and courage in the face of adversity wins the respect and loyalty of his platoon.
Ebenezer discovers that he is a new Osram Warrior, a group of powered beings fueled by the spirit realm through the Adinkra Symbols of Ghana.

An infection transmitted by diseased birds is causing corpses to reanimate in search of human flesh. As the army of the undead grows, a medical student and his friends find themselves surrounded by zombies, with nowhere to run.
A soap opera writer gets hit on the head and wakes up as a character in his own show.
A mystical martial artist/environmental Agent takes on a ruthless oil corporation.
Mr. McMolyne the lab research robot and his two human friends Nik and Derek go on a long journey to find The Great Guardian make their robot friend's biggest wish come true.

A broke taxi driver in Vietnam thinks it is his lucky day when a mysterious woman offers him a fortune to drive her 1,000 miles from Ho Chi Minh City to Hanoi. They set off, pursued by mobsters and an assassin.
Two female band mates put their own romantic relationship and music in jeopardy when a love triangle with a former boyfriend ensues between them.
Part of the announced films in Bumilangit Cinematic Universe Phase 1, the plot is unknown.
A magical tree has a 7 dwarves taking care of it. The tree is bearing money and only good people can take it and prove that the tree has money on it.

In an alternate Japan, territorial street gangs form opposing factions collectively known as the Tokyo Tribes. Merra, leader of the Wu-Ronz tribe of Bukuro crosses the line to conquer all of Tokyo. The war begins.
A rich manager, obsessed by the idea of becoming poor, decides to temporarily leave his nice house and his beautiful wife, and begin living like poor, homeless people.

Taken in by an honourable seaman, an idealist political prisoner becomes his right-hand-man. Now, his dark-eyed wife can't escape from the net of passion, and he, too, is unwilling to try. Will the handsome runaway man ever find atonement?
When a college girl has to make extra money she is pulled into an underground fight club to be able to pay for her brother's leukemia treatment.

Facing writer's block, an author attempts to ignore his urge to drink and the vivid memories of his past. Shot and hand-cut on 16mm (both B&W and color) film, this short alternative fiction reminds us that not everything is as it seems.
A young novice is sent by her convent in 1930s Austria to become a governess to the seven children of a widowed naval officer.
A Pseudo-Biopic about a man who may or may not be D.B. Cooper.

When a farm boy's village is cursed by a mysterious plague, he enlists the help of a wise man with a slight flaw in his character. Together they venture into the enchanted realms of China to obtain the only cure from the evil Duke of Chin.
Vellapanti story revolves around four childhood friends who struggle to fulfill their ambitions but each time find themselves in a soup.
A Prince leaves his city and sets off to avenge his father, not aware his father wasn't murdered, and in reality, committed suicide, and soon learns the truth about his people from a warrior woman.
The film is a dramatization of parts of the Ramakien, the Thai national epic that was adapted from the Hindu epic the Ramayana.
Two detectives are assigned a murder case with DNA evidence or witnesses, and must figure out who the culprit was. The answer may be in the most unlikely of places. Right in the midst.

Anal retentive atheist social worker Jimmy stumbles upon a society of Angel and Demons, blending in with Humans. Bartering to assist in a grand quest, he has no choice but help end a war between good and Evil, But which side will he take?

Kalidas escapes after killing his father's murderer and is given asylum by a woman who raises him and her own son. Later, his adoptive brother is also murdered and he decides to make the culprits pay.
A calculative man schemes to deceit a poor but young widow for his personal monetary gains.
The story of a terminally ill teenage girl who falls for a boy who likes to attend funerals and their encounters with the ghost of a Japanese kamikaze pilot from WWII.
An orphan boy in 1830s London is abused in a workhouse, then falls into the clutches of a gang of thieves.

Two men get a jar, open it and meet a genie inside it. The genie grants them all they want and they are happy until the genie draws the attention of a smuggling gang while also breaking up one of protagonist's love life.
Three professional killers break into the house of an airport employee to shoot the plane on which an Asian Prime Minister is due to leave America.
It tells a story set in a recreational area, where two different boys, Petr and Michal, become friends after an initial mutual distrust.

Tras un combate en el que Santo (formando pareja con el Rebelde Rojo) vence a una pareja de luchadores italianos, le proponen que se una a una expedición arqueológica, que quiere explorar unas ruinas azteca.
Five students escape from the destruction of their beloved Shaolin Temple...now each must take revenge and train in their own seperate fighting styles...they will become The Five Shaolin Masters!!
A young woman strikes up a relationship with her ailing brother's favorite musician.
Plot kept under wraps. Described as a spy thriller.
Four generations of women travelling on a midnight car journey.
Doctor Strange, Black Panther, and Black Widow have to assemble when they realize a secret invasion is imminent.
Sixx the lone fallen angel, hates aliens, loves man, refuses to play by either Lucifer or God's rules.
In 1881, in Algeria, Michael Denning and Hector Servadac are fighting a duel when a comet brushing Earth takes the two men to the Moon where they discover a prehistoric civilization.

Rose, a mostly sweet and lonely Irish driving instructor, must use her supernatural talents to save the daughter of Martin (also mostly sweet and lonely) from a washed-up rock star who is using her in a Satanic pact to reignite his fame.

Ram and Swathi face a lot of financial crisis as Ram's salary is low and as a result Swathi leaves him. He gets in touch with his old friend Deepika which leads to a sexual relationship. Will he ever get back with Swathi?
A painter who takes responsibility for a murder he didn't commit for the girl he loves.
A tough undercover cop inadvertently gets involved in a dangerous heroin ring when a young defector of the drug trade leaves his five year-old sister in his care.
The souls of four ancient beauties are carried to modern society by a mystery necklace and enter the body of an ordinary girl, Qin Duyi.

A simple middle-class woman who shares her life with her only daughter Bella struggles to make ends meet to build a better life for Bella, she often looks out for bargains and below market price properties in the classifieds.
In today's Montreal, the devil, through discreet manners of seduction, takes liberty upon death. A brave trumpet player in love with a damned soul must fight him.
A romantic screwball comedy in the tradition of Preston Sturges and Howard Hawks. Boy meets girl and soon find themselves sharing a disastrous and hilarious weekend in the country.
An explosive Russian crime drama about the violent rivalry that erupts when an elite police operative falls for the girlfriend of a powerful gangster.
Ogami is hired to kill a tattooed female assassin. Gunbei Yagyu, an enemy samurai, happens upon Ogami's son, and sees his chance for revenge.
Combining action, comedy and sci-fi, Kampung Drift is a cross-genre coming-of-age tale of Johan, a teenager in search of the meaning of life and love through drift racing.

U.S. Marshal Hopalong Cassidy is called when a town becomes overrun with bad guys. Disguised as a member of a medicine show, Hoppy discovers that the ringleader is none other than sweet li'l ol' Ma Burton.
NCR: Chapter One is an Indie Feature Film directed by Saif Baidya Under the production of Yaariyan House of Creativity in association with Shabros Films.
A Los Angeles gang member becomes an FBI informant.
Acquitted for killing his wealthy wife, a male re-locates, changes his name, re-marries another wealthy woman, and then becomes a suspect when attempts are made to kill her also.
A very practical man suffering from a disease of the doubt. an unfortunate accident enters him in a coma.

Three teenagers are transported via a unique means to a parallel world where they become involved in a battle of light versus dark, dream versus nightmare. Dragons and demons abound and their safe return home seems impossible.
A group of teen misfits navigate the high-stakes and insane world of eSports, finding a needed sense of community as they go from living room to the international stage.
A giant condor decimates a herd of sheep, and Rin-Tin-Tin is unjustly accused of having turned killer.

A wife and working mother finds herself living the life she always wanted after she inadvertently makes a wish on her 35th birthday but soon discovers that the grass isn't always greener on the other side.
Violence in Korean High School, especially inside the WaSanGo (Volcano High). You won't be able to escape.
A quirky family lives their simple but joyful life which centers around the youngest family member, a little boy.
When a poor musician from Bombay falls in love with an elderly shopkeeper's daughter, gossip soon spreads.
After kickboxing champ Eric Sloane (Dennis Alexio) is crippled in the ring by the evil Tong Po, Eric's younger brother, Kurt (Jean Claude Van Damme), seeks vengeance.

The Xpose franchise now goes to the next level with Himesh Reshammiya doing a spin-off from his iconic character Ravi Kumar from his hit film 'The Xpose' as an action musical entertainer, in which he is up against 10 sensational villains.
A sheep-rancher's son aspires to win a music conservatory scholarship, but to apply he needs musicians who can play his music. Circumstances lead him to form a band out of prison inmates.

A late-night radio commentator relentlessly follows a horrific trail of evidence to rescue her troubled, younger brother -- whom she believes has joined an underground suicide pact run by a secret twisted organization.

Lucia loses a tooth, her dad tells the story of a mouse named Pérez who collects kids' teeth and polishes them into pearls. Perez is kidnapped by bandits. Lucía and cousin Ramiro rescue him in a fascinating adventure.
An anonymous writer meets a famous actor. The two of them fall in love.
A gay man finds himself torn between two single lovers who happen to be father and son.

An elite counter-intelligence unit learns of a plot, masterminded by a maniacal madman. With the clock ticking, it's up to them to track the terrorists' international tentacles and prevent them from striking at the heart of India.
In a clandestine study, while she is filming a porn movie, a strong attraction comes on between Marisa, one of the actresses, and Dick, former acrobat and now her 'protector'.
A fanatic cult infests the kingdom of Annistiem, causing adventurers to travel into the woods to kill the cult's degenerate creations.

Chasing Butterflies is a Work of Fantasy Based on True Events. An amazing story that exists in multiple realities simultaneously. It is centered around a family of musicians that are dedicated to changing the world through music.
A group of British and Aboriginal slaves in 1800's Australia, work together to find an ancient spear and take back their land.

A young guy Soheil is having a reluctant life. He depends on his rich father but one day he has a car accident which leads him to meet with a girl Somayeh. This changes the course of his life for ever.
A young boy tries to rescue a girl in danger with the aid of a magic umbrella.

When Bonnie Walker becomes aware of children who are victims of abuse she wades through many obstacles to intervene. In spite of delays, Bonnie receives promises from God and believes that against all odds, God will bless her efforts.
A CIA operative in Hong Kong must become a Ninja in order to retrieve a stolen Top Technical Secret Film from a Clan of Ninjas sent by the KGB.
Javier is crushed after his new bride leaves him. When his psychiatrist has no answers, he turns to the arms of his ex-girlfriends.
A loving father teaches his family a lesson in validation the hard way.
A romantic comedy centered on a couple who schemes to keep their best friends from divorcing, only to experience strife in their own relationship.

A Czar who attempts to trick a creature that demands tribute from him into taking a fisherman's baby instead of his newborn heir. Complications arise when the daughter of the creature, Barbara, requests a human suitor to find true love.

Ella has a reputation for two things: being a rebellious punk and the fastest gun around. When corrupt officials try to cover up her father's murder, she cuts a swath through the weird anachronistic underbelly of her small island town.

Filmed as a traditional Japanese play, a yakuza boss is released from prison, but finds his gang usurped by a shady politician. With the help of his former cell mate he decides to assassinate the politician with an explosive pen.
An angel on Earth, a doctor unable to believe, a patient with a secret, a love story made in Heaven.
Re-edited version of a Japanese TV serial combined with a direct-to-video anime, released in the U.S. as a feature.
A kind-hearted street urchin and a power-hungry Grand Vizier vie for a magic lamp that has the power to make their deepest wishes come true.

While everyone is away on a company ski trip, Robert's neighbor hires two inept thieves to steal his latest invention. The neighborhood dogs will use Robert's inventions to set up a house of horrors for the thieves.
An amnesiac World War I veteran falls in love with a music hall star, only to suffer an accident which restores his original memories but erases his post-war life.
Neel falls in love with a gangster's niece and things go bizarre when he finds himself getting involved with the underworld.
3 childhood friends join the Hong Kong Triads only to discover that fame and fortune will ultimately break them apart as only one can become the leader of the gang.

Jorge Colon's SIN ELLA shows us how much a family member can guide the values and lives of the others, even when absent. Set in present-day Mexico City, the story follows Gastón (Luis ...                See full synopsis »
Baron, an elementary school student who is reluctant to move from Jakarta to Balikpapan with his parents, stumbles into an unexpected adventure while participating in a scouting activity.
The world goes backwards on Opposite Day. The kids become adults, and the adults become kids.
A woman's love for and devotion to a married man results in her being relegated to the "back streets" of his life.
Four college freshmen and best friends find that it may take more than a shared pair of jeans to help them stay in touch as their lives go in different directions.
Two men team up to fight against British occupation in Egypt during the 1919 revolution.
16 years of alcohol is about a skinhead named Frankie; his violent childhood, alcoholism and his love for Ska.

The discovery of a magic mirror allows Fred to realize his dream: his twin tidies up his room, eats without complaining and becomes first in class. But Fred did not keep his promise to keep this secret by revealing it to his friend, Émile.
A journalist and aspiring policeman realises that his brother has been killed by conspirers. Later, he teams up with the rivals of his brother's culprits to bring them down and avenge his death.
With his livelihood on the line and the stakes higher than ever, a billiards player must face off against underworld kings to win back his pool hall.

3 prisoners escape. 2 end up in Happy, Texas, where they're mistaken for a gay couple expected there to help with the small girls beauty pageant. As the 2 are paid $1000, they decide to stay until the heat is gone.
The greatest currency counterfeiter of all time prints $250 million of perfect $20 bills before outfoxing an international police operation to ultimately walk free and turn his life around.

At the wedding, Mo Jing Qian discovered that the bride was not Anshihui who he was going to marry, but Anshi Ning, a sister with the same appearance. Her sister had died, under the pressure of his family, he was forced to accept her.
A sheltered young loser goes on the worst blind date ever when he and his date must cover up the accidental murder of a crooked cop.
A boy, Neve, sets out in search of his father and lands in a parallel world. Thanks to two mystery hunters, Bertolt and Francois, he will save his father from an evil being.

Private Investigator Somerset and Lieutenant Detective Mills merge together again to match wits and wisdom with either a crazed copycat or calculating killer living out the legacy of John Doe and the seven sins.
A young couple, faced with the painful panorama that the capital offers them, decide to try their luck in a town, with the exercise of a profession for which great titles are not necessary.
After firing a colleague, the head of a PR company begins to question her lifestyle and values.
A man's world crumbles after his addiction takes control over his life.
An insurance investigator tracks down an arson ring involved in insurance fraud.

Four aging animals - a donkey, a dog, a rooster, and a cat - are rejected by their ungrateful owners and thrown out to the streets. Together, they drive a group of robbers out of their hut and live out the rest of their lives in peace.

A coming of age story about a troubled 16 year old girl in foster care in Hawaii, whose path to empowerment begins when a mysterious old man teaches her the ukulele - and she makes it to the World Ukulele Championships in Honolulu.

Three short films. Three women's harrowing journeys to find inner peace in their respective worlds, whether it is Earth (A Song For Swan), a parallel dimension (The Reve), or an alternate realm (Since).
Western / Thriller that takes place in Punta Indio, a ghost town in the middle of nowhere. A crime reveals the dark legend of a cursed diamond.

Nathan and Salma enter the world of social activism. Salma chooses to express himself digitally while Nathan chooses to take to the streets. This difference sparked a big fight when Nathan is involved in a big riot at a demonstration.

Walter Gibson is a university freshman going through a dry spell. His old buddy arranges a "sure thing" for him in California. Gibson and his classmate Allison then take a long road trip out to Cali, and both foil each other's plans.

In Highgate London, five young teenagers hoping to witness Pagan activity, camp in historic Queen's Wood on Halloween but soon discover they are part of the ritual when a mysterious Biker hunts them down.

In the sequel to 2018's THE KISSING BOOTH, high school senior Elle juggles a long-distance relationship with her dreamy boyfriend Noah, college applications, and a new friendship with a handsome classmate that could change everything.
In an alternate Europe populated by monstrous creatures, at the beginning of 20th century, a thief is kidnapped and wakes up in a luxury train leaving Moscow for Paris.

Transylvanian vampire Count Dracula bends a naive real estate agent to his will, then takes up residence at a London estate where he sleeps in his coffin by day and searches for potential victims by night.
A draper's maid weds a poacher's son when the village watch committee tries to expel her.
Whaling ship captain Bering Joy takes his grandson Jed on a whaling trip to teach him core life values while First Mate Dan Lunceford is tasked with tutoring Jed.
A dream and a curse lead a teen and his newfound friends on an unlikely destiny as they set out to save the nine realms of Ezra.
Fung, Lok, Calf and Singer were gangsters under Scarface Ho. They got in conflict with Wai's gang but ending up working for them instead.
The living Volkswagen Beetle helps an old lady protect her home from a corrupt developer.
A raging god of battle and a master samurai duke it out in a series of sword fights in a remote temple.

Mary Fiore is San Francisco's most successful supplier of romance and glamor. She knows all the tricks. She knows all the rules. But then she breaks the most important rule of all: she falls in love with the groom.
The imagination of a wildly creative girl comes alive in an amusement park.
Judge and his mistress are investigated on suspicions of corruption.
The third and final film of Anthony Chen's 'Growing Up' Trilogy will reunite his frequent collaborators Yeo Yann Yann and Koh Jia Ler as the leads.
A rom-com involving Rao and Mary, two unemployed new graduates, who decide to act as a married couple so that they qualify for two teaching jobs at a High School and eventually fall in love.

Two dogs are placed in a pet hotel on New Year's eve as their owner go away on vacation. Feeling insulted, the dogs escape and return to their home, where they can enjoy life. But luck is brutally interrupted when two burglars break in.
Bao sacrifices herself, becoming a butterfly, to save her sick fiance and discovers in the process how true their love is.
The lives and loves of four sisters during their pastor father's absence.
Khaldoun and Arif are two brothers separated by the war, both of them have different opinions, and between them Nejma and Nesma, between them a dream that will never come true.
The agent for the Devil takes the soul of a high school sophomore in exchange for a date with the most popular girl on campus.
A young boy and his family embark on a series of adventures when the boy finds some mysterious eggs which hatch to reveal a brood of baby dinosaurs.

Andrine and Kjell are both 17, and attends a private high school. Many things disturb their way to the spring exams, and fall in love. The come from different backgrounds, but gets common problems when she rents a room at Kjells parents.
A woman offers her country home to friends to help them save their marriage, but her well-meaning gesture creates a new problem.
A group of indomitable Gauls are challenged by Roman Emperor Julius Caesar to accomplish twelve impossible tasks.
A young star at a Wall Street firm finds that the white-collar world is filled with as much crime and death as the dangerous hood where he was raised.
In the near future, a financial crisis will hit Korea and slums arise. From those areas, a group of young people commit crime to survive.
When Egor's mom dies, he gets a stepmom and then a baby half sister. Things get seriously twisted when his dad gets a hot nanny, who's the witch, Baba Yaga.
A master thief's shady parole officer coerces him and five misfit ex-cons into committing a lucrative heist that could jeopardize their freedom . . . or bring down a corrupt pharmaceutical company.

FBI agent Jeff Gordon is to investigate the theft of a US missile prototype. The suspect Anderson, however, is found dead. Jeff Gordon's only lead is the photograph of a woman that Gordon finds among Anderson's papers.

When an adventurous Hmong teen discovers a secret map to a mythical dragon, he and his three best friends decide to go on a quest that leads them on a journey filled with danger, excitement, and self-discovery.

When a car thief can't resist stealing one more car, she finds herself in possession of $2.7 million mob money, and the mob's counterfeit printing plates. The mobsters and corrupt cops don't take kindly for this, and the chase soon begins.
Manager Knobby Walsh discovers young hunk Joe Palooka and trains him to fight the champ. Mobsters try to make life tough for Joe and his socialite girlfriend Anne. Cameos by several boxing stars.
A girl and her friends find a game in the attic that summons a creature known as The Midnight Man, who uses their worst fears against them.

French Riviera, a typical wealthy family, composed of father, mother and four children, two sons and two daughters, who lives in a beautiful house.The father is still very in love with his ...                See full synopsis »

Byzantine Prince kills Kara Murat's father and kidnaps his brother to raise him as the Black Knight to fight against Turks. Years later, Kara Murat has to face the notorious enemy in a mission to save abducted Karaca Pasha of Rumelia.
A demented prison doctor performs gruesome shock therapy experiments on inmates.
Seo-joon, loses everything to voice phishing and infiltrates an organization in China to meet Kwak Pro, the designer behind this phishing system.
Alice stumbles into the world of Wonderland. Will she get home? Not if the Queen of Hearts has her way.

As Mika returns to the farm for the summer, she finds a wild white horse in the forest. When one day, she spots a mysterious young man trying to tame the animal, that Mika believes to be a unicorn, Mika and the stranger strike a deal.
Asterix and Obelix join the Roman Legions in a bid to rescue Obelix's crush Panacea and her fiance Tragicomix, who have been abducted to appease Ceaser.
A national basketball match reunites best friends to face their haunting past in order to move on in life.
A critique of the romantic Portuguese society of the nineteenth century.
A doctor's assistant boxes the local champion to buy his practise and win the doctor's daughter.
Two swindlers get their hands on a map to the fabled city of gold, El Dorado.
A heart felt, coming age story where the only choice between power - and love. When you've gone from zero to hero only to realize that following your heart can be the ultimate sacrifice.

Stephanie and Tega are best friends since they were five years old. They did everything together, they had never even gotten into a fight before until now. This is story about a friends, a boy and a major fight.
An egomaniacal film star develops a relationship with a young dancer against the backdrop of Hollywood's silent era.

With the start of the Russo-Turkish War, the Russian Army attacks Erzurum. Zeynep sets out to find her husband when there are rumors that her husband has been martyred. However, a big surprise awaits her there.
Eddie Jones (Courtney B. Vance) is an agent with the U.S. State Department's elite Eliminator Corps. He eliminates people the government doesn't want around. Eddie also needs to change his life.

León is a successful meditation teacher with thousands of followers and fans around the world. At the same time Eris, an average teenage girl, starts experimenting an unusual character transformation.
With new friends in a new kingdom, Barbie learns what it means to be herself when she trades places with a royal lookalike in this musical adventure.
A rivalry between two men, based on caste and social status, extends from an Indian village to war torn Europe during WW2.
Samuel, a male nurse, saves the life of a thief whose henchmen take Samuel's wife hostage and force him to spring their boss.
Joe Higgins' wife gets the job meant for him, so he stays home to do the housework.
A tribe of vicious female warriors terrorizes the countryside, and especially the males, until one day the men and some local villagers decide to fight back.

A poor boy falls in love with a daughter in a landlord's one day couple runs away from the village, the girl's brother finds the girl and killed her and boy moves to the city, this is a film based on a true incident.
On the run from murderers, two men disguise themselves as women and join an all girl band.

Average Swedish guy Sven, bored with his life, decides to go to Thailand to write a novel and "get away from the rat race". He meets a range of peculiar characters and learns a few things about love, friendship, and himself.

Mexican beauty Camilla Lopez (Salma Hayek) hopes to rise above her station by marrying a wealthy American. That is complicated by meeting Arturo Bandini (Colin Farrell), a first-generation Italian hoping to land a writing career and a blue-eyed blonde on his arm.
A rescue unit within the Chinese Coast Guard are forced to overcome their personal differences to resolve a crisis.
When her father is taken hostage, a woman is forced into a life of crime; and soon, everyone is after the priceless necklace in her possession.
Inner city kids from a poor neighborhood go up against the undefeated Beverly Hills Junior National Karate Team.
A team of criminals with technological skills are recruited on a mission.
Two brothers with the secret power of starting fires with their minds, reunite after years apart, only to find conflict with their differing lifestyles.

Joe Joe has just opened up his very own rim shop and things are going well until an evil loan shark comes to collect an old debt. With no money in the bank Joe Joe has 24 hours to come up with the cash or he loses everything.

What would happen if the Earth collided with a Nebula and created a new plant over Earth. Would there be a new living species running over our planet? The connection between two planets one new and one existing inter-square planet Earth 2.
A young woman's dreams of moving to Wyoming are halted when her unstable boyfriend accidentally kills a man.
Based on the true story of Air Force personnel in Srinagar, Kashmir.

After being left at home when her mother goes on a business trip, a young girl witnesses a woman being kidnapped. With the help of a veteran New York detective, she undauntedly attempts to solve the kidnapping - no matter what it takes.
Two high-school nerds use a computer program to literally create the perfect woman, who promptly turns their lives upside-down.
A ruthless criminal flees from the pursuit, involving more and more casualties.
A lovable scoundrel's life is cut short when he angers the god of death; however, he still has a few tricks up his sleeve.
A clumsy police officer must save the town from the forces of evil before it's too late.
A hitman approaches a writer to help him create his next best seller, but the violent world he was a part of has other plans.
Characters from an assortment of Victorian-era novels join forces to battle against a common enemy.
A huge fan of Amitabh Bachhan, falls in love with a Colonel's daughter and tries to woo her. Later, he finds a mobile which belongs to a ruthless gangster and starts blackmailing him.
A young man brought up in a nunnery escapes from the abusive nuns into the disconcerting outside world.
A flag said to possess supernatural powers of protection comes into the possession of a highland clan of Scotsmen fighting for their survival.
A firefighting pilot survives bailing out of his doomed plane without a parachute only to have to fight for his extended life on earth in a Heavenly court. Based on the 1946 film.
Mandar, an ordinary guy is obsessed with sex and chases girls until he meets Tripti and decides to settle down with her.
When her husband goes missing during their Caribbean vacation, a woman sets off on her own to take down the men she thinks are responsible.
It's about two different characters in their 20s, Vennela & Siddu. They have setbacks in their lives. How they meet, change for good, sort life and become successful forms the movie.
The Gas House Kids go to Hollywood, where they become entangled with a mad scientist while attempting to find a lost treasure in a haunted house.
New visionary indie director starts life-changing movement with innovative inspirational film. The uncommon Hollywood story.

Truck driver Bugs Raymond organizes the trucking associations and takes protection money. Now rich, he decides to marry socialite Dorothy Stone. She rejects him for another, so he plots to kidnap her on her wedding day.
This is strange story about problems of Japanese society and youth love. A young programmer wanders in psychological world with a mysterious woman and her husband who has paranoia.
An isolated and wingless dragon is transformed through his friendship with a brave and compassionate young girl.
An eleventh century Viking Prince sails to America to find his father, who on a previous voyage had been captured by Indians.
A satire about the dictatorship period in Brazil, in which communist militants try to steal the soccer World Cup Trophy from the players Pelé and Carlos Alberto Torres.
A martial artist fights her way to save her sister and herself from a lifetime of imprisonment.
Join Emma and the gang and sing along in this zany musical spoof of ABC's Once Upon a Time.

An expedition to Infant Island discovers a native population and tiny twin fairy priestesses of the island's mythical deity. Named Mothra, she sets out to rescue her fairies after they are kidnapped by an exploitative businessman.
A rickshaw puller is forced to take revenge against a group called the invincible four, and their Japanese backers after they murder his uncle, mother and girlfriend.
A pregnant woman, Kate, questions whether or not she should leave her husband, Ollie, despite him being the object of envy for many of Kate's friends.
Rancher and down-trodden Sheriff confront hired gunmen on the Mexico border.

Two Chinese friends, who operate a food truck in Barcelona, Spain, use their martial arts expertise to help their private investigator friend protect the pickpocket Sylvia, who's been targeted by a ruthless gang.
A gorilla named Ivan tries to piece together his past with the help of an elephant named Ruby as they hatch a plan to escape from captivity.
Raised by compassionate wild animals as one of their own, a helpless eight-year-old girl grows into a beautiful, untamed woman and becomes Lady Tarzan: the fearless Queen of the Elephants.
Union prisoners use a balloon to escape a Southern prison camp near the end of the Civil War and end up marooned on a mysterious volcanic island with very unusual inhabitants.
An epic couple Muse and Orpheus from another Universe lands on the earth to save humanity through ancient Greek knowledge.
Racial tensions and corruption come to a head in a small, segregated town after the police find the body of a young Afrikaner girl in the bush.
One boy's wish changed a man. One man's wish changed the world.

When a home robbery occurs, two junior detectives attempt to discover the culprit. Their closest neighbors are the most likely suspects and the investigation digs up bigger secrets than they expected.
Thirsty for a following, Kurt Kunkle is a rideshare driver who has figured out a deadly plan to go viral.
A 17-year-old girl has mysterious encounters with paranormal activity in the small town of Pine Valley.
This movie describes the violent break-up of former Yugoslavia from the Serbian point of view, using the story of ethnicly mixed couple in war-torn city of Vukovar as metaphore.
Based on Ion Creanga's book, the story of a child from his childhood to his manhood.
An adaption of Fyodor Dostoevsky's Crime and Punishment; Ram is a destitute but bright law student who decides to rob the safe of the moneylender.
An ex-Navy Seal turned cook is the only person who can stop a group of terrorists when they seize control of a U.S. battleship.
A Graphic Novel-style telling of Grace O'Malley (a. 1530 - 1603) who was one of the most famous pirates of all time.

A trilogy of separate stories. In "Labyrinth labyrinthos", a girl and her cat enter a strange world. In "Running Man", a racer takes on the ultimate opponent. In "Construction Cancellation Order", a man must shut down worker robots.
Kariya, a gangster falls for a rich dancer Maya, but hesitant to express his love due to his criminal history. Meanwhile his enemies in the echelons of underworld conspire to have him murdered.
In this parody of blaxploitation movies, a black hero wannabe reunites former black heroes from the 70s to help him get revenge on Mr. Big.
A world filled with chaos and terror, consumes the lives of everyone in this Louisiana city.
An ancient prophecy seems to be coming true when a mysterious presence begins stalking the corridors of a school of magic and leaving its victims paralyzed.
A street hustler begins to take control of the New England drug trade.
This is a retelling of Tristan and Isolde, set in 1940s France. The script was written by Jean Cocteau.
A road trip from Karachi to Lahore where 5 friends discover themselves and the country amidst getting to their destination.

Set centuries after an environmental disaster causes a small population of people to live on an unusual landmass known as the Tearling, a young princess named Kelsea Glynn, tries to save the kingdom by reclaiming her dead mother's throne.

When a precious Tibetan bead is stolen by rogue members of the mysterious Gemini Clan, the protectors of the bead enlist the help of some righteous former Gemini Clan members to retrieve the bead and bring the evil disciples to justice.
When a soldier returns home to visit his estranged father, three lives will be altered forever.
A psychopathic serial killer and a School girl. The serial killer gets the taste of his own medicine, when he tries to sexually assault and kill the school girl.

Gunned down in the snowy wilderness and desperate for shelter, Billy Cavanagh is taken in by kooky old lady Agnes, unaware that her isolated log cabin is being stalked by a bloodthirsty skinless creature hellbent on getting inside.
A mysterious vengeful man takes a job as a security guard for a money transport company amidst a series of violent robberies.
A young witch, on her mandatory year of independent life, finds fitting into a new community difficult while she supports herself by running an air courier service.
Using a special smartphone app, four present-day kids travel trough time to help save the world from a robotic alien invasion.
Missing for seven years and presumed dead, a woman returns home on the day of her husband's second marriage.

Aiman, who deals with never-ending problems starts to wonder the judgment given by God which brings him to stuck in another dimension leading him being fully alone until he starts meeting a mysterious woman named Maya.
In WHEELMAN, you are the most feared man in the US: Johnny Booker. But play through his humble beginnings as an employee for a mediocre taxi service.
Vasu wants to contest in the college elections but is forced to withdraw in favour of the local MLA's son. But when the MLA's goons bash him up, he decides to fight and take on the brutes.
A story of justice and tyranny with the fate of Rome in the balance.
A divorced New York cop takes his son on a ride along with him on Christmas Eve.
A psycho mother's boy is infatuated with a cute widow and stalks her.
A look at the corruptions scandal involving the leaders of the international football organization, FIFA.

Joe, a comic-book loving guy living in the slums, gets shot and dies, but comes back to life as a superhero. His painful past is the key to piece together who killed him and why, but not without a price.
A suburban cop, whose family is targeted by a maniacal mastermind, drags them through a gauntlet of deceit, deviant sexual behavior, and murder.
Based on a true story- Romantic Action Western

An adventurous young koala embarks on a journey across the wild and dangerous Australian outback in the hope of finding his missing father, but he soon discovers that there is more to being a hero than meets the eye.
A terrorist places an atom bomb somewhere in an American metropolis. The president of the U.S. has no other choice, he has to call Delta Force.

Three beautiful women from different cities in Latin America. Ana, in Buenos Aires; Sol, in Bogota and Patricia in Caracas, go through a day in which they are simultaneously faced with the same challenge: an unexpected pregnancy.
The jury in a New York City murder trial is frustrated by a single member whose skeptical caution forces them to more carefully consider the evidence before jumping to a hasty verdict.
Disaster movie about a Navy jet and a commercial airliner heading for a mid air collision.
Kabul, Afghanistan. A drug addicted FBI agent is brought in to work alongside the corrupted local police force to investigate a suicide bombing at the American Embassy.
The journey of an adoloscent boy who transforms into a transgender, the trauma he goes through in the process of discovering himself and how 'she' survives as a winner.

When Raja and Shakti's fight turns into an ugly gang war, the police must intervene to restore peace in the city. Realising their personal lives are at a stake, they must fight together to protect it.
A couple and many of their friends experience changes and challenges in their respective lives after attending a wedding.
A young man tries to repair his relationship with his father while falling in love.
The remnants of a massacred cavalry troop and ragtag group of stagecoach passengers fight for survival against fierce Comanches at a desert ruin.
Security guard Larry Daley infiltrates the Smithsonian Institution in order to rescue Jedediah and Octavius, who have been shipped to the museum by mistake.
A sensitive puppet master is challenged by his creepiest puppet.
The entangled wedding proposal and love life of Carol, Ben and Doctor Steve. Will it end in true love or tears?

Evidence of a mass murder is released virally by an unknown subject, and then recovered by police and made public for awareness due to potential threat in surrounding communities and possibly nationwide.

Vijay struggles as a dockworker and eventually becomes a leading figure of the underworld, while his younger brother Ravi is an educated, upright policeman. This divide causes problems in their relationship.

Several oil companies are trying to get hold of Prof. Wilkens, who has discovered a revolutionary formula for a new type of fuel that will put all the oil companies out of business and control the world's economy.
Alibaba borrows money from his brother to set a slave girl free, and then finds a treasure trove that belongs to bandits. However, his brother's greed puts them in jeopardy.
An orphan child who believes that dreams can come true.

Three skiers from different continents join a team led by an industry icon to represent an age old ski company and emerging energy drink in a winter full of skiing, filming, competitions, and parties. Unfortunately, skiing's the easy part.
A young boy is trying to arrange money in order to build aircraft.
A man, awakening with no memory, is told he is an heir to millions, but he suspects he is an heir to trouble instead.
Three powerful female executives explore their quest for romance in this drama.
Dann Mulvey (William Scott), just released from prison, is falsely accused of murder. The real culprit is the least-suspected person, who makes a deathbed confession.
A young warrior bands with a small group of rebels to wage a guerilla war in order to rescue his love and save his people from certain death.
A Czech fairy tale about a princess named Lada who runs away from home in a mouse-fur disguise in order to escape an unwanted, forced marriage.
Bianong was a kidnapper, a deadly killer--until justice ended his bloody career in Baclaran on April 3, 1950.
Lam cannot do right where his master or his main rival, Sui, are concerned. When the Master is killed, Lam must fight Sui and the Immortal Trio to protect the Book of Invincible Snake Fist.
A lady reporter and two college students search for the "Gold Special," a train that disappeared without a trace.
Actress Tsukuba was Nikkatsu's resident sex bomb in the late 1950's.
A new scientific discovery reanimates a slain man who is either a missing person or a gangster's archenemy.

Cameron comes from a Christian home but is still uncertain and in a desperate search for answers about the Gospel when he struggles with the guilt he harbors for not being able to save his best friend from a fireworks accident.
The Film Is Based on Lord Ganesha.
A wanna be director's struggle in the film industry. The problems he faces and how he overcomes them.
To help his discouraged son get through college, a funloving and obnoxious rich businessman decides to enter the school as a student himself.
Two descendants, one of the wolf and one of the undead and witchery, come together to stop the breaking of the seven seals.
Two scheming demon brothers, Wendell and Wild, enlist the aid of 13-year-old Kat Elliot to summon them to the Land of the Living.

A Jeep breaks down over the road through an old Forest road... Two men get out and look for a mechanic... They find one.. but when he reached at the spot he finds something fishy.. and the story revolves around these men...
A man learns he has a thirteen-year-old son who was raised in the jungle and brings the boy to New York City, turning his life upside down in the process.
The Hellsing Organization fights against monsters and other monster hunting groups with the help of its greatest weapon, the enslaved super-vampire Alucard.
As Harry Potter begins his sixth year at Hogwarts, he discovers an old book marked as "the property of the Half-Blood Prince" and begins to learn more about Lord Voldemort's dark past.

The young arctic fox Napoleon III, having escaped from the fur farm, ended up in the village of Kovylkino. Following him, hunters, fur farm workers, a police detachment and correspondents arrived in the village.
A struggling artist travels to Amsterdam to try to win back the heart of the woman he loves.
Stuck in a passionless relationship, a struggling romance novelist travels to France hoping to find his inspiration, where he unexpectedly finds much more than that.
Four guys serve their prison sentences in the jovial and not-very-authoritarian prison in Maribo.
Two love stories set in one location separated by two hundred years.

Life With Luca is a spin-off comedy series based on the long-running hit Life with Derek. The series picks up 15 years later, as Derek and his "Type A" personality daughter Skyler prepare to move in with aunt Casey and her extended family.
Ex-sweethearts are forced to reunite this Christmas when an eccentric billionaire threatens to buy out their seaside Caribbean town.
A dog travels to India with his family, but is mistakenly shipped to the opposite side of the country and embarks on a road trip to reunite with them.
The three unstoppable Ninja brothers fight to save their hero (Hulk Hogan) and Mega Mountain Amusement Park from the vicious kid-hating Medusa (Loni Anderson).
A piano player pretending to be visually-impaired, unwittingly becomes entangled in a number of problems as he witnesses the murder of a former film actor.
A piano prodigy who lost his ability to play after suffering a traumatic event in his childhood is forced back into the spotlight by an eccentric girl with a secret of her own.

In the crime-rampant city of Detroit, detectives Riko Delio and Jason Stone are assigned to dive deep into a vital case to put an end to the war on organized crime lead by a notorious gangster known all across the city as The Kingpin.
When his son is kidnapped, a government official has to find the money to meet the ransom request.
Paul, a phony politician commits a murder and leaks out the video by morphing a famous actor Kiran's face onto it. When Chitra, a journalist, finds out about it, she sets out to reveal the truth.
A man, sexually maimed by his former wife, lives vicariously through her affairs.
A couple has a fight after living together 5 years in Las Vegas. They go out and celebrate 4th of July, each with a new partner. Breakup?
A beautiful young Chinese woman has the adventure of her lifetime in peaceful romantic New Zealand.
When an obsessive gamer living in his parents' basement is forced to get a job, he embarks on the most epic quest of his life - to slay the corporate villains and save his princess.
A roadside incident shakes up a teenage girl's life by challenging her self-confidence and inner strength.
The story of a young doctor who lives a luxurious life based on credit cards, chasing girls and his bad intentions once he goes bankrupt.
Adults who have long ago lost their link to nature fail to understand the feelings a growing 12-year-old country girl has for a beautiful black stallion.

Sayuri, a coffee shop waitress, uses her supernatural powers to help those who are troubled by spiritual phenomena. She gradually gets involved in serious matters, eventually facing a fierce battle with the devil.

Nello saves the life of a dog but returns home to find his grandfather dead. Living under a haystack, he enters a drawing contest and wins the prize and the affections of a fellow artist, who adopts him.
Tania and Daniela exchange husbands during a wedding just for fun, but a fatal accident will create new, strange relationships.
A group of rebels set out to kill the oligarchs and military thugs who terrorize a war-torn planet in the remote Tau Ceti solar system.
A magical love story involving a man who lives his life like a ghost and a country girl that falls in love with him. On a rural mountain in Jumunjin, South Korea.
Several episodes of the 1966 TV series "The Green Hornet" edited together and released as a feature.
Two agents are assigned to break up a gang involved in counterfeiting, white slavery and drug smuggling.

When Rin-Tin-Tin's master is found murdered, Rinty is accused of the crime. Knowing who the real murderer is, Rinty travels to the frozen country; of the Northwest to track him down and bring him to justice, while clearing his own name.
A feature film using facts and myth to create fiction. "Reality is just a dream, when dreams become real"

The king of hearts has disappeared from the Kingdom of Cards, and the Joker and his friends set out on a quest to locate him, but there are other forces at play in the Kingdom, and someone might have an ace up their sleeve.

After the separation of her parents from her father, a 13-year-old girl is placed in an orphanage where she has difficulty settling in, but then begins to break away from her father because she sees through his selfishness.
In 1975, a group of small time criminals attempt to pull off the biggest heist in American history: stealing over $30 million from the Mafia in the smallest state in the union, Rhode Island.
Blade, now a wanted man by the FBI, must join forces with the Nightstalkers to face his most challenging enemy yet: Dracula.

In order to win the heart of counselor Cindy Keyes, kitchen boy Will Cross comes to realize that becoming King of the Camp takes much more than beating tough guy Chase Gunn in a wake boarding competition.
Teenage assassin sets out on a long voyage to gun down a witness under protection program, who luxuriates in the artificial worlds of Las Vegas.
A combat veteran, with serious psychological damage, stalks campers and hunters in the woods.
She prepares for an imminent end... He prepares for a start with her...
Acclaimed director Liu Chia-liang directs his brothers Gordon Liu Chia-hui and Liu Chia-yung in a wild and crazy ghostly film in this heralded sequel to The Spiritual Boxer.
After Jodi Kreyman gains popularity, her miscommunications start causing rifts with those around her and now she really needs to 'stand tall'.

A distant planet is overtaken by war, slavery and desolation after a tyrannical man murders the world's emperor. Is up to four jumbled man and the king's sweet-hearted daughter to change their reality.
During the 1960s, a Caribbean sailor and his tomboy daughter search for buried treasure but run into unsavory characters and a cute lawyer who's after romance.
A variety of losers in Dublin have harrowingly farcical intersecting stories of love, greed and violence.
Adaptation of Grimm's fairy tale "Der Teufel mit den drei goldenen Haaren"
Fisherwoman Tinay goes to the city to catch a higher-paying job. Instead, she dives in between the relationship of her boss's son and his complicated girlfriend.
Estranged sisters Dawn and Isabella Kimble struggle to fulfill their personal and professional dreams. Can a childhood wish under a December Sky bring these sisters together. again?
The forbidden love between a bouncer and a belly dancer both working at the same night club finds hope when they try to escape their individual destinies.
Valluvanar is an honest politician. When his son Kamban is arrested, he refuses to bail him out of jail. The opposition party takes advantage of the situation and thus helps Kamban escape from jail.
The story of Astroboy, a robot created by Dr Elephant, in the image of a boy, who has super strength and could fly.
A couple who have been together for several years try to decide if they should stay together.
Aris, a Greek man, becomes a no one in his own country and struggles to recover his self, living as a foreigner.
Several love stories set in one of the most interesting new cities in the world, Rotterdam.
Two crooked lawmen (Stomy Bugsy, Titoff) search for a precious stone to collect an inheritance.
Women train to become members of a SWAT team.
Story about a IT professional settled in US and married to an Indian girl. After marriage both living a happily ever after life but things changed when his ex-fiance ruined his marriage life.
A young girl turns to a department store Santa in the hopes that he will help find a new husband for her divorced mother.
Evil villain plots to take over the world using an army of invisible soldiers.
Achari tricks his Guru into taking a group trip to the US to pursue his dream girl, whom he met in India.
First film of a trilogy following the dramatic life of Rika, a half-Japanese/half-American woman who becomes the tough-as-nails leader of an all-girl crime gang.
Ravi and Suman. Happy in their world in the Chawl, their life takes a turn when Suman meets her old friend Neha, and happens to see her apartment.
It follows a vibrant couple as they meet and fall in love. Some unexpected things happen that make everything take a turn. Will everything be sorted out between them?
A cat who turns into a young woman helps a journalist protect their town from a factory boss with an evil plan.
A small town is being terrorized by a serial clown killer.
Set in the spring of 1972, Lacy, a teenage hitchhiker, gets lost in the forest of Bruce Peninsula, where she spends many hallucinatory, surrealistic days and nights attempting to escape.
8 years ago, two brothers set out to explore filmmaking by recreating their favorite film. The following is the product of that endeavor.
As they battle through evil men and orc-infested lands, two orphaned brothers align with a band of rogue warriors who swear their allegiance in the hazardous quest to hunt dragons.
A hitman tries to retire, but a beautiful thief may change his plans.
A deranged writer murders a maid after she resists his advances. The writer engages his brother's help in hiding the body, causing unexpected problems for both of them.
Henry Aldrich wants to win a trip to Alaska.
The king decided to bring archer to a nervous breakdown because he in love with archer's wife.
Valdemar and Sille meets Benedict, a man who claims to have been cursed to eternal life by a Norse shaman in the viking age.

An accomplished painter rents a dilapidated villa in the country, and soon finds himself absorbed in the property's history, particularly the murder of a sex-obsessed countess who died there decades prior.
Golgo 13 is assigned to murder a man named Boss Goa.

An alien scout lands on earth in the year 1854. The creature is searching for water and food. Once it finds what it needs, it will call in an invasion fleet. A lone cowboy must stand against the alien invader or all will be lost.
Dorothy, heir to the Oz throne, must take it back from the wicked Prime Minister Kruel with the help of three farmhands.

A young boy in a remote medieval outpost under siege from barbarian raids is beckoned to adventure when a celebrated master illuminator arrives with an ancient book, brimming with secret wisdom and powers.
Two generations of an Italian Mafia family, struggle for survival during the most ruthless and violent time in Detroit history.
A ruthless serial killer with a peculiar method of stalking and killing his victims comes face to face with a police officer turned invisible by a scientific experiment. Who will emerge triumphant?

Hiroka and Rei, two energetic girls. Umi and Mana, united by a strong friendship. Mr and Ms Owada, leading a collapsing relationship. A sudden tragedy can occur to anyone. This is a story about people's despair, and hope.

A dark comedy about a half-wild creature from the African jungle, which has been identified as a heir of the noble family, set in Germany in the 1930s, shows that in certain circumstances, people behave worse than animals in the jungle.
Man hopes to get a girlfriend which he loves but he ends up in friend zone.

Koshizu (Fuji), a young geisha, tries to kill herself but is saved by cook Yukichi (Sugahara). Rival geisha Adakichi (Yumi), greedy trader Yasukawa (Abe) and wealthy businessman Asai (Soganoya) add up to dramatic turns.

The devil encourages media personality Donald Trump to run for president of the United States, so he can have a political puppet. But throughout Trump's many gaffes, the devil wonders if he even has a chance of winning.
A 12 year old boy mixes up the reality and the adventure of the computer gaming into an unpleasant life style. His parents are not aware of the situation and the problem gets worse and worst.

Nine friends take a holiday at a Victorian home on a private island and uncover a game that when played brings out the worst in each of them. Jealously, greed, hatred, lust, all of the things they keep buried deep inside themselves rise to the surface and come to a boil.
A girl waits 50 years for a doctor's son to return from India, but when he does so he is married.
Ex bank robber and football hooligan George Bull tries to win his ailing father's approval by vowing to save his pub, conflicting with his own desire to stay on the straight and narrow.

Suresh Gopi's character name in this film is Rudra Simhan who is a yogi who gave up all worldly pleasures by listening to the call of his soul. When he comes back to his homeland after a long journey he comes in to the life of Haimavathi.
A village boy falls in love with a girl, who hails from a neighbouring village. They face many obstacles after the girl's father's arch-rival enters their life.

Life through the eyes of a sixteen-year old boy growing up in Boston's north side. Director Francine Pellegrino captures the richness of Boston-Italian heritage while exposing the importance of love, family, and neighborhood.
Wild-hearted mechanic boy Iwaki falls in love with the innocent but gang tied Michiko.
Jigar, an independent, carefree, insurance agent falls in love with Shruti. Soon he realizes that love is not eternal but it comes with an expiry date.
An update to the 1996 film 'Twister', which centered on a pair of storm chasers who risk their lives in an attempt to test an experimental weather alert system.
A story about a young singer and musician who hasn't been competing to work on his country

The Adventure Family was expecting a slower pace once they moved from LA to Tennessee in 2020. What they got instead was a classic 1980's adventure kick started by the discovery of a clue to a lost Civil War treasure in their own backyard.
Children of Varnu Street whose fathers work in nearby factories face the "Tuliana Empire" - a group of boys, children of merchants from the nearby Lauku Street.
Based on the novel "The Ballad of the Belstone Fox", this heartwarming film chronicles the life of a fox much smarter than the dogs that hunt him. In fact, they never could catch him!
Untitled animation movie based on an original medieval legend

Tommy leaves his kittens out for Santa to take back to the North Pole, but after a major allergic reaction Santa can't deliver presents anymore, so the kittens have to deliver the rest of the presents to all the boys and girls.

A lowly hospital orderly impersonates a recently deceased doctor and goes to work in the busy ER of a small hospital where he meets and befriends a nurse who slowly figures out his secret and helps him maintain his charade.

A crew is shooting a libertine costume film when Valentin, the director, suddenly disappears. While the local police investigate, the film shoot continues but takes an odd turn. Robin, the cameraman and director's lover, follows a promise.
In an alternate universe where the wild west never ceased, a lone traveler happens upon a town facing the brunt of lawless creeds and political chaos.
A coming of age story of a young teenage couple as they struggle with an unwanted pregnancy and the pressures it brings. Their decisions separately and jointly have severe and dramatic consequences.

After being cursed into the Labyrinth with the Demigod Minotaur, Ariad sets out to remove the curse and claim title to the throne of Knossis, but finds her younger sister Raven and her mother, Queen Pasiphae, battling for the same throne.
An alcoholic lawyer who successfully defended a notorious gambler on a murder charge objects when his free-spirited daughter becomes romantically involved with him.
Ladybug and Cat Noir Awakening, is an upcoming animated musical film based on Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug and Cat Noir.

Six separate episodes: would-be suicides discuss their despair. A provincial dance hall. An investigative reporter posing as a husband-to-be. A young unwed mother. Girl-watching techniques of Italian men. A glimpse into prostitution.
Adapted from a J.B. Priestley play with many of the original actors. The tale of various people who have come to live in an "ideal" city and their hopes and reasons for doing so.
A story of a young man's quest to avenge the death of his older brother.
Features five French innovative and "shocking" shorts, produced and directed by the new generation of Gallic cinema: "Patiente 69"; "Teen Funkle Paradise"; "Propriété commune"; "Nue"; and "Bom".
A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.
A mother finds out that her daughter not only has a new relationship with a Cuban, but is also getting married in Cuba. She wants to put a stop to the doomed marriage, and takes the first plane.
