Two real life dacoits of Chambal, Mohar Singh and Madho Singh starred in this film.

Fun Down There follows a week in the life of Buddy, a naif who arrives in Manhattan ready to fall in love. The film's dry lends itself to a refreshingly casual quality about the sex scenes-plus there's a happy ending.
Three rich trustees are murdered - appearing as suicides. When a bus filled with orphans and three other rich trustees has an "accident," Colonel Bingham investigates.

As a young autistic girl uncovers her own unique powers as a chess prodigy she must battle her way past male Grandmasters in the misogynistic world of competitive chess and achieve the title of youngest ever World Champion.
An introspective young girl falls for the new boy in class, an outcast who is also a hemophiliac.

The director of a famous theater in 1930s Bucharest and his Jewish dramatist are preparing a show designed to satirize the fascist (legionnaire) movement, but the legionnaires are determined to stop the spectacle by any means.

Based on true events, a man is dealt with a bad hand in life. Anger and bitterness gravitate dark forces that taunt him. Would he get the chance to redeem himself and overcome his darkness before it's too late.
A young female artist with a vivid imagination takes on a boring work experience job only to come up with an idea that may change the world.
Two contract killers are hired by competing cartels to hunt down an elusive drug scientist. The scientist escapes, leading to a globetrotting chase and fight for survival.

During a night of partying, a normal group of friends get in trouble with Aunt Marilyn, a mobster and the owner of a well-known club in Santiago. To come out of the mess, the friends will go from expert boozers to fledgling gunslingers.
While investigating a crime syndicate, a dedicated cop crosses path with a mute vagrant who turns out to be an undercover agent that would eventually help him with his fight agaist it.
A 11 year old disabled girl, routinely pimped out by her prostitute mother, is saved by a suicidal cab driver. Together they go on a journey of redemption that forever changes their lives.

After Tim, a crypto currency trader loses his life's savings after an insider tip goes wrong. Tim meets Juan Jones a local Miami shylock who takes Tim for a ride through the streets of Miami for a night of corruption, and self-discovery.
After a deadly encounter with his Russian half-brother, Nick Salt must find St. Stephen's golden shotgun and avenge his friends.
The Bowery Boys investigate a murder, and all the evidence points to the involvement of the notorious Loop gang.
Javier wants to forget his ex. But it's impossible when she's always online. Getting drunk and partying it's the only solution. Or not?
An anti-Hollywood film, that explores what really happens to people in their family life when they are forced to deal with death, betrayal, and each other.
The murder of a young woman in London exposes deep racial tensions and prejudices inherent in the area.
An anthology of three loosely connected occult tales, with ironic and romantic twists.
Two teens battle their way through a religious apocalypse on a mission to defeat the Antichrist.
A fugitive is having plastic surgery to hide his identity, while committing another crime.

After the death of his father, a boy growing up on a lunar mining colony takes a trip to explore a legendary crater, along with his four best friends, prior to being permanently relocated to another planet.
A public relations man for a movie studio uses an early form of television to help solve a murder.

A former terrorist has started a lawful career, being a truck driver. On a trip he ignores the warnings given about the mafia, which leads to them setting fire to his truck, which has his wife on board. This has to be avenged.
Plot details are unavailable at this time.
Four strangers, each of them possessing their own secrets, work together to pilot a crudely constructed submarine that is loaded with cocaine to safe harbor with the Coast Guard in pursuit.
Santa has to get a job as Santa to earn money to pay his overdue rent bill
An impoverished advocate faces challenges after he falls in love with a wealthy woman who has a look-alike courtesan sister.

Eight years after the battle for the Book of Omniscience, the peaceful lives of Touma, Rintaro, Mei and Kento are troubled by a mysterious new Falchion who can seemingly erase people from existence altogether.
A young Frenchman arrives in Northern California looking to forget a lost love and ends up encountering various forms of feminine power.

High up on a mountain peak surrounded by clouds, a secret Yeti society lives in peace and harmony. One day, a Yeti witnesses an airplane crash; Inside lies "Smallfoot", a legendary creature that will rock the society to its core.
Set in the Anti-Japanese War, Chinese archaeologists and patriots fight to protect the national treasure.
Homicidal sheriff Thomas Jefferson Geronimo is tasked with escorting a mobster to Malta. When the prisoner escapes, Geronimo goes to catch him.
Amid a series of brutal killings of Indian agents in London, a RAW officer and India's Ambassador to Great Britain race against time to find the traitor within their own ranks.
The old man Petterson is trying to sleep but his cat Findus is keeping him awake, so they both agree that Findus shall have his own house. Based on the beloved books by Sven Nordqvist.

On the day of his girlfriend's marriage, Gautam gets kidnapped by an unknown criminal. Bored on the way to the kidnapper's den, Gautam is forced to narrate his cute love story which is filled with loads of twists and turns.
A gender-swapped retelling of Charles Perrault's classic, where Cinderfella is visited by a fairy godfather to help him escape from his wicked stepmother and stepbrothers.
From the strange horizon he came - bringing justice to a place of violence and greed.

An exploration of British history, culture and society since King Arthur. It opens on two protagonists dressed in white presenting and arguing their views on the 10 rules that really govern Great Britain and the United Kingdom.

When Belle, struggling with the loss of her mom, is sent to live with her grandfather, she soon becomes the savior of all living things! An old race horse and Atticus the dog change Belle's life, and in turn the life of those who love her.
An African game hunter sends his young son to school in London, but the boy is lonesome until he discovers the zoo.
A team of secret agents are sent around the world to track down and expose weapons of mass destruction and take down corrupt government officials and criminal king pins.
An ex-con man and his five trained Dobermans help a Treasury Dept. agent stop a racketeer and his gang.
On her 7th birthday, Princess Barbara discovers a magical book that transports her to Wonderland - an enchanted place filled with dragons and fantastic creatures.
Two very close brothers, one autistic, spend their days living in fantasy together until a girl inevitably comes between them.

Cinnamon colored, expressive button eyes and clearly showing the wear and tear of a dramatic lifetime. Theo tries to understand what all the commotion is about him. After all he is just an old teddy bear.
A rough and tumble loser tries to survive a series of chaotic events in a world of booze, sex, guns and dingy motels.

A queer lady holiday romantic comedy that follows the lives of three very different couples in dealing with their love lives in various loosely interrelated tales all set right before Christmas through New Years.
Victim of a plot which has resulted in his imprisonment in a Central African jail for two years, a French secret agent arrives in Paris to settle accounts.
Pablo returns to his home village to confront his fears.
In an era where aliens have invaded and conquered feudal Tokyo, a young samurai seeks work as he can.
Based on the popular novel by Francine Pascal, Victoria Martin and her mother just do not get along. It takes a curious incident for Victoria to realize that her mother was once also a teenager.
A senator's daughter (who can't help singing) follows her boyfriend West in the days of the California gold rush.

In a hot and politically challenged Cairo actress Aida and her neighbor, the aging diva Samiha, are thrown out on the streets. Together with the street smart Yassin, they try to find a place to live, forcing them to confront with their past.

The Underworld is ruled by organized crime syndicates, every crime lord wants to take control over the empire, but the Ramses family play by their own rules and they're about to bring a new order to the criminal organizations.
The filmmaker has to go undercover and go through 3 trials in order to take down the mob boss known as Goldberg.
Jr. and his friends get super powers again but goes horribly wrong.
A dying filmmaker makes one last movie. It goes badly. Oh, and there's a man-eating tree.

Royal Marine Officer Michael Richards meets his first love Angela Bridges just before a ceremony at an English chapel but even though they are still in love he knows a secret which could part or reunite them forever.

The film revolves around a young man whose dad wants him to marry only a girl from Kerala, as he feels they are most beautiful. The young man goes to Kerala for the purpose and what happens there is told in a humorous way.
Charlie Vespa is the worlds most Skilled assassin and wants revenge for the death of his family.
A folktale of the Zhuang nationality of Guangxi province about the daughter of the King of Feathers wedding night.

In this fully animated, all-new take on the Smurfs, a mysterious map sets Smurfette and her friends Brainy, Clumsy, and Hefty on an exciting race through the Forbidden Forest, leading to the discovery of the biggest secret in Smurf history.
When your average person has a bad day nobody dies. When a hitman has a bad day nobody dies either... and that's a problem.
When troublemaker Stefan finds himself on the Naughty List, he must find a way to return home after a Christmas demon named Krampus whisks him away to a dangerous magical land.
A comedy about a recently single guy who moves in with his womanizing brother who tries to teach him the guidelines on how to pick up girls and to stay away from love.

On a cold winter day, Plop and his gnome friends get a visit from Pinki, a penguin that escaped a evil woman that wants to create Pinguin Soup. The gnomes travel to the South Pole to rescue all the penguins, before it's too late..
An American living in 19th-century Tahiti gets involved in intrigue against the French colonial government.
Two mediocre law students from Mexico city plan a virtual kidnapping of a journalist daughter, so they can have a party weekend

A brilliant scientist is plucked out of the company lab and sent to India to sell the genetically modified rice she created - which she doesn't realize will destroy the farmers she thinks she's helping.

Fercho and Balu come up with a creative plan to meet the girl across the street, an American exchange student from New York. The perfect plan goes unexpectedly out of control when uninvited guest show up.
Two young children and their parents help a trio of aliens transformed as friendly dogs to escape the clutches of a local UFO hunter as they repair their spaceship.

Danny and Jonas are two petty crooks who dream of moving into the big scene. When their carefully-planned kidnapping goes askew, Danny and Jonas find themselves in a tangle neither of them can handle.
Mixed race love story set during a hot summer in London's Portobello district.
A witch lives by herself in an old mansion. She gets two apprentices, and her closed world starts to open up.
A private detective's wife takes over his business when he enters the Army.
A hero known as "Relámpago" takes from the rich to give to the poor, and takes justice into his own hands.
A family's adventures at their weekend country farmhouse.
Emma, 17, meets Thierry, 27, her new math teacher.
Two death-obsessed sisters, outcasts in their suburban neighborhood, must deal with the tragic consequences when one of them is bitten by a deadly werewolf.
In a twist on "A Christmas Carol" and "Groundhog Day" a woman experiences seven years of her future over the course of one week.
A timid high-school freshman has seven days to help a zany extraterrestrial harvest an alien substance hidden beneath his school, by disguising him as a substitute teacher.
Cowboy is wrongly accused of a bank robbery, or is he ? The courts story of what happened is different from his story....Did he or did he not, that is the question. You'll have to figure it out.
Ivan Megharoopan is conceived as the eventful life journey of poet laureate K.P. Madhavan Nair, a character drawn from the life story of the great Malayalam poet P. Kunhiraman Nair.

Alice Lee (27) goes to LA to visit her Brother Ralf Lee (32), just to discover that has been lying to the family and works serving tables. Alice and Ralf go on a fun and unexpected adventure where they rediscover their brotherly bond.
About a young girl who finds a pair of pink ballet shoes and is taken to a magical ballet land.There she learns how to help her friends and follow her instincts.
A spirited multi-cultural romantic comedy that asks, very tongue-in-cheek, if true love is indeed just like they show in the movies!
When Thulasi Raman, a teacher, is falsely accused of killing a man, his son Sethu, a librarian, sets out to find the real culprit.
Kings Gaspar, Melcior, and Balthazar are on their way to Bethlehem to worship the newborn baby Jesus, but the Devil is determined to stop them by disrupting their journey every foot of the way.
A financier's secret wife saves a dancer from bigamy.

When a Saxon boy and his sister are captured by fierce Vikings, they are separated and the boy must conquer his deepest fears and go on a quest to the frozen Troll kingdom to save his sister from being sacrificed by the evil Viking Queen.

Sarah is a Christian woman, She tells about the time she almost fell in love. Sarah also reveals personal memories about loved ones. Sarah Woodland is a complicated woman whose story goes between past and present experiences.

When Monica's horse, Champion, breaks horse tradition and reveals to her that horses can talk, Monica helps him figure out what kind of horse he wants to be when he grows up and ultimately discovers her own path as well.
After a year-long marriage, the couple proceeds to a lawyer to file a divorce. Still, it astounds into a situation where they must choose between separating or getting out of a police investigation.

While in Canada Timmy and Lassie encounter a downed hot air ballonist. By accident they end up in the balloon which takes them into the wilderness. The young boy and his dog must find a way to survive even fending off a wild pig.
Jesus Morales is an expert hitman, he's in congress to kill his former Congressman boss.
A sexy mystery about temptation and primal forces set on a mystical island in the Bermuda triangle.
A Mexican-American Mafia kingpin is released from prison, falls in love for the first time, and grows introspective about his gangster lifestyle.

A van carrying crores of cash. One rainy night in the outskirts of Mumbai. Unaware of each other, three stray gangs cross paths on the hunt. Unfortunately, all of them have the same plan. Will they bite the bone or will they lose to greed?

A robbery goes horrifyingly wrong when five have-a-go criminals are forced to take refuge from the police in an old castle. What starts out as 'one last job' quickly becomes a hilarious, fun-filled journey of ghostly misfortunes.
Well, the Walls Family is back at it again, and many things have taken place since the last gathering. What is Mother Mabel and her gang up to this time around?
As Terry McGinnis returns to Gotham, he must become Batman to fight the forces of evil, bringing him face-to-face with villains such as The Phantasm and The Black Mask.
One of the greatest and bravest incident from the life of The Great Maratha King Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj where he defeated Afzalkhan with his brilliant tactics and courage.
Three women of different generations living in a waning industrial town, struggle to restore meaning in their life
A chain of events changes Vinod's life - from honest journalist to black marketer to an underworld Don and a Racketeer in order to combat Vardhan.
Based on millennia old Bulgarian tradition and myth, the Kukeri are humanity's defenders against vampires and supernatural powers.

A town hatches an ingenious plan to cope with the loss of it's crops meanwhile Magda's dreams ferment to reality in the dusty red desert. A rock'n roll heroine is born, a marriage saved, villains foiled, and the world watches as a young boy from an impoverished shanty town holds the dreams and hopes of an entire community.
A terminally ill man sets up his best friend, whom he has loved since high school, so that she will not be lonely after he passes away.
A rollicking comedy ever to hit the screen.
Three young martial artists travel to the big city to retrieve a sacred statue that was stolen by ninjas for a criminal gang.
In 1945, during a 48-hour leave, a soldier accidentally meets a girl at Pennsylvania Station and spends his leave with her, eventually falling in love with the lovely New Yorker.
A musical retelling of the classic tale of Cinderella. In the tiny kingdom of Euphrania, the King and his court are anxious to get Prince Edward wed. But Edward wants to marry for love.

Udhaya and Vasanthi love each other, but when he learns that she is engaged to another, he moves to another city. Here he is framed for a crime; Vasanthi finds out and sets out to prove his innocence.

When Laali, who loves Shyamu, refuses to marry Kalidas her siblings, Dhanna, and Bhabhi, Bhagwanti, are asked to leave. When Dhanna is unable to grow anything, he decides to take the assistance of Thakara, the Bhagwan Shri Vishnu.
Plot is being kept under wraps. Based on the 2019 hit video game by Hideo Kojima.
Claude is a ruthless and efficient contract killer - until he finds his next target is a woman.
Set in the tough expanses of rural West Texas, two lost souls fall in love and will either continue their downward spiral, or find one last chance at redemption.
A family of Appalachian children live together in the backwoods so that they can stay together after the death of their widower father.
A young man steals some jewels from his aunt, then blames her caretaker whilst threatening to implicate her in a scandal about her illegitimate daughter.

When an FBI agent's daughter and a cult leader's son are snowed in on a romantic getaway, they realize that their families have followed them. Unaware of the other's family business, they must keep their parents apart and secrets at bay.
An American leaves his wife and child and flies to Paris where he falls for a neurotic tour guide.

Bukit Kepong is an adaptation from Bukit Kepong incident that was an armed encounter which took place on 23 February 1950 between the Federation of Malaya Police and the gunmens of Malayan Communist Party during the Malayan Emergency.
The story of a professional fraudster who can only speak the truth and a lie detector who has been trolled online.
After an unpleasant experience, Poorna decides to leave Arjun. However, Arjun asks for a second chance and requests that she give him six days, within which he will prove that he truly loves her.

Irregular migrants Okwe and Senay work at a posh London hotel and live in constant fear of deportation. One night Okwe stumbles across evidence of a bizarre murder setting off a series of events that could lead to disaster or freedom.
A comet crashes into a Japanese forest and a group of mighty ninjas must fight a group of killer Aliens before they reach their village and kill everyone.
A comedy about a psychiatrist whose number-one patient is an insecure mob boss.
The Thunderhawk team is back, this time they must protect an cosmic child from aliens who have come to earth to hunt it down.

Bhanuchander, a cop gets murdered at a guest house. The investigating officer Vijay Shanker takes up the case and suspects it to be a possible homicide. Will Vijay and Bhanuchander's wife (Suhasini) be able to track the criminals?
The film finds the duo in the Wild West where they help save a ranch from the hands of a villain. The rivals team up to help a cowgirl and her brother save their homestead from a greedy land-grabber.

A couple visits a holiday home for their honeymoon and the woman is found murdered on the following day. Superintendent of Police Siddharth Mahadev (Suresh Gopi) investigates the case and unravels the shocking truth.
A young married couple is visiting a secluded estate near the coast, hoping to spend a picturesque summer weekend together. However, things aren't exactly the way they seem.
12-year-old Nino is assaulted for being homosexual. In an effort to protect the boy, his parents move the family to a small rural village.
The super agents must act in the middle of the fight of two enemy gangs to capture a scientist and produce changes in the weather.
An abused orphan sinks into a life of crime.
When the Devil's daughter is bored with life in hell her father sends her to Earth to convert the people there to evil.
The sleazy and dangerous adventures of a gorgeous female private detective.
The only thing that can truly set you free is Love.
A big-city narcotics officer uncovers an illegal drug operation in a small town which may prove to run too deep to take down even with the help of an undercover deputy.
Ramesh, a rich irresponsible man, travels to America and returns back a changed man with immense love for his country. But he faces several challenges as he sets out to reform the society.
An unsolved case. An unknown criminal. An obsessed cop. His investigation plunges him into a world of darkness and violence, pulling everyone around him into a web of destructive passion and revenge.
A troubled teenage girl befriends a timid boy who insists that he hasn't left his house in more than 60 years.

A Secret Service Agent is held captive in the trunk of a car and endures mental and physical torture as terrorists attempt to extract information for their plot against the President of the United States.
A loyal Italian father must defend his son who inadvertently sparks a mob war between the Sicilian and Albanian crime families.
A middle-aged woman breaks free from her withered marriage and falls in love with a man who ends up marrying not her, but her daughter
This film is a heavy drama about the downfall of moral values of a family when proper religion teaching is not being instilled in them since they were small.
Love-ful, Romance-ful ,Laugh-ful, Alive with Songs and Dances.
Led by British officers, partisans on Crete plan to kidnap the island's German commander and smuggle him to Cairo, Egypt to embarrass the occupiers.
A multi-billion dollar corporation produces a serum that turns humans into super-soldiers and sells them on the Black Market. They are opposed by an unknown group who is trying to expose them.

The illegitimate son of a nobleman defends peasants from greedy rulers, confounds local bandits, and struggles for permission to marry his tasty upper-crust sweetheart despite their vast societal differences. Then ninjas arrive.
Black handicapped man is trapped into his wheel-chair and his imagination.

A bounty hunter learns that his next target is his ex-wife, a reporter working on a murder cover-up. Soon after their reunion, the always-at-odds duo find themselves on a run-for-their-lives adventure.
A rich and spoiled daughter of a businessman seduces a charming fisherman, upsetting his life and his relationship with the woman he loved and was about to marry.
Friendly but forgetful blue tang Dory begins a search for her long-lost parents and everyone learns a few things about the real meaning of family along the way.
A hack photographer tries to help a group of people escape from a high-rise office building which is haunted by a mischief-making ghost.
A girl helps the 'Avenger' trace a betrayer, the man who killed her father.

When a shocking massacre in a small-town diner leaves no clues, Forensic Psychologist Dr. Jane Halifax (Gibney) teams up with Senior Detective Eric Ringer (Jackman) for one of the toughest cases of their careers.

Two young ladies meet at a cafe and become friends, and their friendship soon develops into a relationship. But when both their families know about the relationship, one family accepts it while the other family does not.
19th century story about a woodcutter in Frisia who becomes famous for making puppets.

The cab driver sets American Zed up with Zoe in his Paris hotel. Despite FFR1000 charged, she's an art student with day jobs e.g. bank. Safecracker Zed meets his junkie friend after 11 years to rob a bank.
A bank runner is accused of killing a woman for whom he deposited a large amount. Reporter and bank official investigate.
A stoner befriends a Great Dane, who is the pet of his neighbor, and tries to make her fall in love with him.

After a devastating tsunami in 2010, southern Florida and the Caribbean islands have been left in ruin. Citizens attempt to rebuild their lives and start anew, but the streets have been taken over by gangs and overrun with criminals.
Sherlock Holmes and Dr. John H. Watson join the hunt for the notorious serial killer, Jack the Ripper.
In a desperate attempt to win a basketball match and earn their freedom, the Looney Tunes seek the aid of retired basketball champion, Michael Jordan.

Ian Winter, a jobless ex-con, has left the life of crime with a promise that he will get his life in order. But his first job turns into a bloodbath. A group of cut-throat African gangsters murder his girlfriend. Now Ian's out for blood.
A gothic tale of obsession between a haunted young woman in 19th century Germany and the ancient Transylvanian vampire who stalks her, bringing untold horror with him.
When an aging, but gentlemanly stagecoach robber is released from prison, he decides to go to Canada to become a train robber.
A bar manager deals drugs on the side and tries to recruit her employees, friends and customers.
A super-powered boy helps a wheelchair-bound policeman in his attempt to bring down a mob kingpin.
A traditional Chinese family faces a number of obstacles after their daughter is diagnosed with dyslexia.
A guy tries to find outside what he is unable to find inside.

A recently divorced woman is downsizing. Her adopted Korean daughter is helping her pack. When a treasured Korean cultural item is broken, the woman travels to New York's Koreatown to see if she can get it fixed. An adventure awaits her.
Childhood sweethearts fight to be together.
An atheist park ranger and a bible salesman find themselves thrown into a slimy conspiracy that threatens to destroy not just the woods - but the entire world.
A troubled young man struggling to right himself after the premature death of his father.
The film centers around how the real-world novel How Do You Live? features prominently in the protagonist's life.

Two struggling pals dress as police officers for a costume party and become neighborhood sensations. But when these newly-minted "heroes" get tangled in a real life web of mobsters and dirty detectives, they must put their fake badges on the line.

An ordinary man, a simple priest, is murdered protecting people completely unlike him, yet, in his eyes, they are exactly the same. 40 years later, it must be proven that he was killed for his faith to be considered a martyr.
I lost my wife. Who is responsible?
A woman goes home with the best-looking stranger, only to discover she's been kidnapped.
When a mysterious cell phone signal causes apocalyptic chaos, an artist is determined to reunite with his young son in New England.
Talking babies go on an adventure.
When two children move into an old house with their mother they find magical mystery involving a lively spirit and a precious diamond.
Ana is a successful woman, however, but unhappy because of the death of her mother, on a fantastic trip to the land where her mother was born, Ana finds peace with herself and her mother.
Set during the Sung Dynasty, patriotic monks of the Shaolin Temple fight against foreign invasion
In the waning years of the Ming Dynasty, influential eunuch Wei Zhongxian extends his corrupt control over state affairs for selfish gain.
A recently widowed woman is on the road with her precocious young son, determined to make a new life for herself as a singer.
A freelance stenographer is hired for a job, but when she arrives at the address she was given, she finds that a murder has taken place there--and she is arrested for it.
THREE TROUBLE-PRONE BROTHERS THEIR COLLECTIVE MONICKER AFTER THE DREADED PRISON GANG IN THE NATIONAL PENITENTIARY BECAUSE OF THEIR FIERCE STANCE IN STREET FIGHTS.

Side by Side explores, with refreshing honesty, the unique bond between a brother and a sister. Facing the rest of their childhood apart, they runaway in search of the only person who can keep their family together.
Two teenagers fall in love, but their feuding families and fate itself cause the relationship to end in tragedy.

A Safecracker has one night to repay a debt before he can leave town, all the while trying to win back the woman he left behind, as well as duck a crooked P.O., a burned out Narc Cop and a former partner in crime with a mysterious grudge.
This is the story of Yuma a strong-willed and rebellious girl from the poor neighborhoods of Managua who dreams of being a boxer.
Two down-and-outs bonded together in misfortune devise a plan to rob a small town amusement arcade.
Nonso plans an overly dramatic proposal to his girlfriend. Everything goes wrong and then he goes missing.
An imaginative person finds his desired partner by building a female shape for interior decoration at his working place.
After a silent, masked individual encounters a man with a television for an arm; horror, euphoria and madness ensue.
Various stories are connected under the theme of fantasy and desire and start a fantastic experience that leads all to one universe.

Sasural is a 1984 Hindi movie produced by Biswanath Prasad Shahabadi and directed by Govind Moonis. The film stars Arun Govil, Bharat Bhushan, Arvind Deshpande, Gulshan Grover, Sadhana Singh and Dina Pathak.

As per a new rule, any person can join the police force. Many people including Krishnaveni, a simple girl, and Radhakrishna join. Both fall in love too. Soon it is revealed that Krishna is a naxalite.
A criminal bides his time at a seedy motel, waiting for his boss after killing several men and making away with a mystery bag.
An elderly couple live by themselves while their children are settled abroad; they take each day as special and enjoy their life.
When the boy hero Shazam is offered to join the Justice League he is reluctant about it, but when his rivals the Monster Society put the League in peril he's the only one who can save them.

Follows two infamous London gangsters, Mickey Mannock and Ray Collishaw. Both men are top of the food chain when their world is turned upside down as they lose a shipment of the Russian Mafia's cocaine.
A murdered man is reincarnated as a housefly and seeks to avenge his death.
Just when you think you know what you're seeing...you don't. Everything you can imagine is real.
While protecting a crime boss's home in the Carpathian Mountains, a contract killer and his old friend get into a dangerous situation when the boss's wife is accidentally killed.

Jonas stumbles into a mysterious tavern which is detached from time and where people from all kinds of different eras meet. He falls in love with a Jazz singer from the 60s. But the time between the two will become their greatest enemy.
When strange, supernatural murders suddenly become the talk a peaceful town, two detectives must solve a deadly game, but will the myth of this game reveal secrets too close to home.

Best friends Sophie and Agatha find themselves on opposing sides of an epic battle when they're swept away into an enchanted school where aspiring heroes and villains are trained to protect the balance between Good and Evil.

Early 1700: Cartographer Jonathan Green (Jason Flemyng) from Forbidden Empire (2014) is back to map the Russian Far East. He's forced on to China, where he confronts the Dragon Master et al. The iron masked Russian Czar escapes the Tower of London to a Russian ship.
Olympian gods watch the Earth and resolve to fight a group of terrorists who stole a diskette containing a secret that can destroy the world.
Kathi loves her horse more than anything in the world.
Nobita and his friends go to rescue Shizuka into the world of the "Arabian Nights (Thousand and One Nights)".
Four children free a mermaid, and in so doing must face an enemy and their fears.
Our intrepid adolescent heroes wake up to find their beloved television stolen, and embark on an epic journey across America to recover it, and, who knows, maybe even score.
Tabloid reporter Allie is looking for a story. Pop musician Caleb's manager suggests one on Caleb's love life, and to create a story if none exist. Caleb was Allie's kid friend/crush.
After returning to the criminal underworld to repay a debt, John Wick discovers that a large bounty has been put on his life.

The imperial guard and his three traitorous childhood friends ordered to hunt him down get accidentally buried and kept frozen in time. 400 years later pass and they are defrosted continuing the battle they left behind
A CIA agent attempts to save a captured princess and return her to her father.
A day laborer is badly beaten, and a young man nurses him back to health.

'Holidays' is an anthology feature film that puts a uniquely dark and original spin on some of the most iconic and beloved holidays of all time by challenging our folklore, traditions and assumptions.
The inspiring and unknown true story behind MercyMe's beloved, chart topping song that brings ultimate hope to so many is a gripping reminder of the power of true forgiveness.

A sexy squad of female ninja assassins is hired by a ruthless magistrate to exterminate his former lovers, who threaten to ruin his reputation. Battles erupt with a hilarious mix of martial arts and magic--all in the line of duty.
Dan Curly sends two hitmen to kill double-crossing Flicker Hayes, who retreats to a small village with ex-prostitute Rose to hide.
A young man who does not believe in arrange marriage, stood against his father wishes and embark on quest of love.
In order to attain wealth and a luxurious life, a greedy wife sells her husband to a rich woman. However she realizes that with a luxurious life, she has to pay a heavy price for this decision.
A teenager is accused of murdering a gas station owner.

Set in 1985, Manila, 3 Filipino siblings spend an extended summer waiting to immigrate to the United States, while the Philippines gets ready to evict their homeland's notorious dictator, Ferdinand Marcos.
A mother takes her children and flees an abusive ex-husband.

Two best friends grow up together and meet two delightfully impish boys leading to the four to flirtatiously intermingle. The innocence of partner swapping eventually leads to a roller-coaster bouts of misunderstood emotions.
A group of friends are forced through a supernatural psychiatric experiment on Halloween Night where they must survive real-life horrors as well as those unlocked deep within their minds.

The Club of Five is a summer adventure film about A charismatic group of childhood friends who uncover a great mystery. There are dark forces at work that could affect the Sinterklaas celebrations for generations.
Amir is a foul guy who has killed a man in Abadan, he returns to Tehran and continuing his misdeeds trying to convince his girlfriend Zarry to escape with him to the south of Iran.

On the run from the year 700, Oda finds shelter in a Dutch village. Blind resident Hilde is asked by Oda for help. When they embark on their adventure together, Hilde soon finds out that this will change her life forever.

9-year-old Krista is so annoyed with her little brother Tyler, she wishes he would turn into a bug. However, when the kids' mysterious nanny makes her wish come true, drama, chaos, and a whole lot of bugspray ensues.
A terrible fate awaits a young couple who find themselves stranded in a guest house filled with evil spirits.

A bunch of scoundrels and members of the Spanish youth, who until now have not paid attention more than in the police stations. They are a group of friends who survive as they can in the suburbs of Madrid.
A police captain's niece is trapped by white slavers.

Riki-Oh, a young man who has superhuman strength, is incarcerated in a private prison, where inmates are treated like slaves. He is forced to use his unstoppable form of martial arts to destroy the corrupt officials and their lackeys.

Mattie escapes an abusive home from her wealthy arranged husband, Floyd, with the help of Floyd's nephew, Thomas. Floyd now attempts to bring them back with intentions of murderous revenge while employing the help of anyone he can buy.
A little boy growing up on a farm in rural Louisiana in the 1930s wishes for a White Christmas and must do a selfless act in the spirit of giving in order to get his wish.

Fleeing into the woods after committing a crime, Craig meets Walter, a man who has made his home in the forest. Walter takes Craig under his wing, and tries to help him become a new man, but this process is painful and dangerous.
Assorted people board a plane with a fire bomb in its luggage hold.
Two young adults who are coping with the deaths of their partners try to move forward with their lives and start a relationship with each other.
A man's story, Solitude and communication Following a woman's trail Memories, Human insight and lyricism
A girl and her fantasy universe in a brick oven.
Changes can be more than skin deep.
A love story between a girl who loves reading books, and a boy who has previously checked out all of the library books she chooses.
Three inseparable childhood friends are just out of college. Nothing comes between them - until they each fall in love, and their wildly different approaches to relationships creates tension.
An international Smuggler is caught in the crossfire of a war between two corporate giants, and targeted for execution to gain control of his cargo.
A wrestler and a bookseller disgraced by life fall in love with each other.

The mythical treasure of the Romanovs are traveling secretly through Greece, destination unknown.Three ordinary people, a security guard, a desperado and the head of a children's camp will be confronted by the "Diamond curse".
An uncompromising, visionary architect struggles to maintain his integrity and individualism despite personal, professional and economic pressures to conform to popular standards.

The Sun of the Sleepless. The film is about a doctor named Gela Bendeliani (Elgudzha Burduli) and his wealthless family in Tbilisi in Soviet Georgia. In the film Gela Bendeliani has an unlimited capacity for generosity and forgiveness.
Three friends persecute a gang of criminals from Harlem to the parties of the High Society of London.
Torchy Blane and Steve McBride try to nab a gangster by tracking his moll.
A troubled, kind hearted young girl must stop the bulldozing of her Gran's strawberry farm by an ambitious mayor in order to save her best friend - an orphaned koala named Smooch.

Inventor creates drug that allows people to live in their wildest dreams. Now, the drug is no more, and everyone who was on it is under house arrest. Garp learns to connect with himself, and in that, to take action.
An ultraconservative security guard suffers a debilitating stroke and is assigned to a rehabilitative program that includes singing lessons with the drag queen next door.
Plot is under wraps at this time.
A social satire in which a man realizes he would have a better life if he were to shrink himself to five inches tall, allowing him to live in wealth and splendor.
Gangster's girlfriend hangs out in a Las Vegas hotel with her cop protectors while she waits to testify.
A young girl falls in love with an experienced soldier.

It seems that Jack's hockey skills translate directly into tearing up the halfpenny and popping sick grinds. With his new buddy Ben by his side Jack takes off on a cross-country skateboard competition tour with hilarious results.
A humorous and heartwarming story about a boy who is charged with protecting a thousand-year-old dragon.
A police captain needs to balance between protecting the last remaining witness in a trial, and his rapidly disintegrating love life.
Two soul mates, who have only met in their dreams, must find each other on in order to defeat dark forces.
With help from his friends, a boy (Wyatt Bowen) trains a dog to compete in an annual event.
Tragedy strikes a group of immigrants crossing the border between Arizona and Mexico.

The Madagascar animals fly back to New York City, but crash-land on an African nature reserve, where they meet others of their own kind, and Alex especially discovers his royal heritage as prince of a lion pride.
A young woman enters an underground storage facility, where she soon finds herself trapped and stalked by a killer.
A man uses a case of mistaken identity to gain the confidence of a small village, and in the process exposes universal human traits: honour, greed, honesty, and eventually love.
Sid Hassler is a theater manager and song writer who can't find the inspiration to create new song numbers.
The sequel to Heart Stopper and continues the story on Jake Bishop and Christina Roberts.
A French gang of thieves flies over to Chicago for a one time job. However, things seem to get out of hand soon.
A love story about a 17-year-old punk-rocker and a 15-year-old runaway girl.
When six women all claim to have independently killed the same man, lawyer turned detective Lois Delgrad has hours to solve the crime or they all go free.
A girl is struggling with extreme poverty and the responsibility of taking care of her siblings. She falls in love, which would cause even more tragedy to her family and to herself.
A girl from the country falls deeply in love with a man from Seoul. However, he refuses to have anything to do with her as he has been promised in marriage since he was a child
A cross-cultural romance and an intercultural friendship between Ram, Rosy and Anu goes through a roller coaster ride of love, laughter and misunderstandings.
A kung Fu expert travels to America to take out a gang of mysterious villains responsible for the murder of his best friend.

A man and woman who have been together for 8 years choose their "allowed" celebrity hook-ups, not realizing how soon they would actually be meeting them in real life, and their couplehood is shaken up.

Thangamalai Thirudan is a 1986 Indian Tamil film, directed by A Kodandarami Reddy and produced by T Trivikrama Rao. The film stars Chiranjeevi and Radha in lead roles. The music of the film was composed by Ilayaraja.
As the daring thief Arsène Lupin (Romain Duris) ransacks the homes of wealthy Parisians, the Police, with a secret weapon in their arsenal, attempt to ferret him out.

In a violent, post-pandemic world, a peace-loving man is forced on a desperate journey to find life-saving drugs for his wife - but to get them he must first help an ornery old man defend his cabin against all-comers.

A kingpin smuggler kills a police officer and succeeds in separating his teen-aged sons. The elder son who had vowed to take revenge, accidentally meets his younger brother. The two join forces to bust the smugglers gang.
Age is a state of mind.
An exec at an online dating service forms a heated rivalry with another website.
A new highway threatens a Chicago neighborhood, so to protest the residents throw a block party.
Betrayed by his own brother Set, Osiris, a primeval king of Egypt, comes back to life to defend his kingdom.
A young policewoman went undercover to get a gangster's son to plant a microphone at a table where the gangsters make their deals. Complications arise when she finds herself falling for him.
Elmer is a huge hound dog with a big problem - he's quite old, but he thinks he's a pup. This gets poor Elmer into plenty of trouble.

A bus driver driving a really old bus has to battle with a new accountant who wants to buy a newer model, different ticket system and new regulations. They decided to fire the stubborn bus driver, but this is something not everyone like.
A monk turned body-builder, with the gift to see into people's lives, befriends a female cop, and uses his gift to change the force of Karma and her destiny.
In the year 2086 sapient beings from an esoteric dimension enter our world and trigger a chain effect that renders one young man to overcome his fears and save humanity from the brink of extinction.
The story of the Donnelly family's arrival in Canada and their realization that what they tried to escape from in Ireland continues in Canada.
While visiting a village in France, Cecile uncovers the darkest and most exciting secrets of the place.
A funeral director meets a man who has been battling Lou Gehrig's disease since he was young. The two fall in love and hope for a cure that can keep him alive.
A worn-out businessman and a beautician on the run collide in a Paris airport. Love arrives, all its hurdles be damned.
A P.I. is obsessed with a cute woman, who seduces and kills rich men around W. Europe.

Seeking to offer his son the satisfying summer camp experience that eluded him as a child, the operator of a neighborhood day care center opens his own camp, only to face financial hardship and stiff competition from a rival camp.
An evil alien searches the Earth for seven "Dragon Pearls" which can grant him ultimate power. A gang of misfit adventurers band together to stop him.
A young girl hurt by her father's alcoholism and abusive ways, meets an mysterious drifter that proves to be the glimmer of light in the darkness she has been searching for.
A woman lets a family friend take the blame after she accidentally runs over a man with a car.
A young woman returns to the mountain where her family spent their childhood summers in search of the sister that only she can remember.
Two young children try to help their beloved Uncle Bob deal with the aftermath of a disfiguring hunting accident.
The Marquis Louis Henri de Montespan challenges King Louis XIV in an effort to win his wife back.

To avoid an arranged marriage, Lisa escapes to the unknown; however, an announcement in the newspapers leads to two unexpected encounters: one with a handsome stranger, and the other with her uncle. Will she accept a preordained life?

Georgie thinks he has killed Hank. He flees with his pal Tim and ships off to the war in Europe, eventually serving in Germany after armistice. There Georgie falls for Gretchen and promises to marry only if he can right his past mistake.
A young girl named Alice falls down a rabbit-hole and wanders into the strange world of Wonderland.
A journalist becomes a victim of rape. To take revenge on the rapists, she makes a deal with the criminals. However, circumstances begin to unfold unpredictably .
A Stikbot needs to save the world.
A Minnesota community is being terrorized by a series of killings, targeting anyone who makes the headlines.
There is a reason you shouldn't go down into the woods today, as a gang of youths will soon discover that they're in for a bloody surprise - Literally.
This epic movie follows young shepherd David taking on the mighty warrior Goliath against all odds. Filmed in North Africa and London.
A woman battles against peoples' inner demons by gaining access to their soul.

Tukasa works for Tadaomy's loan shark company. He picks up more female debtors because of his appealing looks. One day, Erina appears in front of Tukasa. Erina used to be an idol and she now sings on the street.
A street-smart party girl gets mixed up in a violent drug deal and finds a possible way out by masquerading as a nun.
After three Clan leaders are assassinated, Kung Nan-Yen accuses Master Thief Chiu Liu-Hsiang as being the only man capable of the murders, but generously allows him one month to clear his name.
A young man is caught by the police as he attempts to steal food. He blames his crime on hardships caused by the war and begs his friend, a lawyer, to take his case
A young girl meets the doppelganger of her deceased boyfriend and now has a chance to find the people who have murdered him.
A girl tries to destroy her new friends life, and take her place in her family.
Medieval fable of sorcery and witchcraft in a remote corner of the Scottish highlands.
Celebrate the Christmas holiday with Lil' Santa and his adorable baby reindeer Mittens as they gather around the fire to tell a classic holiday, A Little Book For Christmas.
A montage of three intertwined stories set in a small New England town, all linked to an enigmatic woman named Rachel.
When her hit is spoiled, the world's number one assassin, the mysterious Japanese ninja Shinobi, takes refuge in the most unlikely place: a Moscow strip club.
A group of aspiring filmmakers must overcome a series of obstacles and conflicts as they strive to complete their cinematic masterpiece.

Set in the year 2092 and follows the crew of a space junk collector ship called The Victory. When they discover a humanoid robot named Dorothy that's known to be a weapon of mass destruction, they get involved in a risky business deal.
A young woman running an animal sanctuary in the outback takes her revenge on a trio of kangaroo hunters who terrorized her.
A film of a woman swimming in a pool is distributed through the internet. Now her husband and her brother are after finding the one who is responsible for that and taking revenge on him.
If you try to run away and hide from the truth, you circle back and end up where you started.
A frail waif, abused by her brutal boxer father in London's seedy Limehouse District, is befriended by a sensitive Chinese immigrant with tragic consequences.
Multi-part dramatization of the life of St. Paul.
Playful, hypnotic, and ecstatic, twelve licentious and naughty short films from the 1920s are deconstructed by multimedia artist Cécile Babiole, helped by Michel Reilhac.
A young girl named Jana takes a magical journey to Africa.
This beautiful re-imagining of Shakespeare's magical fairy tale "A Midsummer Night's Dream" is set modern day, under a full moon and during a Caribbean Festival.
Dahari treated Fariman's youngest son with suspicion that Fariman was not his real son but that his wife had an affair with a corporate member.
A group of friends accidentally records a crime, being forced to flee from cops sent by a corrupt senator.
Mytyl and her brother Tyltyl, a woodchopper's children, are led by the Fairy Berylune on a magical trip through the past, present, and future to locate the Blue Bird of Happiness.
Tasos dies in a car accident, but he is given five more minutes of life to use them as he wishes.

A story from the age of valiant knights, beautiful princesses, and evil sorcerers. Ruslan, an artist who dreams of becoming a knight, meets and falls in love with the beautiful Mila, without realizing that she is the King's daughter.
As time moves further into the future, Despite Zeus's orders Ares would provoke the humans to cause chaos in the seas angering Poseidon once again while he watches his home being destroyed by Humans.
In Japanese occupied Hong Kong a British agent works with a Chinese dancing girl to smuggle life-saving medicines to allied prisoners of war.
A white-trash mom is visited by three ghosts intent on showing her a path to a brighter future.

Nick McCallum is mechanic who trades in his wrench for a surfboard, going against the wishes of his father-- a former surfing legend who lost his ability to walk after a horrible accident on the water.
Bhobhar explores the life and relationships of a small farmer Rewat in rural Rajasthan, India.
Two martial art experts team up to fight a large and powerful gang that has been terrorizing a coastal town in southern China.
Ex-cop turned food reporter, Rhea Porter, has failed to find an take down the man who kidnapped her sister, twenty-two years ago.
A formal tailcoat that gets passed from one owner to another affects each life in a significant way.
A young girl struggles to create a relationship with her father after the death of her aunt who raised her.
Noémie learns of a treasure that is possibly hidden in her neighbor's house and she is going all out to find it.
A young couple that has just eloped find themselves mixed up in the murder of a blackmailing landlord.
Set in Kunnamkulam, a series of thefts takes place and the Police department is confused over the culprit and the mode of execution. Will they catch the real culprit?
A former professional wrestler is hired to be the bodyguard/nanny for a couple of bratty kids whose inventor father is being stalked by a rival.
The complete "Ramayana" epic covering Rama's birth, marriage to Sita, 14 years in exile, separation from Sita, victory over Ravana and coronation.
The Thunderhawk team is back, this time they must join forces with The Earth Defence Corps to take on an alien invasion and their giant robot.
Two friends try to kick their drug addiction after a friend dies from an overdose, when they try to enroll in a detox program, things quickly go wrong.
A comedy about the creation of the universe in six days, with the devil messing around and contributing in his own way.
A disgraced former American Special Forces operative attempts to clear his name by rescuing a judge's kidnapped daughter from a Mexican cartel.
Conan and his friends search for a foreign spy who might have also committed a murder.
A tragedic love story of a young couple Vimukthi and Parami who couldn't fulfil their romantic dream due to social status.

6 Danish human interest stories based on 6 newspaper ads in 1962: chest, typewriter, small apartment, baby carriage, employment for couple, room for rent and the 7th story on how the journalist met his love via "Dress for sale".
Russia, 1917, WWI. This is the story of the 1st Russian Women's Battalion of Death, formed as part of an ill-conceived propaganda ploy by the Russian Provisional Government in late May of 1917.
A lawyer's fiancée leaves him after he defends a racketeer accused of murder, but she needs his help when her new beau is accused of killing an old flame.
After the tragic death of her fiance, Karlina encounters strange dreams that call upon her return to her mother's village. Out of curiosity, Karlina start her mysterious journey.

A 17 y.o. Japanese secondary school student is living happily with his mom and sister but one day his stepdad returns, drunk much of the time and cruel to his mom and sister. Is there such a thing as the perfect murder?
A down on his luck drug dealer must survive as he attempts to sell off £500k worth of blow he stole from his supplier.
A retired all female heist crew is reactivated after 16yrs when the partner who took the fall is released from prison.
With the help of her coach, her mom, and the boy who drives the Zamboni machine, nothing can stop Casey (Trachtenberg) from realizing her dream to be a champion figure skater.
2001 Hindi film, directed by Jayant Gilatar. The film stars Mithun Chakraborty and Rajeshwari Sachdev in lead roles.

In a time, not too long ago, when illusions and delusions were still order of the day, two art-academy students came up with the unlikely idea to make a fantasy-film. Boy, were they in for a surprise or two.
The story follows police bureaucracy in Hong Kong.
A crook demands his Princess cousin in return for clearing a Prince of a theft charge.
A medic is hunted by guilt of killing a man in a car accident, a cop who staged an experiment of placing a dummy on the side of the road and a dead man found found on the side of the road.

Ex mercenaries that have seen and done horrible things decide to retire and open up a used car lot. They sold a lemon to the wrong person and find themselves reverting back to their old ways as mercenaries.
A Tennessee sheriff and lawyer want a jailed drifter to assassinate a mayoral candidate.
This is an action film following the adventures of Naya The Golden Dolphin Princess and her mission to save the Earth.
Nurse Yorke assists her boss, Dr Napier, who is able of effecting a new treatment on the ailing wife of a Lord.
A Dane who has lived in the States for 17 years return to his family farm.
On the 25th anniversary of his sister's rape/murder, Mitch (Maurice Benard) breaks into the home of the accused killer and tries to make the man confess.
In the world of espionage, some missions require an agent with a unique set of skills, possessing not just bravery but an ability to melt even the most villanious heart. This is a job for C.I.Ape .
A police officer who serves in the Marine Corps Reserves is faced with an ethical dilemma when it comes to helping his brother in prison.
Three brothers plot to collect an 18 year old debt on behalf of their infamous father OG Eddy but the heir to the throne Lucky might be a problem as he finds love in the wrong place.
A man begins to experience his life out of order: each time he falls asleep, he wakes up on a different day of his life, at a different age, and he never knows where or when he will be "tomorrow."
Adiong Untouchable is a sharp-shooter, Adiong Untouchable is a lady killer, Adiong Untouchable is deadlier.

Armstrong a refugee flees from war torn North Srilanka and embarks on a perilous journey through India, Nepal, Thailand towards an uncertain destination, leaving his childhood sweetheart on the shores that foam blood.

A wandering musician falls in love with a princess who they want to give for an old king from a neighboring kingdom, a petty tyrant and a scoundrel. But love overcomes obstacles and connects the hearts of lovers.
Jane lives with her brother Chut with her being the only one doing everything around the house. But Chut will need to learn to take care of himself when Jane is about to get married and move to Japan
A lonely young man believes that the only way to find happiness is to travel to Pluto.
A rich coster's daughter loves a steward who is blamed for killing a blackmailing tramp.
In the future, an L.A. cop whose girlfriend is a stripper uncovers a conspiracy concerning killer cyborgs.
THE RAPE VICTIM IS VIOLATED A SECOND TIME WHEN THE PUBLIC FEASTS ON HER CASE.
The adventures of Memo, a Tintin-type young hero, who loves to help people in need.
Shakespeare's classic comedy: Young lovers living under an oppressive state-rule flee their home-city to change their lives, and end up changing the world. After all, love changes everything.
Detective Danny Fisher discovers his girlfriend has been kidnapped by an ex-con tied to Fisher's past, and he'll have to successfully complete 12 challenges in order to secure her safe release.
Three young men decide to plan a mock kidnapping, but everything goes wrong because a real bank robbery was already planned by two other guys.

Nuenen, 1965. Van Gogh's famous painting 'The Potato eaters' returns for an exhibition to the village. Luuk, a descendent of a woman pictured in the painting, hates it. His goal to escape the village kicks off the idea to plan a heist.

Rajan is a rich NRI and his sister Gowri wanted to conduct his marriage at the earliest. But, an unfortunate accident turns everything upside down and the mystery behind the accident forms the plot of the movie.
A teenager who's spent her whole life confined to her home falls for the boy next door.
A lonely and emotionally neglected rich kid forms an attachment to one of the men who kidnap him during a botched robbery of his father's safe.

Nobita and his friends enjoyed playing in the Kingdam of Clouds which was made by Doraemon's tool. But before they knew it, they wandered into the another clouds which extinct animals lived. "Sky human" explain they protected the animals.
The story of love crossing the boundaries and vagaries of relations.
It's a story about A boy named Sanju John. Who fights for love.
A girl saved by Guan Donghao joins Guan's team, learns skills and becomes a heroine. She and her team fight Japanese invaders and die in the end.
Angie returns to her hometown in rural Ireland after years away. She has to readjust to the life she left behind and at the same time figure out her next move for the future.

In the near future, convicts are offered the chance to volunteer as medical subjects to shorten their sentence. One such subject for a new drug capable of generating feelings of love begins questioning the reality of his emotions.
A sudden hero dressed in all black (including underwear) emerges in the small Russian town to fight for justice.
Benji sniffs out a bogus CIA agent in Athens, Greece.
The protector transforms into a God.

To prove that he still is strong and powerful, Philippe Douvier decides to kill Clouseau. Once news of his "death" has been announced, Clouseau tries to take advantage of it and goes undercover with Cato to find out who tried to kill him.

After staying 3 years in America the Countess Ellie Stenholt returns home to Denmark and the family estate Stenholt. She finds that everything isn't going well noticing that the estate is falling apart and money is short.
A young couple plays havoc with the union of an older couple.
Marilyn (Marilyn Chambers) opens a lingerie store in a small town but faces opposition from stuffy townspeople. That is, until she finds an ancient Druid book of spells.
A travelling monk and his followers find themselves trapped in a land inhabited by only women.
A remnant of the Soviet horror story about anthropomorphic crazy singing creatures who are holding a little girl captive.
About Mom, Dad, two children and Santa, who turns out not to be what he pretends to be, but being a good hero is also a bad thing.
After a missed flight, an absent-minded scientist must catch a cab to make his marriage proposal but a stern driver veers him further off-course.

Hanuman is the most lovable baby monkey one can imagine. He meets Tom who comes to visit the temple in the Valley of Monkeys and tries to protect it from the robbers. A warm relationship develops between the two.
A story about a young deer, who seeks to become a wizard, and a bear, once a legendary hero, who set out on a journey to protect an artifact with power capable of destroying the whole world.

A group of women who have been wronged by various men or groups are given a chance at vengeance. One woman, once beaten to a miscarriage, trains these once mistreated women to become artful...                See full synopsis »
A soldier with a history of PTSD finds himself caught up in a small town's serial killer investigation.
A cat and mouse game between a sociopath criminal, a young female detective and a mystifying businessman.
Two Security Guards must be survive one night in a closed factory when years ago many workers was killed on strange circumstances.
A lonely teen's friendship with a free-spirited British neighbor pushes her to break free of the bonds of childhood.
An English Duke from 1876 is inadvertedly dragged to modern day New York where he falls for a plucky advertising executive.
The early life of Elizabeth I, from her childhood until her accession to the throne of England in 1558.
Fictionalized chronicles of Eugen Sandow, "The Strongest Man In The World" and highest paid entertainer at the turn of the century.
A fugitive toy-maker on the run from a vengeful bounty hunter finds refuge in a town with a dark secret and a very serious rat problem

This teen dance drama is about a young hip hop artist who is rejected by his old dance crew for heading off to college before a major competition. As result, he assembles a ragtag crew to face off against his former friends.
An animated film based on "The Village Of Horror" Creepypasta posted on the Creepypasta Files Fandom website.
A New England sea captain in the 1880s arrives at his fiancée's sprawling Texas ranch, where he becomes embroiled in a feud between two families over a valuable patch of land.
The curator at the Museum of SuperNatural History must protect the world's best-kept secrets.
Behind every crime is a story.

Xane, an immortal vampire, returns to the past to save his former self, Titus. Xane must rescue Titus and stop him from inheriting the curse. Xane is able to save his loved ones, but the broad strokes of time cannot be altered.
A sage travels to the past and collects a set of legendary swords, which he brings to life as a gang of talented but dysfunctional young men, to fight a battle against evil.
When the number one junior player in the country is injured, she begins to discover the teenage life she never got to live... and find the love she never thought she'd have.

Heer and Kabeer part ways following a misunderstanding and a tragedy. Years later, there is an encounter which leads to a roller coaster ride of a journey while Heer is in danger. Will Kabir manage to save Heer before time runs out?

An egg shaped airship has crash landed and Pororo and his friends go over to investigate. Inside they find a little dinosaur named Alo. Crong and Alo both gets kidnapped and Pororo and his Friends go over to Dinosaur Island to rescue them.
Banished to the mortal world, a warrior has to slay a demon to return to the heavenly realm and become a god.
Story of a group of drag races and the young boy and girl who join them.
Batman and Nightwing are forced to team with the Joker's sometimes-girlfriend Harley Quinn to stop a global threat brought about by Poison Ivy and Jason Woodrue, the Floronic Man.
A singing mechanic from 1912 finds himself in Arthurian Britain.
Dirk the Daring, a knight who sets out to rescue Princess Daphne from the evil dragon Singe and a wizard named Mordroc.
When Cinderella's cruel stepmother prevents her from attending the Royal Ball, she gets some unexpected help from the lovable mice Gus and Jaq and from her Fairy Godmother.

In Omiya, where the Kanto region's largest motorcycle gangs run rampant Masaki is sent to a juvenile training school due to a certain scheme. The motorcycle gang "Sakurajinkai" vs the gangster "Aobakai". The Solitary revenge begins now.
When an heiress finds out that the friendly young man she's met at Sun Valley is really an investigative reporter, she ruins his career by falsely claiming they're married.
Act/or is a feature film about four struggling actors on their difficult journey in search of success.
A capuchin monkey helps Katie, a young teenager, overcome her depression after her mother dies.

A futuristic dating service claims to find the perfect match using things like surveillance devices and electronic data collectors, but the system gets thrown for a loop when one guy rejects his "perfect" date.
American Girl McKenna comes to life in this modern-day adventure about a determined gymnast who must focus on her strengths to overcome challenges and find a way to believe in herself again.
Das, with his team, kidnap Arumai, son of a politician, who has been planning his own kidnapping to extract money from his father. Problems arise, when an insane cop is brought to handle the case.
There's a frontier feud on the border of Mexico. Outlaw Hagen's brothers have been killed by Nevada's Kid's family.
Origin of species that have evolved differently from human beings.
An assassin tries to retire against his bosses' will.
In 1860, a French lawyer dreamed of becoming the King of Patagonia. And he did just that. Or so it seems.

With nothing left but regret and destitution, a well bred soul embarks on a journey to salvation on a tropical desire of sunshine, music and hope from the bleak urban underworld he has become accustom to.

As Ernest Hemingway spirals into black despair, a lovesick young girl in 1920's Greece is desperate to rescue him - and employs an ancient spell to transform herself into a mature, desirable woman - for 24 hours.
A jaded former jockey helps a young girl prepare a wild but gifted horse for England's Grand National Sweepstakes.

A new adventure of secret agent Alex Dynamo on land, in the air, and in the treacherous swamps. Alex Dynamo goes up against the S.O.S. organization, a sinister group of beautiful girls driven by a lust for blood.
Memo doesn't speak anymore, he's angry about his father's decision to move his family to The Netherlands.

A young man obsessed with music who has a hard time connecting to people accidentally discovers that everyone has music within them. Shocked to find this he uses his discovery to finally find harmony with others and his own true love.

Delisa lives in a village on the Aceh coast. On December 26, 2004, when Delisa was preparing to take the prayer practice test, suddenly an earthquake and a tsunami hit their village and several other areas in Aceh and Southeast Asia.
A kaleidoscope of characters creating visions of love and death. Stories within stories, which unfolds as the game..

Rapa lives a solitary life in the mountain, until one day a group of travelers arrives in the place and alters his routine. As the landscape is transformed around him, Rapa sinks into his memories when he finds an old photograph.
An innocent bank teller, suspected of embezzlement, is aided by an eccentric, wisecracking waiter.

Satoka Aida, a 17-year high school student, comes to know that her mothers hospitalization for cancer is disturbing the harmony of her home life. Satoka rarely communicates with her father ...                See full synopsis »
The Tooth Fairy Mafia Don runs into the Easter Bunny Assassin and all hell breaks loose..
In this family-friendly adventure, two teens must put their rivalry aside and join forces to stop notorious bandits and survive the brutal wilderness known as the Treasure State.
This is not a story about a loving grandmother.
A robbery homicide investigation triggers a series of events that will cause a corrupt LAPD officer to question his tactics.
Hung Hing gang branch leader Tai Fei discovers he has a son, and soon realizes that he is a triad member involved in the Tung Sing gang which deals in narcotics.
The vikings come to Gaul and kidnap the chief's nephew. The chief sends Asterix and Obelix up north to get him back but the nephew has fallen in love with the viking chief's daughter v.v. What to do?
Woman gets involved with a crook trying to reform.

The Civil War, as Sherman's Army burns its way across Georgia, a village of women, left alone after the war has taken their sons and husbands, forms a militia with pitchforks and rusty flintlocks to defend their town.
Two youngsters find that friendship can overcome any challenge in life.
After a bad day a young man must fight for his life when an ex convict sends a hundred thugs to kill him.
The dangerous cohabitaion of the little brother(Dong-hyun) who showed up in 7 years with evil purpose and the second older brother(Dong-keun) with intellectual disability who welcomed his brother

Adam and Harmony go undercover to bust a band of train robbers. Trailing the bandits, they were later joined by "The Phantom Kid". Armed with a magical harmonica and a horse named Dynamite, they were able to round up the bad guys.
A fugitive is pursued by a lawman who is obsessed with his capture.

To equip the American zoos with as many animals as possible, a cruel trio of big-game hunters team up with an unexpected ally, threatening the African fauna. Will Tarzan allow the fiendish huntress to pillage the jungle?
A businessman faces financial and then criminal troubles after taking to alcohol.
This project is an optioned property.
With only three days to prepare, two young brothers, who have never danced, enter a hip-hop dance contest, but one brother must first overcome his fears.
Corrupt politicians resort to murder and blackmail when a young boy accidentally witnesses them taking payoffs.

When their eldest brother dies, Peter and Alice seek to save their parents from despair until they are forced to choose between home and imagination, setting the stage for their iconic journeys into Wonderland and Neverland.
Yoshio was social withdrawal in his boyhood,but one day he was attracted to puppet theater.
Three women, detectives with a mysterious boss, retrieve stolen voice-ID software, using martial arts, tech skills, and sex appeal.

An unexpected love triangle, a failed seduction trap and an encounter that results from a misunderstanding, told in three movements to depict three female characters and trace the trajectories between their choices and regrets.
The eccentric story of lovers slowly growing apart and a portrayal of the misunderstanding between gender.
Due to his insistence that he has an invisible six foot-tall rabbit for a best friend, a whimsical middle-aged man is thought by his family to be insane - but he may be wiser than anyone knows.
Play Faire is a coming of age story about an aimless teenager who upon graduating high school, takes an apprenticeship with his pottery teacher at the local renaissance faire.
Goku and Vegeta encounter Broly, a Saiyan warrior unlike any fighter they've faced before.
A young African boy named Gisani finds himself destined to protect a rare and magnificent white lion cub named Letsatsi who is cast from his pride and is forced to survive on his own.
Mr. Dithers has gone on vacation and left Dagwood to look after the company. Toby tries to take advantage of Dagwood's naiveté, but Blondie saves the day.
A masseur navigates a virtual limbo where he doesn't know what is real, what is a dream or what is fantasy.
Two trivial criminals, who escape the pursuers to the church where they take the newly arrested bride, ride a moving train whose empty freight car provides a hiding place for them.
A warrior is transported 900 years into the present day and must fend for his life while adapting to modern society
Brought to you by indie Australian filmmakers, Rayon Productions, Smash is a 'first person point of view' doco style feature film.
In Paris, a cat who lives a secret life as a cat burglar's aide must come to the rescue of Zoe, the little girl he lives with, after she falls into a gangster's clutches.
Claire (Nymark), an unmarried pregnant teenager, finds an odd relation in Madame Mélikian (Ascaride), an older woman grieving over the death of her son.
In a valley, two groups of little ants - the organized and efficient Red ones and the lazy and defenseless Yellow ones - go into a war.

An amazing Italian thriller directed by Aldo Lado. Tony and Lisa, both policemen, want to capture a drug trafficker named Mancini. In the meantime, they will have to deal with a maniac known as "The Full Moon Killer".
Solstice moon is about a glamour girl lost in the poetry she finds in play.
Two teenage siblings scheme to get their parents back together.

A fledgling nurse struggles to organize Christmas when an unconscious Santa is admitted on Christmas Eve day. She succeeds despite battling demanding patients, odd-ball staff and a burst pipe that leaves her ward with four feet of water.

While Hunting a group kills a Male Shape Shifting Snake so his lover Snake takes female form to kill each hunter one by one. One of the hunter recognizes this plot he sets out to stop Shape shifting Nagin.
A little fox named Tod, and Copper, a hound puppy, vow to be best buddies forever. But as Copper grows into a hunting dog, their unlikely friendship faces the ultimate test.

A fast paced triad film on rivalry between Malaysian and Hong Kong gangs for lucrative human trafficking business out of China, EMPEROR cocoons a fascinating murder mystery in an Asian crime thriller.
A boy named Barry travels to a world where kids get to choose their parents.
A criminal psychologist and a forensic fingerprint expert works together to track down a serial killer.
Siblings team up with their step-mom in order to convince their Dad into buying a new home.

Milo is a boy who is bored with life. One day he comes home to find a toll booth in his room. Having nothing better to do, he gets in his toy car and drives through - only to emerge in a world full of adventure.
In this offshoot of the 1950s "claymation" cartoon series, the crazy Blockheads threaten to ruin Gumby's benefit concert by replacing the entire city of Clokeytown with robots.
Agent J is a 2007 Taiwanese action romance film composed of three unrelated chapters about stories between agent J and her three boyfriends.
A kebab shop owner's son, Salah, turns vigilante after his father's death in an effort to clean up the relentless onslaught of boozed up thrill seekers waging war on his doorstep.
As the city's villains work together to release clown prince of crime and restore "balence" into the world of madness, They themselves find what, and who they are truly afraid of.
A sleazy French actor and a naive all-American guy meet bizarre characters as they motor along the U.S. and Mexico border.
An honest and brave police officer, Shubhankar Sanyal, decides to nab a notorious leader, Nishikanta Saha, and his associates for creating an environment of terror in Haridevpur.
A group of desperate fighting men who threw their last card in a suicide attempt to destroy enemy stronghold.
In 1942, three men crash in the middle of the Atlantic Ocean and find shelter on a deserted island. As they explore their new surroundings, they discover they are not alone.

An archaeologist unearths an underground palace at Sangramgarh. The locals are afraid of what will happen if they start digging and would like to leave the past alone. It turns out their fears we confounded.
A Brother Grimm's Horror Version of the Classic Fairytale.
A childless couple bury a box in their backyard, containing all of their wishes for an infant. Soon, a child is born, though Timothy Green is not all that he appears.
When LA's preeminent restaurant critic is murdered, each of the city's top chefs is a suspect.
A broken heart consumes Nathan with bitterness, blinding him from the true love of his life and stifling all his dreams. Sometimes finding love and happiness is as simple as opening up your heart.

Li Xiaohui is a junior high school student who does not participate in group activities. When the class takes on a project to cultivate some land, she and her classmates learn the importance of collective living.
A unique look at criminals and the world they inhabit. An assistant district attorney is dragged into this world to protect his friends but soon learns nothing is what it seems.
Four ambitious and aspiring individuals who end up in jail, are led by a school teacher who shows them hope but also stirs up their passion towards reform.
Follows wealthy publisher Britt Reid, who goes under cover at night to fight crime alongside his friend Kato.

A writer wants to get a glimpse of some genuine supernatural occurrences while doing research for a novel, but her experiences lead her down a dark path as she witnesses vivid hallucinations and begins to lose her grip on reality.
A showgirl marooned in Fiji helps a shell-shocked veteran face his fears
When the Queen of the Hard Rock Trolls tries to take over all the Troll kingdoms, Queen Poppy and her friends try different ways to save all the Trolls.
The inventor of a space sphere flies to the moon and is marooned by a crooked financier.
