Dale Dugay, a young IRS agent who gets a chance for promotion must travel out to the sticks and audit some troublesome locals. The task seems simple, but he soon finds that the natives are a degenerate band of sadistic maniacs.

Ethan Tell is a small time crook who makes a big-time score when he steals 1 million dollars. Ironically, his life radically changes for the worse when he discovers that stealing the money was the easy part.

A man living in Mexico becomes convinced of his true nature as a fallen angel and fights off the bully's tormenting his friends, drawing a government agent to his situation and forcing them all to escape their clutches.
The hapless heroine Agnes reincarnated every time she makes the same mistake: falling in love with the wrong man.
The sheriff of a small Utah community searches for a serial killer.
A scheming widow tries to persecute three old ladies, but fate takes its revenge on her.
Abortionist Vera Drake finds her beliefs and practices clash with the mores of 1950s Britain--a conflict that leads to tragedy for her family.
Kariya, a gangster falls for a rich dancer Maya, but hesitant to express his love due to his criminal history. Meanwhile his enemies in the echelons of underworld conspire to have him murdered.
The American army sets up a special force to free three American officers who were captured by the Vietcong in Vietnam in 1968.
A once promising basketball player meets his fate when an unfortunate event takes away his eyes. Can he prevail and leap out of his own darkness?
The story revolves around a mysterious man, who is always there to help the poor and punish the ones, who are unjust and corrupt.

Despite being his daughter, Rani isn't allowed to acknowledge Muthiah as her father. She works in his office and loves a co-worker. But Muthiah opposes the alliance due to the influence of a relative.
A horse is like the mother to the orphan Panpan. When the horse is lost, Panpan's world collapses. On the way to find the horse, Panpan and his teacher are searching for the hope together.
A young man Elly, still trying to get over his past relationship, meets a young woman Mia in Barcelona trying to run away from her past.

A Chinese emissary is sent to the Gobi desert to execute a renegade soldier. When a caravan transporting a Buddhist monk and a valuable treasure is threatened by thieves, however, the two warriors might unite to protect the travelers.
Set in Algeria in the 1920s, a rabbi's cat who learns how to speak after swallowing the family parrot expresses his desire to convert to Judaism.

Russian businessman has sent his wife on vacations to Miami in company of well-instructed bodyguard. It seemed that there was no chance for love affair, but everything has changed, when Moscow businessman Robert has appeared in city.
Karla leaves her estranged husband Piotr after a fight only to return several days later to tell him she has had and an affair and might be pregnant.

Bi-polar mall security guard Ronnie Barnhardt is called into action to stop a flasher from turning shopper's paradise into his personal peep show. But when Barnhardt can't bring the culprit to justice, a surly police detective is recruited to close the case.
On a mission to rid society of its most repellent citizens, terminally ill Frank makes an unlikely accomplice in 16-year-old Roxy.
Safak Sezer as a sailor who returns to Istanbul, following misadventures with Somali pirates and a sojourn in a Budhist monastery, to do battle with a werewolf.

The struggle of chef from 5 star hotel while contributing in the rural class gone lot more difficult when it starts affecting his personal life. Will he able to counter these difficulties and stand for his dreams.
Sometime in the distant future, several earthlings turn up on a strange planet ruled over by a despotic ruler with magic powers. A young earth-man initiates a successful uprising.
Two deaf girls go on a roadtrip to Paris, to look for the ill granny of one of them.

Hye-jung works in a factory on the outskirts of the city. All she wants is to live alone in peace. One night, however, she finds she has become a ghost. As a ghost, she goes back in time, day by day, and tries to keep out of harm's way.
The story of a woman's plan to find and marry a successful and self-made male.

Luc and Helena, competitors in the world of SuperMoto are blackmailed to win the first Chinese BikeAthon, a motorbike rally raid. Challenged by vicious teams and high rollers on the net betting against them on the 3500 miles to Shanghai.
Worried about his impending death, a sick and elderly man hires a for-profit preacher hoping for a miracle, only to wind up as a babysitter for a gang that kidnaps children.
With help from a guardian angel, a spoiled rich, very material teenage girl learns that true value is found in assisting others and not in material things.
A fairy-tale about a conceited young man and a young woman with a tyrannical step-mother, who must overcome magical trials in order to be together.
Foul-mouthed mutant mercenary Wade Wilson (a.k.a. Deadpool) assembles a team of fellow mutant rogues to protect a young boy with supernatural abilities from the brutal, time-traveling cyborg Cable.
A man has the power to see the fate of missing people - with the exception of his own beloved wife.
Two men are framed and sent to jail, where they meet a murderer who helps them escape and leave the state.
Drugs are hidden with weapons shipments of the Chinese Army during the early anti-Japanese war in Inner Mongolia.
Young princess Lisa finds her way through dangers and ambitious court officials after the premature death of her mother.
A platonic love story set in a time of rising fascism in the town of Eden, Oregon.
The life and challenges of a young girl and a secret Santa who comes into the little one's life on a Christmas eve to fulfill the dreams of the child.
Afro-Supernatural spin about a downtrodden heroine's quest to save her teenage son from joining an intergalactic pusher-woman planning a zombie cannibal Armageddon.
Children build a tree-house to spy on a beggar, than seek his help against a builder.
A young man negotiates his erotic and thanatotic drives.
Nene & Angel and their accomplice Cuervo participate in a botched bank robbery in 1965 Buenos Aires, then hide out from the police in Uruguay while the gang breaks down.
Chanti who gets beaten up black and blue is rescued by a girl who takes care of him in the hospital, till he gets fine. He falls for this unknown girl. Will he ever find her and convey his feelings?
A married couple tries to steal back a valuable heirloom from a troublesome kid.

Honzík does not go to school yet and is therefore proud that he is rehearsing the song Pohádka with the other schoolchildren to perform at the Spartakiad. But then a new older boy moves into the area which may become a problem for Honzik.
Two screwy characters travel to Hollywood and cause mischief.

Célio Rocha believes he was assigned by God Himself a difficult mission: to persuade his childhood friend Otávio Sabóia, a corrupt entrepeneur in the construction business, to give away all his possessions to the poor.
The entangled relations between the son of a seductive tea-ceremony teacher and the women in his father's life. Based on the novel by Kawabata Yasunari.
A gangster's Accountant finds his life in danger after a lot of cash goes missing.
How's a boy suppose to be a man with his sister always on his back?

The legendary Elfkins (Heinzelmännchen) of Cologne were gnomes secretly helping craftsmen at night until they were ousted by a tailor's malevolent wife 200 years ago. This is the story of their return.
Before the veil of the Key of Life in "Neoni: Destiny of Archangel" pushed them together, they lived not knowing that the universe would bring them together. These are the Keys of Life they Lived.
Two 11-year olds, Julia and Martin, decide to swap lives with each other.
Live-action remake of Disney's animated classic 'Lilo and Stitch'.
A detective matches wits with a group of thieves out to steal a priceless amulet.
Two thieves break into a house to steal a bag of cash but find the owner of the house lying dead.
A new generation of kids, called Indigo, who have more mental and spiritual abilities than others. A company of such kids gather together in hidden places.
A regretful casino boss contends with a ruthless old friend for the love of a young girl as a tangled web of southern criminals ignites a murder spree over control of gambling in 1960's Biloxi.

James Walker, a no nonsense LAPD Homicide Detective goes Undercover, and soon the lines of what's moral and ethical as well as right and wrong get blurred as he finds himself climbing the criminal power structure.
The Pirates, a schoolboy pop group, enter a major talent contest, things are going well but unbeknownst to the others, lead singer Paul is heavily involved with his uncle's video piracy scam.
An anthology of stories involving meth addicted white supremacists, a man looking for his kidnapped wife and an Elvis impersonator.
Two dead are found and cans of tomato juice filled with heroin are found on a railway embankment outside Berlin. Commissioner Peter Zinn from Customs is charged with the investigation.
A Louisiana con man enters his steamboat into a winner-take-all race with a rival while trying to find a witness to free his nephew, about to be hanged for murder.
Two childhood friends realize their love for each other after being betrothed to different people.
A man overhears a murder plot and telephones three different women, all who share the potential victim's name.
A high school senior is forced to make life altering choices between her family and her future.
London is a young man who is seeing supernatural. We dare you to take this adventure and follow him along this journey.
After losing his father to a bunch of scheming politicians, a young man decides to wade into the corrupt and unscrupulous world of politics to avenge his death.
A daughter allows her mother to hear her have sex, igniting a scandal.

"A loving but socially awkward long term couple wants to spice up their sex life by having a threesome. Now they must battle insecurities, social taboos and the dreaded internet to find...The Third Person!"
A secret police unit above the law is established when an organized crime gang begins to wreak havoc internationally.
Throw out the script. Roll the camera. Grab your guitar and pour the Whiskey. You might get a crowd. You might not.

Dev, a former football player is married to Rhea, a successful fashion editor. Maya is a kindergarten teacher who is married to Rishi, an outgoing event planner. These couples' lives intersect and they each question their own marriage.

When an evil magma demon and his minions steals the sun of a magical world, the new guardians of both the sun and the moon must embark on a quest to retrieve it and save their world from disaster as the moon faces destruction as well.

Wan-ju, a failed stage actor, makes ends meet by playing "real-life" parts as someone's boyfriend or wing man. Desperate for money, Wan-ju takes on his most challenging "role" ever when he agrees to pretend to have witnessed a murder.
When an American World War II pilot gets shot down during a Japanese-initiated dogfight, he makes an unlikely friend-a female first cousin to the Emperor of Japan.

Porsha is a female hustler who has it all money, beauty, respect. She earned it all by being loyal and respecting the codes of the street. A chance encounter with a stick up kid named Fresh introduces her to a whole new world.

In this lively programmer a con man hires a character actor to masqueraded as the recently assassinated dictator of a tiny Latin American country so he can bilk an arriving American ambassador out of his fortune.
12-year-old Marta, who lives with her single mother in the countryside, is confronted with her family's painful secrets. Nothing will be the same again.

A beautiful blonde singer who has a one-time fling with an engaged pilot, is confused by his B-29 bomber crew to be his real fiancée, and her image ends up being painted on the nose of their aircraft, for good luck, as the "Bamboo Blonde".
Sorry Enakku Kalyanam Aidicchi is a story about an individual Ashok (Sriman) who faces problems in his marital life for letting his friends have access to his bedroom.
A family's efforts to move out of a slum area into a better neighborhood is hampered when their son is accused of the murder of a local blind beggar.
A charming film about a group of children on a kibbutz in Israel who foil a plot by spies to blow up a Mirage jet during a military parade.
Just another story about a guy meeting a girl. Only she's dangerous. And he's about to be famous.

A disgraced US Marshal fall for the escaped female terrorist he was reinstated to hunt down, but her desire for vengeance and his need for redemption makes it unlikely that he'll bring her in - alive.
In medieval Persia, during the rule of Caliph Harun-Al-Rashid, Sinbad the Sailor boasts about his latest adventures to his friends.
A rich Turkish family is captured by Somali pirates. Turkish government sends a team of cons to rescue them.
When the young performers on a music contest show admit they have never heard of Angus Scattergood, Bodi is compelled to join the show to restore the Rock Legend's good name.
Savannah realizes getting hired at Hollywood's next "it" spot Vampi's takes more than beauty, blood, sweat and tears, but once you're in, you're in for life.
A writer descends through hell to save the woman he loves.
Stories of love are presented through a number of different couples and individuals.

A Cambridge astrophysicist on routine business in London finds it frustratingly difficult to return a wallet of money to an Eastern European friend, a task complicated by a puzzling if scatterbrained society girl.

After a woman mysteriously vanishes without leaving a trace, a man by the name of James Booker appears in search of her. What he discovers is a thread that is linked to a powerful crime organization that deals in human trafficking.

An undercover cop hired as a bodyguard by a Triad. The lawman finds that he actually prefers the outlaw life, but trouble brews when the crime boss suspects his new employee is romantically involved with his wife.
The war for Purgatory continues as an iconic figure of darkness rises to challenge all.

Manoharlal and his wife Shanti lose their son Raja in a train accident. He is saved by an elephant and taken to a circus. A girl named Rita tries to lure Raja but fails and gets Ranjeet to kidnap him.
While recovering in Venice, sickly composer Gustav von Aschenbach becomes dangerously fixated with teenager Tadzio.

Terrified and bloody, Oscar Svendsen awakes clinched to a shotgun in a strippers joint. Around him 8 dead men, and police aiming at him. To Oscar it's clear that he is innocent. It all started when four chaps won 1,7 million on the pools...

An Irish immigrant and his daughter move into a town in the American South with a magical piece of gold that will change people's lives, including a struggling farmer and African American citizens threatened by a bigoted politician.
A planned kidnapping goes awry when the gang leader falls for the victim.
An honest and virtuous police officer goes undercover to nab criminals and bring them to justice. Despite facing pressures from the higher authorities to abort her mission, she remains undeterred.
Ata and Masoumeh are living in a rented house. Their lease time is over and they can not pay the rent added. But they like to stay and live in this house...
A SEQUEL to the classic Neo-Noir 1991 Neo-Noir Crime film about a powerful drug lord whose gang is infiltrated by an undercover cop.
On the run from unknown pursuers, a Korean teen escapes London and enrolls in an all-girls school, where she fends off bullies during the day and goes on secret missions at night.

A coming-of-age story that follows the main character, Cameron, as he goes on a journey to meet his real father who he recently discovers is Tanzanian, which opens his eyes to the world, race, and to love. Through a series of events, he realizes you never know who you are until you really know who you are.
Gen is a lonely orphan boy. His sole sense of companionship comes from an imaginary friend, the god Prince Fudo-Myo. Prince Fudo-Myo comes to the boy's rescue in times of difficulty.
Little Bobby goes missing after the separation of his parents who decide to talk to his friends to find out where he might be. But who are Bobby's friends?
A middle class drug dealer fights to save his bosses gang from financial ruin but will his methods take them to new heights or completly tear them apart.
A father's love for his daughter has dire consequences when he tries to get her to break up with the man she loves.
Best friends and their daughters vacation in Rio de Janeiro only for one to fall for the other's daughter.

The daily lives of Vasco Da Gama and his friends in a fraction of Cochin, called Chota Mumbai is portrayed in this comedy.
Florencio and Amalio are two cabaret artists who divorce their wives and take custody of their children.
Although they successfully rob a jewelry store, the thieves botch the getaway and are forced to take shelter in a hotel--taking the guests and staff hostage in the process.
Anna, a hard charging Indian-Australian businesswoman who has endured one too many humiliating heartbreaks, returns to her small surf town to ask for an arranged marriage.
A high school kid discovers he can magically change his past.

Brumville follows Connor Cutire and his two childhood friends Lee and Mikey. Connor and Lee want to make as much money as fast as possible selling drugs to eventually move away, go legit and move in to real eastate, with Mikey the accountant doing all the paperwork for them. But as Connor highlights in the film "life is never that simple.
Tonny is released from prison - again. This time he has his mind set on changing his broken down life, but that is easier said than done.
A lawman, his dog and his trusty white stallion fight a gang of outlaws.
A group of fascists plan to finance their work by pulling off a bank robbery.
A group of medical students lead a carefree life. However, when they head to a village that witnesses many farmer suicide cases, they encounter local thugs and strive to survive.
Three brothers who are obsessed with animals are given permission from their parents to travel around America with a camera documenting wildlife.
Making Moves that risks everything over comfort and stability.
When former sheriff Alden Rockwell's best friend is shot, he volunteers as a private investigator to find out the truth behind the shooting and discovers a criminal conspiracy between two counties.
Plot details being kept under wraps.

A London taxicab driver cashes in on a big sweepstakes ticket and becomes the prey of a confidence-gang that sells him a nag of a cavalry horse on the claim that it is a brother to a current Derby winner.
Blacksmith Will Turner teams up with eccentric pirate "Captain" Jack Sparrow to save his love, the governor's daughter, from Jack's former pirate allies, who are now undead.
The Alpha Team is sent on a desperate mission to find an artifact hidden by King Solomon before the Serpent Corporation gets their hands on it.
In this adaptation of the Henry James novel set in 19th-century New York City, a wealthy spinster with an overbearing father is pursued by a handsome fortune hunter who may be only after her money.
A team of superheroes unites in an attempt to vanquish an ancient wizard who threatens to destroy the earth with a powerful mysterious artifact.

The passionate romance between an Irish-American man and a Japanese-American woman is threatened when the Pearl Harbor attacks happen and the woman is forced into a prison camp because of her ethnicity.

One night Mia has a premonition. So after saying a few words of parting at her mother's grave, she sets out on a journey across mountains and jungles to search for her father, who is trapped in a landslide at a remote construction site.

Adapted from four different Russian folk-tales, this early Soviet fantasy film tells the story of Emelya the Fool, who, fishing one day, catches a talking pike who pleads for his life and in return grants Emelya wishes for a life spared.
Events unfold after a devastating earthquake in Los Angeles.
WHAT IF YOU WAKE UP AS THE PROTAGONIST OF YOUR BOOK AND REALIZE THAT YOU ACTUALLY MIGHT BE HIM!

UN peacekeeper is sent do Chittagong Hill Tracks in Bangladesh to investigate a clash between local extremist group, Bangladesh military forces and tribal people of Chakma. But nothing goes as planned.
In 16th-century Prague, a rabbi creates the Golem - a giant creature made of clay. Using sorcery, he brings the creature to life in order to protect the Jews of Prague from persecution.

A Marine Captain returning from Iraq has survived the harshest military action in his career. Coming back to his young marriage as a civilian he must now navigate his demons and decide whether Love is worth fighting for.

Felix has shrunk the hated school principal, Dr. Schmitt, to a height of six inches. Together with his friend Ella, Felix must get the principal back to her normal size while his rival Mario tries to stop him.
A traveling architect meets an old friend from his student years; the pair realize their connection has always been a romantic one.
Set in Shanghai during the 1930s, the story is inspired by John Woo's classic work Bullet in the Head, released in 1990.
Lost in a maze of data, one analyst tries to save a field agent in harms way.

Watch the full movie, Odipolama, only on Eros Now. Odipolama a 2006 Indian Tamil film, directed by Somavijayaprakash. The film stars Parimal, Namitha, Sandhya, Kota Srinivasa Rao in lead roles. The film had musical score by Baamaran.

Ara and Edu have been lovers for a decade, when they were a novice actress and screenwriter. Apart from their "official" relationships, they always find a moment to be together, an oasis in their lives.
A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman action figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's bedroom.
Led by her visions and the spirit of her dead mother, Gemma Doyle takes her boarding school clique deep into mystical realms controlled by an ancient group of women.
The Colosseum is the fighting arena owned by the champion Bracus. Now after the death of their friend, Tommy Lee and Alex Grady want revenge.
Thomas rediscovers the long lost original station which in it's day was called Great Waterton and he also becomes jealous of a new tank engine called Stanley.

The Peruvian anti-terrorist army takes control of a far away and unknown small village isolated in the Andes by the terrorist militia "Sendero Luminoso" (Shining Path), during the dirty war in Peru at 80's decade.
A simple man from a village falls in love with his new neighbor. He enlists the help of his musical-theater friends to woo the lovely girl-next-door away from her music teacher.
The lives of three residents of New York's Staten Island intersect as they struggle to get ahead.

A group of wayward astronauts returning from a long mission to Ganymede crash land on a planet very much like earth. The problem is that the mysterious inhabitants are murderous lunatics out to kill every one of them... or so it seems.
A crook tries to train a pack of dogs how to rob a bank.
On Christmas Eve, three lifelong friends spend the night in New York City looking for the Holy Grail of Christmas parties.
The defense attorney who was unable to obtain the acquittal of an innocent young man concocts a complicated and diabolical scheme to revenge himself upon the prosecutor.
A pregnant seventeen-year-old rebuilds her life after being abandoned by her boyfriend at a Walmart in Sequoyah, Oklahoma.

One year after the unresolved murder of his wife, Shinji receives a mysterious message putting him on the right track to find the assassin. He follows his revenge instinct and disappears into the darkness of Tokyo, where he meets Tomoko, a young woman on the lam. During that night, they come across yakuza and lost souls, and their lives change drastically.
A commercial tale with an all children cast, Girmit is a one of a kind movie.
A young man crosses over North and South Korea to deliver the pain and longings of separated families.
Modern English version of the first book of Dante's Divine Comedy.
A young woman forced into servitude by her step-family gets a chance to attend the royal ball.

Fateh Singh, a ruthless CBI officer, commits a robbery at the most powerful gangster's place in Punjab. But robbery turned out to be a nightmare and he is assigned to investigate the same case. Will he get caught?

With a magical bell ANNA (8) discovers that Santa Claus, Christ Child and the others are real. But they lose their powers. Anna has to save them from oblivion and from a fat old businessman with white hair who seems to let them disappear .

A scientist arrives in Jerez, Andalucía, to study the potential benefits of wine during the grape harvest season (vendimia). Aware of this God Baccus sends a goblin out of a Velázquez painting to help convince the professor.
Chen Zhen rescues a Manchu princess and helps the princess and a Chinese resistance fighter defend China from Japanese invaders.
Charismatic con man Jason Derek Brown becomes wanted by the FBI after hatching his most elaborate scheme yet.
Former small-time criminals get back into crime to help a friend settle a debt.
A mother and her young son move to a new small town. They soon discover the town harbors a dark secret, and it's a race against time to save the town.
A Japanese martial artist Tomioka sends out the challenge letter to the world class martial artists all over the world to challenge them to become the strongest martial artist in the world.
Our anti-hero discovers locals who are oppressed, held captive against their will. For the swordsman to succeed, he first must wade through traps and assassins, and a few seductive maidens.
Two episodes of the TV series "The Persuaders" joined into a movie. Two playboys, Roger Moore, Tony Curtis, investigate crimes along the French Riviera.
A man is arrested and appears in court for conning and betraying four women, posing as four different men.
In order to fit in with the rest of the gorillas, Snowflake embarks on an exciting adventure to find a magical potion to make her a "normal gorilla".
A couple try to save their marriage during a zombie apocalypse.
In 1962, Arthur struggles to conform to the ideals of the perfect woman. While working at a dress shop, she falls for Liza-Jane who introduces her to a world bursting with colors and sexual fluidity.

Ali and Alia are childhood neighbors that fell in love with each other, but bigger events occur in their lives which gets them separated. Ali seeks to maintain Alia's heart even if it is through substance abuse.
Love stories of students in a re-preparing school for college entrance exams.
Four stories, four worlds that collide into one. "Death do us apart" tells a tale of friendship and survival in a world infested with zombies.
AN HONEST COP AND A RUTHLESS JUDGE USE THE LAW AND VIOLENCE AS THEY ENGAGE IN MORTAL COMBAT.

Jack, a 30 something musician finds himself single again after a long marriage. Though he does his best to change his surroundings and bring back his glory days, he can never truly move on until he does one thing. Take off his Gameface.
Discontent leads to a daring escape plan in a women's prison where the inmates are all lingerie clad models and the lesbian warden demands unusual favours for early parole.
A dashing insurance company investigator tries to catch an arsonist before he...or she...can strike again.

An funny, witty and bright biopic by the master of italian comedy Mario Monicelli about the famed italian composer Gioacchino Rossini, here portrayed in a wonderful way by famed actor and later director Sergio Castellitto.

Gwen the Cat and Roger the Dog are secret agents who covertly protect and save the world without humans ever finding out. Their partnership is due to the Great Truce, which has stopped dog and cat hostility for a decade.

A young girl discovers a secret map to the dreamworld of Slumberland, and with the help of an eccentric outlaw, she traverses dreams and flees nightmares, with the hope that she will be able to see her late father again.
The Muppets' twist on the classic tale.
Funny adventures of a young girl Katya and her friends in a land of magic.
An enforcer for the mob enacts her revenge on those who wronged her.

The appearance of a Lady in Red results in a road accident. A head of a construction company finds himself in the afterlife, however, he is sent back to his body and becomes obsessed with the mystery brought on by a Messenger of God.
The fate of Thorn and his bloodline are finally revealed as the final battle for the soul of Avondale threatens to destroy not just the small town, but the world beyond.

In a post-apocalyptic world survivors live underground organized in powerful cults. On of the Shepherds, a code name for assassin, has escaped to the surface with his targets and the cult leader who hired him can't allow that.
Fearing for his comatose girlfriend's life, Patrick creates a way to enter her world to bring her back to reality.
A small-town pair become the legendary Bunty and Babli, turning the world on its head caper after caper--until they meet a very upset police officer.
An orphan imprisoned for killing a member of his foster family tries to redeem himself after his release from jail.
An intriguing look at a sinister web of power, linking politics and the mafia in modern day Italy.

Freshman Neil's Vanguard stories are all he cares about...until he meets the older Julia, who pushes him to put his own fan fic online. When the website's moderator takes a special interest in Neil's work, it opens up a whole new universe.
A young man in London who is unlucky with love swears off dating blonde women. Seeing his online profile, a blonde social scientist disguises herself as a brunette to find out why.
A highschool student who excels at bith sports and academics transfers to a new school and tries to improve the other athlete's study skills
A movie based on the hit songs by the popular italian singer Raffaella Carrà.

Violent Starr is a female space pirate, that ascends to be a hero through an artifact of a legendary warrior. She fights against the Godmichael and his evil minions swarming out to eliminate creatures and races that they deem "unworthy".
Directed mainly for kids, the film speaks of a Havana that "reveals two distinct faces, from the everyday life of a couple of kids", according to the film's official synopsis.
The owner of a trendy disco starts having problems with the men in her life and the Mafia, which is trying to move in on her place.

After being released from prison, Billy is set to visit his parents with his wife, whom he does not actually have. This provokes Billy to act out, as he kidnaps a girl and forces her to act as his wife for the visit.
Two men having the same father , but different mothers hate each other and often get into fights. But they are forced to join hands when their father's life is endangered.
Paras delights the Emperor with his singing. He is granted a wish by the Emperor and he asks for the hand of the princess in marriage. The Emperor agrees to do so if Paras brings him a rare gem.
Math can be magical! Max the Magician (Will Arnett) appears on Sesame Street to show Elmo some amazing tricks of addition and subtraction. Also includes "Hat Day" and spoof "30 Rocks"!
Makoto Yuki's story continues as new Shadows, allies, Personas, powers and foes carrying the potential are introduced.
A young singer fall in love with a ghost that is visible only to his eyes. The movie shows the aftereffects of this love.

This is the Spanish-language version of Ten Cents a Dance (1931), shot concurrently with a different cast but the same director, Christy Cabanne (as "Wiliam Cabana"), and also Mexican director Eduardo Arozamena.
The Case of the Blonde with the bad Nose Job is Sam's first case and a comedy/mystery about two rich sisters and a kidnapping in Las Vegas.
A mysterious man and his witch-hunting sidekick help a young orphaned teenager find her employer, and old magician, who was abducted during a séance.
A group of twisted clowns embark on a road trip.
Jewel thieves quickly dispose of the loot when the alarm is raised, then track down the family upon whose truck they threw them, meanly interrogating them in the hope of getting them back.
An opportunistic jerk joins the quest of a delusional man who thinks he lives in a fantasy world.
Brothers Michael and Anthony have to rely on each other to navigate their relationship problems over the course of a family party.
This is a movie about Kaden Ryan and his friends Summer Adventures.
In 1937 Nevada, silver mine caretaker Jess Tyler is reunited with his teenage daughter Kady who will do anything to persuade Jess to let her have claim to the mine.
The intertwined love story of four young people on Christmas night.
The doors of the jam produced by a company do not open. In order for them to be able to sell their jam, they reward the one who can open the jam. All the people try to open the door of the jam.
A high school film club movie project is interrupted by nefarious thugs. Enter the high kicking school girls who will have to put their acting to use in a real-life situation.

Joe Winstone returns from his service in Afghanistan following the murder of his parents, they were in the wrong place at the wrong time. Follow Joe and Tracy as they seek their own justice not from one gang but two.
Emma, a British spy, is given the task of hiding a mysterious and dangerous artifact so that the world will never find it again.
A specialist who can heal telekinetically falls into a sinister plot to kill a gold-digging beauty.
A re-telling of Artemio Ricarte, a Filipino patriot who fought against the Spanisha nd later Americans. He was later supported by the Japanese during WWII. Nickname was "El Vibora" (the Viper).
A group of evil bandits are terrorizing the land from their invincible mountain castle.
A woman tasked with finding homes for 12 abandoned puppies before Christmas finds love with her co-worker just in time for the holidays.
In-control businesswoman Janie is falling apart of the thought of becoming a mom. Will a chance meeting with an angel be an answer to prayer?
A poor boy who saved a rich girl from drowning is adopted by her family, but he grows into a money-hungry ruthless businessman who would step on others to get to the top of the social ladder.
An ex-convict and a woman fall in love, after she shoots her police Lt. boyfriend dead in self defense, and falsely leads him to believe that he did the shooting.
With his livelihood on the line and the stakes higher than ever, a billiards player must face off against underworld kings to win back his pool hall.
A young thief with a history of grand theft auto becomes an informant and helps police bring down a criminal enterprise involved in the smuggling of hundreds of exotic super cars.
Three twenty somethings discuss the recent passing of a mutual love.
When Ellie loses her husband, seeks grief counseling from a local pastor, but her conflict begins when she falls in love with him.
A group of Song Dynasty loyalists aim to rescue Prime Minister Wen from a Tartar prison. Set during the Tartar rule in the 1300's.
In 1999, a battle takes place between two factions of divine warriors for the fate of the world.
A farm girl falls in-love with a chain-gang convict working at a nearby highway construction site and sets-out to help him when he escapes.
A love triangle develops between a young student, an older barmaid, and a married artist.
A soon-to-be police officer takes a path of crime after his father gets attacked by hoodlums.
The film tells the story of Sodabuddi, who spends his life wastefully. He has two romantic encounters and the audience gets to relive these tales, until the climax throws in a complete surprise.
"Silver Fox" is a hilarious action comedy about a top NSA agent, Ric Gonzales. After proving himself to be smarter that the NSA director, he is recruited for a new assignment.
Ivan steals art for the Greek. He wants out but can he? He meets an actress at two of his "jobs". She has her own problems but helps him.

When their quiet beach town is invaded by a mysterious threat, five kids - a gamer, comic book geek, inventor, skater and martial artist - must band together and use an arsenal of homemade gadgets to fight back.
A teenage slacker's right hand becomes possessed with murderous intent.
An elite combat veteran returns home and becomes immersed in the world of underground MMA fighting.
Girl who's had an easy school career goes to a sports school only to learn how to really be successful.
Suave and scintillating, this fast-paced action thriller follows the adventures and investigations of a group of honest police officers, who go undercover to bring down a terror network.
Scientists genetically create a new Pokémon, Mewtwo, but the results are horrific and disastrous.
Notorious gangster, Pat Tate, rises through the ranks of Essex's criminal underworld. A prequel to the 'Rise of the Footsoldier' franchise.
Illiterate peasant Juan Gallardo rises meteorically to fame and fortune in the bullfight arena only to sow the seeds of his own fall.
A drifter obsessed with the supernatural stumbles upon an inn where a severely ill adolescent girl is slowly becoming a vampire.
A man planning to commit a mass shooting is befriended by an eccentric group of ravers and finds himself conflicted about his intentions. Based on the untold story of Seattle's Capitol Hill Massacre.
Two draq queens go on a Bonnie & Clyde rampage around New York City... but neither one wants to be Clyde

Dos hermanos ambiciosos tienen el deseo de hacer lo que sea con tal de salir adelante. Deciden tomar puestos de trabajo con el hombre mas poderoso de la region, y arriesgaran todo para lograr su mision.. incluyendo sus propias vidas.
A young man, Danny, decides to get a job in order to support his mother. He's hired to work in a garage, but soon finds himself being implicated in a stolen-car racket.
The love story of a couple spanning 20 years, beginning from their teens.

Jessica, whose father killed her mother and committed suicide, is a police officer. While investigating a murder, she finds herself in the center of her own investigation, when her former lovers start being murdered.
Sanjana, an independent single mom goes to any length to protect her daughter from an unseen, un known monster from her past
One of director Koto's bloodiest, most evocative, skilfully orchestrated fight scenes, Poetic, gut-wrenching and, at times, very moving.
Literary adaptation of Dante Alighieri's novel.
A story about an aspiring professional singer and a rock singer who collaborates in a song. As they work on their song, they start to develop feelings for each other.
A young man is torn between his friends in town and his father's ranch.

ORAH, a Nigerian immigrant taxi driver in Toronto, agrees to launder dirty money for her boss in exchange for bringing her son over from Nigeria. When the plan goes horribly wrong, Orah takes matters into her own hands to settle the score.
This drama follows the relationship of a heartbroken woman and a young immigrant girl who has lost her mother at the border, coming together just before Christmas.
A sponge diver hopes to make enough money to buy his own boat and marry his girlfriend. A rival diver, however, has other plans for him.
Half-Indian girl brought up in a wealthy household is loved by the son of the house against his family's wishes and loves another Indian employed by the household.
A humorous take on Sir Arthur Conan Doyle's classic mysteries featuring Sherlock Holmes and Doctor Watson.

Macius was 9 when he became king of a small country. The young Macius quickly realizes that running a kingdom is not child's play, especially when the general of the armies tries to take advantage of his naivety.
The movie "Blind Shaman" will recreate the journey to find the light for the eyes of Tinh Lam (Huynh Lap) and the intertwined causal stories that Tinh Lam must go through to better understand life.
A security guard's dreams come true when he is selected to be transformed into a cybernetic police officer.
A modern day re imaging of the classic by Stanley Donin set in Japan.
Britta must face her fears at her school's Christmas pageant while Holly Boy, the spirit of the season, must battle the forces of evil.
An aspiring artist/ex-con and affirmed bachelor is about to risk everything by painting himself into a corner with the forgery of a 15th-century masterpiece, and by falling for the wrong woman.
A Hindu/Sikh family face challenges when their adopted son falls in love with a Muslim girl.
A straitlaced turn-of-the-century father presides over a family of boys and the mother who really rules the roost.
In this comedy/fantasy film, orphan Beleleng runs away from the orphanage, gets adopted by a millionaire, is kidnapped for ransom, and is rescued by the golden mermaid, Perlita.

The film Akkammana Bhagya is about an ill-fated village woman and her struggle towards the welfare of her family. The story is set in an Indian village from the preindependence era and deals with woman's empowerment.
A shiftless loner finds that he suddenly has something worth living for, as he tries to protect the enigmatic love of his life from the men who want to do her harm.
A Tango dancer and a rabbi develop a plan to enter a dance competition without sacrificing his orthodox beliefs. Family, tolerance, and community are tested one dazzling dance step at a time.

Alona (Miya Nolasco) feels suffocated by her mother's overprotective behavior. Deprived of male company, she answers the first guy who counts her. In trying to control her daughter, the more she is losing her now.
A doctor poisons his dying friend and is framed by his valet for poisoning his wife's first husband.
When a martial arts expert discovers the existence of an illegal slave trade in the 1930s, he goes to great lengths to overthrow it.
When robbers hit Frankenstein's castle, teen pals Bibi and Tina hunt for the crooks, then devise a plan to save the neighbors' failing ranch.

Five friends take their hours with petty crimes. Are persuaded by a tough gangster and his seductive girlfriend to rob a bank. When they are caught, they are condemned to spend a year and a half in Glen Mills, an experimental reformatory.
A murderer, with the help of Chinese vampires, does battle with the ghost of a dead gambling lord's wife and the gambling lord's living brother.
Dena and the Baron battle gangsters on the streets of downtown Cleveland in a quest for $100,000, leading to many murders, double crosses and a final foot chase.
Three struggling room-mates unknowingly become potential prey of a ruthless gangster.
War can only be survived with the songs of Suchý and Slitr.
When a man has to choose between redemption and reward. Sometimes he chooses both.
Dyesebel is a popular mermaid character in the Philippines. The comic book character was originally conceived by the Filipino comic book illustrator, Mars Ravelo and drawn by Elpidio Torres.
The first Philippine - South Korean co-production.
An American living in 19th-century Tahiti gets involved in intrigue against the French colonial government.
Lonely Tuukka catches fish by the river and meets a mysterious old miller and former sailor, the Parrot Man, who teaches him the magic of the forest.
A notorious criminal must break an evil curse in order to rescue an abducted girl who has mysteriously disappeared.
A supernatural, time-travelling, musical adaptation of Charles Dickens's cult Christmas story.
Mumbai Pune Mumbai 3 shows Gautam and Gauri's after marriage life. It is the sequel of the 2015 film Mumbai Pune Mumbai 2 (2015).
Vicky meets Vijaya in college and both keep quarreling with each other. However, Vicky soon falls in love with Vijaya and he tells a lie that he has cancer, only to get her attention and love.
Follows a NYC policer officer along with his rookie partner Angela, as they have a rough day while living the dangerous, and routine job of being a cop in the city.
When his twin brother is reported killed in a Beirut car explosion, a man turns the war-torn city upside-down in search of the truth.

In a terrorist attacks on the Indian Uri camp the protagonist's brother dies, along with 18 other soldiers. The Indian government decides to run a retaliation on terrorist camps on the Pakistani side of the LoC.
After serving four years of a six-year sentence on a manslaughter charge, a tough punk (Pretty Boy Floyd) escapes from prison and goes on a violent rampage.
French nobleman Lafayette comes to America to fight for Liberty and Equality only to return to France to find those ideals are no more.
A orphan girl stranded in the jungle becomes a mighty warrior.
A famous singer reflects on her life, including her journey from being an orphan to her fame as a singer, as she tries to decide which of her three suitors she will choose.
Two sisters go to the fairy to help the little inhabitants of the forest. Musical film-tale with animation.
They are each other's biggest enemies. When a new threat appears, it's time for one small hero to bring them together.

Jens Feldner's pulp fantasy novels are a success. His secret is easy: his girl-friend Selin is a vampire. But there is more to it: She is a vampire slayer on a mission to find the master who bit her centuries ago...
A tunefull account of the life of Ernest R. Ball, composer of many popular Irish songs, including the title's.
The story tells a country girl and a prince, "Kayangan" begins. Tengku Amir leads the corporate world in the city of Kuala Lumpur while Masiera, a graduate trapped by his own idealism.

Ziad dreams of becoming a comedy actor and lives in an apartment with his mother. When his mother is out of town, he launches into writing a comic script and is surprised to come across a speaking puppet Abu al-Abd.

When Romanian farmers, Cornel and Luca find a precious gem, they little realize it belongs to an ancient Strigoi, and it must be returned it before its horrific curse can afflict, and devastate future generations of both family lines.
Billy Boy and his five girl gang are wired for action. They rob for kicks, fortune and thrills.
A crucial high-tech piece of CERN collides into the path of a retired and broken biker focusing covert recovery intelligence away from an actively targeted journalist.
Family adventure based on the bestselling classic comic strip in the Spike and Suzy series created by Willy Vandersteen.
A beautiful woman has a sexual fantasy that she passes on. Then she is visited by a supernatural being, and things start to get more interesting.
Puss 'N Boots must travel around the world in 80 days, all while getting into adventures wherever he goes.
Wangho (Big Tiger) who always wears tiger skin and Chadol Bawi (Hard Rock) fight against corrupt public officials and wicked bandits.
Two men abduct a woman who wants to alienate them from their friend.
The fates of several people face on the country road.
A mother and daughter must confront a terrifying monster when they break down on a deserted road.
A skilled assassin wakes up with amnesia and must piece together.
A girl mysteriously receives advice from her future self and as a result her group of friends, along with a newly arrived, troubled classmate, learn how to be better friends and a better community.
Lokanathan, an honest IAS officer from the slums, who is also an auto driver, fights against the criminal activities of a corrupt politician.
It tells the story of MIT members who struggled to rescue 49 personnel taken prisoner in the Turkish Consulate after ISIS invaded Mosul on June 11, 2014.
An orphan named Oliver Twist meets a pickpocket on the streets of London. From there, he joins a household of boys who are trained to steal for their master.

Enter the Green Hornet. The Green Hornet along with his Boomerang throwing assistant, Alfred, the dynamic duo soon draw interest from a tough top cop who wants to unmask the hornet and a nosy reporter. Nonstop action!
This film leads us into the atmosphere of childish life - games and the sweet taste of the cherries from the neighbor's cherry tree. What changes in a child's world when the boy meets injustice?

The Devil himself comes to Earth to open his own church and the world becomes a pandemonium of delights and confusions. Based on a short story by Machado de Assis, the most famous realistic Brazilian writer of the XIX century.
An ancient prophecy seems to be coming true when a mysterious presence begins stalking the corridors of a school of magic and leaving its victims paralyzed.
Anand, a professional wildlife photographer, decides to take revenge against the people who took over his father's company and are responsible for his death.
A pair of teenage girls, who are blind by day, but when the sun goes down, they roam the streets to quench their thirst for blood.
Super Bao, an innocent and passionate steamed stuffed bun, goes through untold hardships and finally grows into a great hero who saves the world of foods.
A little Roman Catholic boy and a little Jewish girl become best friends despite the prejudice that surrounds them.

John is taken on a murder-fueled ride by a mysterious stranger that transforms the weak-willed, disillusioned husband and father into a desperate hero willing to go to any length to protect his family.
After the dead of his birth mother, the person who joined foreign army for money stays behind in his country to serve his motherland.
An unpolished racketeer, whose racket is finding heirs for unclaimed fortunes, affects ethics and tea-drinking manners to win back the sweetheart who now works for his seemingly upright competitor.

The parallel stories of a modern preacher and a medieval monk, Gabriel the Ascetic, who is killed by an ignorant mob for making a nude statue representing Truth, which is also represented by a ghostly naked girl who flits throughout the film.
One day a young boy finds a fossil of trilobite. Together with his three friends they set off on an adventurous journey through prehistory, up to the beginning of time.
An adaption of the classic tale of a girl's dreams turned reality when her new toy turns out to be a young man placed under a curse.
A devastating event challenges the life of Zey, a teenager with a special gift. He attempts to overcome this challenge through supernatural means.
Los Angeles citizens with vastly separate lives collide in interweaving stories of race, loss and redemption.
On a U.S. nuclear missile sub, a young First Officer stages a mutiny to prevent his trigger happy Captain from launching his missiles before confirming his orders to do so.
Big Nate, the comic strip character by Lincoln Peirce, must destroy the Probe, a shape-shifting villain who has stolen his nose to use for evil purposes.
Romance blooms between two soldiers (Knoller, Levi) stationed in an Israeli outpost on the Lebanese border.
Billy partied too hard and had a stroke. He realizes in his new reality that he can talk to squirrels. Billy be-friends them and they go on a crazy adventure together.

A new rickshaw business opens in town and starts abusing the other rickshaw pullers and stealing their customers. One man from a rival business can't stand idly by and begins fighting back which leads to lots of violence and death.
A young woman wants to get her boyfriend to commit to her, but the most she can get him to do is exchange apartment keys.
A desperate writer fights for survival when the Mexican mob involves him in murder.
A Kung Fu artist sacrifices everything to avenge his father's execution.
Three boys seek to find out if they are as they're parents say that they are 'devils'.

Peter "saves" showgirl Dolly from drowning one night in Copenhagen. She dries and warms herself in his apartment. Next morning, he's off to Aalborg by train with his fiancee. Dolly sneaks on the train.
A supernatural, time-travelling, musical adaptation of Charles Dickens's cult Christmas story.

At the suggestion of a retired professor, a motley group of criminals plans the robbery of a Brazilian diamond company but it must contend with a new alarm system and the mutual distrust among its members.

Bob Saginowski finds himself at the center of a robbery gone awry and entwined in an investigation that digs deeply into the neighborhood's past where friends, families, and foes all work together to make a living--no matter the cost.
Several high school girls search for the missing PE teacher's youth story.
Manny, Diego, and Sid embark upon another adventure after their continent is set adrift. Using an iceberg as a ship, they encounter sea creatures and battle pirates as they explore a new world.

An unorthodox Texas Ranger finds himself tested to his mental and physical limits when he must rescue his wife kidnapped by the brutal hands of the Mafia in Palermo, Italy, only to discover she is not the woman he thought he had married.
A Parisian criminal gang fall apart after challenges to the gang's leader lessen his influence.
A young girl returns to visit her childhood home in Taipei to see her female cousin, whom she has been secretly in love with since she was very young.
Con artists plan to fleece an eccentric family using an accomplice who claims to be their long-lost uncle.

Two Empaths living 300 years apart vow to right a centuries-old wrong, inadvertently exposing a multi-billion dollar international conspiracy in which millions of people are secretly being drugged for the enormous income they generate.
A group of passengers traveling around the Mediterranean on a luxury liner enjoy various adventures and become romantically involved with each other.
When US-raised Jaden returns to his birthplace Myanmar, to search for his roots, he discovers a shocking truth, a new love and ultimately a possible future in his homeland.
2 Little Monsters tells the fictional story of two boys who are released from prison on their eighteenth birthdays after killing a three-year old boy when they were ten.
The film tells the story of Charles, a widower who has given up on life, until he meets a foster child next door that changes his life forever.
A story, set in Rome of 44 A.D., concerning the amorous and political intrigues of the evil Empress Messalina, the wife of the Roman Emperor Claudius, and her eventual hounding to death.
Timmy loves comic books but hates being bullied by Brock. When he sends away for a ninja kit, Timmy's world changes when a real ninja shows up.

An 11-year-old with Hodgkin lymphoma escapes from hospital to embark on a road trip with a middle-aged aspiring musician in order to fulfill her dream of attending the annual Elvis Festival in Parkes, NSW.
After a roustabout sailer avoids being shanghaied in 1852 San Francisco, his audacity helps him to arise to a position of power in the vice industry of the infamous Barbary Coast.
An ecological pharmacist uses ancient Celtic techniques to murder industrial magnates whose practices harm the planet.
"It is absolutely wrong to believe that other people are in a position of undertanding our deepest feelings." - Mishima
An astronomer discovers the Dream Galaxy and with it, the girl of his dreams.
The impoverished son of Irish immigrants is pushed by wrongful police persecution into becoming Australia's most notorious bushranger.

Set in the near future in France, Ireland and Great Britain, this punk-rock comedy war epic in iambic pentameter chronicles a military coup plotted against the House of Windsor by the House of Stuart.
The relationship between the innocent Ayse working on the farm and her boss Ahmet.
Beseeching heaven itself for the answer to the anguished cry of millions.
An adventurer searching for a legendary treasure comes across a heretofore unknown city, ruled with an iron hand by a beautiful queen.
Back in 1982, a Texas University student who was curious about the male sex fantasies he had been having, decides he needs to hook up with an out gay student on campus.
A vice inspector for the Paris police takes special interest in the plight of drug-addicted Lucky whom he considers to be more victim than criminal.
A beautiful young woman takes her father's place as the prisoner of a mysterious beast, who wishes to marry her.
An enterprising wing woman guides her client, a nerdy app developer, to personal success through dating tips and a makeover, but has no idea that cupid and her career are about to collide head-on.
Carmen Vidal is a private detective addicted to pizza, beer and marijuana who fights against a criminal Senator to avenge the death of her colleague, in a modern film noir about self-improvement.
Early Japanese three-part samurai / fantasy serial.

After escaping an abusive relationship, Samira has supernatural dreams at midnight. She wants to change her life, and explores her Hebrew ancestry. She later encounters the Messiah in a dream who tells her that He is coming back.
Power Of Punjab is a story of Martial Arts, a story of Love, a story of Trust, revenge and of Paranormal Activities.
Three young boys must crack a voice-mail code and figure out what the message is before they are discovered by desperate men who'll stop at nothing to destroy the cell phone.
Medel (Bembol Roco) is a petty thief who gives his earnings to his neighbors who needs it but his felonious activities stopped when he marries Frieda (Beth Bautista) and adopts Bimbo (Niño Muhlach).
When an ex-con, trying to go straight, is framed for a multimillion dollar armored car robbery, he flees to Mexico to unmask the real culprits.
The story revolves around Pandi who makes a living through illegal means. He meets a girl named Vandhana and falls in love with her. Will he succeed in hiding his real identity to win his love?
Dumped & fired, Dave seeks to find his way in life & love with the help of his lazy gamer-nerd friend Brandon.

In the aftermath of events of The Last Aztec Warrior, Antonio Ferrera's past has finally caught up to him. His old cohort turned enemy kidnaps him and his family, forcing him to break a notorious arms dealer out of prison.

A police detective investigates the murder of a man found dismembered in a washing machine and is drawn into a web of deceit and murder by the dead man's lover, Vida, and her two sisters, Sissy and Ludmilla,
Two out of work men come up with a money-making promotion to find the most beautiful woman in the world and to set up a raffle where the winner wins a date with her.

The lives of two best friends take different paths when Jake goes to prison to protect his friends, and Chris turns things around to become a police officer. Released after 15 years, Jake seeks revenge against his friends.
A father gets into a desperate search to find his children who disappeared while going down stairs from their apartment in the seventh floor.
A toymaker in Poland specializes in building lifesize mechanical men. He builds a chess-playing "automaton" to hide a pretty young Polish activist who is being hunted by occupying Russian forces.

When Sue Bixby becomes his new boss, stagecoach robber Talbot reforms and goes after her rustled cattle. When he and his men are outnumbered fighting Lloyd's gang, Randall rides to get circus man Mahoney and his man shooting cannon.
A charismatic lieutenant newly assigned to a remote fort is captured by a group of mountain bandits, thus setting in motion a madcap farce that is Lubitsch at his most unrestrained.

Infatuated with a handsome sculptor, an overindulged daddy's girl will make use of every trick in the book--including a cunning but charming impersonation--to reach her goal. But, will the pampered heiress have it her way once more?
The love story of Kathavarayan and Aryamala.
A group of twenty-something heroin dealers in the South Bronx in the early 1980's struggle to avoid the law and the rival competition.
An accidental Internet superstar hates his web-addled, fame-addicted generation, and revolts by kidnapping a priceless masterpiece by Andy Warhol - the godfather of the Facebook era.
The traveler Franz arrives in a mountain valley, where they are awaiting the new local sheriff. he decides to pretend he is the man they are waiting for.
Most memorable movie by P.Madhavan and Sivaji dominant hero will show how gnana oli will impact your life.

When Katherine, a beautiful Southern girl obsessed with thoughts of eternal life, invites Count Alucard to come to her mansion in the U.S., she unleashes a Pandora's box of horror on unsuspecting relatives and neighbors.
The horrendous spanish detective becomes a bodyward in his new third adventure.
The No. 3 assassin of Japan is given the chance to usurp No. 1 and take their place.
In a love triangle that miraculously mirrors her mother's romance years ago, a young woman lets her heart lead.

An Elf is left behind by Santa to help rescue the Harper family from a lousy Christmas. The Elf and the family get more than they bargained for, as the kids help the Elf discover his special powers and true identity as a budding superhero.
Will Molly, the last dodo bird in the land of dinosaurs, defeat Snarl the T-Rex and restore peace to Jurassic Planet? Practice your Dino-roar and find out with Jurassic Planet Dodo-Minion.
A reel-life costumed actor is abducted and asked to be a real hero by Toon characters.
A young Woman struggles to escape the domestic abuse she suffers from her psychotic Boyfriend.
Anime character Skye Hoshi mysteriously becomes real and falls out of her poster, it's up to slacker comic store employee Atom to help her get back home before her anime is destroyed.
A couple struggles to visit all four of their divorced parents on Christmas.

When Junior, an overprotected preteen worm, is accidentally brought up to the surface, he must face a risky journey back home, while learning the great powers of self-respect, trust and true friendship.

A policeman gets killed and the short-staffed police chief sends for a few experienced officers to support him in his fight with organized crime. Meanwhile, a conflict between local gangster groups escalates.

Wu Shao Tung is raised to be the leader of the Wu Tang clan, who previously have been defeated by the evil Yen Chan tin and his clan. He is taught roughly and is shown how to defeat the Unbeaten 18, a cave of treacherous traps.

Three female ninjas are recruited by the government to recover a gold treasure robbed by a gang. They go undercover, sometimes nude under bed covers, to investigate and achieve their end, fighting and killing men in unusual ways.
The true story of the love, life, and music of one of the greatest composers of our time.

A country bumpkin (Dong-shik) goes to Seoul in order to bring his older brother (Young-shik)back to the country. Little does he know Young-shik is a petty crook involved with a prostitute (Sonia) who is servicing American GIs. Then Sonia comes onto Dong-shik...
Two brothers live in harmony until the younger brother's wife creates misunderstandings between the brothers.
Two couples inhabiting the same apartment exist in parallel dimensions unaware of each others presence, an opening in the fabric of reality threatens to tear their worlds apart.
A lottery winner breaks up with her fiancé and marries a fortune hunter who proves to be dangerous.
Two inventors head to propose a machine for easy soap packaging while evil capitalist tries to destroy the machine and gaslighting friends.
When a woman's ex-lover commits suicide, she is confronted by painful secrets from her past.
In Simon Amstell's affecting, bittersweet comedy, a rising young filmmaker is thrown into emotional turmoil by a burgeoning romance and the upcoming premiere of his second feature.
The spirit of a long-dead prisoner returns for revenge, haunting the prison's new governor.
Thyagaraja, a saint and a poet, overcomes many hurdles in his life, including grinding poverty to emerge as the greatest Carnatic music composers of all time.
The first humans to set foot on Mars are tasked with setting up the infrastructure for the rest of humanity to arrive, but must band together to survive after unleashing a terrible threat.

Yuri is a young musician. He is very afraid of death. For this reason, he hardly leaves his apartment. One day he meets a mysterious man who claims to be death. He takes him on an extraordinary journey.
After 40 years, Keloglan and his friends act on the call of Cankiz. They are thrown into an adventure in which they fight against the oppressors who try to consume the animal's lineage.

Stage manager Phil secretly wants to be a star and fights for his place as a recognized company actor. Filmed from several different continents via video call using only household objects as props, set, costume and musical instruments.
Nobita find a Place for abandoned Cats and Dogs to live in 3 million year ago. He and his Friends go to the Kingdom of Cats and Dogs again after a Thousand Years.
A mysterious man is sent to protect a woman against her sister's attempts to have her killed. In the process, the man and woman fall in love.
A Heffley family road trip to attend Meemaw's 90th birthday party goes hilariously off course thanks to Greg's newest scheme to get to a video gaming convention.
On a freighter going from San Francisco to Shanghai Mr. Moto solves mysteries caused by a gang of smugglers.
Batman and Nightwing are forced to team with the Joker's sometimes-girlfriend Harley Quinn to stop a global threat brought about by Poison Ivy and Jason Woodrue, the Floronic Man.
A story of a revenge taken by Vir Singh in greediness to get the throne of his brother, who was the real king.
A crime boss is accused by a reporter of murdering her brother and raping her. He investigates the frame-up.
In Miami Beach, Vice City, a local young hustler and his ride or die girlfriend, is determined to make a come up like a drug cartel, but everything gets real over money and diamonds.
A depressed art teacher becomes the victim of paranormal disturbances after confiscating a strange pendant from an orphaned student.

In 2059 scientists manage to revive two people after 80 years of suspended animation - a boy Marek Torlewski and a dictator Muanty, who quickly becomes a serious threat to humanity. Synteza is an adaptation of a novel by Maciej Wojtyszko.

Terry feels discriminated against when the summer jobs at the Sun Tribune go to two guys. She decides to do something about it. She dresses like a guy and gets a haircut. Will students at the other high school notice? Girls notice "him".
Funny sexual fantasy with three naughty nurses.
Intrigue at the Roman Emperor's court prior to its destruction by Vesuvius.
Kabuki adaptation: A princess, a figure from the literary past who anticipates a modern woman, tempts a self righteous priest.
A fairy tale romance takes an unexpected turn when Mark discovers his beautiful bride-to-be, Connie, has actually been plotting against him.
The film intertwines a love story between a fan of Rodrigo and a young man with actual footage of concerts by the late famed tropical singer.
Before they depart on a vacation, two parents deposit their young son at a school -- a haunted school.
People who were linked with Mori Kogoro are being attacked or killed according to their names' number sequences.

An up-righteous police officer with a wife and son gets involved with a conspiracy after he arrested a murderer by chance. His weakness was his son needed an operation to treat his legs. Which path to choose? Righteousness or conspiracy?
Tobi is a boy who was born with two wings. Some scientist wanted to examine him but that won't be that easy.

A pair of New York City detectives is faced with a moral dilemma when offered a tremendous sum of money in exchange for catching a killer and turning him over to the victim's family instead of the criminal justice system.
An 1840s slaveowner trains one of his slaves to be a bare-knuckle fighter.
A reporter, notorious for working on pseudo-documentaries, must uncover the legend of the three guardian monsters who must rise to defend Japan from the vengeful spirits within Godzilla.
Diggsy meets a stranger who gives him a key to parallel universes where another version of the girl of his dreams may not only exist, but where one of them could possibly love him back.
Mick Sikes is a detective with a dark addiction and even darker past on the trail of a twisted serial killer.
Guru Ji is a social reformer who works to help people fight against social evils.

As Jamie travels in Chile, he invites an eccentric woman to join his group's quest to score a fabled hallucinogen, a move that finds him at odds with his new companion, until they drink the magic brew on a beach at the edge of the desert.
The found footage collective, Everything is Terrible! Has taken over 2,000 forgotten VHS tapes and re-contextualized them in order to tell the tale of The Dark Lord himself, Lucifer.
A married couple tries to steal back a valuable heirloom from a troublesome kid.

A comic tale of a poet and his fan both in love with each other and relentless efforts by his would be father in law to not let them marry each other. Instead, he wants his daughter to be married to the poet's friend.
WHEN EVERYTHING ELSE FAILS, THE DESPERATE TURN NO NINONG WHOSE EVERY WORD IS LAW
After the loss of his wife, a Naval Captain attempts suicide.
After the son foils an attempt to steal a priceless Thai artifact, the family becomes national heroes and the target of revenge by the criminal gang whose robbery they stopped.
A man who lost everything in the Haitian earthquake defends his new friends against gangsters.
Upon returning to Vietnam years after the war, veteran Joe Hoffman stumbles onto a drug-running operation overseen by some of his fellow ex-soldiers.
A maniacal leader trains assassins to become more efficient killing machines through virtual reality. A Federal Service Agent is assigned to infiltrate the mysterious academy.

Ted Daniels, a ranch hand working for a rodeo, captures a magnificent wild horse that he tames and trains. As Ted is recovering from an accident that happened during a rodeo, the rodeo owner cheats him out of his horse.
A midnight showing of an early 1970's horror movie turns to chaos when the Killer from the movie comes out of the film to attack those in the theater.
BECAUSE SHE IS JUST AN ADOPTED DAUGHTER, A VICIOUS YOUNG WOMAN COMPETES WITH THE REAL DAUGHTER OF A RICH WOMAN IN EVERYTHING; SHE EVER SEDUCES THE REAL DAUGHTER'S BOYFRIEND.

Haluk, who is trying to take revenge on his fiancee Handan, who cheated on him, proposes to Zeynep on a contractual basis. Handan, who learns that Haluk and Zeynep got married, resorts to various games to separate the two.

Jules Claus has embraced Christmas again and is getting ready for the busiest time of the year together with grandpa Noël. Everything seems to go according to plan, until Jules receives a very special letter with an intriguing question.
This is the real life story of the baddest woman you've never heard of.
An engaged lady rethinks her decision when she finds a strange but powerful deity in her fiancé's family.
Bad Hombres tells the story of two undocumented immigrants who take a job digging a hole and then learn their employers are criminals.
A guest tries to stay inside the house of a man who can't kill him unless he's outside, because of believing guest to be equal to God.
Just out of prison, Benny Horowitz tries to go straight. Things are complicated by his former girlfriend and his former gangster buddies.
Five criminals with no memory of their crimes must escape from the strongest prison ever created.
Over the course of five social occasions, a committed bachelor must consider the notion that he may have discovered love.
A former radio DJ, suicidally despondent because of a terrible mistake he made, finds redemption in helping a deranged homeless man who was an unwitting victim of that mistake.
A young melancholy man live day by day searching his way. He meets friends like him and fall in love with a spanish girl. But for him all this it's not enough.
An orphan working as a Pizza delivery boy and the daughter of a caste-based politician are forced to get married in an unforeseen situation.
The true story of a British ex-SAS soldier who must defend a hotel packed with civilian families against a horde of heavily armed rebels during the 1997 military coup in Sierra Leone, West Africa.
A 15-year-old boy is caught in a centuries-old feud between Norse gods.

Chandrachoodan, a righteous police officer, gets into trouble with his seniors because of his values. Despite being surrounded by corrupt officials, he vows to bring an underworld gangster to justice.
Two lovers are separated but in a twist of fate, find themselves in a care of a syndicate leader. He is the bodyguard and she is the wife.
A series of blunders lead Doug to believe he has murdered his fiancé Betty. Now he has to avoid jail, lie to relatives about his engagement and escape alive from Betty's revenge.

Lee Du-seok publishes an autobiography describing murders he committed after the statute of limitations expires. A detective and one of the victim's mothers search for the author while another killer begins a spree of murders.
The legendary Boudica unites the tribes of Britannia, igniting an uprising against their Roman occupiers after the rape of her daughters.
A group of kids on holiday in Cornwall meet a magical creature on the beach with the power to grant wishes.

Amidst the chaos of the pandemic, Abhiram, trapped in China and Mythili, missing Abhiram's presence with a baby in her womb in India. A trivial mistake puts Abhiram in an experience of 14 years exile. How he fights back is the narrative.
A Squatch,a sleepy Oregon town and greedy townsfolk make for a bad combination.
In British Palestine of 1938, several men vie for the affections of a Coptic banker's wife who's involved with the anti-British underground movement.
A small town deputy goes toe to toe with a dangerous underworld kingpin in the midwest.

Madeleine Verdier, a penniless actress is accused of the murder of a famous producer. With the help of her best friend she proves that, she is acquitted for self-defense. Then begins a life of glory and success, until truth comes to light.
A disbelieving son sets out to discover the true secret of his magician father's inheritance.
A collection of four Japanese folk tales with supernatural themes.

A love story between a communist and a falangist set in the time when spanish republicans took refuge in Russia shortly after the start of the Civil War and shortly before the outbreak of the Second World War.
Four parallel worlds, with four parallel Londons ruled by different magical powers and monarchies.
Successful advertising specialist learns that he is sick with a deadly disease. In fact, the diagnosis is wrong, but his life has already begun to change.
James Furlong, motherless, discovered an extraordinary gift by accident which caused the death of his father and his grandmother.
A blind and deaf woman dedicates her life and sacrifices all she has for her son, a good-for-nothing troublemaker who gets mixed up with a criminal gang that tries to frame him for a robbery.
A human becomes the super-hero Sparkman, after being granted super-powers by an alien princess in order to defeat the evil alien warlord who forced her to flee to Earth.
Maggie Peyton, the new owner of Herbie, Number 53, the free-wheelin' Volkswagen bug with a mind of its own, puts the car through its paces on the road to becoming a NASCAR competitor.
Six love stories made of expectations, passion, contrasts, that intertwine with one another.
A young boy is recruited by his imaginary friends Sharkboy and Lavagirl to help save their planet.
A comedy centered on the life of Kate Reddy, a finance executive who is the breadwinner for her husband and two kids.

The naive Kikoriki have never seen TV before, and are soon convinced that the world truly is in grave danger. They quickly come to an earth-shattering decision: The Kikoriki must help Lucien save the world.
A Brazilian western about Cabeleira, a feared killer living in the countryside of Pernambuco State in the 40's.
Sreedharan, a simpleton tries to impress his nephew 'Ashwathi' and decides to marry her, but under several circumstances he came to know her tragic past and helps her.
A crook poses as a Lord to rob a merchant and holds a detective captive in his cellar.
A battle is on to save the soul of a woman who must decide whether or not to become a vengeful spirit.

A modern woman, whose youthful appearance leads people to believe she is her daughter's sister, divorced several times, is about to marry a man who is a fortune-hunter, against the wishes of her daughter and, especially, her outraged son.
Cayenne, French Guiana: When a teenage drug mule absconds with a bellyful of product, a corrupt cop who traffics cocaine must find the kid without blowing his cover or getting killed by the cartel.
The poignant, coming of age story about a group of eleven year old girls in their final summer before middle school.
Two feuding bounty-hunter families have to team up to track down a criminal couple.
An air hostess gets involved in Naples, against her will, in the in-fighting amongst rival gangs.
Feature version of the 1936 serial "Shadow of Chinatown."

A punk rock romance portraiture of present day America. This teen / coming-of-age film utilizes iconic American imagery to examine the people's reaction to the campaign and inauguration of Barack Obama.
Two homeless girls find an lost old man in the streets of Salvador, and are willing to help him. But they start using him to get alms from people.
Multiple stories about people living in an apartment complex intersect - among them, a girl who enjoys shooting strangers and one of her victims reflecting over his death.
A romantic comedy based upon a couple who are down on their luck, but through some Divine intervention experience a wonderful chain of events.
Kutty is a good-hearted soul, but unfortunate incidents tend to portray his ruffian side whenever he encounters the girl he loves. A bizarre incident brings them closer and yet keeps them apart.
A young man returns to his hometown after years of being gone to get revenge on a gang that ruined his life.

The government, military, and police forces have been dismantled. When violence nearly ended the human race, a group was formed to change the direction of humanity. But whether humanity can survive rests on The Last MonoMyth.
An ex thief and his girlfriend are brutally killed by a group of his former associates. He is then resurrected as a female to exact revenge on their killers.
Expensive diamonds are stolen but before the thief can fence them he is strangled by ex-con Cueball, who then takes the gems and continues murdering people he believes are trying to swindle him.
A fantasy story centered on a magical film projector.

Iowa farmer Ray Kinsella is inspired by a voice he can't ignore to pursue a dream he can hardly believe. Supported by his wife, Ray begins the quest by turning his ordinary cornfield into a place where dreams can come true.
