Having a fear of commitment, Ryan is forced to make the tough choices on women, work, and life before he loses it all.
A girl inherits a miniature horse that develops an unlikely friendship with her half-sister's Jack Russell Terrier, which takes to riding on the horse's back.

A young boy dreams that he is in an imaginary world where, assisted by his family's plumber, he must save other piano-playing kids like himself from the dungeons of his dictatorial piano teacher who also mind-controls his mother.

Forced to spend the night at a creepy old holiday resort, two wannabe gangsters run into trouble when, unpacking the car, their box of cash splits open, spilling a million bucks in eye-catching bundles all over the driveway.

A ten-year-old orphan gets adopted by a man pursued by the Mob. After surviving a hit man's attack, by a strange twist of circumstances the new foster father now has the would-be-killer's appearance, that of his son's biological dad.
Nan, a member of the Mainland's police force travels to Hong Kong with her sidekicks to track down a deadly gunrunner.

Throughout time, Areo fought Satan's army for the good of the universe. Archangels taught him well, Callie protected him. He now faces earthly nuisances: drug cartel, human traffickers and evil wrongdoers who challenge God's best warriors.
The story of Koko, a young boy raised by Pokémon, and the creation of a new bond between humans and Pokémon.

Pop singer Lu, who's touring Central America, her sleazy manager Harold, a rugged boat captain and their guide, Sam, and Sam's girl Brandy, are targeted by a gang and a local tribe over Lu's resemblance to the natives' moon goddess.
The true story of a heroic man, Hunter "Patch" Adams, determined to become a medical doctor because he enjoys helping people. He ventured where no doctor had ventured before, using humour and pathos.
When Jack and Aurora met they'll rely on their friends as a case mistaken identity leads them on an adventure teaching them that it's who you are on the inside that matters most.
Superstar Nora Aunor turns comic as a female cockfighter.

A woman returns to her hometown seeking bloodthirsty retribution when her lover is killed by her scornful ex-fiancé. Torn between love, hate, loyalty, and vengeance, her path to satisfaction widens out of her control..
A songwriter in love with his demanding boss's secretary enters an alternate, wacky world where a much-needed hit tune may be created from his heart.
Deathstalker must defend his remaining comrades, his life, and his newfound love in the battle against an evil army of stone warriors and the wicked queen who created them.
A young farm girl battles the monsters of Fairyland to rescue her brother who has been kidnapped by an evil queen.
A young man ignores his mother's pleas and becomes drawn to a life of crime.
Two morticians accidentally burn down the family mortuary, and in order to raise the money to rebuild it, they must pose as the hottest new painters to hit the art world.
A prosecutor tracks a gang murder to a Los Angeles youth who could name his own brother.
Dokan shehata is a movie about the good and bad in life, And how life will be when there are jealousy and hatred between brothers.
A man makes a deal with the Devil in order to get revenge on the three corrupt officers who killed his wife and daughter.
Eva wants to become a singer and ends up in the Mambo bar, where behind the scenes is traded with other goods than talents.
To save their cash-strapped orphanage, a guardian and his kids partner with a washed-up boat captain for a chance to win a lucrative fishing competition.
A little girl gets separated from her teddy bear and is inconsolable.
Two women fight for what makes them happiest, they just can't exactly distinguish if it's each other or their careers. They only have time for one but they try to have it all.
14-year-old Chakra is sold as a slave labourer to the captain of a Thai fishing vessel. The captain's rule on board is cruel and arbitrary.
La India Maria portrays a poor but honorable woman who causes a stir around town when she decides to become a witch doctor.
A police officer is forced to work with the Magical Girls who took his son in order to survive the night and discover the truth behind his son's disappearance.
Priscilla Chase is a woman who has never had an orgasm.
The spirit of an ancient evil queen posesses the body of a young anthropological student, who then goes on a murderous rampage.

Among Wolves is a morality tale that emphasizes the importance of sacrifice and the value of innocence. This film follows Connor, a recently returned veteran, who struggles to find his feet in his old hometown.
One morning a month for 18 months a young couple experiences the power of love and the pitfalls of life in the most vulnerable space two people can share, the bedroom.
Katja's life collapses after the deaths of her husband and son in a bomb attack. After a time of mourning and injustice, Katja seeks revenge.
The story of a family seeking harmony, seen by a twelve-year-old boy
The story follows a young girl who as a child is a victim of an extramarital relationship, unknowingly gets involved with a married man and her journey in finding the solution.
After a car accident in which his son Roberto miraculously remains unharmed, Don Francesco Aliprandi makes a vow to the Madonna.

A greedy Manchu (Qing) general wants it all. His troops scavenges through the countryside on a deadly mission of theft and lust until two young fighters and an over-the-hill master decide to fight back.

Police officer Leon wakes up after a failed operation in a remote forest. Here he meets other men who wonder what's happening. The Ribbeck brothers plan to use the XX chromosome to create an invincible superman, with genes from criminals.
Holding a grudge, recovering addict Charlie Waits sets out on a course of revenge to take the life of 'Migs', a ruthless gangster that took the life of his childhood friend.

On her 16th birthday, Asagiri Kanna, a shy and bullied girl is abducted and taken to attend a new school. There she finds out she has been promised to marry the demon king, Kaki Kitou. Neither of them seem to be happy about it.
The first installment in an exciting new horror franchise. A young writer believes she has discovered the holy grail of terror, the knives used by Jack the Ripper for his notorious murders.
This is a real life story inspired by Subir Banerjee,the little child actor who played the iconic role of Apu in Pather Panchali.
Young Dr. Kildare tries to help an unlucky brain surgeon and his seemingly insane patient.

Four brothers committing crimes with a promise among them to stop someday. When a deal goes south, the older brother says it's enough, but the other three disagree and recklessly do business with a wanted crime lord.

The Crimson Skull seeks to obtain the mystical Lost Amulet Of Vultura to raise the dead and revive his long deceased Queen. Only the daring and beautiful Nyoka the Jungle Girl dares to oppose this murderous threat.
A former political henchman seeks out revenge for being dropped by a ruthless politician while a determined investigator tries to find proof of a connection between the two of them.
A young man lands in the land of little people, who ask him to save them from their enemies.
Chance throws them together as dance partners. Can love keep them together or will their secrets tear them apart?
A criminal has come out of hiding only to find that his old partner has become a priest and his girlfriend has been forced to marry a powerful mob boss.
In the Falangist Spain of 1944, the bookish young stepdaughter of a sadistic army officer escapes into an eerie but captivating fantasy world.
Three bumbling criminals find it harder to keep hold of a baby after successfully kidnapping the baby for ransom.
When a young car thief stumbles on the invention of the century (and the various government agencies that want to kill him), he and a sassy checkout clerk named Kate have the adventure of a lifetime.

A Science Fiction adventure set in two different time-periods. An impending visit by extra-terrestrials is discovered by Government Agents. Ten years later we discover the outcome of the extra-terrestrial visit.

Although an initial match-making attempt between Pyongho and Saebyol through their grandparents is unsuccessful, the two are brought together by fate to participate in the Pyongyang spring fashion show.
A new sheriff of a small town along the U.S. & Mexico border investigates a drug cartel deal that went horribly wrong.
As he struggles to rescue his kidnapped family, a martial arts expert vows to seek revenge against the abductors.
A murderer returns to his hometown after being released from prison. He finds out that the young people of the city, including his little brother, are addicted. He is trying to improve the situation.
A man is cursed with falling in love with other men's women.
Weeks away from his wedding, an insecure guy puts his fiancée through a series of tests to see if she would cheat before they tie the knot.
A famous painter creates a triangle in a young couple's marriage.
A well to do Business Executive unintentionally has an Out of Body Experience that leads to horrific and lawless pandemonium in his calm and quiet life.
When a transatlantic flight goes missing, Federal Agent Tallulah Murphy is assigned by the President to investigate and stop the threat before it's too late.

The Rapture has come and gone. In it's wake, a wasteland filled with desperate bandits. Josh McManus, a drifter with a knack for fighting, must find the mysterious "Shepherd" - a dangerous mission that will put his faith to the test.
Organized crime is a family business, and families are messy.

Freshly out of jail, Max replaces his brother at the local Kebab restaurant for new years eve. Once Paola, a crazy woman with a mysterious suitcase, arrives in the place, things go south very quickly.
A support group of killers is held regularly. The participants sit in a circle of trust and share their transgressions.
Blacklits is female driven futuristic edgy thriller, set a hundred and fifty years into the future that has no current day technology, it's a world that is unthinkable but yet realistic.
Following the unusual connection made between four workers at different stages of their lives, Under the Snow captures factory life in a way rarely seen: personal, flirtatious, introspective.
The son of famous detective Sam Spade carries on the family tradition of getting involved with the Maltese Falcon - and with the people who will stop at nothing, including murder, to get it.

Two married 70-year olds wake up one morning in twenty-something bodies but haven't lost a lifetime's worth of knowledge. What starts out as a rough adjustment turns into a whole world of enjoyable possibilities.
The story begins with the demise of a lawyer named Vishwanath and travels through multiple twists, suspense and turns without leaving a single clue for the police to find.
Czech fairy tale about a shepherd who finds a golden fern with magical powers. He can ensure his continued happiness if he does the right thing, but will he?
Accidentally, three sibling children are left alone in a winter storm on the island of Spitsbergen. No-one on the main land, an ocean apart, knows where they are. It's a dramatic fight for survival.
A bankrupt publisher thinks all his troubles are over when he stumbles across a Brown Wallet containing 200 pounds. But he is implicated in the murder of his wealthy aunt ...
When two girls move to the country to be near their ailing mother, they have adventures with the wondrous forest spirits who live nearby.
After getting attacked by a gang of criminals, Shivan, a taxi driver, moves to an unfamiliar place. There, he meets new people who show him the true meaning of life.

Little Dragon Maiden mixes the old with the new to create pure golden magic as kung-fu fighting veterans Chen Kuan-Tai and Lo Lieh join relative newcomer Leslie Cheung in a far-out swordplay love story that rocks.
Two oddball Berliners discover the abandoned appendages of a mannequin. Separately, and with grotesque consequence, they come to terms with their disjointed mate.
Ram fights to save his love Vaidehi and to bring justice to her troubled family.
Evie seeks to reunite with her father in a post-apocalyptic Wild West after a civil war ravaged the U.S., leaving only the dead and a land of no law.
A con man, Alex, has a girlfriend, Amanda, that is crazy for him. Unfortunately for Alex, Amanda is really crazy and will do anything to keep him.
Scott Calvin has been a humble Santa Claus for eight years, but it might come to an end if he doesn't find a Mrs. Claus.
A brother gets jealous about another brother's mother
Snow White, a beautiful girl, is despised by a wicked queen who tries to destroy her. With the aid of dwarves in the woods, Snow White overcomes the queen.

A young man, armed with a magical bow and arrows, embarks on a mystical journey through a mystical land to rid it of all evil and joins forces with an outlaw to take down an evil witch bent on claiming the magic bow for evil.
The romantic relationship between a sports journalist and a cyclist during the Tour de France.

Small town brothers Brady and Luke Wylie struggle to cope with life after the abrupt death of their parents in a freak accident. When younger brother Luke refuses to utter a word to anyone, it forces his brother down a destructive path.
A man who has been accused of murdering his wife is granted the opportunity to travel back in time -- in one-hour increments -- in order to piece together who killed her, and why.
An former small-crimes convict is offered a chance at revenge by participating in a risky robbery.
A guy in love with an engaged woman tries to win her over after she asks him to be her maid of honor.
Gretel is an entrepreneur. Victoria is engaged in prostitution. Two parallel and different lives that are eventually found with similar conflicts and deficiencies.
The end-of-year trip to Bariloche for a group of high school students.
Amaryllis, an alien comes to earth to avoid destruction as on your planet, and with the intention to take revenge of the Greys, murderers of their race.
An officer frames a colleague when a gambler forces him to steal secrets.

A gang of escaped convicts take over a farmhouse and hold the woman living there hostage. It turns out that her husband is a cop, who among other things is in trouble because he has accidentally killed an innocent girl.
A Chinatown detective traces the death of his Kung Fu master to a mystical city hidden in the streets of San Francisco.
The canine star of a fictional sci-fi/action show that believes his powers are real embarks on a cross country trek to save his co-star from a threat he believes is just as real.
The lives of the four suffering people intersect in the heat of the Japanese drums' concert venue.
In a small village on the edge of the war between the military and the cartels, a little boy escapes to the forest to plead to the gods of nature for his disappeared mother's safe return.
Two con artists go after the wrong score and pay the price for getting caught.
Life and racing is all about taking the right path. A coming of age story of young boy who finds acceptance through racing
Anitha, a government official, embarks on a journey to find Chandramouli, an archaeologist, who went to Vietnam to search for any existence of the prince of the Chola dynasty.
A rich player emotionally abuses his girlfriend until she discovers the bond of multiple past lives that ties them into present day and turns the tables.

A Tantric believes that by donating a virgin woman's head to gods crown, would bring down the universe to his feet. How the hero and heroine gets entangled in the underworld nexus, while rescuing the robbery, forms the crux of the plot.
Mary Contrary is set to marry Tom Piper when he is kidnapped by Roderigo and Gonzorgo, two goons working for the evil Barnaby who wants to marry Mary for her inheritance.
A madman sets out to destroy a group of Chinatown merchants.
A Pacific Ocean steamer with a brutal captain, Peter Forbes (Noah Beery), and carrying a motley cargo of passengers, drifts into the Sargasso Sea and is ship wrecked on the Island of Lost Ships.
A psychopath killer, targeting film critics. The film is a fast-paced thriller that raises many questions of the ethics of criticism.
For a pale, disproportionate high school kid living in Orange County, happiness is seasonal.
The friendship between the impulsive and adventurous Pim and the more cautious Pom is put to the test when they are faced with trying to find their way home.
A young boy is whisked away to the mythical land of Tao where he becomes the center of a conflict between an evil lord and a group of animal warriors.
Several unexpected events link two men to each other, with one of them finding out about their two births old relation through a magical book.

Millennia ago, seven stars fell from the sky. In each star were stones with distinct abilities. Jerome becomes a yellow stone baring, Empyrean and has to deal with a cross-realm criminal terrorizing the streets of London.
The son of the chairman of a bank is abducted and held for ransom. DSP Ali intervenes, but is unable to save the child. Later, his world is turned upside down when his daughter is kidnapped.
The story of two children growing up like siblings on the streets.
Three jewelry thieves get trapped in their safe house and, one by one, they fall apart.

Young Iris was born deaf and always had a problem feeling heard herself. When she discovers a lone whale singing at a frequency unintelligible to other whales, she sets out to find the frequency that will make Blue 55 feel less alone.

Flap is a Korean-American gangster who arrives in Korea and befriends a struggling actor named Seung-hwan. They experience a string of one-night stands until Seung-hwan meets Yeong-ju and attempts to make her give up her wild ways.

My dream was making movies. It was a vague dream but Sunhee's love helped me. I came to think that our dream was too big to think it vaguely. So we just decided to do as much as we can and to make the movie of our story.
In a medieval fantasy world, boar warrior Attila the Ham teams up with a tough human princess to find the legendary Great Blue Bean, a source of tremendous power.
Fentanyl a.k.a 'King Ivory' is trafficked from state prison gangs; based upon true events.
A telepathic mutant recruits a post-World War III TV game-show warrior to lead her band of mutants to safety.
Set in Brazil, three kids who make a discovery in a garbage dump soon find themselves running from the cops and trying to right a terrible wrong.
Evil mastermind Dr. Mabuse seeks Professor Erasmus' secret invention, a device that makes one invisible, but a murder in a revue theatre brings the German police and the FBI into the mix.

It looks like the end of the line for Poco and Kim when they are separated following a car accident. Poco's relentless search takes him through the desert. Bravely facing the odds, Poco encounters many dangers, and makes some new friends.
A case of mistaken identity has Mark Shapiro on an international chase to protect a mystery case, trying to stay alive.

A stirring story that captures the glory of determination when a physically challenged young girl brings an abused, homeless female jockey, and an abandoned horse together for a ride of a lifetime and much more.
Follows the lives two co-dependent sisters who work as hotel maids in Fresno.

On the night of the 2016 Presidential election, Cass, an L.A. club promoter, takes a thrilling and emotional journey with Frida, a Midwestern visitor. She challenges him to revisit his broken dreams - while he pushes her to discover hers.
A shy genius is employed by his former university to design robot software.
A government program turns Duncan, a man who suffers from multiple personality disorder, into a super-soldier with the attributes of a cowboy, a ninja, and a Viking.

Two women - a struggling actress and a brilliant homicide detective - spiral into a midlife crisis. Trapped in a web of violence, they face a decision: flee, or confront the powerful forces of their world.

A former Marine who lives life on the edge as a rookie firefighter falls for a divorced woman he rescues, but struggles to rescue himself in a mysterious and revealing journey towards self-forgiveness.

With his glory days long gone, an overweight former football player will make a bet with his close friends and visit the nearest gym for the ultimate makeover, only to discover the girl of his dreams and his true soulmate.
Right out of police academy, Jeff/Omar Epps starts as undercover cop in Cincinnati. First it's small time cases but he proves himself and moves up to a big case - befriending a brutal crime boss.

A "coming of age" family adventure feature. A father attempts to revive his deserted relationship between his daughter and his son by introducing them to a century old family secret that will take them on the ride of their lifetime.
The life story of the brave soldiers of the Pakistan Army, mainly the Pakistan Air Force. Outlining their lives, relationships, duty and hardships.
A janitor who claims he's seen a murder becomes romantically involved with the glamorous TV reporter covering the story.
Stella is a highly successful, forty-something San Francisco stock broker who is persuaded by her colorful New York girlfriend Delilah to take a well deserved, first-class vacation to Jamaica.
Biography of the famed motorcycle daredevil, much of which was filmed in his home town of Butte, Montana. The film depicts Knievel reflecting on major events in his life just before a big jump.
A squad of four undercover cops are charged with cleaning up the streets of Seville from drugs and prostitution.
Director Pavel Ruminov wanted to break up with his girlfriend. But she had a different opinion on the matter and refused to leave the flat, insisting their story was not over yet.

After the success of the first Brazilian space mission, a scientist intends to accomplish an even more audacious feat. His goal is to launch into space the Nationalist rocket II, this time taking two humans to the moon.
A serial killer goes out in a blaze of terror on a summer's day in London
Four labourers are tortured by the police to confess to a theft they have not committed.

Jaka Sembung is the leader of the rebel and a famous fighter that inspires people to fight the Dutch Colonial Government. The Dutch representative in Java offers a reward for his death and employs another mighty warrior to go after him.
Raised by compassionate wild animals as one of their own, a helpless eight-year-old girl grows into a beautiful, untamed woman and becomes Lady Tarzan: the fearless Queen of the Elephants.
A clever thief is recruited to work for the CIA after eluding them for years. Based on the U.S. TV series, "It Takes a Thief."
The story of the Battle of Midway, told by the leaders and the sailors who fought it.

During the Iran-Iraq War, a disabled young woman is taken captive by Iraqi Baathist forces in Khuzestan Province (in Southern Iran). Her brother, along with his fellow combatants, tries to free his sister from the clutches of the enemy.
A New York city girl falls in love with a Jordanian businessman over Facebook and decides to surprise him with a personal visit. What she finds is not exactly the person promoted on Facebook.
Two agents investigate missing ammunition from the Chinese military. Not a single shot is fired and it is all kung fu fighting start to finish.

When Red Dragon is send out to retrieve a letter incriminating her master, as he plots to overthrow the emperor, she meets swordsman Yuen, who got to the letter before her. Red Dragon ...                See full synopsis »
A glowing green orb - which embodies ultimate evil - terrorizes a young girl with an anthology of bizarre and fantastic stories of dark fantasy, eroticism and horror.
Momo, an orphan girl must do battle with the soulless and grey men who stealthily take over her city and steal time.
Devaraj takes a job at the same factory where his father, retired Captain Ramakrishnan, is killed mysteriously while he is on duty. After he starts working, he must face many challenges.

An author who returns to his hometown to deliver a commencement address to a class of graduating high school students has to deal with his feelings for an old flame as well as the advances of a student who has the hots for him.
In the Redwood Forests of California, a multi-millionaire lumberman and his two young grandchildren encounter two gnomes who are supposedly the last of their kind.
A romantic girl travels to Hong Kong in search of certain love but instead meets a kind-hearted professional fighter for whom she begins to fall instead.
The theme of the fairytale is the struggle between good and evil - albeit this time in a different guise.
Three children seek help from an eccentric personal-injury attorney in order to stop their parents' imminent divorce.
An unearthed treasure of Dita's early years as a fetish star, a bondage-themed stylistic homage to the silent film era and classic 1940's-era damsel in distress serials.

A beautiful young dentist (Ormond) working in a tough British prison starts to become attracted to a violent inmate (Roth) after the break-up of her marriage, and embarks upon an illicit affair with him, with terrible consequences for all.
An explosive Russian crime drama about the violent rivalry that erupts when an elite police operative falls for the girlfriend of a powerful gangster.
After getting dumped on Christmas Eve, Angela must rebuild her life surrounded by her rebellious teenager, her tyrannical mother, her hysterical best friend, and a weird psychologist.
The ghosts of thieves help a beautiful young countess save her inherited castle from modern developers in this comic horror/musical.
An American soldier falls in love with a Muslim woman. Their love story represents peace in the world, despite religious and cultural differences.
R15 (R-Naught 15): A mathematical term estimating how many can be infected by an individual carrying a contagion. Above R1 can cause an epidemic - especially if there is no cure.
Mexican horror film with a variety of classic monsters, bat-like creatures, a rat-faced monster, dinosaurs and a cyclops.
Fred, a journalist, faces an international intrigue to protect the mysterious Nelly.
A police officer uncovers the truth about Kaathavarayan, a young man who is accused of assaulting his girlfriend.
An American intelligence agent is sent to Tokyo to track down a Communist spy ring.

Indrajit a young magician lives with his grandfather in India, while his dad, Krishna, runs a TV channel abroad. Indrajit's life takes a dramatic turn after his father takes him away to live with him.
Kamar is secretly in love with Alya, who is married to his friend, Harris. After Harris goes missing at sea, Kamar marries Alya. A tale of love and betrayal ensues.
Mia Stone is faced with an eerie supernatural opportunity when a strange encounter with an eccentric man gives her a second chance at saving her company, marriage, family, and future.
A pair of nightclub owners run a string of escort bureaus where men pay for the "companionship" of young women. The district attorney sends an undercover agent to infiltrate the bureaus.
Mash Rajab finds a hen that lays golden eggs but his two sons eat the hen for their dinner. They go to a journey to find their destiny and face many challenges.

An aspiring composer discovers a broken-winged, beautiful angel in his swimming pool. When everyone finds out, he must deal with his jealous fiancé, his future father-in-law, and his friends who have a business plan.

The characters engage in a séance at a mansion while a storm rages outside. During their stay, the film uses an extensive flashback structure to reveal the various criminal acts that each have perpetrated.
Everything is not what is seems for Mia Valentine after discovering another side to her father and the people that's associated with him.
A 20th Century pilot named Buck Rogers and his young friend Buddy Wade awake from 500 years in suspended animation to find that the world has been taken over by the outlaw army of Killer Kane.
An explosion happens in the middle of Seireitei, and Rukia has a memory loss. Then Urahara tries to seek the background of the events.

A young man, harshly sentenced for a few minor infractions, escapes from a prison in Huntsville Texas and flees to Laredo, Texas, where he hopes to cross into Mexico for a reunion with his wife and small son.
A mailman takes care of a dog that, unbeknownst to him, is an FBI drug-sniffing superdog that has escaped from the witness protection program after becoming the target of an assassination.
A businessman who is trying hard to be a good father to his daughter has a run-in with malevolent policeman.
After a brutal assault, a woman believes she's being taken in to the witness protection program, albeit the police officer taking her far up into the hills was her assailant.

Fighter pilot Doug Masters teaches at his flight school for teens in trouble with the law. In an emergency landing on a deserted airforce base, the kids accidentally uncover a deranged plot to wage chemical warfare.
A star athlete left for dead and now disabled becomes the hero a city needs to protect those he loves from a drug epidemic, gang violence, and a ruthless gangster.
This musically driven drama follows a successful Real Estate developer who puts his marriage and business on the line when given the opportunity to follow his ultimate, life-long dream: music.
Borys Kosa is at the top of his form. In the struggle of his life with his greatest rival, Denim , he makes a mistake that destroys his career.
When the toys' humans go "AWOL," they must defend their home from unexpected guests, two uninvited intruders who hope to swap a new baseball player bobblehead for a valuable one.
A middle-aged outlaw with strong morals and long-standing family roots is torn between his obligations and desires, yet perseveres after being harassed by the mafia and two dead parrots.
Two friends take jobs as truck drivers, unaware that the trucking company is being targeted by a gang of saboteurs who will stop at nothing, including murder, to stop them.
On the eve of their children's marriage, NYC in-laws Sheldon Kornpett and Vince Ricardo embark on a series of misadventures involving the CIA, the Treasury Department and Central American dictators.

Sasha came to visit his grandfather - a forester. He thought that in the reserved wilderness, near the Sovetskaya River, an unbreakable silence had settled and that he was able to calmly ...                See full synopsis »
Snow White, a beautiful girl, is despised by a wicked queen who tries to destroy her. With the aid of dwarves in the woods, Snow White overcomes the queen.
A son discovers the unknown life of his deserted father's after his death.

A smart-but-shy eighth-grade girl thinks she's finally found her niche when she helps to start a diverse robotics team, but when the team threatens to fall apart around her, she must wrestle with problems even the best code won't fix.
An unaccredited tour guide and a heartbroken tourist form a romantic bond as they explore the wilds of Philippine Islands.
Azhagu Raja, who owns a cable channel, always mocks Priya, who fails at everything. Eventually, love blossoms between them, but their families' bitter past becomes an obstacle to their marriage.
A NASA janitor is sent into space.

The Accident Man, is back and this time he must beat the top assassins in the world, to protect the ungrateful son of a mafia boss, save the life of his only friend and rekindle his relationship with his maniacal father figure.
A guitar-playing drifter helps a rancher's granddaughter find her true calling. They soon find themselves in the middle of a land war driven by quirky characters and magical realism.
A blossoming teenager uncovers the dark secret behind her traumatic childhood.
Mary Rose -- the story of a girl who goes missing on a secluded island for three weeks, and does not remember being gone when she is found. Years later, the island is calling her back to it.
A lovable scoundrel's life is cut short when he angers the god of death; however, he still has a few tricks up his sleeve.

Seven friends--three women and four men--meet for dinner. Everyone must put their cell phones on the table. No matter what message comes in, anyone can read it and listen to the phone calls. However, this leads to a lot of chaos.

A young boy dreams that he is in an imaginary world where, assisted by his family's plumber, he must save other piano-playing kids like himself from the dungeons of his dictatorial piano teacher who also mind-controls his mother.
When a young soldier in Vietnam gets dumped by his girlfriend back home, he and his best friend decide to go AWOL and return to the States to win her back.
A macho man in a family on the eve of deer-hunting season must deal with the eldest son's curse of never having bagged a buck.
It follows three mummies as they end up in present-day London and embark on a journey in search of an old ring belonging to the Royal Family, stolen by the ambitious archaeologist Lord Carnaby.
Charlie and Lisa, two divorced parents in their 40's who find themselves at a midlife crossroads. Both are single parents and they have four complicated teenagers.

Edited version for theaters of the eponymous 1972 show, about Triton, a sole survivor who seeks vengeance against evil sea demigod Poseidon and his monsters who eradicated his clan of good mermen and usurped their throne.
Propaganda film about "Ambassadors Treason" against the Soviet communist government in 1918.
A young composer has vivid dreams of the past that reflect, yet conflict with his waking life.
Adventure film about the boy Hodja who gets a magic carpet of a wise old carpet man. A wicked and desirous of power sultan will get their hands on the carpet.
Renato have a secret, he can give a breathe of life. He is in love of Jael and one day find the way of give her the best day of her life.

The former partner of a master criminal turns himself in to Scotland Yard. The criminal, a master of disguise, plots to kill his partner, but must first get through the wall of security Scotland Yard has thrown around him.
Undercover agent Mark Sheldon gets paroled to a remote tropical island with a diamond mine manned by slave labor run by sadistic Stephen Danel.

A boxer, fresh out of prison for killing his opponent during a match, and his ruthlessly ambitious friend - both of whom get wrapped up in conspiracy and betrayal as they choose different paths to live new lives.
A psychiatrist donates his time to help the mentally ill street people of Hong Kong. A reporter who hears about his activities accompanies him on his rounds.
Follow the adventures of Winnie the Pooh and his friends
A Victorian-era architect commissioned by the Duke of Towers to design his stables falls in love with the Duchess.

After the passing of her mother, Al, is left to the hands of the State Government. Her only wish and hope is finding her Dad whom she barely knows. She sets off on a journey and trusts that her wish will come true, but who she finds is not the man she remembers.
A transient young man breaks into empty homes to partake of the vacationing residents' lives for a few days.
A composer at work on an operetta falls in love with a girl, without realizing that she is the star of the opera company.
Two brothers Ah B and Dee live in two different worlds. Ah B decides to quit his smuggling business for a new life, but accidentally involves the innocent Dee into the smuggling case.
Betrayed is a relationship drama that explores the stress placed on a two year old marriage when an old flame surfaces. Jealousy, witchcraft, and murder ensues. Lives and relationships are destroyed.
After a series of ninja attacks, a Turkish policeman who's an expert on ninjas is called for help.

On the planet Latimer, reawakened Takeshi Kovacs must protect a teenage tattooist named Holly while investigating the death of a yakuza boss alongside Gina, a strangely familiar no-nonsense CTAC agent.
Together they'll crack down the enemy of the society.
A widowed father stays with his three married sons. Things change when a movie star comes to stay next door.
A desperate young mother escapes an abusive relationship only to find herself in a small town and into the arms of a street hustler. Her pain and disappointments lead her to heal through faith.
An illegal immigrant working at seedy motel tries to help catch a serial killer, jeopardizing her own freedom and life in the process.
The flaming saga of life and love in the Pre-Historic Age.
A condemned murderer, in the process of being executed, relives the events that led to his being sentenced to die in the electric chair.
After being humiliated by others, "Shadfil" goes through ups and downs in so many adventures to finally win everyone's heart and become the real elephant king.
Docudrama tracing the life of Saint Faustina Kowalska, whose visions of Jesus Christ inspired the Roman Catholic devotion to the Divine Mercy and earned her the title of "Apostle of Divine Mercy".
A young model and her petty thief boyfriend find their way through the English fog to a backwoods manor in hopes of looting it. What they find instead is murder.
Agron is appointed chairman of the committee, but with the new task come great hardships that make him pass challenges related to the demands of his relatives in the new job

When a desperate and lonely bank robber chooses the wrong hostage, he ends up stuck with the most unexpected partner in crime: a sheltered, uber-Christian middle aged woman hellbent on saving his soul.
The spirit of an ancient evil queen posesses the body of a young anthropological student, who then goes on a murderous rampage.
The story of the courageous king ' Chandragupta ' of the mourya dynasty.
An origin story about one the of the greatest Legends known.
Eric hates his life until he meets the woman of his dreams, in his dreams.
An epic musical celebration of India's blessed land, precious culture and incredible stories at an unprecedented scale, complete with songs and the beauty of nature.
When a child is crushed under the evil prime minster's chariot, the father of the deceased child kidnaps and raises the prime minster's child as his own to become a rebel.

When a routine traffic stop results in the unexplained, grisly death of her colleague, a cop realizes footage of the incident will play for her eyes only. As the attacks mount, she races to understand the supernatural force behind them.

When seven year old Jarret West questions the existence of Santa Claus, his teenage older brother, Jeremy, a young man with Down Syndrome, takes him on a quest to the North Pole to prove Santa is real.
A fading gangster turns over his once massive empire to his resistant civilian friend.

Kolilakkam is a 1981 Indian Malayalam film, directed by P. N. Sundaram and Produced C V Hariharan. The film stars Jayan, Sumalatha and Madhu in lead roles. Music of the film was composed by M. S. Viswanathan.
A cop, a lawyer, and an assassin cross paths after the murder of a federal witness and the kidnapping of a famous pop star.

After spending a stint locked up Jake returns home to find himself teaming up with Mack Terrors group of vigilantes in an effort to to save the girl and the city he loves, from a band of evil neo-nazi.
Christian Family Feature Film Based on the True Bible Story of the 3 Wise Men, and Jesus, Mary and Joseph's escape to Egypt.

Iris Carr is a mousy, brown-haired woman who can't remember her life 5 years back. When she falls into a lake, her memory comes back. She is actually wife of a billionaire who she and her lover killed. Story ends with triple cross.
After Krishna stops Maayandri from releasing her brother, Kirmada, Maayandri decides to exact revenge on him. Later, Bheem and his friends set out to rescue Krishna and defeat Maayandri.
Stockholm 1956. The Swedish botanist, candidate and lieutenant Nils von Ekelöw, presents his research to a panel of professors.
The lives of three childhood friends take very different routes. One becomes a gangster, one a policeman, and the last must choose which one to marry.
A corrupted young man ventures to the United States in quest of the American Dream, and forms a band of robbers to obtain it.

A newbie guard for an armored truck company is coerced by his veteran coworkers to steal a truck containing $42 million. But a wrinkle in their supposedly foolproof plan divides the group, leading to a potentially deadly resolution.

A mystical Astrolabe with the power to destroy the world is stolen from the lost city of Atlantis in the Atlas Mountains. Hakim discovers he is one of the last descendants of the Atlanteans and must prevent the impending cataclysm.
A cancer victim's family must confront and resolve their dysfunctionality.

Mavka loves Lukash,. Their brief happiness ends when Lukash is forced to marry the shrewish Kilina. The Spirit of the Forest turns Lukash into a wolf as punishment. The strength of Mavka's love breaks the spell, but Kilina curses Mavka.
When their best friend is the victim of a racist murder, Alison and Arjun, who obsessively films everything, plot their revenge on Gordon, of the university's controversial 'English Society'.
Musashi Miyamoto is challenged to a duel by a confident swordsman Sasaki Kojiro. He agrees to fight him in a year's time.
Dushyant and Jaya are childhood friends. In spite of his familys poverty, Dushyant has one great ambition in life: to become a successful singer. Will he achieve his ambition?
On a small South Pacific island during WW2, various US Navy P.R. personnel pass the time romancing the nurses and the native girls while trying to avoid front line Sea Duty.

A police officer who's transferred in the police of Marseilles gets assigned to take down a group of Italian robbers who drive the powerful Ferraris with the older nephew of Daniel, a terrible driver who gets the legendary white taxi.
A hotel manager invents a tequila that sends the wedding of a Mexican Drug Lord into chaos.
What are the ingredients to a perfect life ? Three sisters explore their relationships with their family , their boyfriends, with one another and with themselves in the backdrop of a family holiday.
An alien Overlord plans to blow up the Earth but first, he snatches and proposes to marry an Earthman's wife.

After ninjas killed his family, Cho and his son Kane come to America to start a new life. He opens a doll shop but is unwittingly importing heroin in the dolls. When his friend betrays him, Cho must prepare for the ultimate battle.
Gambler Jake Green enters into a game with potentially deadly consequences.
Marcos lusts after his boss's promiscuous daughter, but after botching an extortion scheme, he becomes wracked with guilt.
The Tale of a Pusher follows the rise and fall of a small time cocaine pusher in Los Angeles. Will he make the right choices or dig himself deeper into the world of narcotics?
During a Midwestern winter, two working-class brothers must cope with their recently incarcerated father.
The three unstoppable Ninja brothers fight to save their hero (Hulk Hogan) and Mega Mountain Amusement Park from the vicious kid-hating Medusa (Loni Anderson).
A marketing executive tries to find Mr. Right on a Christian dating website. When impressing her dream guy ends in disaster, Gwyneth gets in touch with her spiritual side.
A secret cabal, The Shadow, works to bring about the return of Goth Azul - the Undead God - in the rich world of SAGA, populated by elves, orcs, dwarves and dragons.
A mute young man takes the conflict between his parents very painfully. The doctor tries to find out what is the reason of the boy's aggressiveness. The effort bears fruit: the boy starts to speak.
A non aging man rediscovers his identity as a black man in America from the past four centuries with the help of his wife, Esmeralda, as they avoid the local authorities.

A lawyer's receptionist is keen on detective stories and crime films. Believing her boss has been killed, she reports it to the police, but once questioned she knows all the answers about his disappearance.

A squad of soldiers ventures into the Afghan desert on a routine training exercise, only to get trapped behind enemy lines and even worse, exposed to a hybrid plant that reduces them all to a state of hallucinogenic horror.
Unlicensed private detective Franck Beriat hesitantly agrees when a woman finds him to seek revenge for her sister.
Frank's caught wildlife in the Brazilian jungle incl. a 400 lbs. white jaguar. He ships it on the same ship as an arrested assassin. The assassin breaks free and frees the animals.
Raj rebuilds his dead father's car and names it Tarzan, but the car comes to life in a miraculous way. Slowly, the car starts killing the killers of Raj's father.

Leonor works in a brothel called El Paraiso, in a Caribbean environment. Juan, a man in love with Leonor, has escaped from prison. Both Leonor and John want a new life, but they are hampered by the shadow of their past.

The story of Funke, a young Nigerian girl, who wants to play football for the country. A personal story of struggle and inspiration as she tries to convince her family and friends to allow her to achieve her dream.
The young leader of an indigenous tribe must face a group of soldiers who want to take them off their land.
Two police constables try to solve a murder case in a village.
In the 16th century, a sea captain and his daughter escape a false by running away to become pirates.

Three kids discover a magical raincoat that transports them into the body of its owner, a cursed magician. With a scorned witch hot on their trail, they must solve the mystery of the raincoat and break its curse before it's too late.
A school-teacher, who forces children to share their food with him, forbids one from entering the school until he brings his own Tiffin/Lunch-box.

A coming of age story of triangular romance between a boy and two girls that explores the twin emotions of true love and teenage infatuation in a boy who perpetually finds himself in complicated situations both at home and outside.

An inventor creates a humanoid robot named Jet Jaguar that is seized by the undersea nation of Seatopia. Using Jet Jaguar as a guide, the Seatopians send Megalon as vengeance for the nuclear tests that have devastated their society.
The Final Chapter of the Super Popular TV Show 'Klassi Ghalina' presented in a 2-hr Feature Film. Our beloved heroes have to face Count Dracula and all his ordeal of monsters, in a hilarious way.

Lacy, a career-driven business woman, goes to a B&B in Illinois at the advice of a new therapist. There she finds herself stuck in a mystical, small Christmas town, reliving the same day over and over. Lacy must figure out how to escape.

Heidi Cannabis returns in order to recover part of a loot from the drug gang "The Nice Neighborhood". Heidi discovers the betrayal and murder by the rest of the gang leading to unexpected surprises and revenge.
A veteran returns home to deal with family secrets and small-town scandals.
A woman leaves her husband after the death of her child to teach deaf children how to speak. Her own child was deaf and although she has no formal training she successfully teaches one boy.
Brothers Jonatan and Skorpan lead a revolution against the tyrant Tengil in the magical afterlife land of Nangijala.
A down on his luck street magician and his con artist ex-wife reunite to swindle an accounting firm.
A homeless boy fell in love with his owner's girl.
After discovering a parallel universe an astrophysicist enters a series of supernatural worlds that forces him to question his reality.

A South Korean teenage tomboy, working as a dragon, gets her dragon head twisted, causing her to fall. The culprit later turns out to be her new neighbor. He has a rock band that includes her ex. How can romance develop from this?
Amir is dead and all the people around him are accused of his murder. But as the investigations go further more interesting things appear to everyone.
A teenage boy must fight in an interplanetary war as the only available pilot to a revolutionary new giant battle robot.
They learnt how fragile life is
A Lancashire mill owner's son poses as a workman to unmask the foreman as a stealer of cloth.

Nix is a young girl that just happens to have an eight foot long pointy tail. What she desires above all else is to find a "monster", in the hopes that she can stand next to it and pale in comparison, and then feel less like one herself.
Sing-a-song dance-along a honey of a picture.
Roberto "El Suavecito" is an irresponsible playboy who is wrongly accused of having committed a crime.
101 Weddings is a humor based story set against the backdrop of a mass marriage ceremony which are taking place together at one platform as part of a mass marriage ceremony.
The exploits of 303 Squadron RAF during the Battle of Britain. The squadron consisted of Polish pilots, many of whom were veterans of the air battles involved in Germany's invasion of Poland.

The adventures of The Wombles, strange creatures who live on Wimbledon Common and pick up the litter left by the humans. There's always time for a nice song and dance as well. This was a film version of the popular childrens TV show.
Three twenty-somethings find themselves in an impossible time loop, where each day they awaken to the same terrifying day as the preceding one.

Every short surprise on a way only Pat and Mat can do.
A tough former military soldier steps up to help a Florida charter boat captain and his daughter when they become the victims of an international crime ring.
When an imaginative girl has fantasies that her mother is having an affair, her visions almost ruin her parents domestic life. Based on the play "Alice Sit By The Fire" by James M. Barrie.

The real-life Chris and Martin introduce each Wild Kratts episode with a live action segment that imagines what it would be like to experience a never- before-seen wildlife moment, and asks, 'What if...?'
A young man becomes suspicious when his recently widowed mother decides to re-marry soon after his stepfather's death.
Inspired by real events. Plot Kept Under Wraps.
A team of geologists attempt to remove a native cannibal population from an island to perform atomic research, but the cannibals' female leader disposes of them one by one by seduction.
An Anthropologist's life and reality are ripped apart by a Satanic cult.
A boy must fight his way from an alternate reality, back to his own, to save his suicidal 5-year old brother; when 3 billion people are reported missing.
Character and intelligence will confront beauty and wealth when Olive embarks on a blind date.

Virgil Renchler owns most of the town, providing a thriving economy. When his men go too far and kill one of his migrant workmen, the sheriff goes after him, even if it means his job and everyone else's.

It follows friends Dylan and Youssef, Who dream of becoming soccer players. When Dylan is paralyzed following an accident his dad and former coach wants him to accept his disability, but he is determined to play soccer again.
A group of young vampires have bitten off more than they can chew when they realize that their mentor lied to them.
Believing himself to be a suspect for embezzlement in British India, a man must testify against non-violent freedom-fighters.

When a researcher is cursed by a mermaid-like creature deep in the Amazon, he comes to realize that returning to fight the creature is his only hope of reversing the monster-like changes happening to his body.
A 15 episode serial in which Blake battles the "Scorpion" over possession of a 'death ray' machine.

A spirited 8-year-old girl deals with the grief of her mother's death by forging a bond with a wild emu. This spiritual dreaming is a bond she will do anything to keep, but one that puts her at odds with the new social worker.
The hero visits a town and meets a woman whose daughters were killed. He seeks the murderers, eventually encountering three men who he initially believes are the killers, though he learns otherwise.
Thistle the magician and his forest friends (from _The Elm Chanted Forest (1986)_) take on an ice emperor, Mrazomor, and his horde.
Relax and let your brain melt in a ADHD riddled mess that only an overdose of LSD could produce, slip into a unstable mental state where seizure induced visual effects take over your mind.
A young man suddenly discovers that he has the gift of healing. As he tries to understand it and the new reality it offers, a teenage girl with terminal cancer unexpectedly shows him the way.
A group of professional bank robbers run from the police and hide at night in a flower shop. The owner is not pleased and has a secret on his own.

Gregg creates a time machine and wants to return to 1865 to see if he can prevent Abraham Lincoln's assassination. Gregg, with friends Kara and Meagan, take the contraption to an isolated beach to start it.

An altruistic department-store owner hires ex-convicts in order to give them a second chance at life. Unfortunately, one of the convicts he hires recruits two of his fellow ex-convicts in a plan to rob the store.
A cop relies on a young car thief to take down four gangsters, who plan to rob a rich merchant for a large amount of money.
A boy named Nathan lives in a cartoon-like fantasy world where he is forced to confront his demons.
Four socially troubled 18- year-olds from the south of England go on holiday to Malia.
The tragic romance of Prince Kaisal and Mariyam from Uigur folklore.
A fantastic and horrible journey. The weird aircraft crash of Zhang Shiquan ,Kenny,made his wife, Lu Yun, Lorraine-a young novelist sad and crazy.What is the story behind the crash...
2011, preparations for EURO 2012 in Poland are entering their final phase. However, tempted by 5 million EUR, the President of of Poland decides to sell the rights to EURO to the Czechs

Chad goes to The Wrong side of town where he is tricked by pretty girls to set him up, confronted by gangs that beat him half to death, it is a horrible night for Chad when he goes to...The Wrong Side of Town.

See the 3 Indays in one picture, see Pugo and Bentot in their funniest, riotous best, after 12 years away, they're still tops. A picture for the whole family, A demonstration of talent, songs and laughter.
The summer is here and a cocky Peter Parker (Joel Harris) has to save the ones he loves around him from a cure hungry man trying to help himself (AJ Aquino) and his daughter.

Mike Billings decides to give gambling a go and it happens he's good at it. His instant fortune attracts quite a number of characters including a con artist, a hired killer, and the requisite attractive woman.
In the riveting conclusion of the landmark Skywalker saga, new legends will be born-and the final battle for freedom is yet to come.
Mia, who lends her voice to a Japanese Anime super heroine, finds reality and fiction to be interlacing more and more. Suddenly, Mia can see electricity, leap off rooftops and save people's lives.
Two friends move into a haunted house and become involuntary roommates with a humorously annoying, grumpy ghost. They have to complete a set of entertaining tasks to send the ghost away.
Trying to survive his family Christmas, Cody makes a wish to be alone, which ends up backfiring when a shark manifests and kills his entire family.

Jesus and Buddha are new best friends who try to get through high school to compete in religions against each other, but first they have to stop the Dark Lord Satan from killing off all the religions in this prequel to the Bible.
A lone sheriff and a visiting environmental consultant race to solve the mystery that haunts the valleys of Brada County.
An astronaut crew on their way to the Moon are unexpectedly propelled by gravitational forces and end up on Mars instead.
A former convict poses as a cop to retrieve a diamond he stole years ago.
When aliens misinterpret video feeds of classic arcade games as a declaration of war, they attack the Earth in the form of the video games.
Three different stories Smriti (Memories), Satwa (Soul) and Bhobiswot (Future) get interwoven in one complex plot, creating a world of illusion.
A 12 year old boy and his mother become the targets of two warring werewolf packs, each with different intentions and motives.
With Coco and kitty in prison, Mystery Inc. thinks that they can finally enjoy a break.
Three lovable losers and their nosy bartender discover their lives are being controlled by guardian angels with conflicts from the Devil. It takes the angels to bring Jules and Jade together.
An unmarried couple is striving to work things out between them. Will they get married forms the crux of the story.

In an endeavor to convert the traditional business into a big one, ambitious Baban strives hard to fulfill his dreams of prosperity, but the circumstances lead him elsewhere, which in-turn gives rise to a storm.
A Japanese-Frenchman on vacation is caught up in a criminal conspiracy along with a female bomb expert and a bumbling Detective.
The tale of the extraordinary life and times of Lucky, a horse that was born in captivity but achieves his dream of running free with the help of a stableboy.

Bullerbyn is a village in Småland. There are three farms. In Mellangården, Lisa lives with his brothers Lasse and Bosse. In Norrgården, the sisters Britta and Anna live and Olle lives in Sörgården together with his little sister Kerstin.
Two kids, a world apart, form an unlikely friendship when they hatch a wild plot to sell a car from Detroit to Mumbai in an attempt to help their struggling fathers.
Six years after his dad dies in a car crash, 15-year-old David sees his mom move in with the new man in her life - and his extended, misfit family.
A journalist Murat Davman fights with enemy's secret organization which assassinate to Turkish agent.
Modern, urban librarian meets simple, traditional farmer and falls in love.
The future of America, when the world runs out of oil.

A fallen angel uses his cunning abilities to test the Pariah. As evil's influence becomes more rampant, the prophets who may be able to stop it rise up as the final battle for mankind marches ever closer.

Jake lets the children play at his home and tells stories of his role in the civil rights movement. A developer wants to have the elderly Jake evicted from his home to increase real estate value, so the kids decide to go on a bath strike.

One righteous and innocent man who studied law get angered by injustice and find the concealed truth of major company which runs illegal prostitution business and that company's connection with corrupt public prosecution power.
The story of an undercover cop who manages to infiltrate into the underworld with the help of his old buddy.

A beautiful young woman is trained by her father in the art of professional assassination. When her father is killed, she is forced to choose between the violent world she knows or the peaceful life she desires.

A loving wife (Elise Neal) struggles with making a life-or-death decision to pay the ransom money for the safe return home of her wealthy husband, when he is unexpectedly kidnapped by a group of hoodlums with nothing to lose
Myth, Magic and Money play some interesting twists in the life of a couple.
De Filippo 's tragedy of a politician presiding over criminal activities in Naples has been transferred to East Chicago.

Five juvenile lost causes are sent to the Everglades where a war veteran tries to reform them using survival tactics. Their new skills and resolve are tested when a Miami drug lord targets them for trying to clean up their neighborhood.
Story about Ji Gong, a Chan Buddhist monk that has a supernatural powers, which he used to help the poor and stand up to injustice. This movie tell one of his adventures.
A TV interviewer and his cameraman meet a former actress and travel through her memories and career.
Four British villains raid a settlement to obtain explosives for use in a diamond mine. In doing so they nearly destroy the settlement, so and Tarzan pursues them to their mine.
A farm cat moves to Paris in search of the high life while her wannabe lover from back home tries to reunite.
A laborer moves to Shanghai in the hope of becoming rich. But ends up using his kung fu skills to survive.
Residents of a friendly Pennsylvania town foil three brothers' plan to rob a bank on Christmas Eve.
A Martial Arts Champion is transported to another realm to team up with a group of past warriors hoping to defeat a powerful enemy.
Belonging to "brave bars" enemies in the exciting world of football, two fugitive lovers challenge everything.
Bounty hunters from the future transport a doomed race car driver to New York City in 2009, where his mind will be replaced with that of a dead billionaire.
Downloading Torrents has never been so dangerous.

Jose Maria and his sister Mercedes are archaeologists who have been given a grant to study the story of Our Lady of Guadalupe, whom Juan Diego, an ordinary man living near the hill of Tepeyac, witnessed in December 1531.
Hajj, a rascally beggar on the periphery of the court of Baghdad, schemes to marry his daughter to royalty and to win the heart of the queen of the castle himself.
Tyson and the Bladebreakers must stop an unleashed dark shadow group called the Shadow-Bladers and save the world in the ultimate Beyblade showdown battle!

An action epic that explores the origins of Master Shake, Frylock, and Meatwad, better known as the Aqua Teen Hunger Force, who somehow become pitted in a battle over an immortal piece of exercise equipment.
Narumi is set up by a mysterious woman. Abducted and tortured, Narumi is forced to take on a new job - the target is a veteran killer as good as he is.
South32 Shower is a action sequel feature film of South32 produced 2016 by Luigi Bian.
A man is released from prison, goes to live with his brother and his family attempting to fit in. He is then confronted by 2 thugs and demanded to repay a prison debt by killing a marked man
A young woman arrives in San Francisco's Chinatown from Hong Kong with the intention of marrying a rakish nightclub owner, unaware he is involved with one of his singers.
After the earth suddenly stops spinning, causing the apocalypse, the 6 most dangerous prisoners in the world will have to face their fate and themselves to try to survive.
The story of a Vietnam vet forced into the dark world of the Mob in order to support his handicapped brother.
After a truck carrying a cargo of narcotics is held up by rival smugglers, the driver sets out to prove his innocence.

Believing that Saroj is taking advantage of his younger brother, Vijay, a crime reporter, marries her and abandons her soon after. Meanwhile, Laxmi, the daughter of Vijay's mentor, secretly loves him.

A family man who witnessed a hit-man carry out a killing as a child decides to carry out contract executions in the suburbs of Melbourne, but soon finds himself also working as a hit-man, making his life far more complicated.
The Bumsteads are trying to leave on their vacation but one thing after another (including Radcliffe stealing their luggage) is stopping them.
An eccentric family gets stuck spending the same Thanksgiving over and over.

The writer F. Vallejo returns to Medellin after an absence of over 30 years. He meets 16-year-old Alexis. Alexis is the kind of killer who knocks people off on command. The two are immediately attracted to each other.
The Prince is set to learn the Ethics and Royalty of His Kingdom. Will his personal instructor let him through?
Bigi , Luk and Patrick - Tiger Team - found a mysterious object connected to the legendary mountain of 1000 dragons. The search takes them to China where they face many dangers.
Inadvertently left at home by adults, young cousins face-off against burglars.

4 archaeologists are chosen for to carry out a dig for powerful company. Led by an ancient manuscript found in Baviaran Royal Library they find themselves at megalithic stones in Northern Ireland. They find something that doesn't belong.
A planned kidnapping goes awry when the gang leader falls for the victim.
A team of French-Brazilian actors goes to Bucharest to shoot a film at a lower cost. But the Romanian technical team secretly shoot their own film.
The co-owner of a dog track is framed for two crimes: the shotgun killing of his ex-partner and the hit-and-run death of an elderly man.
The last day of the Spanish redeployment in the Iraq war, a Spanish soldier gets trapped in an ambush, leading her to fight a new war.
A lady encounters a supernatural things during a tour and a horror experience with a sudden appearance of a man called jinn and the story goes on the horror path.
A young man sets out on a dangerous quest for a magical bird with the power to heal any ailment.
A terminally ill girl is revived by a magical penguin spirit. In return, her brothers are sent on a quest for the mysterious Penguindrum.
A monk leaves his monastery and ventures out into the real world for the first time in his life, and ends up in an adventure with a kung-fu master who is guarding a special artifact.
An atheist journalist and a God-fearing senior build a friendship despite their differences and through their battle with terminal illnesses in this emotional drama.
A young woman falls in love with the man of her dreams, not knowing that he's an embezzler who's about to flee the country.
A retired MMA world champion gets caught up in an underground fight club called the "Blood Circus" and must fight to survive and save his family.

Teenage Kim is in love with her father, Victor, a middle class L.A. businessman who's sleeping with her peer, Jean, while Victor's wife is sleeping with a local novelist. Kim seduces Victor's business partner, Ted, to get to Victor.
11-yr old Mahek dreams of becoming the very best at everything, but is unsure of how to achieve her goals. To complicate things further, an old magic-less modern fairy walks into her life.
Hoshina Hikaru and three other Star Twinkle Precures gaze at the sky and end up warping into the Miracle Planet.
Jared Peters and Sergei Radic, two teenagers from vastly different backgrounds become forever linked in a split second with the four pound trigger pull of a snub nosed 38.
D.B. Cooper, makes off with $200,000 by jumping out of an airplane he hijacks.
The endearing romance of four people, woven into a song.
Follows the lives of 2 poor Brazilians and their schemes to get money and the consequences of their actions.
A man haunted by ghosts must make their final wish come true in order to get rid of them.
A 9-year-old girl uses the Internet to send homemade movies to her parents in Heaven.
A young girl coming to terms with her mother's looming death finds her voice through the most unlikely of friendships.
An international crime ring lead by a sinister character is about to be taken in.

This story deals with a gang-rape victim who boldly handles the "after effects" of the incident in the social structure along with the other characters that surround her. All this, apart from pursuing the related legal case.
A Nazi spy passes himself off as an optometrist in San Francisco's waterfront district. Someone robs him of his codebook, and he must get it back.
Appukuttan and Gauri meet during a village festival. After some constant fights, they fall in love. But Gauri's brother, Shivan Kutty, has a different plan for her.
Live-action remake of Disney's animated classic 'Lilo and Stitch'.
A pastor feels that God tells him to walk across several states, praying for miracles along the way.
Koji runs a second-hand bookstore. He likes female drummer Ikka, but, suddenly, female high school student Misaki appears in front of him and keeps confessing her feelings for him.
A bank manager with: (a) a gambling problem and (b) access to a multimillion dollar account gets into a messy situation. Based on the story of the largest one-man bank fraud in Canadian history.
It isn't really the fault of the children in 2B that their efforts to be helpful end in disaster.
After leaving off from Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse, the story continues.
An indigenous detective returns to the Outback to investigate the murder of a young girl.

A woman keeps coming to Quai Des Orfevres to see Inspector Maigret about disturbing events in her household.Maigret and his colleagues are annoyed, until this woman is found dead and they realize she was on to something.
Zhan Zhao is a deputy to the wise Judge Bao. When Zhan heads back home for a vacation, he uncovers a plot to assassinate Bao so that a rebel group can overthrow the Emperor.
Twin sisters are separated when their parents divorce. They meet again by accident when they are both sent to the same summer camp and hatch a plot to reunite their family.
A wannabe businesswoman and a happy-go-lucky guy meet each other during an arranged marriage blind date but eventually team up to start a food truck on their own.
Two teenagers strike a dangerous alliance and head out on a journey to hunt down the monster menacing their hometown, uncovering deadly secrets along the way.
A dramatization of the Ventura County Borderline shootings and Woolsey fires in 2018 which thrust a peaceful community into disastrous peril.
A maid is kidnapped and scratches a message onto D.C. the cat's collar and when his owner Patti discovers this, she plays amateur detective with the help of D.C. to try to find the culprits.
The new film will be set in 1969 and depict a fictional war between the U.S. and Russia as they race to land the first person on the moon.
A young woman finds herself as the intended victim of a murder plot on a transatlantic flight from London to New York.
Three youths are born and brought up in a village. Their dream is to marry foreigners and live a fancy life abroad. To materialize their dream, they set off to Goa. Will they hit the jackpot there?
A group of medical students devise a deadly game: to see which one of them can commit the perfect murder.
The angel of Death visits a businessman to warn him that his life is over and that he will have to account for his deeds before Judgment. Adapted from the classic morality play.

Unni, who his family thinks is an NRI, is actually a smuggler known as Valayar Paramasivam. Problems arise when his enemies start plotting against him and his brother becomes a police officer who is in pursuit of Paramasivam.
Looking for his long lost grandfather, Olaf (11) discovers a parallel magical universe and gets entangled in an age-old conflict that, as prophecy has foretold, only he can resolve.
She has two days to find out who is killing her.
Mason accompanies his childhood friend, Iris, on her debut music tour, whilst dealing with his older brother's life of crime.
Released from prison, a gangster (Michitaro Mizushima) retrieves diamonds sought by fellow yakuza.
Regina wants to go to summer camp but her mom can't afford it. She discovers that she can control people by singing and she takes advantage of that. She has a lot of adventures with her friend Peter.
A female ex-con falls in love and hesitates to reveal her past.

A Noir mystery at the height of the bootleg era in early 1930s Detroit. Incidents leading to the take down of "The Purple Gang" one of the most powerful gangs in American history. This story is based on true events.

Roy and Bo leave their small California town the weekend after graduation for a short road trip to Los Angeles. Soon, they find themselves lashing out and leaving a trail of bodies behind them. The violence escalates throughout.
After a misunderstanding among their parents, two brothers turn against one another.
A peaceful alien planet faces annihilation, as the homeless remainder of the human race sets its eyes on Terra. Mala, a rebellious Terrian teenager, will do everything she can to stop it.
A detective investigating a man's death in the mountains meets the dead man's mysterious wife in the course of his dogged sleuthing.
A trained chimpanzee plays third base for a minor-league baseball team.
A successful woman in love tries to break her family curse of every first marriage ending in divorce, by dashing to the alter with a random stranger before marrying her boyfriend.
Fellow tenants in a high rise are extremely irked by Anton's trumpet playing until they learned it has magical powers beneficial to them.
A serial killer preys on the exceptionally gifted in order to inherit their talents and become Nietzsche's modern-day Uberman.
A small desert town is terrorized by a powerful, seemingly possessed car, and the local sheriff may be the only one who can stop it.

When a solar flare hits the International Space Station on a collision course with Earth, it is up to Astronomer and former NASA Astronaut Jess Denver and Air Force Colonel Sam Adler to team up and save humanity.
British children help a young refugee boy by hiding him from the authorities.
A woman plots revenge on her former boss.
IN3DRAGON (The Unseen Fist) offers non-stop martial arts action, love, romance, thriller and comedy. This is the best action movie from the award winning superstar JJ Stomp.
When a family emergency forces a troubled teen to do the wrong thing for the right reason, a community discovers the meaning of forgiveness.

Ever since her brother died, Lupe has lived an agoraphobic life at odds with her teenage son and her superstitious Mexican mother. It takes a drastic Day of the Dead ritual to wake her up and teach her the value of saying goodbye.

The Holy Maiden of Hell, Ashura possesses immense power that can destroy humanity. Buddhist monks trap her in a deep cave to keep her from falling into evil hands. Kindhearted Abbot Jiku grants her wish to enjoy the human world for 7 days.

The Dream Journal, animated with hobbyist 3D software, weaves together deep-web imagery with hardboiled detective story tropes and repressed libidinal fantasies to create a nightmarish vision of an internet addict's unconscious.

The title refers to the government's plan at the time for putting an end to a lucrative racket, kidnapping. When Hudson and Norris enter a country house to get out of the rain it turns out to be a kidnapper hideout.
A struggling street musician finds himself the target of an animal welfare investigation that threatens to take away his beloved cat at Christmas.
Three former collegians experience love, heartbreaks, as well as life's ups and downs.
A man dying of cancer tries his best to leave the world on his own terms.

A story woven around family and social values, portraying the importance of marriage vows and family stability. An NRI boy comes from Dubai to Mangalore for marriage. Afterwards, he faces resistance from his wife for his return to Dubai.
An aged Sir Lancelot looks to make amends after his love for Guinevere caused him to destroy Camelot.
The film tells of the pursuit the federal authorities conducted upon the common people and their links with revolutionary fighters during the agrary reform.
THE FINAL SACRIFICE is a three-sided story about German, Italian, and American soldiers, set in Northern Italy during the final weeks of the World War II.

Mili watched her mother's murder 11 years ago. Mili now has a family with the Jiu Jitsu team, but the gang she once ran with decides to teach her a lesson. Now Mili must risk everything to save her friend from a life of sex trafficking.
An actor struggling to make his way in Hollywood gets kidnapped and has to find a way out.

In this sequel to The Blue Lagoon (1980), two children are stranded on a beautiful island in the South Pacific. With no adults to guide them, the two make a simple life together and eventually become suntanned teenagers in love.
A logger defends his family from a group of dangerous drug runners.
Kevin (Dolphy) and his family suddenly find themselves prospective millionaires. What happens when they move into a bigger house and leave their real "home along da riles"?
The story of Ioannis Zachos, a young psychopath who commits a murder in Athens.

A preacher and a nun walk into a bar - armed with guns; Called out of hiding and summoned back into town, they vow to restore order and faith, ending the corruption and murders that plague Savior City.

Follow the heartwarming journey of two orphan girls whose only wish is to find a home for Christmas. With a little help from their guardian angels (Dick Van Dyke and Dame Angela Lansbury), they discover miracles can happen when you believe.
A man embarks on journey to find his love in Dubai, only to learn she has different suitors and admirers.

Shreya opens a Pandora's box of sexual abuse cases that point to a high profile celebrity. Amidst rising crime and violence, Arundhati, a Social Activist starts a public movement called SAFE to protect women, children and the aged.
A talented martial arts student goes after his expelled brother, who get into bad company.

Liz and her daughter Amy move to Hamelin where a dark secret in Liz's past is uncovered by the restless spirit of the Pied Piper, who seeks out those who have gotten away with a crime, and punishes them by taking away their children.
A girl dreams of a festival, where family and the staff from her day-care center are involved.

An ancient Cherokee monster awakens because of the modern world's greed. It escapes its tomb and attacks, destroying everything in its path. Can a Sheriff, a Scientist and a Professor stop it before it is too late?
Lucky loses everything except for his friends until he finds his fortune in a discarded ugly pair of shoes and enters the first ever "Ugly Shoe Contest" where Karma begins to unfold.
Two great friends who live in a small coastal town face an opportunity that will change their lives forever.

A lay preacher who arrives at a British settlement in 1830s. His violent past is soon drawn into question and his faith put to the test, as he finds himself caught in the middle of a bloody war between Maori tribes.
A murder detective must follow the footsteps of a brutal killer within the secrets of a classist college.
Parivartan is a Hindi web film based on family drama concept, starring by Simran Sharma, Vineet Singh Chandel and Girish Thapar while written and directed by Pranav Vatsa.
When a young woman from a strict, colonial village suddenly finds herself seduced by an ancient woodland god, she falls into a fantastical romance that quickly threatens to consume her.
Since Fatima and Zuhra's brother did not come home one day, Fatima is worried and goes outside to look for him. Then, the street thugs kidnap and rape Fatima. Fatima commits suicide.
Triplets Prince - Bebo - Semsem (Ahmed Helmy) are taking advantage of similarities between them and outwitted the people, till meet a psychiatrist crook Suleiman al-Halabi.

Enter a world where a legendary crystal holds the key to unlocking unlimited power. Join a group of unlikely heroes as they race against time to find the crystal before it falls into the wrong hands and unleashes chaos upon the world.
Six former college friends, with two new friends, gather for a New Year's Eve weekend reunion at a large English countryside manor after ten years to reminisce about the good times now long gone.
