After years without vacations, the bionic super agents decide to make a trip to rest but they are interrupted because they must fight against an international gang that wants to seize a treasure.
With Lenin about to destroy the Romanovs, Rasputin sends Anastasia through a magical portal.
This is the story of Lord Ram and his years spent in exile with his wife and brother, and also chronicles the end of the demon king Ravan and his family.

After two years in prison for participating in an illegal street race, Roy says no to a new illegal winter race from Bergen to Murmansk in the North of Russia. But then he hears that his daughter will participate with a boyfriend.
Yoshimatsu, an university lecturer, likes her student Mikiko and he succeeds entering her house by seducing Mikiko's mother.
Inspector Bhagat Singh is brutally murdered but the killers are never found. His brothers, Ajit and Jai Singh, decide to find the culprits and learn that he was killed by none other than the police.

Tom and Cora Elliott love their active social life so much that they neglect their seventeen-year-old daughter Mary and fourteen-year-old son Les. Fred Mason, Tom's neighbor and the doctor ...                See full synopsis »

Two lesbian lovers escape the city to commit a lovers-suicide deep in the forest. There they are captured by the queen of a lesbian colony who uses them for her own sex games. The couple organize a revolt against the queen.
A crazed scientist invents a serum that induces a catatonic state in whoever it is injected into. He uses the serum to paralyze his enemies, so that he can bury them alive.
3 street singers, 2 record producers, 1 assassin, 1 baby.

In Missouri, during the 1840s, young Huck Finn fearful of his drunkard father and yearning for adventure, leaves his foster family and joins with runaway slave Jim in a voyage down the Mississippi River toward slavery free states.
In a future where a plague has infected much of the population, two brothers are tasked with traveling to Canada to retrieve a mysterious package.

An inspired experimental chemist, wakes up in a New Orleans jail, accused of arson that's linked to an illegal drug-manufacturing ring. Suffering from amnesia, he's unexpectedly released on bail, determined to find his missing girlfriend.
Kit, a twenty-something dreamer, receives an invitation that would fulfill her childhood dreams.
Three funny, sometimes absurd and sometimes terrifying stories make up "Triptiko."

Follow the life of a waitress studying to be a real estate agent who meets a love interest that happens to be a real estate investor. The story takes an unexpected turn when she realizes her dream man could become her worst nightmare.
A ruthless businessman's payoff to the Belgian mafia is intercepted by his revenge-seeking former protegees, launching a deadly war of violence and double-dealing.
A professional race car driver faces hardships when he switches teams and leaves his family.
Sarah and Ben moved across the country to start a new life together after graduation. Then Ben decided that new life doesn't include Sarah.
A student learns about a gang/cult led by the Dean of Students at Long Beach University via a video of a torture murder caught on tape. The fight begins when they kidnap his girlfriend.

Konny a single mom of Latin American origin lives and works in Los Angeles CA. Konny has an 8-year-old son and her mother both depend on her. Jack a father of Hispanic origin living in L.A....                See full synopsis »

Amid the intense political violence of Istanbul, Kadir is released on parole two years early on the condition that he become an informant for the police gathering terrorist informations, activities, and searching for bombs on trash cans.
A young married couple is visiting a secluded estate near the coast, hoping to spend a picturesque summer weekend together. However, things aren't exactly the way they seem.
An ex-con trying to find work in a new Depression is lured back to a life of crime, but his gang passes the point of no return once they become fugitives.
Traces the journey of a young IIT aspirant as he copes with academic failures and is surprised to discover inspiration in a most unexpected place. Inspired by a true story.
A woman stuck in a cycle of depression and grief becomes addicted to seeking closure by taking experimental medication that allows her to speak with her deceased sister in her dreams.

A young couple meet while on a suicide mission that has much to do with love, suspense, and murder. Despite their mission being deadly and intriguing, the couple falls in love, as all young people do when in exciting situations.
A dutiful cop, guilt-ridden over saving the life of a gang leader, becomes obsessed with bringing down the crime syndicate of the man he saved.
After the execution of Fu Manchu, a mysterious new criminal mastermind arises. Strangely, he acts the same as Fu Manchu. . .
"I will not love it anymore. It is all my fault." A dramatic love story between a blind man and woman.
When a legion of demons are unleashed in a hospital, a veteran nurse who suffers from PTSD, must fight her way through 9 floors of hell before the demons claim her very soul.
The adventures of a skillful Belgrade policeman who proves to be equally successful as a caring father.
After an experimental bio-weapon is released, turning thousands into zombie-like creatures, it's up to a rag-tag group of survivors to stop the infected and those behind its release.
A merc team called "The Librarians" is hired to find the missing granddaughter of one of their closest friends, and they'll have to go against a ruthless Miami mobster to get her.
A best man (Wilson) stays on as a houseguest with the newlyweds, much to the couple's annoyance.
A guardian angel has 24 hours to convince a soul that life on Earth is worth the effort.
Two young women accidentally bring back the Sanderson Sisters to modern day Salem and must figure out how to stop the child-hungry witches from wreaking havoc on the world.

Force of the Trojans will embody the spirit of the original Harryhausen films with all the fun, vibrant action, epic scope and dedication to craftsmanship that has made Ray Harryhausen's films timeless.
Grace is a robot incognito whose primary function is to represent humanity based on a generalization created from all social media and wireless communications. Rudy is her final test.
A troubled young woman who visits a psychotherapist to help her quit smoking undergoes hypnosis and finds herself reliving a tragic Victorian romance from a past life.

Boundaries between good and evil have been blurred, two young lovers try to get out of a nameless city ruled by Evil. Just as their plan seems to be coming together, a mysterious stranger puts them on a dangerous course.
A recently-returned Vietnam POW loses his family and his right hand during a violent home invasion, and seeks retribution against those responsible.
A restauranteur teams up with a police officer and his ex-con brother to avenge the death of a friend's daughter.
The protagonist, who's a bit rough around the edges, falls in love with the sister of a friend, but the road to romantic bliss is not to be a smooth one.
Ordinary people meet in a laundry service in Budapest, Hungary and they share the same thing, their dirty secrets.
In desperate need to raise money for his ailing daughter's operation, driver Nathu kidnaps his employer's daughter, not knowing that he is being manipulated by someone with his own agenda.
A battle between two brothers tears their family apart.
A group of children come together to fight the predatory machines that threaten the nature around them. To do this, they must transform themselves into cartoons and defeat an ambitious witch.

A magic blade made thousands of years ago from the remains of a meteor is stolen by a criminal gang in Japan. A Japanese policeman tracks the gang to California in his quest to get the sword back before it can be put to evil use.

Zade, a free-spirited twenty-something comes from a long dynasty of tarot readers who practice real magic. Determined to forge a normal life and find a different kind of magic, Zade is cast in a premier magic show in Las Vegas.
A legacy of men, known as Hunters, have protected the world from evil for centuries. Today, a new Hunter has emerged: A young woman.
Movie adaptation of the third route of Fate/Stay Night.

The story of the world's top aircraft repo man--who's lost his pilot's license. An extreme aviation film, based on the real-life adventures of Mike Kennedy, aircraft recovery specialist and the best jet thief in the business.
Two young martial artists seek the training of an old master to try and combat a local warlord.
An investigation by a young inspector who quickly becomes obsessed with stopping a monster.
Five downed pilots must contend with hungry prehistoric beasts and lusty cave women on a lush island paradise.
An evil demon bird attempts to destroy a happy island family.
A twelve-year-old Jewish boy hides with a family of Catholic peasant farmers to escape the Nazis.
When a meek father takes drastic measures to provide for his family, he is accidentally transformed into a hideous mutant.

Experience the original story of romance and rescue. King of Glory takes you on an intense ride through the ancient Scriptures of the prophets as it chronologically and accurately unfolds their story and message in a way that makes sense.
Following the untimely death of their mother, a family decides to buy an electric grandmother in order to help around the house and serve as a nanny for the three children.

After experiencing difficulty sleeping, Lisa is diagnosed with sleep apnea and sent to a sleep center where she, and five fellow patients, discover the doctor's ulterior motives and it creates a nightmarish situation of life and death.
A pretty smart detective joins an investigator to disrupt a dangerous gang of money-smuggling smugglers.
Set in the wetlands of Brazil, a lawyer helps a mysterious young woman protect her multi-billion dollar inheritance from her greedy relatives.

Trisha Rawlings, a Beverly Hills socialite suffers from loneliness following the separation of her womanizing husband Stu. Strip, a young drifter, became infatuated with her and, develops a May/December relationship with her.
Motorcycle racer Rommel seeks vengeance against JC, a madman who murdered the sidehacker's fiancee.
A widowed father tries to support his children after he becomes a ghost in an accident.
Poor and hungry peasant Macario wishes to have a good meal for All Saint's Day. After his wife cooks him a turkey he has three apparitions: The Devil, God, and the Death.

A high school track coach loses his only child in a violent encounter, setting him on a journey into the depths of grief, alcoholism and homelessness. Sometimes redemption is found in the lowliest of places.

The life and times of Emilio Moran, the owner of a cabaret called 'La Gardenia'. Who is a compulsive gambler that fells in love with the beautiful Sonia, the most famous cabaret singer of his cabaret.
A despondent Vietnam veteran in danger of losing his livelihood is pushed to the edge when he sees Vietnamese immigrants moving into the fishing industry in a Texas bay town.
High school student Ling Xiaoyu is recruited by Anna Williams of G Corporation to transfer to Kyoto University and gather information on a student named Shin Kamiya.
A young writer must delve into the dreams of his subconscious to remember the contents of his missing novel, only to discover the dark secret that made him forget them in the first place.
13-year-old orphan Aleksa and his friends discover that the evil Doctor Jovica Vuk is using sorcery to capture the Zlodolci, a group of immortal knights who can control life and death.
Three segments about three Warsaw couples about to get married.
A crimefighting organization called the Angels goes up against a drug-smuggling ring headed by a female kung-fu killer.
A young border guard falls in love with a beautiful but mysterious Lappish woman, unaware of her dark past.
Part 1 : 'Maniac' - A gang is kidnapping and raping young women. Part 2: 'Queen of Temple Street' - A gambling addict sells his wife to a brothel to pay off his debts.
A group of religious zealots known as The Death Risers have an evil plot to destroy the world by bringing to Earth the Norse God they worship: The Goddess of the Undead, known as Hel!.

Billie ventures to her parents old Strip club business to take some time out of her mundane life. The moment Billie enters, she triggers off a psychological nightmare that threatens to engulf and destroy her.

In the year 2019, after global destruction and descent into savagery, the immortal Kuzman discovers his destiny. As he enters the whirling circles of time, he discovers the blasphemy of our century, and how it is to close its circle.
It's Friday night--she's moving in with her boyfriend tomorrow--so she goes out, but gets stuck in traffic--where she meets a handsome stranger.

Neddie Nerfhoffer has a dream. He wants to do his part to help save the galaxy from a tyrannical warlord. When Neddie finds an ancient starship, he and his friends take to the stars to stop the evil General Disdain.
A morally bankrupt defense attorney suffers a nervous breakdown and begins to see visions of a dead client. At the same time, people associated with that case start turning up dead.
A snowman arrives in a quaint village with the intend to befriend a youngster and to teach him the powers of magic...if you believe.
A sorceress travels to the Lost Lands in search of a magical power that allows a person to transform into a werewolf.
A cat burglar is forced to take a bickering, dysfunctional family hostage on Christmas Eve.
Two male acrobats compete for their beautiful female partner, until one of them decides to leave the circus.
A young couple, in love and facing a life-changing decision, find one seemingly ordinary July 4th cleaved in two by the flip of a coin on the Brooklyn Bridge.
Seven warriors come together to protect a village from a diabolical General.
After a boy sees a man in Santa Claus suit kissing his mother, he thinks that the real Santa wants to replace his father, so he goes to prank-war with him.
It's a high-flying adventure when Louie, a mute trumpeter swan, is given the gift of a trumpet, and finds his voice.

A Lady out of Love from a mixed heritage descent, finding her One in a time where Life a bit hectic going on but surprise still around, while meeting individuals on her way some connection to some old new ways to connect in Love in a way.
Animated feature based on the popular 'Ghostbusters' franchise.
Four fallen robot gladiators are rescued from the scrap pile, turned into an elite group of mercenaries and sent on a mission to bring about a new age of enlightenment in a post-apocalyptic universe.

It's about a man (Michael) who loves his neighbor woman (Jessica), and enter a problem after a problem until he know something that change the look of life for him, you'll cry when you understand his feelings
A toon-hating detective is a cartoon rabbit's only hope to prove his innocence when he is accused of murder.
Three college couples spend one final night having a Christmas party before they go off for winter break.
In order to defeat the wicked Grand Duke of Owls, a young boy, transformed into a cat, teams up with a group of barnyard animals to find the rooster who can raise the sun.
JoJo is kicked out of her dance troupe and finds out what dancing truly is.
A government agent tries to break a Neo-Fascist group in California
An accountant takes LSD and disappears with incriminating evidence against his mysterious employers. The Purser is tasked with finding him and destroying the evidence.
Two women who have been close friends since adolescence must cope with the changes that maturity brings.
A toon-hating detective is a cartoon rabbit's only hope to prove his innocence when he is accused of murder.

Faith comes home after learning of her father's tragic death. She must choose between finishing her education and taking over his ministry. Struggling to cope with his passing, she has an unwanted visitor to guide her through her pain.
Flirtatious mermaid Miranda (Glynis Johns) swaps places with a schoolteacher who has gone on vacation. All is well until she falls in love with a human.
A pungent, extremely entertaining tale of hedonistic, amoral blackmailer Matsukata.
The adventures of a prince to achieve a magical flower to bring back his father's vision.
In Los Angeles, an ex-con takes the underground fighting world by storm in his quest to fulfill a promise to a dead friend.
A framed juggler breaks jail and poses as a ghost to force the killer to confess.
An Englishman with a grudge against an insurance company for a disallowed claim fakes his own death, but is soon pursued by an insurance investigator.
An elite military unit encounters a supernatural entity, known as The Elder Gods, that forces them into battle against an army from another world.
A relentlessly positive young girl battles to overcome aggressive cancer and other overwhelming odds with the undying support of her best friend, an Australian Shepherd dog named Luke.

Challenged by her step-sister to return home, a young woman hiding from her past in a remote Japanese village, is abducted into a fantastic wilderness and pursued by a monster, with only four nights to escape to Tokyo and face her demons.
After rising bootlegger Slaughterhouse Scorpio eliminates his gangland competition, two reporters and a cabal of six businessmen work to expose him.
A police inspector investigates a guy who traps innocent women on Facebook.

When Nitya, an academically bright student meets Vikram, who has strong views on politics and idealism, it seems like a match made in heaven. With time they realise that their views are diametrically opposite and that they want different

When a cop is called to investigate a seemingly ordinary murder in the New Mexico desert he uncovers a deeper conspiracy and begins to suspect that the killer he's trying to find may be a humanoid beast.
A wealthy American businessman sends his spoiled young daughter to Paris to get "refinement", but she gets involved with a gold-digging "nobleman" who's after her money.
Can you make the perfect crime? This movie is about that it is the small things, that decide if the plan will put people in jail or make the perfect crime.
As children, a Mozambique native and a Portuguese colonialist were friends. Years have passed and Mozambique is fighting for its independence. Two childhood friends meet on opposing sides.
Child siblings whose parents were murdered by goons exact their revenge in later life.

The world's most notorious Mexican wrestler bargains his way out of an eternity of fiery damnation by returning to Los Angeles to play guardian angel to Belisa Montoya, a troubled teenager whose not what she seems.
An orphan (Eight-year-old boy soprano Bobby Breen) gets a chance to sing opera in New York
Vasfiye, her story, tellers of the story, and their listeners change every time the story is told.
Stylish road movie in which a kidnapped youth becomes friends with his abductors.

Based on the true story of Kiranjit Ahluwalia, a Punjabi woman, who was abused by her husband for 10 years. After killing her husband in self-defense, Ahluwalia is imprisoned as those close to her fight to set her free.

Gui- xiang Liu is a young widow, with a rare disease and the son of elderly in-laws live together, to raise the money to his son, gui-xiang liu married a old miners with many years older than himself.
A tough detective who is part of an elite New York City unit is trying to find out who killed his partner, but uncovers a plot to kidnap mobsters for money.

You know how it is... you wanna look, but you don't wanna look. Some secrets are to powerful to be told, when there is no one to turn to. One black car one bad ass bitch behind the wheel, deliverance guaranteed.
A teenage groupie must fight a murderous demon hell-bent on adding her idol to his music collection.
Makoto Yuki's story continues as new Shadows, allies, Personas, powers and foes carrying the potential are introduced.
Based on "The Little Broomstick" by Mary Stewart, a strange flower grants a girl magic powers.
Rasmus run away from an orphanage to look for some parents who want a boy with straight hair. He meets the tramp Paradis-Oskar and joins him on the road.
When Chris and Andy order a model from an escort service, they find that something is unnaturally wrong with Natasha, something deadly wrong.
A man begins to suspect his neighbors are not what they appear to be and their secrets could be deadly.
After escaping from summer camp, Thomas and his invisible fox Felix have the adventure of a lifetime.

A little girl, Mary, is disappointed when she doesn't receive a pet rabbit for her birthday, but then she gets one after all, in the form of an imaginary friend. Mary's parents can't see him, even though she insists that he is real.
A man finds a ring that gives the bearer great power but the goddess to whom the ring belongs wants it back.
A warrior struggles to uphold the rights of the Tamil people.
Sam is a dexterity-challenged art student having the worst day of his life when a streak of fate, and a gust of wind, blows a woman named Hope across his path.

Story is set in a fictitious village Kharpur, Rajasthan, where salt is produced from a saline water lake. The village envisages a belief, that the salinity in it's air and water gets engrained within the people living there.
An artist pretends to be a valet to escape a woman's advances. He marries another woman but must keep painting in secret to make enough money.
Everything is normal with the Krumborg family, Two robbers want to kidnap Krumme all the while Krumme's present accidentally winds up with Mrs.Olsen.
What we don't say gets accumulated in our body, filling our soul with voiceless screams. What we don't say does not die, it kills us instead.
A diverse collection of desperate people sign up to compete in a "free for all" road race/destruction derby type event.

An orphan child, angry and violent, torn and traumatized, pursues a love that appears not destined for her. But nothing can stop her dreams. In her unbreakable faith in the power of righteousness over destruction, she finds liberation.
Follows the story of Rayo, an artist who returns home to Nigeria from London to confront her dying mother and her haunted past.
A former tennis star arranges the murder of his adulterous wife.
The young composer Franz Schubert tries to gain a foothold in Vienna.
A man wants to live a quiet life after he is released from prison. But his past does not leave him alone. His young son is determined to save his father.
A couple endure 365 days of marriage in order to inherit money.
A modern day adaptation of the ancient Greek play Lysistrata by Aristophanes, set against the backdrop of gang violence in Chicago, Illinois.
On a Friday afternoon in North London, Jack decides to bet £250 on a horse win treble which, if all three horses win, would net him and his friends a fortune.
The police try to catch an elusive smuggling gang. As a competent officer is assigned to the case, another agent tries to infiltrate the gang from the inside.
Barmaid in seedy docks does better detective work than the police to get her beau off a murder accusation, helped by a good priest who proves to be a good fighter for the truth.
In an attempt to save his crumbling marriage, a police detective extorts a recently paroled art thief into stealing valuable paintings to present to his wife as gifts.
Sam and Jonathan, a pair of hapless novelty salesmen, embark on a tour of the human condition in reality and fantasy that unfold in a series of absurdist episodes.

Cass followed the bright lights to London, but was quickly disillusioned. She met (and married) Doctor Langdon, and soon realised she wanted to return to her home by the sea, and her first love Colin.
A famous pro football star lost connection with his family. His mother helps bring him back to his family roots and his first love.
Teresa, a young orphan, falls in love with Pietro, a health inspector. She will try to bring order to his reckless life full of debts and lies.

Nashville doesn't know what they are in for, when Charlie, an older out of touch dreamer, decides to pursue a career as a country singer, after he is misdiagnosed with a terminal illness. He goes after his dreams.
In search of her grandmother's wedding dress, Jenny travels to the Salton Sea.

Two sisters of Sappho make love in a new apartment, until a photographer neighbor comes by and suggests a naked photo shoot. The girls agree but after the photo shoot they pull a fast one on the photographer and tie him up for further fun.
Ko leads a team of Hong Kong assassins that are taken out one by one. Ko manages to flee to the countryside, where he aims to find out who's behind this and to gain the strength to fight back.
An ordinary LEGO construction worker, thought to be the prophesied as "special", is recruited to join a quest to stop an evil tyrant from gluing the LEGO universe into eternal stasis.

Aging screenwriter Felix Bonhoeffer has lived his life in two states of existence: in reality and his own interior world. While working on a murder mystery script, and unaware that his brain is on the verge of implosion, Felix is baffled when his characters start to appear in his life, and vice versa.
A lonely American boy living in Scotland makes a new best friend, a fellow nine year-old who happens to be a vampire.
The Eternal Warrior has protected the Earth for more than 10,000 years from The Immortal Enemy - a monstrous, civilization killer.
Two amnesia patients team up to recover their mysterious pasts as rival mafia families, a frantic FBI unit, and an unexpected enemy threaten both of their lives.
A grieving father plans to find the man who killed his son in a hit-and-run accident while joining a support group lead by a manipulative psychiatrist and an ex-police detective.
After the death of his girlfriend at the hands of terrorists, Mitch Rapp is drawn into the world of counterterrorism, mentored by tough-as-nails former U.S. Navy S.E.A.L. Stan Hurley.
Young Andy develops a crush on his drama teacher. Meanwhile, Judge Hardy has his own problems when he gets conned into forming a phony aluminum corporation.
In the distant future, mankind has forsaken global wars for battles of single combat. The world has been divided into two opposing super powers, with each side represented by trained champions.

In a remote orphanage run by their aunt Henrietta, little Kara and her brother Rupert discover that Henrietta is in league with dark forces and sacrifices the orphans' souls to Wurdilak, the notorious soul catcher.

A Mature Sensible Love Story Where A Man Meets His Long Lost Love After Two Decades .The rekindled affair could be ruinous, for the jealous husband who is a DIG Police Officer, a brute with a unenviable reputation.
Dracula returns to the small Yorkshire coastal town of Whitby, bringing with him the war that rages between Heaven and Hell.
A young boy is bequeathed the ownership of a professional baseball team.
A teen artist living in 1970s San Francisco enters into an affair with her mother's boyfriend.

Follow the extraordinary journey of a gifted musician as they embark on a quest to recover the lost songs of ancient legends. Experience the transformative power of music and its ability to shape the fate of the world.
A young man dreams of marrying a beautiful girl. But, due to pressure from his father, he ends up with a Plain Jane. Then, he meets a gorgeous woman who, unbeknownst to him, is only behind his money.
A 13-year-old girl named Meilin turns into a giant red panda whenever she gets too excited.

A Watcher, a Hunter, a Sandman, and a Ghost Writer form an uneasy alliance and secretly meet with a computer science professor in hopes of convincing him to voluntarily abandon his research into the existence of Immortals.
Possessed by Devi Maa, a blessed woman predicts her own death, leaving her shattered family to deal with a look-alike.

To protect Morrowland from another threat, Jim and Luke have to set off on a dangerous journey. On their adventure, Jim's most fervent wish might also come true: to find out the truth about his mysterious origins.

Áurea is a sentimental older woman, who befriends teenager Áureo. They like each other, so she talks to him about herself, her spirituality, mysticism and existence itself. They become inseparable, so his jealous mother confronts her.
A young martial arts student gets caught up in a series of Kung Fu adventures with a woman who manages a Chinese restaurant.
"Til death do us part" wasn't nearly long enough for Max and Abby as his ghost returns to help her get over him. But with a second chance to be together, neither will ever want to say goodbye again.

A Danish girl sees her brother's body be taken over by the soul of an 1800s man. A boy and the local, clairvoyant inventor agree to help her. They're up against dark forces and time when they head off to the Island of Lost Souls.
A young locksmith is forced to leave his home and family to join the Buenos Aires police force.
Two trigger happy cops, arrested for accidentally killing a group of hostages, stumble upon a drugs trafficking gang in prison during their everlasting search for real action.
During World War Two, Janka is hiding a young Jewish girl named Ester, and an unusual bond is created between them.

Tim Avery, an aspiring cartoonist, finds himself in a predicament when his dog stumbles upon the mask of Loki. Then after conceiving an infant son "born of the mask", he discovers just how looney child raising can be.
A real-live mermaid washes ashore on Ellis Island and adapts to life in New York City. A remake of Ron Howard's 1984 comedy.
A family seeks the protection of evil forces with the help of three mysterious women who live in a rundown farm house.
A female cop on a first date tangles with murderous thieves when they overtake a remote winery/estate hunting for priceless works of art. Wine Hard.
With his sister suffering from a serious illness, a young boy takes it upon himself to get God's attention in hopes that God will heal his sister.
The illegal relationship of the wife of the prosecutor of a provincial town turns into a nightmare.
Tim a West German teenager is a rich brat who aspires to be a tennis player. He meets his identical twin Ronny while on a school trip to East Germany. This chance meeting changes his life forever.
A middle-aged Tukaram is passionate about food and archaeology but a misplaced call from Madhura that adds the tadka to his life. While love simmers, Nicole and Sidharth's story spices up too.
Based on a famous fairytale by Yuri Olesha.

A young woman joins a photo shoot on a tropical island as a model and falls for the artist. Dad, who's a cop, arrives to check up on her. When one of the models ends up dead, he looks into it. Are the models being used for sex tourism?
Yusuke and his team of spirit detectives must fight the demons of the Netherworld before they bring a new reign to the human world.
An advertising campaign accidentally unearths an unsolved crime from a decade ago, throwing the campaign manager and his girlfriend in the middle of a fight that may cost them their lives.

Shouichi, Ryo, and Hikawa have to combat a new wave of Unknowns, but are faced with another threat in the form of G4, another Battle Suit designed to fight the Unknowns, but is potentially stronger and is on the wrong side.

A veteran soap opera star retires to a beach house with her publicist and partner, but her Early Onset Alzheimer's will strain the couple's relationship until they find the strength to redefine themselves and what they mean to one another.
Three unique diamonds. Two teams of thieves. One big heist that spins out into a battle for the ultimate eternal prize: Cash.

It is a world without language. A world where one is raised to respect the rules. Only one Boy questions the verity of what he has been taught, and he must decide whether to continue living in a society of fear or choose his own destiny.
Giuseppe commits to love a woman he hasn't seen in 15 years, amid dangers of seduction from her daughter.
A separated attorney in Rio sees an English teaching American widow and tries to woo her.

A cowardly rapper tells a redneck about a mysterious briefcase and a large amount of cash that sets into motion a series of bumbling events that will inevitably involve much of the L.A. underworld and may just bring down corporate America.
Passengers on an ocean liner can't recall how they got on board or where they are going yet, oddly enough, it soon becomes apparent that they all have something in common.
Undercover cop Kikuchi teams up with the Okinawa local police to clean up the narcotics and prostitution underworld.
Detective Kaniyan Poonkundran is hungry for a challenging case to investigate and the mystery of a murdered dog leads to a rival who could be the match for him.

A very young chemist invests a formula that can be revolutionize the whole market. At the beginnings nobody care the young chemist. Then competition is started to capture a formula. One woman changes everything.
After a weird nightmare, a photojournalist finds out to be a murderer. While he sleeps, his alter ego kills.
A troll named Leaf and his sidekick, Bellyrumble, set out on an epic journey to save the imprisoned King Basil, and gain the love of a lonely princess.

Karthik, a money minded businessman, gets engaged to another money-minded girl Anushka. When his factory gets shut down by an environment activist Divya, he goes back to India only to fall in love with her.
A student monitor at a girls' school faces the scorn of her fellow pupils when she reports one of the popular girls for staying out late.
Five strangers are invited to a castle under the pretense that one may inherit it. Little do they know what dangers await at the House of the Wolfman.
Assigned to protect a small town in Vietnam, Dao arrives to fight against the crime boss; but soon his past catches up with him, threatening to destroy the cherished village.
When a novelist is murdered, suspicion falls on all the women he had affairs with--and then wrote about in his books.
Rico illegally immigrated with his mom to escape the dangerous drug world, but when his mom contracts cancer, he must dive back into that world to help pay for her treatment.
A young man goes to great lengths to seduce his reluctant girlfriend. She finally follows him into the bedroom after seeing a "hot" live show.

A century after the Wicked Witch, the Emerald City is at the mercy of a once-revered hero, and salvation comes from the wrench of young Victoria Wright. Rediscover old friends and meet new heroes in this new tale set in the Land of Oz.

Teens try to get clues for a treasure to the rightful owner. The bikers are chasing them trying to take it away, and a crazy lawyer who mixes reality and a computer game gets involved. The rightful owners are revealed in the end.

A renowned psychiatrist has selected six mental patients to interview as part of the research for his new book. As he begins his unorthodox methods the question becomes, who really belongs in Spring Valley Mental Hospital?
A businessman runs into corrupt police officers and gangsters after procuring a bag full of cash

In 1933, orphaned American heiress, Waverly, goes to live with her Grandfather on his estate, Dragonwind, England. She fulfills an ancient prophecy; she discovers her ability to command enchanted sources of power which protect mankind.

A news crew is taken hostage on an airplane set to take off from the Seychelles by a gang of Somali pirates whose leader is driven by one goal: to be interviewed by a prominent member of the crew, legendary journalist Frank Saltzman.

A man who works in a pharmacy as a part time job to aid his financial status finds out that his father has been exterminated by a savage brute and sought to avenge him, then unlocks a whole melancholic world of crime!
Based on the True Story Was I Next The Sean Cribbin Story One Man's Journey From Victim to Survivor
Miracles seem to happen after a mysterious, bearded stranger named Mr. Nicholson arrives in the neighbourhood around Xmas.
Alyssa and Amanda are two little girls who are identical, but complete strangers, that accidentally meet one day.

The three thieves Kasper, Jesper and Jonathan lives together with their always hungry lion in the little town of Kardemomme town, the home to a fair but kind police officer, and the strict Aunt Sofie.

The Z-Fighters must contend with Lord Beerus, the God of Destruction, but only a God can fight a God, and none of them are Gods. However with the creation of the Super Saiyan God, will the Z-Fighters be able to defeat Lord Beerus?
A New England Detective tries to solve a murder where the eyewitness is not talking.
Prashanth and Preeti are madly in love with each other. When her father opposes their relationship, they decide to fight against all odds to unite.

16-year-old Steffi is planning a school trip to Paris and her first sex with Fabian when she is diagnosed with terminal cancer. She defies parental advice and escapes with Steve, a frustrated circus acrobat, to enjoy the time she has left.
A college student gets involved in the wild partying lifestyle of the professional freestyle motocross world.
A man with a violent streak is trying to reform but gets pushed into a situation where he has to take action.
It follows the Niger-Delta militants' struggle as witnessed by inhabitants of the communities.
John Hewitt Jr. battles who he hated versus who he has become. The ever challenging conflict of how we where raised versus who we want to be. Children, Spouses and Friends will not be spared.
Tara is revealed to be a once-in-a-century goddess whose power of song and spoken word ignites a revolution in a repressive dictatorship.
A group of humans join the Green Lantern Corps, an alien interstellar police force that protects the universe.
An embittered old mariner and an unwanted young orphan form an unlikely bond building a boat.
Animated feature film based on Charles Perrault's stories and nursery rhymes. It features Humpty Dumpty, The Old Woman Who Lives in a Shoe, and the Crooked Man.

A ruthless, cynical, hated publisher is killed in a plane crash, doomed to be a "restless" spirit for being unloved. A heavenly power gives him a month on Earth to find one person to shed a tear for him before his fate is sealed.
Tade's wife sacrifices her marriage for the sake of her career. Tade replaces her with a crude village girl.
A sassy bounty hunter and her convict boyfriend free a society from the clutches of a repressive theocratic police state.
THIS SEQUEL TO THE ORIGINAL FANTASY-DRAMA BASED ON A POPULAR KOMIKS NOVEL REPRISES THE STORY OF AN UGLY DUCKLING WHO TRANSFORMS INTO A BEAUTIFUL WOMAN WHEN SHE WEARS A MAGICAL UNDERGARMENT.
Spirits come out when kids leave a school for the day.
Law abiding citizen finds out that in his inherited apartment live two charming woman working as professional killers.
When the city finds itself at war, the community is forced to take sides. And its members soon learn that staying neutral is not an option.
22 year old Omanakuttan who is even unable to finish his school ends up marrying a girl whose wedding he went to attend.

Ram finds himself treated as a freak. Berenice awakens a mummy in the Egyptian museum of Turin. Together, the two teenagers will live an exciting adventure, full of fantastic elements and references to the history of ancient Egypt.
Before there was the myth, there was the man.
A man she love who betray her with her son years ago come back, as a "child".
The raucous exploits of a blended family of 12, the Bakers, as they navigate a hectic home life while simultaneously managing their family business.

A birthday prank turns ugly when Amy Belle falls unconscious and travels to the world of Balloonland in search of her deceased father, learning that although his love cannot be seen or touched, it lives forever in her heart.
Crista, Berta and Sole, are three young people who feel exploited and discriminated by society.

In a remote corner of the mountain wilderness, there is a small inn called The Margin of the World Inn strangely located in the hub of traffic. There are many haunted rumors flying around about ghosts, love, martial arts and intrigue.
Vincent, the framer, get a job as an apprentice, but really wants to steel Mona Lisa...
In this outrageous comedy, a group of high school Seniors juggle between old loves and new flings on the shores of a beautiful Italian town.
Ravindu and his friends go to the media to stop Lionel from taking away Nero and the other dogs by dog catchers. Otara and Sangeetha help them to rescue the dogs.
As altered foods ravage the world, voodoo forces dysfunctional family SheepPsyche to play live reggae K-pop in VR.
A group of barnyard animals form an underground rock band. Inspired by Jarrett J. Krosoczka's children's book.

When deaf, teenager Ruth has the chance of a lifetime to follow her dreams of starring in the Nutcracker Ballet, her excitement and confidence is abruptly ripped away when someone's jealousy clearly wants her gone.
Soon after becoming Emperor in 1736 Qianlong makes an incognito tour of the empire and investigates the White Alliance criminal organization.
A young mermaid gives up her life in the sea to love a human prince.
A couple go to Mexico for a vacation and mistaken for a thief and must get away before going to a Mexican jail to rot.
Lin xiao, Gu li,Nan xiang and Tang Wan ru grew up together graduated from university into the workplace. They start a new journey.

A woman, deserted by her husband, gets a job in the city. Her mother takes care of her son in the country. She often sends the boy presents which his grandmother claim come from a fictitious fairy-godmother type character named Mrs Seoul.

A child witnesses drug dealers murder his parents. He escapes and grows up wild in the city's slums. Years later he emerges to help the residents of the area who are being terrorized by street gangs and drug dealers.
Follows the adventure of a group of kids and a paper boy named Peter. Plane ride, box car racing and bad neighbors are all included.

A misguided young man ignores the wise advice of a gang leader and starts selling drugs to achieve his dreams of a luxury lifestyle; but he soon realizes that quick money comes with deadly consequences.
A young musician travels to Burning Man, a unique event in the middle of the Nevada desert, in an attempt to get back the impetuous girl he has fallen in love with.
After being raped by an evil feudal lord and subsequently getting banished from her village, a peasant girl makes a pact with the Devil to gain magical powers and take her revenge.
Filled with vengeance, a simple man turns into a hardcore criminal in order to avenge the destruction of his family.
Hanamura's yakuza clan starts taking control over its rival by kidnapping and torturing two women that are crucial to the war between the two gangs.
A recently widowed postman, fulfills his job description by going completely postal after the tragic death of his little girl.

A special friendship is woven between Iddo, a child who lost his mother in a car accident, and Freddy, an abused street dog. This friendship will lead Iddo to overcome his fears, and Freddy to trust humans again.
Jaded hit-man Monk returns to his hometown to face the ghosts of his past.
Rashad is a young man facing eviction. Rashad gets swept into a world of crime after an old friend (Andre) persuades him he can make quick money running drugs.

A group of young political activists breaks the law to get attention to animal rights, by freeing caged animals from labs and farms during night time, leading to highly illegal sabotage actions, putting them under increasing pressure.
A butler and the staff of an eccentric aged philanthropist whose family wealth is exhausted engage in larceny and crimes to maintain her lifestyle and provide funds for her charitable activities.
The father of a flirtatious woman makes an offer to a young man, to protect her daughter.
A baby born with the help of a snake priest is granted a guardian angel in the form of a supernatural snake spirit to save her from a deadly prophecy.

When a fairly routine extraction mission goes belly up, Deadshot and Harley Quinn must figure a way to salvage things before their heads are literally blown off! (This non-profit fanfilm is not affiliated or endorsed by DC Comics)
A skilled mountaineer races against time to rescue his mute daughter from the clutches of human traffickers in Bulgaria.
Homicide detective John Hobbes witnesses the execution of serial killer Edgar Reese. Soon after the execution, the killings start again, and they are very similar to Reese's style.
An urban romance about loneliness and disconnection in the megapolis of Jakarta

An alien visits Earth and casts an evil spell over a poor fisherman who finds her magic container that can generate anything. Since this container can generate anything, soon the fisherman finds that several criminals are after him for it.
A young woman returning to her old school to visit her professor also runs into her old boyfriend and her senior, each of whom has a past with her.
A rich businessman and a young woman are attracted to each other, but he only wants an affair while she wants to save herself for marriage.
One of Toei's last ninkyô yakuza pictures of the 1970's.
A young woman who works at cosmetic company becomes the prime suspect after her beautiful co-worker is murdered.
In a distant time and place, power is decided by a cruel game in which two teams of gladiators fight in a vast arena.
While waiting for her divorce papers, a repressed professor of literature is unexpectedly seduced by a carefree, spirited young lesbian.
A young poor girl receives a marriage proposal from a mafia novice. She's going to refuse, but he's going to insist - at all cost.
From your favorite comics serial, comes the most electrifying combination of two top action stars.

Marine Captain, Foreign Area Officer, is turned spy when tensions with China escalate. The U.S. is attempting to gain control of Myanmar for a strategic advantage. The way in, through Myanmar's drug trade and a young Marine.

A bomb explodes in a shopping mall. Sam the security agent tries to save the victims, but at the end he runs off. Later he encounters all the people he saved. They all think that somehow he is responsible for what happened.

During a terrible storm, a jaded couple gets stuck in a house with a charismatic woman who threatens their relationship, and their sex-crazed male best friend. Through this ineluctable isolation, their true humanity surfaces.
A comedy about a young Christian couple who has a wild adventure on their wedding night, as one surprise after another foils their attempts to consummate the marriage.
In 1913, the charming, seductive and sinister vampire Count Dracula travels to England in search of an immortal bride.
In 1943, the crew of a B-17 based in the UK prepares for its 25th and final bombing mission over Germany before returning home to the USA.
Shang-Chi, the master of weaponry-based Kung Fu, is forced to confront his past after being drawn into the Ten Rings organization.
The criminal subculture of the Albanian community in the Bronx, starring a real-life ex-con.

An ordinary man Reinert, goes out in the morning for throwing his garbage in a plastic-bag. At the same time a bank-robbery happens in the neighborhood. The loot from the robbery is also kept in a plastic-bag.
Delightful tale of a cat who becomes a sharp gentleman and sets out to restore his master's name and wealth after he gives Puss a pair of magic boots.
A pastor facing foreclosure and the loss of much needed community programs, strikes a deal with a devilish drug pushing cop team and quickly finds himself in over his head.

Two years later, they are with us again: our beloved Yolki heroes in the most incredible New Year stories. Borya and Zhenya, whose one-year-old children will take their friends to a psychiatric hospital on the eve of the holiday.
The good-looking blonde Iris is kidnapped by a gang of traffickers and shipped to Rio De Janeiro. There she is expected to fetch top prize from potential buyers of young women.
A mighty saga of men in war.

In the year 500 A.D., a jealous, decapitating monster terrorizes the drunken revelers of Heorot. A fearless princess goes in search of a hero who can save her people. But that hero guards a secret more dangerous than any monster.
In the midst of an apocalypse, a man struggles to reach his pregnant wife, who is thousands of miles away.
After three classic Norwegian fairy tales, gathered by the fairy tales masters Asbjørnsen and Moe.
An expecting father must become a vigilante when he is wrongfully targeted by relentless gangbangers.

Maleficent and her goddaughter Aurora begin to question the complex family ties that bind them as they are pulled in different directions by impending nuptials, unexpected allies, and dark new forces at play.

A young warrior is searching for his mysteriously disappeared master. He must join forces with other fighters in order to get a magical sword and defeat an evil grand priest. The fate of mankind is at stake.
When a young girl stows away on the ship of a legendary sea monster hunter, they launch an epic journey into uncharted waters - and make history to boot.

When one of his informants is murdered, Detective Inspector Jack Regan is drawn into a deadly political game. He is soon a marked man and, after being framed, is suspended from duty. This doesn't stop him searching for the truth.
Nightingale Wong is a super heroine who looses her memory when her triad boss father is murdered. She is taken in by a kindly prostitute, and eventually takes revenge.

A boy and an adult witch live in the same building in Tel Aviv. The boy falls in love with the new girl who came to the neighborhood, a retired witch. The connection between the two teaches both that in love there is no magic.
An over zealous pokemon called Keldeo enrages a very powerful Kyurem, with the help of Ash and Pikachu can Keldeo become a sword of justice and defeat the mighty Kyurem?
Joel attempts to find a romantic connection while in the development of his next film, all the while dealing with his health and other personal issues.
In the City of Dallas Texas, during a 24-hour period the paths of 5 people interlace in a violent scenario that will change their destiny.
Former criminals reunite after years to rescue a friend arrested by the police.
A young unicorn named Unico must fight an evil magician and save everyone who's trapped under his spell.
A papermaker gets involved with a murder case concerning two criminals leading to a determined detective suspecting him and the former's vicious father searching for him

After a dark force conquers Canterlot, the Mane 6 embark on an unforgettable journey beyond Equestria where they meet new friends and exciting challenges on a quest to use the magic of friendship to save their homeland.

After a mummy hand appears in a frat party pizza, four kids must chase it down, escape the mob and an ancient sect but most of all learn to forgive each other if they're going to stop an Egyptian zombie apocalypse . . . then deliver pizza.
Bondini is a story of the protagonist Minu and her journey of life and her pursuit in attempting to balance love and life.

The beautiful, beastly Beverly returns and faces a new gaggle of gargantuan gals, hell bent on achieving deluxe diva domination. Get ready for the cinematic smackdown thrills of Giantess Battle Attack. Size really does matter.
An American playboy of the late 1950's disappears while on holiday in Malaysia, triggering the largest manhunt in the history of Southeast Asia.
The dandy grandson of a French thief is cajoled by his father's former partner and a femme fatale into challenging the syndicate that ruined his family's criminal empire.
Six thieves wish to change their lives by stealing oil hidden in a tunnel dozens of meters underground in Korea.
Jonas Cord is a disagreeable young tycoon who's building planes, directing films, and catting around on the corporate make in 1930s Hollywood.
As a math savant uncooks the books for a new client, the Treasury Department closes in on his activities, and the body count starts to rise.
Harriet M. Welsch is a spy. But when her friends find her secret notebook, the tables are turned on her. Can she win them back and still keep on going with the spy business?
Two hitmen and a getaway driver find themselves in the middle of a confrontation between a drug lord, an arms dealer and a con man, all surrounding the mysterious contents of a messenger bag.
Class of Fun is the hilariously funny family film chronicling the misadventures of a young intern teacher at an elementary school.
An older married guy who runs a bookstore has an affair with another married woman.
A womanizer's lover' s dead body is found in the Seine.
After the time of the Mane 6, Sunny--a young Earth Pony--and her new Unicorn friend Izzy explore their world and strive to restore Harmony to Equestria.
Four women escape from a prison and wind up stranded in a swamp with a lecherous redneck after them. Meanwhile, an federal agent tracks a ring of heroin smugglers through the same swamp.
Three teenagers go visit a friend at his old farmhouse for the weekend. What they didn't expect was to be stuck in the middle of a centenary war between good and evil.
A street kid grows up to be a tough mob boss, only to find his childhood love in a brothel.
An orphan boy befriends his town's gas station owner, and the duo, who share a love of superheroes, create fantasy worlds where they fight evil.

Four years after an alternate ending to the series, the Undead have been re-released and Glaive reveals himself to be the Albino Joker. The four Riders are again united, intent on saving Amane and stopping the Albino Joker.

John Carradine narrates five horror tales with macabre twists. A couple fixes a strange old clock. The Scotland Yard is after a serial killer. A murdered scientist seeks revenge. The last two stories focus on Frankenstein and Dracula.
An intrepid radio reporter sets out to track down and expose Nazi agents.
A family attends a live taping of The Banana Splits television series, but are forced to survive as soon as the characters go haywire and start a killing spree around the studio.
A young peasant boy named Jack climbs a giant beanstalk and stumbles upon a city in the clouds ruled by an evil queen.
A soldier made into a dog handler falls in love with the mother of the dog's owner and both achieve fame in the Pacific.
Can the girl next door get you the girl of your dreams?
Plot is not available at this time.
A collection of tales based upon eight of director Akira Kurosawa's recurring dreams.
In 19th century France, a peasant winemaker endeavors to create the perfect vintage.

Best friends Sophie and Agatha find themselves on opposing sides of an epic battle when they're swept away into an enchanted school where aspiring heroes and villains are trained to protect the balance between Good and Evil.
Three young women vacationing in Paris find themselves whisked away to Monte Carlo after one of the girls is mistaken for a British heiress.
Kerem goes to a village to start a new life for his family. It will not be easy for Kerem's wife Neriman to get used to her new life.
Third grader Judy Moody sets out to have the most thrilling summer of her life.

When Anju falls obsessively in love with Hashim, little does she know that he is actually a Jin. 'Huway Hum Jin Kay Liye Barbaad' is a supernatural romantic comedy about an unexpected otherworldly love affair.
A new corporate trainee takes a road trip to recover energy fragments to support the construction of an Earth-like planet.
A Criminal is determined to take revenge on the cop who got him convicted.
Idiosyncratic new recruit Francis "Ike" Farrell tries to help the Cubs to the pennant with his pitching and hitting.
Arnab tries to help Ruksahana, who is found under mysterious circumstances in a house. He lets her stay at his home until he discovers something strange about her.
A promiscuous gay party animal falls for a young Mormon missionary, leading to crisis, cliché, and catastrophe.
Chronicles the romantic enchantment of a 90 year old reporter with a girl 70 years younger than himself.
A vengeful gangster targets and terrorizes an entire police unit and their families.
The film is based on the ancient legend of the shark's tears.

In his hometown in England, a young boy happens upon a magical prophecy. A discovery that leads him on a predestined journey to an extraordinary world where he realized he's the only one who can defend it against a terrible evil.
An illustration of gradual destruction of an urban monster.
Animated feature based on the popular 'Ghostbusters' franchise.

A hitman specialized in executing cheating spouses contemplates redemption after falling for a single mother. When the killer blows off a very important hit, his partner in crime sets out to finish the job.

A young girl takes a hard task. She must try to save her brothers and get rid of the curse placed on them by their mother. It is a story of courage, perseverance, but also of the power of words, truth and true love.
The bird attack continues, this time in San Francisco, California.
Vijay, a Tamil professor, is in love with Uma, a lawyer. Along with Ravi, he fights to put an end to prostitution and the production of illicit liquor in their locality.
Former delta operator after 20 years of service joins a local police force but due to COVID and cutbacks finds himself out of work, dealing with alcoholism and past traumas.

Before the New Year, everyone wants a little love. Successful businessman Igor is looking for thrills, and his girlfriend is a stunning top model who wants their relationship to finally reach a new level.
MAYA is a mystical thriller, telling the story of the presumed relationship between Icaro and Adriana, since the moment they met until the day when she disappears and cease existing.
While hearing the story of "Gulliver's Travels", a young Russian boy dreams that he is the title character on the island of Lilliput.
A former safecracker is lured back for one last job by an old flame and business partner. This is filmed in the style of a 1940s 'film-noir.'

Hassan who decided to return and settle in Kampung Putra because there were several issues and matters that had to be resolved, one of which was the mortgaged land belonging to his late father, Mustafa on Seman Rich Man before that.
A professor invents a radium tube that makes internal combustion engines stop running. He and his invention are captured by a gang of robbers. A federal agent is sent to rescue him.
Former political inmates Sergei and Nikolai live as exiles in a remote Siberian village. After the general Soviet gulag amnesty of 1953 8 pardoned common criminals terrorize the inhabitants.
New adventures of Captain Vrungel, his mate Lom and ship-boy Vasiliy Lopotukhin.
Five youths quit their low paying work to become thieves, and inspired by film noir study boxing and judo to set up a school for future gangsters.
A hit man is sprung from jail to kill a socialite, but strikes up a romance with a pretty parole officer instead.
A little boy embarks on an unexpected journey by God's hands
Tarzan and Jane Porter face a mercenary army dispatched by the evil CEO of Greystoke Energies, a man who took over the company from Tarzan's parents, after they died in a helicopter crash.

Buenos Aires, 1932. After a series of warning attacks from an enemy, a mafia boss decides to fake his own death and then strike back. Things don't go according to his plan.
A semi-modern-day adaptation of Goethe's 1774 classic novel The Sorrows Of Young Werther about a young man, his beloved, and the man she is engaged to.

Dress designer hired by ex-girlfriend to design her dress for her upcoming wedding to another guy.
A deeply-in-debt retired couple tries to win a rock dance competition. A minister is suspected of tax fraud. A teenager makes the acquaintance of a pervert.

Mrs Oh finds herself driven to having an affair because of her husband's neglect. When her husband's business fails, he commits suicide. Despite being free to love again, the strict rules of society prevent her from meeting another man
A cosmopolitan East Coast geologist (Anne Archer) drills for oil and finds love with a Texas wildcatter (Terry Jastrow).
A select group of people are offered invitations to a newly discovered world.
A meditation on the journey of a soul told through a series of nine vignettes
AN ELF FALLS IN LOVE WITH A COMELY LASS WHOSE HUGH INHERITANCE FROM HER DEAD PARENTS IS APPROPRIATED BY HER AUNT.
Isabella Montoya is a Green Agent, an assassin employed by the government to eliminate CO2 emissions by eliminating the population, one sacrificial lamb at a time.
The last surviving child of the Russian Royal Family joins two con men to reunite with her grandmother, the Dowager Empress, while the undead Rasputin seeks her death.
This is a rebellious love story about high school students
A simple trip to inspect an inheritance leads Marco to a plane crash, being trapped in a mine, and the love of his life.
A young Princess and her bodyguards must escape the palace which is under attack from an Overlord and his militants. Thus insures a journey of martial arts mayhem.
A teenage girl living with her grandmother in New Mexico discovers she has the ability to navigate between the world of the living and the dead.

Gamera the Flying Turtle falls under the spell of evil aliens, but two children free him and he returns to fight the aliens' monster, Viras.

The son of a farmer is bathed in his blood in front of an isolated mountain hut. There is no record of the attacker. Two investigators disappear without a trace. Years later, policeman Brenner sets out to find his colleagues.
Brilliant but disgraced detective John Luther breaks out of prison to hunt down a sadistic serial killer who is terrorising London.
A mute puppeteer uses a deceased scientist's invention to control dead bodies like puppets.

Jolly Rogers is a trotting race horse who only wants to gallop.

Priya who hails from a middle class family has an inexplicable hatred towards those belonging to rich families. Siddarth who falls in love with Priya, belongs to an affluent family. Will Priya accept him, forms the rest of the story.

When an old-school bar owner and his unruly daughter get caught up in a cat-and-mouse game of corporate espionage, it will take brains, brawn and help from the lesser of two evils to make it out alive.

Life inside the drug world which thrives off "corruption, deception and inequities of all kinds. What if Jamaican born, Drug Enforcement Agent is forced to return home to save his country from the tyranny of the Dragon Drug Cartel?

In 24 BC the Romans conquered Egypt. However, at the border of Egypt they discovered a far greater threat: the army of the Empire of Kush (aka Nubian Empire). This army was led by the Nubian Queen Amanirenas.

The oldest pyramid in the world is found in Indonesia. A journalist must team up with an archaeologist and a shaman to uncover the mystery of the pyramid. They found out that this ancient pyramid is a prison for a malevolent ancient demon.
Several ordinary high school students go through their daily routine as two others prepare for something more malevolent.

The Hollywood elite mix with politics and organized crime in 1950s Los Angeles during the Red Scare as socialite Clark Tisdale works off his debt to a vengeful mobster.
A lonely and hopeless man get a bodyguard job for protecting a young child. Soon he discover a dark truth and realized he is not so hard-hearted man he thought he is .
An ordinary taxi ride takes Jun to the amazing world of Ben an unusual indigenous farming practice filled with mystery and magic.

An epic tale filmed during the Second World War. Russian heroes Nikita Kozhemyaka and Bulat Balagur save the Russian land from the enemy hordes of Kashchei the Immortal and free the beautiful Marya Morevna.
The lonely proprietor of a small hotel in a provincial Turkish town develops a passion for a departed guest and the reality of routine everyday-life starts crumbling into pieces.

the relationship between a nomadic Gypsy community and the local population.
When Hiccup discovers Toothless isn't the only Night Fury, he must seek "The Hidden World", a secret Dragon Utopia before a hired tyrant named Grimmel finds it first.

When an unhappy, overweight, older man is almost at his wit's end, a strange Voodoo witch comes into his life with a spell that unexpectedly changes his life forever.
A man avenges the murder of his mother and brother by killing the murderer's three sons.
Two petty thieves face-off against gangsters, bandits and police after forging a treasure map.
A major newspaper publisher dies in suspicious circumstances during a parlour game at a dinner party. The publishers secretary is the obvious suspect, but the Inspector isn't so sure ...
Two strangers, fleeing failed relationships in other cities, meet on the streets of New York. As they connect over a single evening, their outlook on life and love is tested.
In a time of war and disease, a young officer gallantly tries to help a young woman find her husband.

An astral traveling painter falls for a girl who also travels. Only to find out that she is more than he bargained for.
The true story of Homer Hickam, a coal miner's son who was inspired by the first Sputnik launch to take up rocketry against his father's wishes.
Jørgen is a gambler - always short of money. He marries a rich man's daughter and gambles in the inn, while she waits for him in the honeymoon cabin. Love?
A group of kids realizing there is strength in numbers, band together to take on the neighborhood bullies.

Countryside thieves are won over by a young orphan girl.

After getting attacked by a gang of criminals, Shivan, a taxi driver, moves to an unfamiliar place. There, he meets new people who show him the true meaning of life.

A self-centered action star making a Die Hard type of movie about terrorists taking over a political convention in Madison Square Garden is forced to become a real hero after actual terrorists take over the building during the film shoot.
Family film with the cartoon characters of Monica's Gang (Turma da Mônica). Chuck Billy (Chico Bento) starts a radio station with some innovative programs, and the competition gets angry.

A robbery-gone-wrong pits an aging artist and her girlfriend against a determined duo of thieves in a close-quarters home-invasion thriller.

Inside a Chinese prison two inmates form a friendship and face the difficulty of life on the inside.

With this film, the director tries to move away from the clichéd storyline and entertain the audience with a fresh idea. The film aims to be a thriller but at the same time, it tries to establish, an emotional connects with the viewer.

June Martin is a dishwasher in a California logging camp boarding house. Steve Blake fights Jed Malone for her and loses, thus casting suspicion on himself when Malone dies under cloudy circumstances.
A triad family fractures when the patriarch promotes a younger family member against his council's wishes. The advisers murder the patriarch, and the fractured family tries to survive the bloodshed.
The Seedlings rise to the surface to save the world from the planets destruction.

Jerry Martin quits his dull job as a bank clerk and falls in with a band of hobos. He takes on the guise of Bachelor, the "king of the market, " and finds himself pursued by dangerous men who are after the real Bachelor.

A conman Roy, gets dumped by his girl-friend. Then he finds out he has a fatal disease. On the verge of death, he resolves to do some good, by helping his apprentice Dittu hoodwink the mobster who hurt his (Dittu's) family.

The classic story about the jealous and evil queen who tries to kill the beautiful maiden by giving her a poisoned apple. Snow White falls into a deep sleep and can only be awakened by a kiss from a prince.
As a pianist is mysteriously killed his replacement is thrown into the world of ballet. One full of mystery, intrigue and the air of immortality.

Seven year old Albert/Alfie has an imaginary best friend, and thinks he is old enough to get a dog. Dad doesn't agree. Will getting to know a magician help convince dad?
A comedy about the creation of the universe in six days, with the devil messing around and contributing in his own way.
When a school in upstate New York is snowed in, a group of students hi-jack a plow to keep the school closed.

A successful Hollywood actress returns to her small town roots to perform a play by her dying mentor when she reconnects with her former lover, forcing her to come to terms with a dark secret she's been harboring.

A man and woman meet and try to have a romantic affair, despite their personal problems and the interference of their disapproving friends.
A charming mischievous creature shows up at a family-owned bed & breakfast, and turns the funny family's life upside down.

While on location in a spooky Romanian villa with his Hollywood big-shot mom and her dorky boyfriend, twelve-year-old Kevin befriends a Renaissance-era girl ghost who helps him cause unrest on the set.

Well-known monsters such as Frankenstein, Dracula and Mr. Hyde join forces to fight against a bigger threat.

A veterinarian is mistaken for a deadly international assassin during his layover in Hong Kong. With the help of a mysterious agent, he must take out a series of heavy weights to clear his name. Or die trying.

Sahar and Kian are in love and want to get marry but Sahar's parents are disagreeing with that so they decide to run away together to the north of Iran. But in the way in the bus they face new troubles.

The 3rd film of the series this time White Forehead is trapped by the Octopussy and Monkey who is the hero will go to save her.

1975, Rosenkreuz Manor. A nurse and her eccentric patient are bound together by a shared longing: the old lady's memory contains the secret to Sigrun's past; the young woman's life force holds the key to the future for the Baroness.
Everything in this world is decided by your percentage of marks. One can only get marks from forming relationships with others. The more Blue, the better, while the more Red- then you're like Aaron.
A little girl's imaginary friends come to life when she goes through her great-grandmother's antique mirror, a la Alice, after she sees it glowing.
A student learns a magic trick.

A pretty but virtuous small-town bank clerk is the victim of a vicious rumor from an unsuccessful suitor that she spent the night with a notorious womanizer.

Biographical movie about the early 20th century Broadway stars Nora Bayes and Jack Norworth.

Film version of the TV series You Can't See Round Corners (1967). Small time bookie, Frankie McCoy is conscripted into the army during the Vietnam War, and is frustrated because his girlfriend will not have sex with him.

Spawn - having become plagued by nightmares - discovers that his former Special Forces partner, Chapel, was the one who murdered him. Their paths inevitably cross when Chapel attempts to steal military weapons for Jason Wynn.
For Peter Parker, (Mark Ricci) life is hard. Balancing school, work, friendships, and of course, Spider-Man, is no easy feat. But it won't get any easier as a new villain emerges - The Kingpin.
14-year-old Midori is the constantly abused chore girl for a freak show. Things begin to change for her after a dwarf magician joins the freak show, but not always for the better.

Getting to first base is easy. Getting home takes a hero's journey. A coming-of-middle-age story of a baseball legend who must overcome his past while rounding the bases during an historically unique World Series home run challenge.
Into the world of the Emperor Penguins, who find their soul mates through song, a penguin is born who cannot sing. But he can tap dance something fierce!

A conventional music teacher lives for his singing group who are outcasts at their sport-mad school. Circumstances force the group to stand up for what they believe in, because when they sing, they find meaning in life.
Shriranga Deshmukh is frustrated with the women in his life. At a fair, he gets a gift from the higher powers, and from there on life changes as he can hear what women want.
When a young married couple find themselves in financial trouble as they expect their first child, devoted husband Chris risks everything in his desperate attempt to ensure his family's security.
Kunjunni has a speciality. He has the body of one person and the voice of another person.
In England, an American expat is hired by a woman to kill her ex-husband but things are not what they seem to be at first glance.
Starting with a violent prison break, clever, ruthless Ralph Cotter corrupts everyone around him.
Exposes the Commanders of an ISIS camp , who Indoctrinate the youth for acts of violence.
Five warriors challenge Ogami to duels. Each holds a part of information needed to complete the assassination of a mad clan leader.
Exploring the origin of the Mishima Zimbatsu and the rise of the tournment known as Iron Fist Tournment / Tekken.
When young Norman Huntley, a pathological liar conjures up the mysterious Miss Hargreaves he gets more than he bargains for. A wonderful and magical re-imagining of the classic Frank Baker novel.
A blacksmith and his wife, cultivate and live on a plot of land far from the village. The villagers have not a favorable opinion of them and when the blacksmith's wife is in labour no one help him.
A cab driver finds himself held hostage by a hitman who forces him to drive through the roads of Dubai and help him kill his targets.

A polish retelling of the 1985 film Return to Oz. A brave little girl along side her sidekick chicken, a robot and a soldier go on a adventure in a stop-motion fantasy land to overthrow the evil Troll king and bring peace to the land.
A former police detective, still recovering from his alcohol addiction, is seemingly drawn into L.A's criminal underworld after stumbling upon a local drug ring.
Will 13 y.o. Danny and Julie become more than friends? Danny gets a rival but gets help from Hubbie the ghost.

When a young wife discovers her husband of two years is involved with his beautiful secretary, she applies for a job as secretary to a business rival.

A beautiful redhead becomes involved with a smalltime gang of hoodlums who plan and perform a daring diamond robbery.

Unforeseen circumstances threaten the passionate relationship between star-crossed lovers.

Joseph and Mary, now pregnant, travel to Bethlehem for the Roman census, they face a threat from King Herod.

Phillip and Blanca decide to go to a family house in southern Chile, hoping to save their relationship after suffering a pregnancy loss. However, both are unaware that in that place there is a dark family secret linked to black magic.
A meeting between two traveling gamblers leads to a case of mistaken identity that has deadly consequences.
A protector of fine art is sent on a mission to save the most valuable piece of art known in the world.
An ex-con is the prime suspect when a series of murders occur under the full moon, every victim a young blonde woman.
A gay Chinese-American and her traditionalist mother are reluctant to go public with secret loves that clash against cultural expectations.
The nice town Kellyville is too small to accommodate the world's worst scoundrels, Albert and Egon, who decides to go out in the world.

A millionaire sets out to prove his theory that his pet chimpanzee is as intelligent as the teenagers who hang out on the local beach, where he is intending to build a retirement home.

A group of people gathers back in the post-war ruins of a luxurious Munich hotel they inhabited at one point or another years before; each trying to cope with the tragic consequences of the war and their own actions.

Australia, 1978. The Commonwealth Police return with a new investigation which will bring the mighty Calabrian Mafia to its knees as old friends become new enemies in the dramatic and thrilling conclusion to the Australian Enemy trilogy.
The honest laborer falls into disfavour and is undermined by his factory's son because they both love the daughter of the factory owner without suspecting the secret that unites them.
A single mom named Gabbie hires a tour guide, a psychic, a priest, and a historian to help exorcise their newly bought mansion; after discovering it is inhabited by ghosts.

Khalid and Kehailan are two team leaders who are passionate about car racing and challenges. They enter into a crazy competition to win the challenge involving a lot of surprises, which unexpectedly change both their lives.
The only full-length Finnish ballet film, a fable about a goblin and a fairy that become fast friends.
A semi-autobiographical story about Hubert as a young homosexual at odds with his mother.

A young boy meets a mermaid in the river by his home. He tries to convince his parents and other adults about his discovery, but nobody believes him.

A couple head to a cabin in Joshua Tree for 4 days to quit smoking. As their nicotine withdrawal kicks in, they find themselves at odds with who they are and who they want to become.

A roguish poet is given the run of the scheming Wazir's harem while pretending to help him usurp the young caliph.
An old fisherman tells stories about Pomors. A collection of fairy tales about the Russian North, full of folk humor and wisdom.

A man returns from Paris to find his home of Chihuahua Mexico occupied by Francisco Villa's revolutionary troops.
In a coven of Parasitics, a secret is revealed and its truth is far more dangerous than they ever imagined.

A young woman is taken hostage by a police officer gone mad.
Daffy Duck opens a detective agency for the supernatural along side his Looney Toon buddies.

Banani is the daughter of a rich man, brought up by gypsies after he abandoned her due to the grief of losing his wife. She and Bijon, the son of a landlord, fall in love when the gypsies come to his father's estate.
A family struggling to get by during the Depression expects another presentless Christmas until the father brings home a dollar for them to spend on presents.
P.I. Roper is asked to investigate his ex-girlfriend's disappearance and possible murder to find her life more complicated than he could ever imagine.

Jane and Tom set out on an adventure in which they must keep the corrupt Grimblatt from locating the K-13 fuel for his evil space mirror.
Two disreputable friends get tied in with a group of criminals who turn out to be excessively violent and deceptive.
