Two men named Charlie Hinton and Phil Ryerson get laid off and have to become stay-at-home fathers when they can't find jobs. This inspires them to open their own day care center.
A young newspaper writer returns to her hometown in the English countryside, where her childhood home is being prepped for sale.
Pooda Johnson is celebrating his last weekend on house arrest with a kickback (party) that could jeopardize the very freedom he's celebrating.
An innocent lamb learns about life and death when he seeks revenge upon the wolf who slaughtered his mother.
Dorothy and her band of vagrants have been on the run from a pair of vampire hunters for decades.
It opens with a murder. Abelardo Sachs is the owner and editor of a famous political magazine He's gunned down in his luxurious home by a masked killer.
Po and his friends fight to stop a peacock villain from conquering China with a deadly new weapon, but first the Dragon Warrior must come to terms with his past.

A postal clerk is robbed and threatened to his life, giving up the money. In his community he is seen upon as a coward, ruining his family. After moving he meets a man who seems to knows it, wanting to help him regain his life and honor.
Celebrate the Christmas holiday with Lil' Santa and his adorable baby reindeer Mittens as they gather around the fire to tell a favorite Christmas classic, A Little Book For Christmas Part 2.
The story is about a visually challenged guy, Vimal, struggling with life and his amazing journey of fulfilling an unusual dream of becoming IAS officer despite his low self confidence.
Gods and monsters in modern day Los Angeles.
Public Security Bureau investigator Dong Fangjian is recalled from his honeymoon to track down a spy who has information on secret tests of a prototype submarine.
The notorious criminal Barra is approached by Agent Frank for a profitable collaboration. The brand new designs of a revolutionary internal combustion engine is the target.

Frazier is out to stop Nugget's freight line. He has Starky impersonate the notorious outlaw Fargo Jack. But Rocky quickly realizes that the new Sheriff Tom was the real Fargo Jack and he sets out to trap the gang.
Wealthy Bob Harrison buys all the seats in the theatre to watch Mona Leslie's musical by himself. He loves her, her agent Ned Riley loves her. Conflict ensues.
Two Baltimore drug gangs are fighting for position. There runners want a piece for themselves so they begin to make moves to take over the crack game in Baltimore city's ruff streets.
Follow the adventures of Winnie the Pooh and his friends

A demobilized centurion returns home to Pompeii to find his father murdered by a gang of black-hooded Christian robbers that terrorizes the city and he decides to investigate the matter while the nearby volcano threatens to erupt.
An explosive drama set against the world of street racing.
When Alvin's ceiling begins oozing sticky brown sludge, he finds a peculiar escape from his sheltered existence.
An unassuming track coach accidentally invokes the spirit of a notorious pirate long believed dead, and who must now team up to lay the pirate to rest, and save a local hotel from a mobster.
Nature (The Ancient Dryad Spirit) has become angry and vengeful because of mankind's blatant abuses that have destroyed the balance that protects all living creatures.

A Kung Fu master finds out that an opium den is destroying the lives of the town he lives in, and vows to put an end to the den, but first he must try to defeat the strongest enemy he has ever faced: his addiction to the drug itself.

In 1963, military industrialist Arthur Blackmark and a Soviet commander must race against the clock to stop an international nuclear incident which threatens to fire up the Cold War and end the world.
Flash Gordon, Dale Arden and Dr. Alexis Zarkov visit the planet Mongo to thwart the evil schemes of Emperor Ming the Merciless, who has set his planet on a collision course with Earth.

Albalad, Saudi Arabia. The year is 1919. The day is one of birth and death. Saleh Al Dahaleezi is a son, a husband and a dead man. He returns from the spirit world to his family home to investigate his murder and confront his killer.
Plot Unknown - Sequel to the 1993 Anime film, Ninja Scroll.
Several ghosts in an ancient palazzo in Rome join together to save their home from destruction. Mastrianni plays several parts and is hilarious. The other actors are great too.
Agnès Le Roux, a young independent woman, returns to Nice in 1976 to have a new start in her life after a failed marriage. All while falling in love with an older lawyer.
A girl made of fire steals a shard of a legendary crystal in hopes of reigniting the dying sun.

In 1871, Horatio Spafford loses all of his possessions in the Great Chicago Fire. Upon rebuilding, his four daughters are lost at sea. Devastated but unwavering in his faith, he writes a song that would become cherished by millions.
A gardener in East L.A. struggles to keep his son away from gangs and immigration agents while trying to give his son the opportunities he never had.
The only daughter of the Chinese emperor Han Xuandi, escapes from a strict prince and seeks help from the Gauls and the two brave warriors Asterix and Obelix.
In the tradition of Arsenic and Old Lace, comes this morbidly funny Australian tale of murder and mayhem at the hands of two charming old ladies.
Follows three grifters dealing with a meaningless existence.
A gang of poverty-ridden juvenile delinquents progress from petty theft to hard crime, but a kindly judge manages to set most of them on the right path after they are finally apprehended.
An American Special Force assassin in his retirement finds himself in the middle of a dispute between two drug lords after his brother is assassinated.
A car thief and a punk rocker fall in love as they become embroiled in deaths attributed to an aphrodisiac.
A young humanoid alien who gets stranded on earth hooks up with a grizzled old sheriff in a western town and tries to help him solve a tough case, but the sheriff doesn't want any help from a "kid."
Darna and her brother Ding battle a woman who has the wings of a hawk.
Oz and Glinda have their first born child named Olivia. They don't tell Olivia that an evil spell has been cast on her by someone she never knew.
Biopic of Mafia boss Lucky Luciano, covering his life from 1946 to 1962 with occasional flashbacks.

After surviving and arriving home from a missions trip, Jacob (Geren Davis) decides to return to South Africa after discovering clues to his father's death. He reunites with his younger brother Joshua (Calvin Loron) in the process.
In the post-apocalyptic Australian wasteland, a cynical drifter agrees to help a small, gasoline-rich community escape a horde of bandits.
The life at the Military Academy of Agulhas Negras, with a cadet living remarkable moments during school times.

Guilherme and Sofia, brother and sister, grow up sharing experiences and slowly discovering their sexuality. The thing that Sofia doesn't know is how far Guilherme will go to keep her inside his own perverse, dark and perfect circle.
Just before a wedding, the bridegroom hears a complex tale painting his lovely bride as devilish and unbalanced.

Sarah is a teen girl who is looking forward to her 18th birthday to move away from her controlling father Don. But before she could even blow out the candles, Don imprisons her in the basement of their home.

Two hit men wait for their next target in an empty apartment. The hours go by. Little by little, they start losing their patience and their temper. Pretty soon, they may even lose their lives. Killing time can be a deadly affair.
En algún lugar del interior de la Argentina, la creencia popular sostiene que cuando un hombre muere a traición, éste debe ser vengado por su primogénito, para que esa alma descanse en paz.
When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.
Two cops tries to capture a jail-broken felon, a psychopath who seeks revenge on his adversaries, while one of the cops falls for the felon's daughter.
Matvey, the fastest courier on the frozen canals of 19th century St. Peteresburg is recruited by a group of pickpockets working the winter markets.

Kevin est un homme d'affaires à l'apparence tranquille. Mais cet homme dissimule un lourd passé que tout le monde ignore, jusqu'à lui-même. Quand des rêves violents apparaissent, il cherche...                See full synopsis »
Solidarity activists prepare a bravura heist, taking out 80 mln from a union bank account just before it is blocked by communist authorities.
Freemont Gordon (Corbin Bernsen, "LA Law") takes a road trip to escape the social pressures of his celebrity family, and begins anonymously building treehouses for people he meets on his journey.
A teenage boy finds status and belonging in the rarely seen world of Canada's cutthroat drug gangs, but he soon discovers that trying to get out may cost him his life. Based on true events.
The life and career of Panccho Villa from young man to revolutionary leader is chronicled.
A young wizard must create new spells in his magic book before the planets align. His uncle and aunt, powerful mages themselves, help him achieve that. Based on the award-winning Brazilian TV series.
The superintendent of a women's prison is pressured to pardon a member of a criminal gang. When she refuses, her daughter is framed on a manslaughter charge and sent to prison.
FILIAL LOVE TAKES CENTRE STAGE IN THIS FILM MADE FOR THE WHOLE FAMILY.

A new family is having difficulty adjusting, when an adorable dog comes into their life. Once his special powers are discovered, the local dog catcher and the (F.B.D.I) Federal Bureau of Dog Investigation will stop at nothing to get him.
A popular high school football player becomes a werewolf after a trip to Romania, and struggles to come to terms with his new reality.
Oskar, an overlooked and bullied boy, finds love and revenge through Eli, a beautiful but peculiar girl.
Two kids and a trusty dog, Ranger, set out on the adventure of a lifetime in search of a forgotten gold mine.
Tom (Speedman) and Dan's (Marsden) one-night stand turns into an intense power-play between captor and captive.
A smart high school student falls in love with her new handsome English teacher after she begins to receive one-on-one tutoring from him.
A journalist pursuing the identity of a notorious terrorist finds his deeper agenda threatened when a rookie analyst with the CIA begins peeling back the layers of his own hidden identity.
A cop who becomes a hitman for a group aimed at eliminating those who are above the law finds his world turned upside down by a single a devastating blow.

When an ignored little boy bonds with Bigfoot and discovers the human-like ape is in danger, he has to find the courage to stand up to those bigger than him to save the legendary creature and set him free.
Santa and his brother Dingle as a couple of Pirates? That's where the fun begins in this madcap adventure where Santa must go to Fiji to retrieve the Elves (kidnapped by Dingle) and save Christmas.
A C.I.A. agent is assigned to go to Beijing to look for a hidden "treasure," which turns out to be a woman who has supernatural powers, and is the National Treasure of China.
The complex story of how a respected and charismatic Deputy Sheriff became the first and only person to be imprisoned purely on the basis of repressed memories.
A DEA raid into a drug tunnel on the Mexican border turns into an odyssey of horror for the agents involved.

The owner of a circus decides to swap his trained bears for trained pigs, and fires clown Cibulka. The clown gets a job at a local school, bears escape and seek him out and a school inspector comes into town.

Taani is the daughter of a Cycle Rickshaw Puller who works hard to give her daughter education mean while Taani also realizes hardships faced by her family and starts working as a maid and fulfill her dreams.
A former hitman, turned American citizen, wages a one-man war against several U.S.-based cartels, while avoiding ICE and federal authorities.
Two college students kill their roommate and make it look like a suicide.

Rather unusual and unexpected wedding anniversary gifts, such as a pair of women's panties with the name "Teresa" on them get a husband in hot water with his wife, and need some explaining during this 93 minute Musical-Comedy.

An RAF squadron is brought down over occupied France. The flyers reach Paris in spite of the fact that the youngest is injured; his wounds need treating and he must stay hidden. The Gestapo has already issued orders for their arrest.
A teenage hoodlum sees no other way to live as he struggles with being a young father, a faithful boyfriend and a loyal 'homie dedicated to his gang in South Sacramento, California.

A former criminal turned limo driver loses his job for beating up a rapist client. Left with few options to support his pregnant fiancée, he contacts his estranged shady brother and gets mixed up in a deadly drug deal.
When Lorne Michaels made his legendary offer of $3,000 for an on-air Beatles reunion in 1976, he never imagined they might actually show up at the studio to accept.
Beyond Control is a psychological drama that follows a day in the life of Lucy, a girl whose wild imagination tugs her between a childhood fairy tale fantasy and her worst nightmares.
A paroled inmate accidentally becomes an amnesiac, aimlessly wanders around and is later used as a patsy by an adulterous wife and her lover after they kill her rich husband.
Set in 1922 South Carolina, The Blood Brother Chronicles centers around two half brother vigilante killers that soon discover they both have supernatural powers.
The relationsip between Jorge and Laura as a married couple works perfectly well till she finds him with another woman. Then Laura leaves the flat they share and goes to live with a girlfriend.
A young Thai boxer learns the skills and inner meaning of martial arts.
A Broadway star unintentionally kills her impresario but keeps mum about it after the police investigator targets a rival actress.
Rafa's hooked on the pure, fiery feelings he gets from speed racing, but when his kid's mom gets mixed up with drug dealers, he burns rubber to save her.
In Mesopotamia, a lost cavalry patrol is gradually killed off by Arabs.
A retired ex-criminal, the notorious Mister X, must clear his name when an up-and-comer commits a heinous copycat crime.
A hot-headed inspector takes on a small but powerful Vietnamese-Chinese gang, after a series of crimes and murder attempts committed and putting an undercover cop and his girlfriend in great danger.
During World War I in 1918, a pigeon and his friends spring into action.

Johan wakes up lost, with no memories, unable to speak and haunted by visions that he cannot understand. His father, communicating through an old radio, tells him that he is being kept prisoner by evil demons living in their town.

A recent widow must find someone to take care of her children as the indelible HORTON BLISS appears on a motorcycle with sidecar and takes them on a magical journey to overcome grief and learn to be a family again.

O'Hara is a mercenary leading a squad of soldiers on their mission to rescue hostages in a remote part of Africa. Unfortunately, the mission goes awry and the team is stranded and forced to survive against the local rebels.

A survivor of a pit bull attack, Donna Lawrence, adopts a pit bull-mix puppy, Susie, that has been beaten, set on fire, and left for dead. Together, they lead a historic effort to seek justice and protection for all animals.

Dogtanian is a young swordsman who dreams of joining the legendary Muskehounds. After proving his skills and earning their trust, he and the Muskehounds must defend the King from the evil Cardinal Richelieu's secret plot to seize power.
An escaped convict plays the occupants of a remote home against one another for his own sadistic pleasure while searching for the loot he buried there following a previous robbery.
The moving story of 4 young men struggling against overwhelming odds to remain honest. Crooked employer shorts their earnings; they turn to crime, their first theft ending in tragedy.
Set during a vicious storm, two criminal brothers on the run seek refuge in a desolate farmhouse. Taking the resident family captive, they find the house holds dark secrets of its own.
The Addams get tangled up in more wacky adventures and find themselves involved in hilarious run-ins with all sorts of unsuspecting characters. Sequel to the 2019 animated film, 'The Addams Family'.
Jake Singer is at loose ends in New York City, and neck deep in psychoanalysis with the outrageous Dr. Morales, when he meets the enigmatic and beautiful widow Allegra Marshall.
Alain Delon and Claude Jade stars in this Soviet movie: Documents reveal in 1980 that the Germans planned to kill the Big Three in Teheran in 1943.
Jeremy and his family go on a coast to coast road trip from Boston to San Francisco. But during the trip they notice unusual activity at a town in Western Massachusetts.

Tony (Claudine Barretto) is woman desperate to find love. She meets Lawrence (Rico Yan), a photographer, who offers her to help find the man of her dreams. Together, they will discover the real meaning of "True Love".

A play within a play within a play within a play. Actors perform a play in a house; an audience member invites them to work in his own home improvising a play around his own life. The line between fiction and reality blurs.
The secret is out, and the Atractor's sanctuary has been revealed to the enemy. With Quon badly hurt, it's up to the rest to defend their homes, their lives, and their freedom.
This prequel to Bubba Ho-Tep finds Elvis shooting a film in Louisiana when he runs afoul of a coven of she-vampires.
A young Shirou Emiya and his adoptive father Kiritsugu travel to Fuyuki in order to investigate the Sakatsuki family, who are rumored to be harboring a child with powerful magic abilities.
After wondering what her life would be without children, workaholic Sharon is unexpectedly granted her wish while on Christmas vacation.
PCS is an action thriller about a man who discovers the truth about a series of mysterious events.
A comedy centered around a group of people who meet -- and whose personalities collide -- over the course of a couple's wedding.

Taking its cue from classic survival-thrillers such as 'Duel' and 'Deliverance', 'Survival Instinct' is a fast-paced edge-of-your seat thriller with a strong female lead and a plausible, morally-ambiguous villain.
A teenage boy is cursed with periodically turning into a sheepdog.
Clumsy but deft Londre confronts a corrupt priest and a Mayor of the town to help youngsters in love.
Anandakuttan has to bring home his sister who had ran away with a Tamilian.
The story of 1970s musician and activist Helen Reddy.

At a Hong Kong shopping center, Buck Yuen's (Jackie Chan's) intuition warns him. He saves a robbery's loot and gets on television, ends up in Istanbul via South Korea, and accidentally becomes a spy. Fortunately, he knows Kung Fu.
Xiaogang is rude to his younger sister Xiaoduo until she performs an unselfish act.
A Navy veteran purchases a government surplus vessel and becomes involved in the capture of waterfront racketeers.
Pororo and his friends go on an adventure as they travel on the ship and they search for treasure.
The villainous master criminal Dr. Fu Manchu sets out to destroy the people he holds responsible for the death of his family.
A mysterious hypnotist reverts his beautiful assistant back into the form of a prehistoric sea monster that she was in a past life.

Two insurance investigators try to uncover the truth about the murder of their colleague and friend. Their findings lead them to some dark truths about the company they work for and the people they believed to be friends.
A gang of amateur dancers takes part in a dancing competition to avenge their personal vendetta.
A thief and her ex-boyfriend stage a fake wedding at New York City's Natural History Museum -- a perfect cover for a perfect heist.
A small band of desperate freedom fighters must topple a vicious dictator before he destroys mankind's last hope.
Mighty Man is branded as South Africa's equivalent of Super Man, fighting gangsters and drug lords.
The Go-Bots fight to rescue the Rock People.
A take on the classic story written by L. Frank Baum.

When Jacob (Asa Butterfield) discovers clues to a mystery that stretches across time, he finds Miss Peregrine's Home for Peculiar Children. But the danger deepens after he gets to know the residents and learns about their special powers.
A companion piece to another Ishii directed picture from 1970, also starring Watase, Yoshida and Sato called PRISONERS' BACK LIST.
A has-been actor takes a job playing the victims in a homicide reenactment, where he sparks with the civil officer investigating the real-life crime.
A young woman narrates the story of her friendship with Maruti - none other than Rambhakt Bhagwan Shri Hanumanji.
A routine military exercise turns into a nightmare in the Scotland wilderness.
The Muppets present their own touching rendition of Charles Dickens' classic tale.
A police officer tracks down a murderous criminal gang with the help of the ghost of his former partner, who was shot by the same group.
A group of illegal immigrants are brought to Stockholm in a bus by a smuggler who takes all their money and passports, and then runs away.
Vanishing Glory is a passionate tale of three sisters set during a period of American history when times were tumultuous and will be an epic of right vs. wrong and the human condition.
A young American girl in Paris falls in love with a handsome nobleman, but he is about to wed in an arranged marriage. She hatches a plan to overcome that obstacle and get her man.
A group of friends set out on a quest to find a magic stone to turn their mouse friend back into a prince.
Ananthakrishnan is a famous journalist whose daring news reports have opened the eyes of many. However, he struggles when he tries to unfold the mystery behind the death of a popular dancer.

Two men were going on a job at the house sitting and take care of the 7 children, who created chaos against them. Meanwhile, the landlady always give warnings to the children and men as she makes a task for it.
A heartwarming story of a little boy with an overactive imagination.

In an ancient castle there is a portrait of a White Lady - a Lady who reputedly still haunts the castle grounds. It is up to a blush of local boys to overcome their fears in order to shed light on this mystery.
A surveyor for the Canadian Pacific Railroad must fight fur trappers who oppose the building of the railroad by stirring up Indian rebellion.
A girl works for the yakuza as a whore.
A man who is being driven crazy by the noise in New York City decides to take vigilante action against it.
An ironically romantic tale of a man who strives to live for real seeing the taste of life in love.
Michele Ferretti is a small underworld boss in the Roman suburbs who must manage his uncle's empire as long as he is segregated under house arrest.
During WWII the valet to the British Ambassador to Ankara sells British secrets to the Germans while trying to romance a refugee Polish countess.
A man must defend his ranch from drug dealers and assassins.

When a smart 13-year-old girl from a blended family is about to be kidnapped during a cruise by two criminals, she has to to form a bond with her stubborn stepbrother with whom she has not been able to get along until then.
A detective poses as an opium fiend to save an addicted knight and his daughter from abduction by a jeweller.
Two rival detectives are forced to go undercover to investigate high-stakes illegal street racing.
An upper class teenager leaves his predetermined life to start a new one in a small town.

3 young adventurers take a road trip of a lifetime. Venturing from London to Lands' End along one of the longest historical routes in Britain, 300miles, they arrive on the cliffs of the West Country to sing their song of peace and freedom.

Richard Clark has just left the well-known Wellington Academy to teach at Marion Barry High School. Now, he will try to inspire the D-average students into making good grades and try to woo a fellow teacher.
Scotland Yard Chief Inspector Johnnoe is investigating a string of bank robberies but the robbers are determined to compromise Johnnoe and the investigation.
Retelling of a folk legend about a beautiful sorceress and her young apprentice. The older witch initiates the younger into a magical world while two winged men observe them.
A powerful witch's spell changes a lovely girl into a mule destined to die so that she will rise from its carcass before the world to rule as Pan's child bride.
A man's heroic attempt to help a woman in distress ends up with him waking up the next day without a kidney and plotting his revenge.
In 1882, a young Russian aristocrat goes on an epic adventure to find out what happened to her grandfather and save her family's reputation.
The story of 19th-century Dominican dictator, Ulises Heureaux, from the start of his presidency in 1882 until his assassination in 1899.
A not-too-bright cop searches for a serial bomber.
A maid at a seaside hotel nurses to health a man she found on the beach who has lost his memory.
Alice stumbles into the world of Wonderland. Will she get home? Not if the Queen of Hearts has her way.
After witnessing a murder, a young boy named Devon refuses to testify unless he is given the chance to be a policeman.
Ravi and Vinod's father is killed by a don, for developing a photo that showcases a crime scene. Ravi, a criminal and Vinod, a cop, decide to exact revenge from their father's killer.

A professional holdup man with scruples has a young ambitious partner who covets his wife and his life. When the holdup man goes to prison, the partner cuts loose, leaving a trail of deaths behind him.
A caliph imprisons the cobbler's son his daughter has fallen in love with, but the cobbler's discovery of a treasure cave may be the key to freeing his son.
The terminally ill father used his wisdom to make a plan in the last period of his life, that is, when he dies, he will avenge his son...

Set in an era where superheroes are commonly known and accepted, young William Stronghold, the son of the Commander and Jetstream, tries to find a balance between being a normal teenager and an extraordinary being.
In a land of predators, one love will separate man from beast, life from death.

A yokai known as surinaki has escaped his sell and is causing trouble through out the yokai world Yasha Enma and Enma King Shien must stop him from destroying everything and stop Enma king Shein from turning to the Darkside.
In a world where ranking determines the value of a player, a gang of skilled gamers find a quick way to get rich by breaking the rules.

A hapless producer gets a lucky break with a film in Mexico. Things take an unexpected turn when he finds himself having to spend the $1-Mil budget in cash, drawing unwanted attention and sucking him into a life of danger and mystery.
When a scheming fortune hunter finds his rich wife is not going to die as expected, he and his lover make other plans to get her millions.

A foster boy is befriended by a lost dog who turns out to belong to the President of the United States. The boy decides to run away from the foster home to return the canine to the White House -- "Because it's the right thing to do!"
This film is about an upside down world, where being homosexual is considered "normal" and heterosexual is considered "not normal".
This film is about warring women bandits. Roberta leads a group that will rescue her kidnapped twin sister Senyang from Fernanda's group.
The emotional story of a boy, his grandfather, and his dog. The boy's dream of becoming a great classical painter appears shattered when his loving grandfather dies.
Seven years after their fateful first encounter, Abril and Manuel meet again. Although they're both married, their attraction has only grown.
1940. A prototype of a new cutting edge tank is being taken on a secret mission to Moscow, to Comrade Stalin. Soon the cross-country run turns into a ruthless race.
Didgory and Polly set off on an adventure with the help of the mad uncle Uncle Andrew.The wood they find them selves in and set off to meet a evil Queen Jadis.

A journalist in Barbados investigates a video that surfaced on social media claiming to show a giant, unidentified creature. Her story uncovers a multi-nation government conspiracy that will forever change the face of Barbados.

A biopic of composer Agustín Lara, from his humble arrival in Mexico City looking for fame and fortune to his meteoric rise to stardom. Includes his early gig in a brothel, his love affairs, and the music that made him famous.

An Asian would-be actor's regimented but lonely life is turned upside down when he meets the girl of his dreams at the same time his newly-divorced best friend and his aging parents move into his one bedroom apartment.

This movie is adapted from a video game of the same title. The story is set in the turbulent late Eastern Han Dynasty. Ambitious Dong Zhuo controls the court and the commonalty, and heroes from all over the country begin to rise.

Giseop starts work at the Busun Church at the request of Rev. Kang, whom he has always revered. When Kang is involved in a dispute with his predecessor, Giseop takes Kang's side first, but soon his beliefs begin to shake.

When the wife of prominent lawyer Walter Briggs is kidnapped, he decides to take matters into his own hands. But things are not really what they seem and the abduction becomes more complicated for everyone involved.
A gang of ruthless drug smugglers manipulate a girl who does everything in order to have her daily fix.
Chef Huang embarks on a journey to hunt for the best Nasi Lemak recipes and the hardships (and laughter) he's going through.

A college professor's well-bred daughter assumes the name of Jeanne Crail to date Earl Williams, a slick con artist who frames her for robbery. Rather than have her father find out about ...                See full synopsis »

A young boy who sees his father gunned down kills the assassin. Years later, he has grown up to be a successful bounty hunter who is feared by many. And then one day he discovers secrets to his past...
A swashbuckling adventure which takes place in the mid-1800's on the South Pacific islands where bloody raids and battles were once the rule of the day.
The families of two lovers were confused in selecting the best bride and groom for their one.
After moving to a rural home, a family experiences strange events.

A street prostitute takes in an abused young woman on the run from her misogynist boyfriend, leading to both facing off against the prostitute's dreaded pimp and a relentless police detective out to arrest all of them.
A wandering cowboy watches over formidable bandits who, to touch an inheritance, must eliminate the members of the jury who sentenced their uncle.
The Untold Story of Executive Order 9066: Kensho's internment. The heart of Satori.
A jazz musician enlists in the Navy USO to avoid combat, but ultimately gets thrown into the line of fire as he struggles to escape the horrors of WW2.
Oslo 1960. Egon is in house arrest after a bad plan. A rich kid with a nasty plan enters the life of the Olsen Gang.
Maki teaches at a college and several of her students collude to break up her engagement to a chemistry professor.
Two corporate executive assistants hatch a plan to match-make their two bosses.
Prasanth and his family come to Chitra's house with a marriage proposal. They realize that they aren't meant to be together, so he embarks on a journey to find his soulmate.
A cache of cocaine is stolen in France. Following the trail of the assailants, two men from the organization reach Madrid, where they suspect that the loot may be hidden.
A docile man gets enraged when a politician's son throws acid on her face and later kills the miscreant. He is then hunted by the police and politicians who wants him dead.
Three teens discover that their neighbor's house is really a living, breathing, scary monster.

Bringing back Arata, Lilith and the rest of the Trinity Seven to face off against the greatest enemy in the history of the team; Lilith's own father, the strongest Demon Lord, who challenges Arata, now a Demon Lord candidate herself.
After fleeing Earth in the late 80s, an alien returns to his childhood home in search of his best friend. As he gets closer to finding her, his mysterious past gets closer to catching him.
An American barroom pianist and his prostitute girlfriend go on a trip through the Mexican underworld to collect the bounty on the head of a dead gigolo.
When the happiness of his family is held to ransom by a violent crime lord, Ram sets out on a quest to destroy his nemesis and his criminal empire.
It is a remake of an English movie, Trading Places(1983) directed by John Landis with the lead roles of Eddie Murphy, Dan Aykroyd and Ralph Bellamy.

In Victorian England, the independent and headstrong Bathsheba Everdene attracts three very different suitors: Gabriel Oak, a sheep farmer; Frank Troy, a reckless Sergeant; and William Boldwood, a prosperous and mature bachelor.
Roberto and his three sisters don't know what to do with their lives.
A CIA agent becomes wrapped up in her father's mysterious past in a race against time to recover data vital to the survival of countless other American operatives around the world.
Plot kept under wraps. An adaptation of the comic book, Red Sonja, a vengeful warrior known as a "She-Devil with a sword".

A sexy librarian named Joan is interning at a library in China. She keeps rejecting her co-worker's advances. There she finds a volume of the Kamasutra and everything will change for the beautiful Joan.
The son of a crooked cop follows in his father's footsteps. He joins an elite group of cops known as the "Flying Tigers" and learns the true meaning of justice.
A young woman commits a hit-and-run, then finds her fate tied to her victim.
A normal 14-year-old boy named Charlie happens to live in a haunted house with his embarrassing supernatural family - the Frankenstein's Monster, Count Dracula, a mummy, and a zombie.
Jay Hardy Jr, a CPD officer sets his vengeful eyes on known drug cartel head Chavez for murdering his father. In a city known for corruption, who can he trust.
A bounty hunter of lost masterpieces of any era, hired by a Swiss Art Collector is at the end of his tasks. But one last assignment will let him discover his hidden and dark legacy.
Among gunshots and boleros, a passionate relationship flourishes between a lonely transvestite and a young guerrilla during the Pinochet dictatorship in Chile.
Sworn enemies find themselves in each other's bodies, and use this to ruin each other's lives.

Demonic telepath Knyazev succeeds in extracting a soul from Nadya, but falls in love with the girl, soul foremost. Meanwhile, girl's spirit forms a bond with Viktor which results in a superpowered phantom.

Three couples who know one another are stuck at home during the beginning of lockdown. Jonathan, Clarissa and Paul will see their lives turned upside-down, forced to look at each other and ultimately at themselves.
Four girlfriends reunite for a week of partying on the beach, and it's all sand, sun and margaritas until one of them turns up dead.
An ambitious photo-journalist creates his own stories to get sensational scoops.
A young archaeologist has 24 hours in Mexico City to find a Mayan jaguar relic that's been missing for 600 years in exchange for her husband's life.

Summer 1947. The World War II has just died down. Unexpectedly and incognito a stranger shows up in a small village in Transcarpathia, situated near the very frontier. For some purpose he ...                See full synopsis »
Dodger must confront the struggles of life as he is visited by the Garbage Pail Kids and intimidated by some older bullies.
A French detective is investigating the murders of women around a brothel and discovers a young man is using them for snuff films.

A rare Chinese Christmas story about a bar girl (Ching Li) serving drinks to a man that looks like her husband from five years ago. She convinces him to fulfill her son's wishes of having the father he's never seen, show up for Christmas.

About the last years of the life of the great artist Modigliani. A poor Italian artist suffering from alcoholism and opium addiction falls in love with Jeanne, a girl from a wealthy family whose parents are categorically against it.
Set during the Heian Period, Kyo is a beautiful city that is proud of its glory. Two beautiful onmyouji meet, and the sad and short-lived beautiful cherry blossom starts to stir after 1000 years.
After an EMP takes out the power and society crumbles to chaos, Lucas must find a safe place far from the city for himself and a group of young survivors to call home.
John Miller is an politician wanting to become mayor. He founds a group called S.Q.U.A.D. whose mission is to get rid of all street scum by any means necessary.
In India, a police inspector investigates a murder that took place on a train between Calcutta and Bombay.
The film tells the story of a heartbroken woman's revenge on a rogue casino artist.

A comedic look at the everyday setbacks and struggles of four people who become connected through a spider web of love affairs and connections. This urban dramedy is an accurate study of how close we all really are.
A father plan to kill in the same day the 9 members of the jury who had condemned his son to the death sentence.
A powerful American entrepreneur travels to China with her bodyguard where they find themselves in a dangerous situation and must fight for survival.
A Boy who loves to read western stories he fantasizes that he is a hero in one of them.
Staked to the ground naked in the scorching desert of Mexico, lies a nameless young man left for dead.

A rich capitalist is blackmailed and threatened with the murder of his daughter. There's a terrific scene where gangsters bust in and kidnap a young woman. One of three excellent Jerry Cotton films we now offer. Color, 35mm.
Don't give up, its time for your comeback. Keep the faith, Don't let fear hold you back. You're never too far behind, when you're being coached by the Greatest Coach Of All Time.
Governor Jaisingh Sinha is murdered and the needle of suspicion points towards his estranged son, Sahil Sinha who must prove his innocence.
A Chicago librarian has a gene that causes him to involuntarily time travel, creating complications in his marriage.
A man's many wishes come true, only to realize what he's wanted the most has been in front of him all along.

With the aid from a New York City policeman, a top immigrant cop tries to stop drug-trafficking and corruption by immigrant Chinese Triads, but things get complicated when the Triads try to bribe the policeman.
Inspired by the film "Timur and his team", the boys from a small mountain village create a "Taganok" squad to populate the lake on the top of Mount Kiramet with fish and thereby save the mountain.
In this simple story about honor versus love, an old man struggles in front of his entire village to accept his son's new love interest.

They had to be criminals just once - If only they kept their mouths shut. A dish-pig is bullied into a petty crime that will free him from his debt to a local underworld mogul. Unfortunately, the brains behind the operation is an idiot.
Priya falls in love with rahul during a delayed flight journey but realizes that he and her brother share a past
After several years, a legendary swordsman returns to save the villagers from a highly trained army of swordsmen and their leader.
A recent widow meets an army major while skiing and despite pressures from friends and family becomes romantically involved with him.
When visiting their grandmother, two gunslingers help rescuing their cousin from criminals.
An adaptation of "The Wizard of Oz" that tries to capture the essence of the African-American experience.
During the first world war a Canadian officer escapes from a prison camp and reaches Berlin where he and a streetwalker plan to reach Holland.

Thongs and Octopus accept a job from their landlord: kidnap a baby. Soon, the baby awakens strong paternal feelings in the two crooks, leading to complications when it comes to handing him over to his possibly crazy gang boss grandfather.
Just like the changing colors of the Blue Mountains through the changing seasons, the film explores changing human emotions and journeys beyond mere winning or losing in life.
When it is the time to shape reality, the spy world calls The Pro Bono Spy Hunter.
A highschool student suffers from depression, resentment, and lonliness when he is forced to repeat his final year but his friend's are accepted into college
A retelling of the life of the celebrated 17th-century painter through his brilliant, nearly blasphemous paintings and his flirtations with the underworld.
Hong Kong policewoman Yeung teams up with Taiwanese and Mainland officers to take down a gunrunning ring.

A heartbroken man attends a spiritual retreat to cleanse himself and fix his broken life. There he meets a fellow lost soul, and together they discover that "the cleanse" releases more than everyday toxins...a lot more.
A musical with Soul, is an original musical based on the shared histories of Garlambirla, otherwise known as Coffs Harbour, on the mid-north coast of New South Wales.
A young bank receptionist gets mixed up with Rajveer Nanda, a man who has a mysterious background.

A teen searching for his brother stows away on a criminal's boat that shipwrecks on Letchi island, where terrorists have enslaved the Infant Island natives. Discovering Godzilla asleep, they decide to awaken him to liberate the natives.
The story centers around a ronin samurai and his young son during the time of feudal Japan!
A group of pro wrestlers decide they've had enough of their lying, cheating promoter and plan to rob him during the upcoming big show.

Walt Disney's 3-part made-for-TV feature, The Secret of Boyne Castle (1969), originally shown on "Walt Disney's Wonderful World of Color" (the new title for "Disneyland"), re-edited into feature film form for European theatrical release.
Two young people who love each other decide to leave their village and look for a better future in Athens. But now they are wanted by the police and on their way, they will have many adventures.
Live-action role players conjure up a demon from Hell by mistake and they must deal with the consequences.
After a botched assignment, a rice-fetishizing hitman finds himself in conflict with his organization, and one mysterious, dangerous fellow-hitman in particular.
Sundar plays the character of 'Gate Selvam', a man who decides to quit the mafia and lead a peaceful life. The story is all about the circumstances that arise because of this decision.
In a future where the terrorists have obtained more and more power, the master Ninja Snakeblade and his allied soldiers must fight the dooming threat before the entire world is left in ashes.
A group of friends find themselves in the hands of a mad doctor who plans to use them in his scheme to take over the world.
At the end of World War II, a German soldier is looking for his daughter while an SS troop is looking for a Jewish treasure.
Two teens live the same day repeatedly, enabling them to create a map of things to remember.
Deaf and dumb couple is sufficient for Neanderthals to communicate with their child a family story to go.

Nobita saw a moon turned yellow last night and told his class about it but they think it's funny. Doraemon gives him the "History Explorers Club Badge" and discovers there's life on the moon. Until a new student changed him forever.
Jean-Marc Leblanc (Labrèche), a desperate civil servant, escapes reality as we know it by imagining himself as the hero in imaginary adventures.
Along with his partners Inspector Joseph and Vandhana, DSP Ranjith Kalidoss attempts to hunt down a psychotic killer before realizing he's himself suffering from an unwanted disorder.
A gang of extreme sportsmen raises the stakes in their criminal activities.
John and Molly, a divorced middle aged man and a single mother meet at a friends party and start up a small relationship, all John has to do now is meet Molly's son... Cyrus

One day a nerdy middle-aged small-town man gets an exotic companion who can make wishes come true. Because the creature looks funny and behaves in an obnoxious way, he encounters all kinds of funny and embarrassing situations.
A group of youngsters kidnap a respected Mafia figure.

After conquering R'yleh and the Frozen Kingdom young Howard Lovecraft must now travel to the Undersea Kingdom in order to free his captured family, protect three mysterious magical books, and prevent the impending wrath of Cthulhu.

When a woman repairs a mysterious watch on the eve of Christmas, she's transported in time where she meets the love of her life. Now that she's back home, she must get clues to figure out where she meets the man she's destined to be with.

Jenny, a young taxi driver, is assaulted and raped by four thugs. Since the police seem to have no time to look for their assailants, Jenny, tired of not getting justice, decides to take revenge on her own.
When an aspiring comic book artist is propositioned by a charismatic stranger, the lines between reality and the comic book world become violently blurred.
Set one year later after the events of the anime series with an all new original story.
The old renowned Landboskole is spreading a new team of Agricultural Candidates after completing the Course.
A young girl on the threshold of her teen years finds her life turning upside down when she is accompanied by an unlikely friend.
Equal parts musical, performance, and poetic lecture, In The Jungle is an experimental narrative about a scientist living and working deep in an unnamed jungle.
A young man is searching for the war to free his country and establish freedom. Instead of war he finds the love of his life.
Two young persons will lead an exciting investigation in order to resolve some extraordinary phenomena that occur in a peaceful village.
Four young people, one city.For love or ideal, with funny and faint bewilderment.An original improvisationin Chinese Cinema, a brand new rendering of city life.
A young man falls in love with the beautiful owner of a mortuary who has a long and tortured past.
A fantasy adventure about a paralyzed track runner and a brilliant inventor seeking to return home after crash landing into a mythical forest.
While his trailer trash parents teeter on the edge of divorce, Nick Twisp sets his sights on dream girl Sheeni Saunders, hoping that she'll be the one to take away his virginity.
One Journalist. Driven by Truth. Trapped Inside.

Leroy Brown rises to defend the streets that spawned him, driven by darkness emanating from within. Odisfarce is a dark tale fusing the supernatural with raw gritty reality; first in the franchise Chronicles of Leroy Brown.
A young mouse, mole and hedgehog risk their lives to find a cure for their badger friend, who's been poisoned by men.
Six people deal with a deep loneliness in weird and wonderful ways.
Rahul falls in love with famous industrialist's daughter Payel.
An ancient Egyptian princess is awakened from her crypt beneath the desert, bringing with her malevolence grown over millennia, and terrors that defy human comprehension.
A young person gets hired to kill someone completely unknown, by someone equally unknown. Or is that true? Nothing is what it seems.
Action film about young outlaws around the year 1910.
A hapless young Viking who aspires to hunt dragons becomes the unlikely friend of a young dragon himself, and learns there may be more to the creatures than he assumed.
Determined to have a normal family life once his mother gets out of prison, a Scottish teenager from a tough background sets out to raise the money for a home.
A former Army investigator is forced to revisit his greatest failure, and face the resulting personal demons, in the wake of a tragedy and new revelations at his longtime mentor's funeral.
In order to evade the law, a ruthless don tries to kill his lookalike; a chef and tries to take his place.

Martial arts champion Andre Lima's fighting days ended with his wife's death. The past nine years Andre has struggled to rebuild his world around his two children. When his daughter's health suddenly fails, his finances collapse.
Two teams try to entice unsuspecting people to perform outlandish stunts. The winning video is the one judged funniest by the studio audience.

A popular middle-aged writer is warned by a fortuneteller that strange things are about to happen to him. He then meets a man, who claims to be him. The writer uses this bizarre situation to change his life and take revenge.
Adaptation of an Arabian Nights Story: The adventures of a Cairo cobbler who leaves his wife after she has had him arrested for buying her the wrong kind of vermicelli and honey cake.
'Boys' is the story of five boys and a girl from different families They are youthful, vibrant, careless violating all conventions and In the process, they discover their hidden talents.
A gang of teenage girls, looking for kicks and ignoring their probation officers' warnings, embark on a crime spree of robberies and burglaries.
Rivalry between two gangs of thieves. The sympathetic group reforms; the others are brought to justice.
Emperor Palpatine reigns the galaxy, along with his pupil Darth Vader. he is obsessed with destroying what remains of the Jedi, and gathers several Sith warriors to take revenge.
A boy suddenly can see a ghost after an accident, that will reveal the secret of his life.
A traveling saleswoman convinces an army lieutenant to pose as her husband so that she can rent an apartment during the World War II housing shortage.
Former cop Brian O'Conner is called upon to bust a dangerous criminal and he recruits the help of a former childhood friend and street racer who has a chance to redeem himself.

BIG PHARMACEUTICAL THRILLER - a "fixer" for Big Pharma must unravel a deadly mystery when a brilliant scientist accidentally invents a trial drug so volatile she discovers all involved are being killed.

The San Bernardino National Forest becomes a war zone when two veterans seek revenge for the slaying of their fellow troop-mates. They brought this battle on themselves but the hunted are now the hunters.
You can't change the past, but you can change the way you look at it.
A young boy grows up as he embarks on a quest to become a knight.
An evil sorcerer teams up with a mad scientist to unleash Dinosaur Hell on Earth, and only Daisy Derkins and a hero from the future can stop them.
A couple in their garden. The subtle shifts in their bodily interaction speak volumes about their relationship.
The film is said to be based on the emotional bonding between a boy and a dog and their love and affection for each other.
A gang of low-rent mob goons plot a heist, only to be forced to confront radioactive evil from beyond the grave.
A man who stops into a foster home to drop off some donations soon tells the kids a story about two teenage friends who uncover a long-lost medallion that transports them back in time.
In the sixteenth century, a noblewoman has a love affair with the French King.
A law school professor witnesses his colleague, friend and mentor murder his own wife. Rather than turn his friend in, he disowns him, but the decision leads to more danger.
When 12-year-old Caleb's father announces that they'll be moving before the start of the new school year, Caleb and his friend Blake hatch a series of adventurous plans to foil Dad's intentions.
After borrowing from loan sharks for a final round of partying before committing suicide, a man (Carmelo Gomez) falls in love with a waitress (Salma Hayek).
After a disgraced man's accidental death, the lives of his family change drastically when they receive money from his insurance company.
One year after Riccione, Vincenzo invites Camilla and Furio to his father's home on the mythical Amalfi Coast.
When the world was still young and Sound was Music. This was the story you'll hear told.

A sport agent loses her superstar client before the start of NASCAR's season, she takes a chance on a rebellious female dirt track racer. She has to get her NASCAR ready, and reform her reclusive father, a former NASCAR champion.
A hapless young Viking who aspires to hunt dragons becomes the unlikely friend of a young dragon himself, and learns there may be more to the creatures than he assumed.
Animated Stories about the various Myths, Legends and Tales about Firebreathing dragons, Mountain Tall Giants and Mysterious Magic-Weilding Witches.
Kees is an 11-year-old boy who lives in the center of the city of Amsterdam in the early 20th century.
An 11-year-old boy who believes that he is the best detective in town runs the agency Total Failures with his best friend, an imaginary 1,500-pound polar bear.
Fifth brother is separated from his kin whilst fighting the marauding Lao, and is nursed back to health in a monastery. He is befriended by Grinder, a monk whose job is to mill wheat.
The story of two sisters, as Britain descends into an alien apocalypse.
Two Brooklyn bred brothers have a rough rise to the top of the pro-boxing world only to meet the challenges of fame, family and forgiveness.
The Shelleys visit Lord Byron and compete to write a horror story.

When Claire (Erin Cahill) goes home to save her dad's (Gregory Harrison) annual Fall Fest on her family's pumpkin farm, sparks fly with an old rival: the opposing lawyer (Trevor Donovan) she now faces in court.
A young woman decides to spend her summer holidays in a countryside village in Portugal but begins to experience terrifying supernatural occurrences leading her to a fight for survival.
A mother and her young child undertake a dangerous journey from Ecuador to the United States after she's diagnosed with a life-threatening illness.

Ravi has weakness for women and gets into a physical relationship with ladies. One day, he falls in love with Bhavana. He has a heath issue, which requires blood. Why is he in a relationship with many women and what will happen to his love
To gain lands from the prince of Saxony, a group of orphans seeks Mozart, in order to obtain the very rare score of one of his compositions.
An easygoing gambler played by Atsumi (later to gain fame as Tora-san) gets caught in the crossfire of two gangs' warfare.
Screen version of the fairy tales of the Brothers Grimm "The Brave Little Tailor"
After being conned into buying a shady '65 Chrysler, Mike's first date plans with girl-next-door Kelsey implode as he finds himself targeted by criminals, cops, and a crazy cat lady.
Ex-con Alex plans to flee to the South with his girl after a robbery. But something terrible happens and revenge seems inevitable.

A mercenary group called NEVER lead an assault onto Futo City using T2 Gaia Memories, a series of enhanced Gaia Memories based on data from the Kamen Riders. To protect their city, Shotaro and Philip have to uncover the secrets behind it.
A former MMA fighter and his brothers must rescue their kidnapped family from a dangerous crime syndicate after $50M of illegal diamonds gets stolen.
Priestess Oma is forever young in this Jungle Jim knockoff of "She" or the La of Opar stories from "Tarzan". The Jungle Jim type is played by Weissmuller using his own name.

Avinash (Akhil Akkineni) in his childhood meets a girl (Kalyani Priyadarshan as Junnu) and believes that she is his soulmate, and patiently waits to come across her even after growing into an adult. Will they meet again?

An inventor creates a humanoid robot named Jet Jaguar that is seized by the undersea nation of Seatopia. Using Jet Jaguar as a guide, the Seatopians send Megalon as vengeance for the nuclear tests that have devastated their society.

A daring Bangladeshi teenager attempts to help her struggling family by disguising herself as a boy and driving her father's prized rickshaw for much needed extra money. Based on the acclaimed novel by Mitali Perkins.
A federal agent travels to a small town to investigate the murder of her brother.
The film is about Hobu Chandra, the king of Bombagarh and his wife Kusumkoli. Everyone in Bombagarh was happy. Then arrives Gobu Chandra and things take a turn when he becomes the new minister.
Two mysterious orphan children have extraordinary powers and are chased by a scheming millionaire. But where do these kids really call home?
The wizards try to defeat enemies from another world.
After his master dies, a peasant squire, fueled by his desire for food and glory, creates a new identity for himself as a knight.
Ritsuko, a young woman suffering from extreme germophobia, moves to a new town with her family.
A duel between a suspected murderer and a detective pressed by people who want results. But whose skin is really wanted.

In 1953, two young Italian children are promised in marriage by their fathers. Twenty one years on - despite changing times, fading traditions and 70's liberation - the pair are expected to marry, or face the consequences.

An evil king made a deal with the devil and received a deadly power that will defeat anyone standing in his way. It's up to a fearless warrior to find a magical sword, which's the only weapon that could stop him.
A likable guy pursues his office crush with help from his evil talking pets, but things turn sinister when she stands him up for a date.
A young photojournalist gets entangled in a political conspiracy when he witnesses Naxalites robbing a local bank.
A married couple move into their dream house, but very soon the wife begins seeing a ghost that her husband does not see, leading him to believe that his wife is losing her sanity
A police officer with a painful past returns home to help the FBI track down a mastermind assassin.
In a place where there is no time, a traveler comes to an unnamed village where we do not know where on the map. The weary traveler is a messenger. They have stories to tell, words to say.
Sandra and Deborah are two women trying to escape from a tragic recent event. They go for a vacation on a beach house but are then followed by an evil cult.
In the secret relationship between a manager and his secretary begins a tragedy.
A story focusing on true love, morality, and family responsibility.
A bad deed on the part of a tough minor-league hockey player results in an unusual sentence: He must serve one week as a real-life tooth fairy.
The life of prosperous medic going to ruin after he was framed by unknown but probably close person.
Romance and fantasy mix in this comedy that shows how a heaven-sent cupid tries to seal the romances between two pairs of young lovers.
A police inspector is infatuated with the wife of a doctor and tries to break them apart by hook or crook.

Two young farm workers, who like millions of others, leave their village to seek their fortunes in the city. Each chose a vastly different path to make it and become embroiled in misunderstandings, gangster brawls and police raids.

Robbie Crusoe, a brilliant young chemical engineer with a dubious ethic, come to Brazil to meet his father. When his plane crashes in the middle of the forest, Robbie will have to survive the Amazonian jungle and the ghosts from his past.
Kit is a young, easy going girl who is destined to find love, only for it to be ruined by the dark Cupid herself.
A poor farmer is always inventing things. A lot of them don't work, but the toys he makes brings joy to the children at the local orphanage. It is a very good movie.
The story of an eponymous Scottie dog, a prehistoric bone and a gang of bungling crooks out to thwart the ambitious plans of an eccentric Scottish paleontologist.
The story of Doctor Kenan, from a wealthy family, and the poor singer Tango Suzan.
A self-appointed "love expert" tries to play cupid with uneven results.

Four convicts become embroiled in what seems like an easy way to get a million dollars. Enlisted to pick up a sealed box and guard it for one day, the four men let their curiosity take over and decide to look at its contents.
A young man with extraordinary abilities unravels the shocking secret behind the mysterious murders in Stonelake.
The owner of a fighting cocks farm becomes, to his surprise, the emissary of death. He must carry on his horse the souls of those who have just died to the Kingdom of Death.
Sumitra travels to Pandharpur to find a ray of hope, after Sangram killed her husband and son and took over their business.
The tale of two sisters, bound by more than blood, who bring home a man on a dare, only to see the situation spiral out of control.
A clumsy daydreamer gets caught up in a sinister conspiracy.
A wholesome family struggling to make ends meet has their world turned upside down after they rent a room to a deranged Olympic hopeful.
As Noah and Wade prepare to marry in Martha's Vineyard, the personal problems of their friends - and the unexpected arrival of rapper Baby Gat - threatens to permanently end their relationship.
Idealistic Senate staffer Daniel J. Jones, tasked by his boss to lead an investigation into the CIA's post 9/11 Detention and Interrogation Program, uncovers shocking secrets.
The coming of age story of a fifteen-year-old girl who struggles to rescue her grandfather from a nursing home.
Andy Hardy goes to college after returning from World War II. He is in love with Kay Wilson this time.
Follows the relationship between two young minds, which took a unfavorable turn.

(1930) Jameson Thomas, Muriel Angelus, Jack Rain. Early British thriller about a master criminal named 'Flash Jack', who heads a gang of top-hatted thieves that rob the wealthy. A detective tracks the crimes to a posh night club.

After a wild party in Las Vegas, one of billionaire Tony Mastrano's girlfriends disappears. She's been kidnapped by the Russian mob, looking to settle a score that dates back to her childhood in Moscow.

A young Japanese entrepreneur is set on a quest by his wealthy father to find the world's best opening line in order to "get the girl". But when they stumble upon a sure-fire love potion, mayhem ensues.
Board the Millennium Falcon and journey to a galaxy far, far away in an epic action-adventure that will set the course of one of the Star Wars saga's most unlikely heroes.
Big nosed Benny lacks confidence to get a girlfriend or kick out his spiritual childhood friend, Autumn, from his Toronto apartment. But then he meets Jordan.
Two disgruntled restaurant employees (David Bowie, Rosanna Arquette) decide to rob their employers (Buck Henry, Andre Gregory).

Lázaro, a young man with a terminal illness, goes on a journey to find Ambrosía, a mysterious pirate town where death doesn't happen.
A man captures a hospital and its staff for his child's operation, which turns into a hostage situation and a media circus.
A compulsive gambler dies during a shooting, but he'll receive a second chance to reform himself and to make up with his worried wife.

In an alternative Victorian Age Gotham City, Batman begins his war on crime while he investigates a new series of murders by Jack the Ripper.
1952. Drama starring Leslie Dwyer and Lisa Daniely. Successful remake of one of the earliest British talkies. Set in the Hindle, two mill workers take off to Blackpool for the 'Wakes' holiday.
When a virtual reality simulation created using the personalities of multiple serial killers manages to escape into the real world, an ex-cop is tasked with stopping its reign of terror.

A cop pursues a serial killer into a nightmare world where dreams become reality.
A woman living in a boarding house is kidnapped by a small-time criminal. Soon others in the gang try to take her away from him so they can get the ransom.
A collection of Swedish animated short films for children.
A defiant Native woman must overcome her own trauma when she falls for a mysterious man who protects her Tribal sisters while she helps them heal from human trafficking.
Past lives parallel lives collide with native American Seminoles and a novelist named Melvin Corbin in this fantasy mystery thriller
Two estranged brothers are forced to fight and pursue an overwhelmingly dangerous force.
Neighborhood kid goes to work for the Mafia as a debt collector.

Golden Dragon (Dragon Lee) comes to town to investigate the mysterious death of his brother. You know that it will face many criminals, but is a specialist in martial arts and also his friend Silver Snake accompanies him.

After moving to South Africa to care for her sickly grandmother, an American girl creates two imaginary friends to keep her company but after her grandmother's passing those friends and her own mind become enemies.

Brooke escapes years of abuse by moving to another state and must have surgery to save her life due to the abuse. Brooke's ex husband, John, sends a hitman to kill her thinking he won't get caught because he's in prison.
An army of evil purple ninjas do battle with sadistic yellow ninja to stop an assassination plot.
Destiny brings a lonely sketch artist and a bohemian girl together. Despite fate granting them only one night of romance, they remain forever bound by a legend of a thousand cranes.
Two warring witch cousins must come together to help save their magical aunt.
Injured and lost in the deep woods, a father and his estranged son face-off against the elements and each other's belief system in their desperate struggle to survive in the wild.
A man in the witness protection program struggles with his crumbling home life, while two hitmen from his old neighborhood hunt him down.
The story of Aung San Suu Kyi as she becomes the core of Burma's democracy movement, and her relationship with her husband, writer Michael Aris.
Based on the fifth Dragon Quest game.
A young and beautiful couple from China meet in a hotel during a fire.
Jess Lapid riding fighting shooting and loving his way to newer and greater heights of entertainment.
After a recent breakup, Noah uses his ex's old iPod to travel back in time to try and fix his relationship.
Pranks will be played, ghost stories will come alive, and crushes will be revealed, all in another summer at Camp Winoaka.
Kyle and Swin live by the orders of an Arkansas-based drug kingpin named Frog, whom they've never met. But when a deal goes horribly wrong, the consequences are deadly.
Sent to repair the computers at a supermarket in a town hit by a storm, a technician discovers some unusual things and is faced with difficult decisions.
One day Molly must release that she has given up her own life.. she wakes to find she is raising Charlotte children and that the abusive husband is deeply involved in her life.
Base on the true events behind the infamous 3 guys 1 hammer viral video.

A single mother prostitute, who goes by the name Princess, finds herself forced to work undercover for the police in order to apprehend a homicidal, misogynistic pimp named Ramrod, who will do anything not to get arrested.

Sikandar is union leader of workers in a factory which is owned by Chawla a corrupt criminal lawyer . when he refuses to take bribe. Sikander and his family are killed .Sikander returns back. how will he face Chawla ?

A widower has a run of good luck; a sudden increase in his fortunes, and a new woman in his life whose resemblance to his late wife seals the deal. However, the new bride may not have the best intentions towards him.
Honza used to lie happily on the furnace but now his mother insists that he sets off to the world to get some experience.

Police Detective Jack Flinder (Billy Zane) is already in trouble with the rest of his force for imprisoning a corrupt partner, but now he has a new problem with which to deal. Things get much worse from there.
Bhoomi runs an eco-friendly start up business in Hyderabad. Her mother wants her to marry soon and is on the hunt for suitable grooms but Bhoomi is reluctant towards marriage.
After a mad genius inventor of killer robots and cyborgs at Chaank Armaments Corp. kills execs, he unleashes his ultimate death machine on the new cute CEO firing him.

Based on a novel by Amos Oz..

A retired veterinarian living in a remote Scottish village encounters a goat who thinks he's a dog, an Admiral who's afraid of the water, and a beaver who was raised by rabbits.
Hitting rock bottom, an aging boxer's (Bo Lawson) rivalry within himself restores his vitality with hopes of retraining to fight for what matters most.
A sexually unsatisfied young woman decided to pursue various sexual experiments and scenarios.
Max, a dead corrupt businessman, makes a Faustian pact with Satan's henchman to drive three people to Hell in exchange for longer life. Soon Max realizes that there still may be good in him.

ENPATHUKALILE EBHYANMAR is a film set in the eighties. Shajahan, the protagonist leaves his native place due to a problem caused by his father. Later his life takes on a whole new dimension in a way that he never thought possible.
A young man suddenly discovers that he has the gift of healing. As he tries to understand it and the new reality it offers, a teenage girl with terminal cancer unexpectedly shows him the way.
Masked hero El enmascarado de oro faces a criminal that turns invisible.
Based on real events, four professional bank robbers and ATM machine breakers from Russia go on rampage in Bali. The Balinese police force are in hot pursuit to catch the robbers.
Labeled as the prime suspect in the murder of his partner, a NYPD detective goes rogue to root out the real killers and picks up a trail that leads to higher ups in the department.
First in Spectacle. in Thrills. and Romance. NOW a talking singing HORSE.

A nurse loses her job after selflessly taking the blame for a fatal mistake her sister and co-worker made; she is subsequently employed at a poorly-equipped hospital, where she finds romance and tragedy.
A ten year-old boy runs away from his abusive parents, steals a Mustang, and a pursues a promotional card game sold at gas stations.
This film based on life of the Mahabharata character Ghatotkacha, the son of Bhima and Hidimba.

Cooper O'Neil's life changes when his former FBI partner arrives DOA with a thumb drive that's the key to a diabolical plot headed by a madman with an ax to grind. Welcome to Safehouse, where friends can be enemies and games can be deadly!
While Haley goes back to exploring the world and living in interesting places, Sal and Ty are left behind to think about what she meant to each one of them.

Two young children discover love with the advent of adolescence.
Ali Riza Bey and his family encounter with the big city.
Gopi and Radha need to overcome all the struggles to get united.

With the help of his assistant, a top Washington D.C. investigator must solve the mysterious murders of a supposedly haunted mining town within the Rocky Mountains, all before a deadly snowstorm hits the area.

Police detective Tajima, tasked with tracking down stolen firearms, turns an underworld grudge into a blood-bath. Suzuki transforms a colorful pot-boiler into an on-target send-up of cultural colonialism and post-war greed.

An elderly woman installs a horn in her crypt in case she's buried alive.
A group of terrorists cause chaos in a small Mexican city, now Mario, the town's mayor, and a special forces group must restore peace in the city.

A man (Alfredo) and his girlfriend die in an accident. His brother (Rodrigo) discovers that it was no accident and that there are more accidents and surprises, so together with Olivia they will try to discover the truth.
Taylor Williams the third meets the girl of his dreams, Mandii Carson.
A blacklisted small-town special effects artist has swept away to a Disenchanted Land, finding himself in the middle of a war between three magic bitches over birthrights and IP ownership.

As the story opens, a busful of tourists are touring Copenhagen. Their guide draws their attention to the beautiful statue at Langelinie. At that, the film's focus moves below the waterline, where several fish tell the story of ...
In 1709, Kit Ross (Cicely Courtneidge) disguises herself as a man and joins the army to search for her press-ganged husband.
Forced outside the city limits, they make their final stand in a small farmhouse. Paying tribute to Night of the Living Dead, our heroes fight to stay alive against an army of flesh eating monsters.
A cursed princess must journey to the Underworld to save her true love and realizes that the biggest obstacle to her happiness is her own prejudice.

Eric and Elin meet as adults and reminisce about when they met for the first time. Their parents were addicts but for a couple of months they lived together as a family. This time together still defines who they are and what they became.
When a young woman is pushed off a boat, she must unmask her would-be killer.

Could a panther be the reincarnation of a colonel's wife who died in Africa, then the fate of a young man, or is this only his delirium? We will find out after a parade of classic gags and plot twists.

Two families come together during a beach vacation which soon turns to chaos after a disagreement in traditional values, family principles on upbringing and table manners.
A spy living in the house in disguise, who has a heart transformation.
A tiny alien president takes refuge in Nobitas home due to an interstellar war. Doraemon and gang help him by thwarting the enemies.
Eshwar, an atheist, is married to Paravathy, a firm believer of a snake god. Eshwar's manager tries creating a rift between them but doesn't succeed. Eshwar punishes the manager for his evil deeds.
A charming woman is staying with her sister. She soon seduces her brother-in-law, and her sister is broken hearted.

La Martina arrives to a small conservative town, fascinating men and winding women up.

A surreal, isolated village sees its inhabitants gradually leave behind their mutual traditions and superstitions as they leave for the city. Among them are two cousins who love each other and who get into a quarrel with other villagers.
An orphan working as a Pizza delivery boy and the daughter of a caste-based politician are forced to get married in an unforeseen situation.
Follows Audrey's journey to recovery after a bullying incident, with the help of her chaotic but loving family and a boy named Linus.

Years of friendship, laughter and love shared between two brothers faces the music when a 14 year old boy is confronted with the complexities of a simple relationship.
After several box-office flops, an independent filmmaker is encouraged to make a commercial romantic comedy that mirrors her own relationship.

Haj Haidar is suspected of murder. First, this suicide crime is declared. His son, who is studying law, uncovers the story and, with the help of an investigator, searches for the killer. Something happens in this search.

The story of a boy named Ben who enjoys his simple countryside life and is forced to move to a highly ranked school where he doesn't fit in. The rest of the movie shows how Ben is driven mentally insane by his selfish mother.
The story of legendary Notre Dame football player and coach Knute Rockne.

An ex-army dog inherits a fortune from his eccentric millionaire owner, and which is poisoned, asks the leader in the heaven for animals to send him back to Earth, as a human private investigator, to solve his own murder.
Plot under wraps. Sequel to 2021 movie "Cruella".
Before the veil of the Key of Life in "Neoni: Destiny of Archangel" pushed them together, they lived not knowing that the universe would bring them together. These are the Keys of Life they Lived.
Three best friends embark on a road trip to discover the secret which their parents have been hiding.
A desert warrior rises up against the evil army that is destroying his homeland. He captures the enemy's key sorcerer, takes her deep into the desert and prepares for a final showdown.
A young man's attempted suicide takes him to another world where he must confront love and sin to get a second chance at life.
Movie narrates the story of an athlete Rebecca whom her village Kizhakkemala is proud of. In an interesting way the movie plots family relationships through the life of Rebecca.
In 1901, Elisa Sanchez Loriga took on the identity of Mario Sánchez to marry her lover of fifteen years, Marcela Gracia Ibeas.
Eve and Guy are in love. When Eve falls into a terminal coma, there's only one way to save her - putting her mind into Guy's body.
A corrupt IPS officer misuses his power and resorts to illegal practices to gain monetary benefits, as he joins hands with the local MP to overthrow his father.
Two men learn to confront a traumatic secret they share involving the savage murder of a schoolmate.
A college woman, born with a paralyzed arm, aspires to become a pianist. To develop her musical talent and find her inner strength, she'll need the help of a washed-up music professor.

A boy learns the meaning of work after a magic gourd grants him anything he wants.

A suspensefully captivating biopic depiction of the life of a south eastern Michigan native and author Laura Geist, and her journey of hopes and heartbreaks. Based on the incredible true story of the Geist and Clark family.

Captain Celluloid battles the evil Master Duper and his criminal gang, the League of Film Pirates, who plan to hijack copies of classic films, copy them and sell them to desperate film collectors all over the world.

Saga of Love is a fairy tale inspired film-musical depicting a mystical journey of two souls from the magical Kingdom of Angels to Earth, the Kingdom of Darkness, to the Kingdom of Eternity and beyond.

The accidental discovery of a big fortune hidden in the apartment of a deceased man will fill the heart of a real estate agent with greed and dreams of a luxurious life, but the neighbours think otherwise.
A washed up, alcoholic actress who is prone to blackouts wakes up next to a murdered man. Did she kill him and, if not, is she in danger?
When the British build a prison and steal from the locals, a young man from Lahore decides to take action.
The tale about a girl with a cold heart who is dying in agony because of joy and love.
Nightclub hostess Mimin is hired to impersonate her lookalike Hsin, an office worker who was murdered.
A crime story. With a moral.

When Murder Incorporated is shutdown by the police, two unemployed professional assassins - Harry and Alice are forced to undertake the most dangerous contract of their short careers - lifting five millions dollars from the Russian Mafia.
A shaky truce between a group of kingdoms is maintained by a ban on practicing alchemists. However, a group of alchemists from these lands unite to enable peaceful cooperation.
Larry and Richard use a voodoo-revived corpse to track down hidden money to clear their names.

A one-handed madman uses various detachable devices as murder weapons to gain revenge on those he believes have wronged him.
Blind swordswoman Oichi ponders whether a life of peace might be better than killing criminals for money.
