A young beggar wanders the Athenian streets in search of a meagre income to pay for her bedridden mother's medicine, and reunite her divorced parents.
A young wizard must create new spells in his magic book before the planets align. His uncle and aunt, powerful mages themselves, help him achieve that. Based on the award-winning Brazilian TV series.
A curious daughter asks her filmmaker father "What is cinema?" With a camera in hand and friends from school to help her, she sets out to make an incredible movie.

A young woman named Taylor Sojourner loses her boyfriend Jeffrey in a tragic accident--then she wakes up in a parallel dimension in which he's alive. Does she choose to stay in this fantasy or go back to reality?

A dogged, witty young man that journeys back to his desert hometown to avenge his father. Between him and his goal, there are a few greedy old townies, a legendary stack of money and the blonde, blue-eyes love of his life.

Can a marriage in crisis survive? "Love a la Carte" is a comedic fantasy about struggling monogamists staying married for better or worse, with the help of an online polyamory dating website called "Love a la Carte."

Desperation to be with his only child forces a divorced man to take the guise of the child's nanny. Situations get really messy when the child's grandfather (the man's ex-father-in-law) falls in love with his disguised ex-son-in-law.
A ghost tries to sabotage her former boyfriend's current relationship with a psychic.
The greatest, longest, most expensive film produced in the film history of the Philippines. Exact running time: 3 hours and 20 minutes.
A husband's suave exterior unravels after his marriage, and he unleashes his paranoid and volatile temper on his wife, which escalates to more dangerous and unpredictable tantrums.
A Young Man Fights For Poor And Down Troddent People And He Unearths Culprits Behind The Mob Lynching.
The friendship between a white man and an Apache chief is tested when they fall in love with the same woman during a time of frontier conflict.
As an attempt of robbery goes wrong, Sale is left with little choice.
An ACP who is determined to rid the city of corruption is very attached to his half brothers.
Desperate to turn his life around, a hard-luck gambler risks everything to sell stolen casino chips to a ruthless gunslinger. It's the worst bet of his life.
Pursued by a sea captain, larcenous saloon queen Roxy McClanahan assumes the identity of a Civil War widow with wealthy relatives.
While visiting her school's forbidden attic, Mandie stumbles upon the mystery of a long forgotten Christmas.
Two best friend rookie cops; one graduates to detective and the other becomes the mayor. When the Detective's wife gets kidnapped, in lieu of ransom he has to kill the mayor to save his wife.
Seeking redemption, a middle aged man drives cross the country in search of the daughter he abandoned as a child.
Home for the first time in years for her sister's holiday wedding, Noelle McDowell is forced to face Thom Sutton, the man who jilted her when they were both teenagers.

Taranto is a ghost town that no one dares to enter. The poorest are left fighting for survival, while gangs are competing for territory. Two thirteen-year-old orphans, who grew up together, dream of joining one of the gangs.
Ben and Katie Jordan are a married couple who go through hard times in fifteen years of marriage.
Two vice cops get entangled in a web of prostitution, blackmail and murder.
A teddy bear, a mechanical mouse, and a marionette join forces to save their kidnapped friend, Buttercup the doll, from the denizens of the Land of Evil.
A discredited, self-centered political campaign manager attempts to salvage his career by running a dog against the town's corrupt mayor.
A American team has few hours to survive a deadly zombie outbreak in Rio de Janeiro.
Dustin Sanchez stars as Jack, a crooked bail bondsman with a secret. His secretary Joan is very taken with him as she doesn't really have much going on for herself anyway.
A wealthy Cincinnati brewer and his daughter get caught in the affairs of a European kingdom.
Great Patriotic War, early 1940s. After barely surviving a battle with a mysterious, ghostly-white Tiger tank, Red Army Sergeant Ivan Naydenov becomes obsessed with its destruction.

When Mr. Johnson, a man lost and desperate in his own heart, seeks counsel from the pastor of his church, Mr. Johnson's search for answers to questions that burden him leads him down a dark path that only God's love can illuminate.
Two rival soldiers who were killed in Vietnam are brought back to life in a top secret military experiment that creates superhuman warriors.

In an apocalyptic future world, a young upper class couple is visiting an exhibition of surrealistic paintings, presented by a group of young anarchists in their loft flat where they trap and torture their high society guests.

Angela, the beautiful Mexican mistress of a NY mobster, asks virginal Father Michael for protection after Zena, the mobster's wife, kills her cheating husband. Michael becomes torn between his vows, Angela and his sister - Zena.
Avalon Anders stars as Jeanie, a genie sent to a junior college to turn a nerd (Gesner) into a man.

Kamilla goes on fighting to get Sebastian accepted, both while in jail and after being released. She's the only one believing that he wills top stealing. Is her support enough to keep him away from that?
Four years after the destruction of Isla Nublar, Biosyn operatives attempt to track down Maisie Lockwood, while Dr Ellie Sattler investigates a genetically engineered swarm of giant insects.
Two undercover cops blow their cover while investigating a heroin ring.
What happens when you throw 2 guys who hate each other together? Add for good measure a beauty and a gangster and the trouble is no one can be trusted.

Trenton, one a priest now a vampir is struggling with his own sins as he works with a small group to prevent the gates of Hell from being opened and after a redemption through Hell the evil is vanquished.
The Kiekeboe family vacation is disrupted by a vampire plot involving artificial blood.
The film, set in 1912, is about the exploits of France's first motorized police brigade.
A drifting ex-soldier turns underground fighter with the help of a just released ex-con, pitting him against corrupt cops and hired killers now gunning for him and all those he cares about.
Barry Allen uses his super speed to change the past, but his attempt to save his family creates a world without super heroes, forcing him to race for his life in order to save the future.
A true story of love and suffering in war-torn Ukraine leading to FC Dynamo Kyiv's infamous "Game of Death"

Bandipotu Simham is a 1982 Indian Telugu film, directed by Muthuraman and Produced by Srinivasa Rao. The film stars Rajinikanth, Chiranjeevi, Sridevi and Nalini in lead roles. The music of the film was composed by M S Viswanathan.
Jacob Shaw, an ex-war photographer suppresses his gruesome plan for revenge on a London gang. But meeting April Harley a war fanatic, sets him down a bloody, vengeful path.
In Cold War Moscow, a female spy steals secrets from an idealistic politician - and falls in love with him.
Four girls spend their days terrorizing students and teachers before getting sucked into prostitution and drugs by a pimp.

The nephew of a murdered millionaire decides to track down his uncle's killer. He faces many life-threatening dangers as he tries to break into the inner circle of the sinister criminal "The Tortoise."

Haru is living a disintegrated married life with her then high school teacher, Yuichiro. After Yuichiro's sudden death, Haru meets his mistress, Shiori, who was also one of his students. Fueled by jealousy, unexpected events begin...
Two opposing, vampire hunters must unite to defeat a vampire lord and his horde of bloodsuckers.
Sinister forces compete to find the million dollars in gold hidden by recently deceased gangster Joe Valerie in his family's old dark house 15 years earlier,

In one of the narrow streets of the Old town of Stockholm lies hotel City. It's inhabited by mysterious characters such as 'Greven', 'Blomman' and others. The police inspector Göransson is chasing a jewel thief, 'Diamond-Lasse'.

Lana's daughter Emma returns from London and announces that she's getting married next month. Things become more complicated when Lana learns that the man who stole Emma's heart is the son of the man who broke hers years ago.

An interracial gay love story set in early 18th century South Africa about two men -- a black prisoner living in a Cape Town penal colony and a Dutch sailor -- who weather injustices as a result of their affair.
After being accused of being too inhibited by her ex-boyfriend, a violinist creates a rather wild to-do list that sends her on a whirlwind journey of self-discovery.
When a devastating virus breaks out in a big city, killing its victims in 72 hours, a blue collar man must fight to expose the truth behind it's origin and the company that created it.
A young women unravels the chilling truth behind the death of her lover and a bizarre family secret they guard at all costs.
The story of a County Sheriff's investigation of a Texas serial killer.
Joe North is a cab driver in London, something that gives him many opportunities to have sex.
The corpse of a missing child turns up unaged twenty five years after the reported disappearance, turning the family and close-knit community against each other.
Amaterasu battles her way through life, only to find the shock of a lifetime at the end.
A remake of the classic 1995 film of the same name. A paranormal expert and his daughter bunk in an abandoned house populated by three mischievous ghosts and one friendly one.
Kermit and his friends go to New York City to get their musical on Broadway only to find it's a more difficult task than they anticipated.

Timmy is a bright boy but a lousy student. His teacher, Mrs. Stevens, has threatened to fail him. While he is supposed to be working on a current events project, he captures an escaped convict and holds the man hostage in his tree-house.
A rich rocket scientist organizes an expedition to the moon, which they discover is inhabited by nude women.
Two boys come up with a plan to put their village on the map and get a Guinness World Record.
A female war Vet suffering from PTSD unable to cope with normal society, puts her lethal expertise to work.
Part Two of the Loneliness Trilogy.

Dinosaur detective PaleoJoe and his side-kick Shelly, investigate the disappearance of Dinosaur Stan, one of the most complete skeletons of a tyrannosaurus Rex ever discovered from it's home at the Black Hills Museum.

When a priceless relic is stolen, Queen Margaret and Princess Stacy enlist the help of Margaret's cousin Fiona teams with a man from her past to retrieve it, with romance and resulting in a very unexpected switch.
A sweet-natured, small-town guy inherits a controlling stake in a media conglomerate and begins to do business his way.
Jayadev, an honest policeman, investigates the death of his colleague which leads him to a local goon, Mastan Babu. However, he goes up against him to get justice for his slain partner.
Egon Olsen has a plan. After several plans/attempts at the gang getting the red bag with compromising documents on illegal int'l arms deals, will they succeed in Paris?

A stubborn and tiring middle-aged man, who has voices in his ear telling him what to do, is assigned to 'deal with' a much younger apparently troublesome man, but struggles to come to the right decision.
Dad loses his job and now the family is in the need for money. Mie and Ole is working on a talent Show at their school and Little Per tries to help the family...
A hired labourer, Joseph, works on a farm inhabited by Monique, a war widow, and Jeanne, her captivating daughter who longs to escape to the big city.
Rubber, Scissors and Pencil leave the desk they live on to stop The Bear, who is planning to destroy them.
When some important papers are stolen from the King's Messenger by a female spy, the messenger's uncle sets out to retrieve them and unmask the spy.
The future of sports is put in jeopardy when a sheltered 6'8" high school kid displays superhuman athletic skills.
A small-time Grifter returns to his old turf to pull off one big last score. Standing in his way is a determined Detective and a mysterious sixteen year-old who might just be plying her own long con.
If you're looking for a new side hustle, you could sign up with the Night Mail. It's a delivery service with a dark difference. You'll be working for the dead.

When a greedy businessman discovers that there is gold underneath a dam, he decides to demolish the dam and claim the gold for himself, and tricks a witch's young daughter to help him in order to keep Bamse from stopping him.
The theatrical life of a beautiful courtesan in 1830s Paris and the four men who love her.
A drug bust spirals out of control, sending the police department into chaos.

The story of an ordinary family where upon the grandmother's death Kanji becomes an alcoholic home buddy, Hinako begins acting up and smiling leaves the lip of Haruko. Those are not the only problems either.

Sonny lives with his intellectually disabled older brother, and works as a bellhop at a second-rate hotel. This changes when Monique a beautiful, suicidal nut-case checks in. Sonny is offered a part in a heist that goes wrong.

One of the main intrigues of the Russian history is opened. How left, what in the XIX century Russia forever lost the lands in North America? After all it possessed the huge territory from Alaska to Northern California.
San Quentin prison inmate Arnie Judlow asks his twin brother Bill and his wife Ruth to assist him in a daring escape plan.
When a scientist finds a cocoon a woman emerges from it. She is being chased by two faceless monsters who are collecting specimens for a museum.

An American with a shady past joins with a morally-bankrupt Irishman to find treasure buried by Arabs in a deserted mosque in the Sahara. The situation becomes complicated when they are surrounded by bellicose Bedouin bandits.

The final chapter in the Heaven's Feel trilogy. Angra Mainyu has successfully possessed his vessel Sakura Matou. It's up to Rin, Shirou, and Rider to cleanse the grail or it will be the end of the world and magecraft as we all know it.

After discovering that the guy of her dreams plans on attending Stanford, the not so book smart Cassie does whatever it takes to be accepted, even if it means doing things that may get her kicked out of school if she gets caught.

Second film of the trilogy Narc Wars. Escobar kidnaps LJ to recover all the weapons the other had stolen. All is a trap made by LJ and the price is Escobar's life. He can managed to escape unscathed and kidnaps Latimer's mentor Mr Matanza.
Nancy discovers her new stepbro may be a Vampire.
After inheriting a trunk with a lantern in it, a man releases a beautiful genie named Samanthia. She starts granting his wishes and sexiness emerges all around him.
It tells the story of teenage anti-hero, Vicaria, who is on a desperate quest to cure death.

In 1897, in a castle near the town of Werewolfville in the Carpathians, a slightly deranged Professor Orfanik experiments with his new inventions which include, even at this early date, television and a film camera.
A struggling real estate broker decides to pursue a career in the film industry, and ends up working for the actress of his dreams.
Rambo mounts a one-man mission to rescue his friend Colonel Trautman from the clutches of the formidable invading Soviet forces in Afghanistan.
An Olympic gold medalist escapes to freedom in the US, only to be tracked down by his sadistic ex-coach.

A war veteran clashes with a mob boss in this crime saga. When Ryuji returns from the war, he finds himself torn by the death of an old friend - the son of crime kingpin Kiyomiya. A death Ryuji feels responsible for.

A successful defense lawyer and family man is lured by his criminal clients into a double life of drugs, witness intimidation...and murder. But when begins to win unwinnable cases, the Feds suspect he's more dangerous than his own clients.
After a tightly wound young British woman is hit by a bus and sent to purgatory, her spirit must stay behind and save the life of a suicidal artist within ten days, or be doomed to hell forever.
A gang of elderly pensioners carry out a number of spectacular heists, involving a vacuum cleaner and a sewer suction machine.

This movie contains four separate stories, each by a different director. They are all ghost stories, including themes such as death wishes, prison, and alcoholism. Good and evil women play prominent roles in the various tales.
Four friends discover and accidentally kill a burglar -- who may not be alone -- in the kitchen during their weekly poker night.
A pair of recently married gay men are threatened by the brother of one of the partners, a religious fanatic who plots to murder them after being ostracized by his church.
An American woman inherits an abandoned apartment in Paris and searches to uncover the mystery of why her Great Aunt kept it secret for over seventy years.
Thirty-year-old Hana (Ivana Chylková) enters a life crisis. She discovers her husband Igor's (Jiri Bartoska) infidelity and her life, subordinated to her husband, is suddenly questioned.
After moving into a cottage together, two young lovers confront the horrors of a forgotten childhood.
A misfit ant, looking for "warriors" to save his colony from greedy grasshoppers, recruits a group of bugs that turn out to be an inept circus troupe.
The dwarves, along with Bilbo Baggins and Gandalf the Grey, continue their quest to reclaim Erebor, their homeland, from Smaug. Bilbo Baggins is in possession of a mysterious and magical ring.
A girl is almost murdered, but no explainable motive can be found until a 20 year old murder is uncovered and linked to the case.
When a rash of demonic possessions occurs in Los Angeles, the Vatican summons an Irish Priest with mysterious powers: Ciaran the Demon Hunter.

A fully Animated Sci Fi Fantasy Film based loosely on Escher's Relativity. The characters must grapple with the consequences of disturbing the natural balance of things in their perfect world of geometric duplicity.
When Anders wakes up on his wedding day, he finds himself naked in an elevator, only remembering some of what happened.
A young boy born extraordinarily small must rescue his older brothers from a wicked ogre.

Eric is a journalist who stops publishing after a threat. Nicolasa convinces him to investigate a group of people stripped of their lands and resources. Eric then embarks on a search for justice that leads him to a mythological entity.
Mytyl and her brother Tyltyl, a woodchopper's children, are led by the Fairy Berylune on a magical trip through the past, present, and future to locate the Blue Bird of Happiness.
A man who has lost everything in a fire moves to a new neighbourhood and tries to pick the pieces of his life.
In a fantasy world of black and white, a young teenage girl discovers a magical portal leading to a secret world full of color.
Rumpelstiltskin tricks a mid-life crisis burdened Shrek into allowing himself to be erased from existence and cast in a dark alternate timeline where Rumpelstiltskin rules supreme.
The story of The Super Mario Bros. on their journey through the Mushroom Kingdom
After SpongeBob's beloved pet snail Gary is snail-napped, he and Patrick embark on an epic adventure to The Lost City of Atlantic City to bring Gary home.
It unleashes a war between police, gangsters and a gang of former mercenaries.

Two couples are enjoying their summer at the beach, but when the grown son of one couple arrives, it surprisingly stirs something in the husband of the other couple, will the forbidden feelings end badly?
A Copenhagen police officer seeks justice for his partner's murder by a mysterious man.

The classic Arthurian tale of tragic love. In medieval times, Lord of Cornwall decides to marry an Irish princess Isolde. However, his most loyal knight Tristan becomes bewitched by her beauty and they fall hopelessly in love.
A reporter, notorious for working on pseudo-documentaries, must uncover the legend of the three guardian monsters who must rise to defend Japan from the vengeful spirits within Godzilla.

The much anticipated sequel on the "Heroes of Sorrow" saga. A group of relatives of missing POWs in the Falklands War, seek retribution by hijacking a military airplane with a cargo of nuclear weapons.
The owner of Annapurna boarding house faces trouble for letting a girl stay at the boys hostel.

A talented youth is overlooked by a family of individuals that are absorbed in their own dramas, but when he becomes an over night sensation on the internet he unintentionally brings a broken family back together.
A hopeless man stranded on a deserted island befriends a dead body, and together they go on a surreal journey to get home.
All Hell breaks loose when a gang member kidnaps the boss' wife in a move to take over control of the gang.
A young prince's epic journey of love, obsession and betrayal.
In this second startling film in the BLIND DEAD series, writer/director Amando de Ossorio returns to the horrific origin of the depraved Templar:
An adventure seeker and his fiancée visit an uncharted island, only to find that it is inhabited by deadly dinosaurs and other creatures ready to attack.
A Gulf war veteran is wrongly sent to a mental institution for insane criminals, where he becomes the object of a doctor's experiments, and his life is completely affected by them.
Two cops--both partners and best friends--find their friendship and their lives at stake when they try to take down a ruthless drug dealer.
It's a fairy tale romance when a modern Cinderella meets her handsome lover prince.
A man and woman meet and find out they have trouble with their relationship.
A man is framed and sent to prison for a crime he didn't commit. When he is let out on limited parole, he sets out to clear his name and find the real criminals.
A serial killer strikes again during WWII in Germany. The wrong man is arrested and a detective hunts down the real killer. But justice in Nazi Germany is not so easily administered.
Rival toy store owners compete over several Christmas seasons, and God's grace goes to work in their lives.
Police inspector Romano is investigating the kidnapping of a journalist entangling himself into a web of secrets of a business tycoon and the police captain.
A seasoned F.B.I. Agent's child-genius son assists him on catching a child-killer, a schizophrenic mohab nut who believes he's been chosen by god to be a new Noah.
A young boy sneaks onto his grandfather's hot-air balloon and together they travel over France.
A gold-digger floozy marries a wealthy wine producer but she secretly takes a young lover with whom she conspires to murder her husband for his fortune.
An artist falls in love with a girl and get addicted to drinks and smoke after love failure

Upon returning to his hometown for the first time in years, folk singer Cole Jackson learns that corrupt politicians have been poisoning the land with toxic waste, and permanently silencing anyone who dares speak out.
A village boy meets his tragic fate when he is sent to the city to work for a rich trader.
The story of the legendary German Shepherd who was found by American pilot Lee Duncun in France during World War I, and later became the most famous animal star in Hollywood history.
The action heats up when history's most memorable icons come to life for an amorous meltdown in this interactive "please touch" museum.
In a Scandinavian insane asylum, murderer Salem sneaks out at night to exact his revenge on those who he deems responsible for his predicament.
American Fashion Publicist Gabby invites Paco, a talented Mexican Chef, to move with her to the USA, with the hopes of building their lives and careers together.
An unfulfilled divorced woman gets the chance to relive her past when she meets a young man who appears to be her high school sweetheart who died many years before.
A young runaway girl hides out in the barn of a retired horse trainer and forms a bond with his troubled filly.
A Los Angeles detective tracks a strangler that has the city by the throat, eventually leading to him discovering a sexually sadistic cult with powerful influence inside the city's police department.

Billy Dombrowski and a rag-tag group kids set out on a journey to form a hockey team. To become a team, they must first learn to work together, trust in each other's abilities to win -- together they are persevering on thin ice.
Two overly imaginative pranksters named George and Harold hypnotize their principal into thinking he's a ridiculously enthusiastic, incredibly dimwitted superhero named Captain Underpants.
No mercy for a woman who has been living in sin for six years.
Mr. White, a delegate from Hollywood Films, arrives in Barcelona to visit their distributors. The programming section girl will be his guide.

The Olsen gang is on vacation in Spain. They've run out of money so Egon Olsen has a plan. Leaving prison in Denmark, he joins the big time without his friends. Will they help Egon when he gets conned?
Spirit, dwelling in a cave, raised young and gave a magical power and the fire of justice. After that, the guys joined in the fight against evil.
Beauty on the inside is just as important when looking for love as beauty on the outside. Right? A FilmBuff Presentation.
A manga artist becomes suspicious of his employers when a garbled message is discovered on tape. As he forms a team to investigate, Godzilla and Anguirus set out to help defeat the invaders.

A drug that alters perceptions during trauma and stress, is being advertised as a cure for socio-political tensions. Several couples volunteer for human trials but end up with more than they bargained for.
A female-led gang of orphaned teenagers fights corruption.
A former CIA operative turned political talk show host is hired by a disaffected corporate shareholder to expose her company's cover-up of an incident and deaths in an Ecuadorian village.
Dharani, a daring youth, gives refuge to Anjali, a rich girl, who fled from her house to escape a marriage with her rowdy uncle. But, his act of goodwill invites more trouble for him and his family.
A Bible professor from 1890 comes forward in time to the present via a time machine and cannot believe the things that he sees!
Mike travels through time and dimensions to find the Tall Man's origins.
Jealousy and the need to possess all destroys the life of an extraordinary beauty.
Federal Marshall Tex Miller, and his girl-friend Belinda Pendergast are having problems with the masked bandid 'Pecos Pete'.
Two siblings try to bring a dolphin separated from his family back home.
Rikki, a young mongoose raised to fear mankind, awakens in a human home after a storm, and is forced to choose between his mongoose values and saving his new human family from two king cobras.

An intense and erotic love is born out of loneliness and secret passion. The woman is married. The young soldier is starting to recover. She is not who he thinks she is. A film about the urgency of deceit and desire; seeing and not seeing.

Boxing trainer Claus works a second job as a collector for loan shark Holger in order to pay off his own debts. He is assisted by Igor, a 'Jaws'-like tough guy. Trouble arises when Claus falls in love with hot-tempered Laura.

Andy Lau played a high IQ young man who got 8 years old-like mental age, who suddenly becomes a head of triad society. With his kiddish behavior and desire to always play with games and toys, would he make it?
Tired of the authorities' ability to deal with a family of mobsters, a martial artist creates his own gang to fight back.
A beautiful woman looking for a rich husband but her greed causes her in problems .

Lucas lives with his daughter in a quiet town. One day Franco suffers a terrorist attack, as a result of which Lucas's daughter dies. The pain and hatred take over Lucas and he decides to go to Madrid and plan the assassination of Franco
Summoned to India by a dying maharajah, Tarzan attempts to remove an elephant herd from a valley to be flooded upon completion of a modern dam.
Henry isn't well and goes out.
A group steals a death ray in order to terrorise the world into peace. The inventor and his daughter try to retrieve the death ray with the aid of a government agent.
Three vegetable friends seek the roots of true heroism during a 17th-century adventure.
The mystery surrounding Mike is that of Andy, the mother's brother, who disappeared in the woods one day.

A group of youths aspiring to become professional superheroes, fight in a world full of people with abilities, also known as quirks. Deku and his fellow classmates from Hero Academy face Nine, the strongest villain yet.
Pulled back to a past Earth, Captain Trelane and his crew must escape a strange subterranean robot facility.
British gangster Kevin (Mark Denham) has to choose between money and family as he reluctantly pursues a life of crime to afford his daughter's life-saving medication.
Professional hit-man Charlie Wolfe finds himself in three tales of murder, blackmail and revenge after a botched contract assignment.
A cruel man is given the gift of a delicious fig that holds the powers to make dreams come true. But while he tries to fill his dreams of riches, his poor dog hopes to find a better life.
A young boy becomes a crime-fighting superhero with the help of a mysterious pharmacist's invisibility powder.
The fairy tale of a young aspiring singer who leaves her hometown to go to a major city to make her dreams come true.
Gulliver washes ashore on Brobdingnag and becomes an object of curiosity for its gigantic inhabitants.
A scientist discovers a formula that makes him invisible.
A Southern California girl befriends three furry aliens after their spaceship lands in her swimming pool.
Set in a roller skating rink, this film includes a Toys For Tots skate jam highlighting some of the top jam skaters in the nation.
A group of preteens and teens mislabeled as thug cope with inner city life. This film gives great insight to young people's challenges.
An ex gang member from East London is abandoned by the love of his life and finds himself back on the streets facing an angry community that never forgot.
After a drunken night ending in a fight; a man wakes up to find that a murder was committed and that he may be responsible.

A modern-day Robin Hood, Ananya (codename: Venus), meets a Master Con Artist, Neel (codename: Alpha), through the Dark Web. They plan a heist to loot a billionaire fugitive of his ill-gotten money and disrupt his smuggling network.

Kidnappers demand six million in ransom, but the United Nations does not negotiate with terrorists. One of the best counterfeiters is serving a lengthy prison term and the agent who arrested him needs his help.
Martin (33) goes on vacation to the beach with his girlfriend. Everything seems normal, until his mother arrives. Lightning strikes and there is a car to disappear.
An eminent attorney finds herself in a desperate search for her kidnapped husband.
Set in Tokyo in 1998, three 19-year-old time patrollers are dispatched to take part in time travelling vampire hunting.
Mobster Paul Vitti is released into Dr. Ben Sobol's care, where only more chaos ensues.
Before Christmas, in the village of Hart's Landing, an ominous shadow may befall! Will Walter and Tandoori be able to save their village from an ecological disaster?
When natural elements turn Christmas vacation into involuntary prison at an mountain hut and the children decide to take their parent's fate into their own hands, a romantic comedy can start.
A nameless hero in command of a secret human weapon arises from the ashes of the fallen Jushin empire to defend the people from zombies, cannibals and beasts.

A military expedition in Siberia gone wrong. The existence of humanity is in peril as Inanna, Sumerian goddess of lust and war has summoned a giant meteor to destroy the planet, after being accidentally set free from her ancient prison.

A 19th-century drama about a man whose heart was replaced with a clock when he was born. The situation dictates that he should avoid feeling strong emotions -- love, most of all -- but he just can't keep his feelings under wraps.
A forest ranger with the ability to visit the past by looking at photographs attempts to solve the mystery behind his father's sudden death.

The rom-com flavored cute love story of Jalwayu Enclave revolves around a village-based guy Gurjazz and Delhite Air Hostess Monica, who unfortunately gets locked up in the same building during the covid-19 lockdown.

The Long Knife is a 1958 British crime film concerning a young nurse who becomes drawn into criminal activities. Directed by Montgomery Tully and starring Joan Rice, Sheldon Lawrence and Victor Brooks.
Ancient mysteries. Powerful evil. And a fearless hero's quest through a fantastical realm of steam-powered wonders and sinister magic...
Sergey Gromov is professional stuntman. While accepting easy-to-done job for good money, he finds himself involved in dangerous game of some mafiosi.

Probably in our world there are no coincidences but then we have to admit that up there a lot of beings could be working overtime. And here in our place in the left corner of the lukewarm suburb they are really doing their best.
The film deals with an attention grabbing narrative plot involving an educated Muslim girl who revolts against wearing Burkha.

Famed swordsman and poet Cyrano de Bergerac is in love with his cousin Roxane. He has never expressed his love for her as he his large nose undermines his self-confidence. Then he finds a way to express his love to her, indirectly.

Dad is to take the 5 kids to Egypt but the plane leaves without him. They can't enter Egypt without an adult supervisor; their neighbor agrees to take them but she wants to visit museums and the kids want to swim and see the camel race.

When Karyavardhi and Bala Nagamma's son, Balavardhi comes to know that his parents are held captive by a wicked wizard, he sets off on an adventurous journey to kill the wicked wizard and free his parents.
Jon Arbuckle buys a second pet, a dog named Odie. However, Odie is then abducted and it is up to Jon's cat, Garfield, to find and rescue the canine.
A young married couple loses their year-old son Saba in a shopping center. Lasha and Tekla together with their friends begin to look for the kid in the festive and cheerful atmosphere.

A salesman named Kosuke Okuda happens to meet Mao Watarai, a friend from his middle school days. Back then Mao was bullied, but now she is an attractive woman. Kosuke and Mao fall in love and decide to marry, but Mao has a secret.

Ten-year old Sakura Avalon, Cardcaptor of the elusive, magical Clow Cards, unexpectedly wins a trip to Hong Kong where strange dreams lead her to an imprisoned sorceress with close connections to the creator of the cards.
A chronicle of the tragic love affair between American poet Elizabeth Bishop and Brazilian architect Lota de Macedo Soares.
This film tracks a hasty marriage through its first 365 days.
In the Far East, Alex O'Connell, the son of famed mummy fighters Rick and Evy O'Connell, unearths the mummy of the first Emperor of Qin -- a shape-shifting entity cursed by a witch centuries ago.
Two young brothers are forced to track down their absent father, having recently returned from service in Afghanistan, after he disappears during a reindeer hunt in the mountains.
A fan movie based upon the first Warriors book, Into The Wild.

A princess visiting the US is saved from being arrested in an illegal speakeasy by a prizefighter. They fall in love, but she must go back to her nation to become queen, and can't marry a commoner. Complications ensue.
An American girl travels to Brazil and falls in love with a drug dealer from the favelas, in the pulsing city of Rio de Janeiro.

When an illusive Syrian terrorist begins ruthless killings of innocent civilians and turns his focus to the United States, the CIA is left with few choices and considers paying him off. With only one chance and no back-up, a group of elite Deltas are assembled to go into Syria and rid the world of him once and for all.
Based on the life of Japanese serial killer and thief Kiyotaka Katsuta.
A young man studying to become a priest is kidnapped. He then start's to hear the voice of God.
Nick Black is a Plymouth Serial Killer But Once He Wasn't Alone And Worked With Three Serial Killer Friends Each As Dangerous As Him.
A musical fantasy with riotful and fantastic comedy.
In 1898, spirited nine-year-old Ociee Nash lives with her father and brother in rural Mississippi until her father sends her to live with her refined aunt in Asheville, North Carolina.
An erotic vampire tale set in a surreal world of pleasure and betrayal.

Based on the true story of a young South-Asian man who loses a bet with his father and agrees to take part in an arranged marriage, unaware that he may very well fall in love with the young woman he is being unwillingly paired with.
Two idiots try to pretend that their murdered employer is really alive, leading the hitman to attempt to track him down to finish him off.
A mermaid falls in love with a human prince, which leads to tragedy.
A miracle pill intended to save the world causes unforeseen side-effects forcing the surviving gays and bible thumpers in a small Texas town to join forces or fall prey to the flesh craving mutants.
An adventurous teenager summons the courage to help a friendly dinosaur to escape from the clutches of a mad scientist that wants to use him for experimentations.
The origin story of Bhavesh Joshi, an Indian superhero, who sets out to fulfill his slain friend's wish to clean and reform the country, by training himself to fight and wearing a mask.
A small time crook keeps trying to reunite with a woman who briefly sheltered him while he was on the run from the law.
Ravi and Vinod's father is killed by a don, for developing a photo that showcases a crime scene. Ravi, a criminal and Vinod, a cop, decide to exact revenge from their father's killer.

A stay-at-home dad drives for an Uber-like company until he encounters a beautiful escort and decides to use the family minivan to drive for her agency, unwittingly sending him into the seedy underbelly of the skin trade trade.
A woman sets out to take revenge on the mobster who murdered her boyfriend over a gambling debt.
When they are forced to work together, rival detectives fall in love.
A "born free" type story set in Kenya about an orphaned cheetah cub that is adopted and raised by an American family.
Blessed with superhuman / Superman-like abilities since birth, Darna battles the evil Maria, a former childhood friend who's now possessed by an evil spirit.
Struggling to keep his family together David wavers between doing things God's way and the temptation to handle things himself when he can't afford treatment for his daughter's rare cancer.

A young doctor wakes up from a car accident and discovers she is married to another man and living a life she can't remember. Her search for the truth to her past life will lead her to question everyone around her and her entire existence.

Reika is a transfer student and comes from the sky. Her true character is an angel. Her purpose is to find an angel, Luna, who is missing on ground. However, she meets friendship and love. These are the things that angels must not feel.
A prince (Mahesh Kumar) pretends to be a fool, but is in actuality a black-cloaked hero who steps into action when members of the royal court plan to overthrow the king.

Set in another galaxy in another time zone. The warrior Lorf Degan, half Elf half Man must rescue the land of Trillium from the devil forces of Skaarka half beast half Elf that will kill and destroy all before them.
He grow as a gifted kid, always watching after others.

A legendary fifteen-foot tall mountain gorilla named Joe is taken to an animal sanctuary in California by zoologist Gregg O'Hara (Bill Paxton) and Jill Young (Charlize Theron), with whom he grew up. Poacher Strasser (Rade Serbedzija) returns from the past to seek vengeance on Joe.
An outlaw leader fakes a draw for a sick girl so he can help her escape.

After the brutal murder of the prostitute Vera Paterny, Inspector Reinisch hardly makes any progress with the investigation. Vera's colleague Sonja reports on wild sex parties of the murdered and mentions names, prominent names.
Masked intruders take the family of a bank manager hostage in order to rob his bank.
Charlie is hired to deliver a pearl necklace to a millionaire at his ranch. When murder intervenes he disguises himself as a Chinese servant and begins sleuthing.
A homeless man with amnesia and a troubled teenage girl, develop an unusual attraction for each other, as his other worldly abilities draw unwanted attention from the authorities.
Paris-Tehran. A rootless love story between Gecko, young and free, and Anahita, an Iranian woman in exile - tangled up in History and steeped in Internet, unique and spontaneous.

Nick is a student who moves to a new place to study for his exams. Unfortunately his roommates give him hell but he always manages to forgive them after a visit from Jesus Christ, Virgin Mary and God in his sleep..Until one day he snaps.
A former British agent is employed at the Fenton country estate where he aids Fenton's niece in eluding the police after she's unjustly accused of murdering a local gamekeeper.
A whimsical look at hurried relationships and the friends caught in the wake. They are looking for love, even if they don't know it.
After possibly killing a man in a brawl at a farewell party Tony Gunther, an American merchant seaman, is knocked out and wakes up in the apartment of Laura Ring, the secretary of a shipping company.

When the older sister of Shira, an 18-year-old Hasidic Israeli, dies suddenly in childbirth, Shira must decide if she can and should marry her widowed brother-in-law, which also generates tensions within her extended family.
The swordsman and the commissar crossed their swords over the treasure.

Little Iodine does her best to break up her parents' marriage, ruin a romance between Janis and Marc, and cost her father his job, but eventually she has a change of heart and sets out to correct the wrongs.
An angel was cast out of Heaven to find and protect "The One," a person who holds the key to saving mankind from demons and other monsters.

The movie revolves around youth who enter junior college after finishing high school. As teenagers, the 16 year young minds go through various roller-coaster rides wanting to experience new things. But sometimes things do go awry.
When the moon is full, young men die attempting to reach the mysterious blue light in the mountains.
The horrendous spanish detective becomes a bodyward in his new third adventure.
A family reunion goes awry when the housemaid is found dead and threats from an unknown killer put all under house arrest.

Efficiency expert Joy Miles has her free-spirited mother-in-law Loraine's move from Louisville to Savannah planned to the minute until one missed flight turns a straightforward road trip into the hilarious journey of a lifetime.

Private investigator Abel Walker (Ackerman) along with his cameraman, Jim (Foy), are on the hunt for a missing woman. As they unravel the mystery of her disappearance, they become caught in a sick and violent game that will end in murder.
A lieutenant is accused of shooting a squire to save an heiress. He is cleared by a dying confession.

Angela works as a TV show-runner. Years ago she decided to focus on her TV family and leave the running of her real family to her husband. When a family crisis brings her back to Portland - can she play the role of "Mommy" once again?
An angel under the thumb of a ruthless gangster is saved by a trumpet player down on his luck.
A girl aids her sister's romance with a man who really prefers her.
Japan builds its first aircraft carrier, the Ibuki, to deal with escalating world tensions.
A fairy tale of three brothers (Pavel Reznícek, Jirí Langmajer and Karel Dobrý) hatched from eggs who try to save a princess (Lada Jelínková) kidnapped by an evil wizard (Jaromír Dulava).
If we don't belong neither here, nor there, where home will be?
Yaji and Kita are two men who live in Edo. They are deeply in love. Yaji is married to a woman, while Kita is an actor addicted to various drugs.

In a near-future city where soaring opulence overshadows economic hardship, Gwen and her daughter Jules do all they can to hold on to their joy together, despite the instability surfacing in their world.
A rich man's past comes knocking when he is informed that one of his employees is his long lost son. He does not know that he's being cheated and that his real son is the one who loves his niece.

Vivika Zaharouli, sick and tired of the goings-on of her womanizer husband, welcomes in Athens her godchild, who comes to live in their house. She doesn't know, however, that this is not her godchild but an impostor.
Mad scientist Mataro Madano has hijacked the Mach Train, and the Rescue Force must use all the tools at their disposal to save the passengers.
A disfigured Holocaust survivor sets out to determine if the man she loved betrayed her trust.

A small child witnessing the murder of his parents at the hands of demons. The child narrowly escapes and comes under the care of a wise old master, who subjects him to a training regime that will lead to him on a mission of vengeance.
A young noblewoman must fulfill her calling to become the long foretold Paladin.
A boy sets out on a quest to save his ill mother by searching for a mythic figure said to have magical healing powers.
A group of unaccompanied minors bond while snowed in at the midwestern Hoover International Airport during the holiday season and ultimately create a makeshift holiday themselves.

As Spawn struggles to control his own destiny, he is caught between the forces of Heaven and Hell. Heaven has sent merciless angels to destroy him, while Hell has its own forces beckoning him to serve his rightful master.

A long hot summer in rural Norfolk and a rough coming of age for Goob Taylor, fighting with brutal, womanizing stock car racer Gene Womack for his mother's attention, and falling for the exotic charms of a pretty foreign field worker.

A group of children in the town of Elmira attempt to convince a local bigwig to keep open the factory he has decided to shut down. The kinds actions restore the businessman's faith in the community he had soured on.
The story of young ballerina Anna, as she becomes a professional dancer and is ready to leave Munich and move across the Atlantic to New York.
The FBI's most powerful weapon is the mind of one man.

When a Mafia don's right-hand man, a bulldog named Sonny, swallows his ring, comedy ensues as two of the don's best soldiers try and retrieve the ring from Sonny, who has been adopted by a new family.

The trials and tribulations of two high school students deeply in love with each other, but facing the challenge of their completely different social backgrounds, during the twilight of the communist Romania.
Karthik and Yamini can't stand each other, but there lies the twist when opposites attract.
Reyes Mendoza (Carmen Sevilla) is a Spanish artist who arrives in Mexico in 1913 and finds herself involved in the Pancho Villa (Jose Elias Moreno) revolution.
Railway Anti-Criminal Task Force (RATs) investigates three unrelated murders happened in a train.
A veteran of the Chechen War is helped by the ghosts of his two fallen comrades to leave the war behind.

Reza is a poor musician who is wandering the streets. One night he finds a baby and with all the difficulties he decides to brings him up. But when the boy's real father becomes aware that his child is alive he decides to take him back.

Priscilla Williams, a young girl living with her widowed mother and paternal grandfather at the post he commands in northern India, becomes enamored of military life and embroiled in brewing rebellion against the crown in the early 1900's.
Psychologist Dr. Brennac is asked by a colleague to help with the case of Claude, a patient on trial for multiple murders. Is Claude really guilty of the crimes, or is he a victim of his own mind?

Author of erotic literature is suffering from writer's block. Beautiful women from various eras of history start appearing to the desperate man to introduce him to erotica popular in their times to help him find inspiration.

Following the lead up to one of the biggest robberies of the century, Hatton Garden The Heist watches the journey of Brian Reader, John Collins, Terry Perkins, Daniel Jones and the mysterious Basil throughout the audacious heist.
To reach the sea, a soldier has to fight his way through zombie hordes as well attempt to help other survivors along the way.
A woman's ex-husband teams up with her fiancé's one-time lover to come between the woman and her true destiny.
Adventure, Romance. Comedy, Songs - In a setting of an isle of enchantment.

Placed near the Rio Bravo (Rio Grande) a son of the richest family in small town that sees all it's inhabitants as servants. Which leads him to believe there are no consequences for his actions even rape and murder.
A young burnout couple enters the dangerous world of dream farming, a counter-economy in which the impoverished sell their dreams to the wealthy.

Nick Hume is a mild-mannered executive with a perfect life, until one gruesome night he witnesses something that changes him forever. Transformed by grief, Hume eventually comes to the disturbing conclusion that no length is too great when protecting his family.
The Danish fantasy film 'The Land of Glass' is about the young boy Jas who lives alone in a closed gardener with his father, a truck driver and often away.
A gas station robbery and murder. A community tired of watching their city fall victim to senseless crime. An effort to put make a difference.
A desperate Mexican Waitress seeking to earn money for her father's life-saving operation takes a new job only to find herself on the deadly path of a savage crime family's hunt for a stolen diamond.
A woman who is kidnapped and forced to compete in elite underground fights and has to battle her way out to freedom.
Follows a young boy who runs away from home in search of his estranged mother.
Séneca gets in trouble after receiving an e-mail from Heaven and becoming the fastest man in the world.

FBI Agents Luke Murphy and Jessica Rosen must resort to creative and unethical methods to combat Noah Moretti and his criminal crew who have partnered with a major cartel to traffic young women and children.

After missing his father's funeral, a young man, Lloyd, and his best friend, Drew, navigate through the home and people he left behind, then take a trip across the country to learn more about Lloyd's recently deceased parent.

When a depressed woman is burgled, she finds a new sense of purpose by tracking down the thieves alongside her obnoxious neighbour. But they soon find themselves dangerously out of their depth against a pack of degenerate criminals.
In a future where a plague has infected much of the population, two brothers are tasked with traveling to Canada to retrieve a mysterious package.

A young lady is kept away from boys by her overprotective mother because flames tend to spontaneously erupt whenever her hormones are aroused; for her, "protection" on a dinner date is carrying a fire extinguisher.
When his powerful crime czar boss kills the man he considered a mentor, a young gangster on the rise goes to war in order to get revenge.

An adventure into unfamiliar and very funny territory both on and off the field for an American Pro Baseball Player, who finds himself in the smallest town in Australia with a cricket bat in his hands and a little girl's life at stake.
A psychic who can't read his own future falls in love with one of his ever-so-skeptical clients.
A rancher and former rodeo star comes across a runaway boy while he is hunting a wild stallion.
A real all-star cast turns out for this modern yakuza yarn.

Sief, is a con artist who's hired by the beautiful rich woman Hala to help her get her money back from another conman, to begin an endless series of tricks and games in which the concepts of love, friendship and life get mixed-up.
Mia moves to South Africa with her family to manage a lion farm and develops a special bond with Charlie, a white lion cub. However, things change when she uncovers her father's secret.
An impoverished village school-teacher's problems mount after winning a car.

A group of teenagers struggling in the wizardry business accidentally unleash an inter-dimensional vampire from his prison using a teleportation cube, and must stop him before he devours the good people of their little town.
Going into the depths of the mind, the story of Amphibious explores what scientists are secretly meeting about on scale that takes the viewer into another vertical of thought.
The story about Klas Ekengren, the mayor of a small Swedish town, and his mother Alma.
Four prostitutes join together to travel the Old West.
The story of a 25 year old virgin girl, looking for the right boyfriend, not realizing that "the one" has been next to her for many years.
An attempt to bring the border between fiction and reality as close as possible, until it is unrecognizable.
A doctor travels from America to India to investigate a man with paranormal healing powers, and uncovers the existence of a dark power that has the potential to transform humans into a new species.
A lover finds that his prospective father-in-law wants him dead.
A childless couple bury a box in their backyard, containing all of their wishes for an infant. Soon, a child is born, though Timothy Green is not all that he appears.

Deep diver Bricks has had 524 diving operations with inspecting oil installations in the deep North Sea. He and his friend is to retire. They are persuaded to a last lucrative job, When the diving bell is stuck 100 meter below sea level.
Danny Lee is a retired cop investigating the murder of his wife, witnessed only by his son.
In a time of conflict, a group of unlikely heroes band together on a mission to steal the plans to the Death Star, the Empire's ultimate weapon of destruction.
When the girl he likes goes missing, Jake enlists the help of his grandpa and Grandpa's former special ops buddies.
Raymond's father is the leader of the Scorpios and he is preparing to hand over the business to his son. Other gang leaders, Phoenix and Anders, know this too well.

An adventurous story about the famous alchemist Wilhelm Storitz. He dislikes the idea of the marriage of Marc and the local beauty Mira and so he uses his ability of being invisible to stand in the way of their wedding.
Fourth installment of the 'G.I. Joe' film franchise.
He-Man, the most powerful man in the universe, goes against the evil Skeletor to save the planet Eternia and protect the secrets of Castle Grayskull.
Moti and Raja are twins. While Moti is loved by everyone, Raja, who paints women, is considered a fool. When Moti's wife falsely accuses Raja of rape, the family throws him out of the house.
When one of his colleagues becomes corrupted by power and goes over to the dark side, a young police officer tries to bring the offender to justice.

A simple self-destructive drifter and tough small-time boxer with a brain injury that could kill him meets and falls for a cute beach carnival owner, Ruby, but also befriends a sleazy friendly criminal, Wesley, who's planning a big score.

In a New England port town, Pop Thorson and Rocky Blake are rival tugboat owners. Thorson's boat has sunk in the shallow water while docked, and he is certain Blake sabotaged it for winning a lucrative contract of military supplies.
They knew each other in another life, destiny united them again, and destiny is trying to keep them apart. A story of love and reincarnation.
A re-imagining of the circumstances surrounding the fatal crash of Soviet orbital capsule, Soyuz-1.
Sometimes healing comes from the most unexpected places.
A comet crashes into a Japanese forest and a group of mighty ninjas must fight a group of killer Aliens before they reach their village and kill everyone.
Legends collide as young Yuda wrestles with his newfound godlike powers, defending his world in an endless battle against ancient and powerful evils.
Told through the eyes of seven children drawn from diverse local and ethnic multicultural backgrounds, 'KIDS' delves into pressing issues facing Australian society.
Pinoy version of America's Captain Marvel.
A Modern day Nazi death squad embark on a covert mission to recover lost treasure in south america and only handful of British mercs stand in their way.
To Catch a Yeti. To live a dream. To Meat a Loaf. Some things just seem too good to be true.
A composition of symbolic, surreal and almost mystic images.

A ruthless pirate captures the keeper of a lighthouse, in the most southern city in Argentina. His goal is obvious and horrific. He plans to control the lighthouses signals in a way that the passing ships will be crushed on the rocks.
An evil witch tries to take possession of a crystal ball from the hands of a young and benevolent witch.
A poor but honest clerk, burdened by his family's dependence on him, sells state secrets to a traitorous businessman in exchange for wealth.

After her estranged father dies during a UFO sighting, a country singer returns to her hometown of Lost Heart, Michigan and learns about forgiveness, redemption, UFOs, Bigfoot, and Jesus in this better than average religious movie.
Pretending to be rare stamp dealer, a man devotedly supports wife and musically talented younger brother as a professional hit-man.
With retirement on his mind, a successful Atlanta-based drug dealer sets up one last big job while dealing with trigger-happy colleagues and the police.
"I deliver everything that the post office service does not handle." Eun-ha, who is a normal junkyard employee, secretly works as a delivery clerk that deals with unusual delivery requests.
A struggling ex-con and his unpredictable accomplice scam superficial trophy wives and their rich older husbands in self-obsessed Los Angeles.
A naive teenager is sent to rehab camp when her straitlaced parents and friends suspect her of being a lesbian.
In a post climate apocalypse United States, a snowy civil war is dominated by one female super soldier.
Baseball superstar Gehrig is one of several ranchers being coerced by a bunch of bandits. His sister and her lawyer/lover organize the ranchers.

Young Thomas skipped school and while walking the Berlin streets he notices a house afire and two small children were saved. It was determined to locate this "unknown" boy, but Thomas remained silent for fear of being exposed as a truant.
Born out of a Christmas ornaments-filled heaven, Turkish Superman fights the mob in order to save the day!
The life of Kennedy Gamarra, a rebellious teenager, who in a moment of rage decides to enlist in the army - an experience that will change his life and that of his corrupt relatives.

Vet leads his team of disbanded mercenaries into the treacherous Gallows Wood on one last mission to capture the elusive Professor Black. What was meant to be a simple extraction mission soon becomes a terrifying journey into madness.
Tough cop Dave Bannion takes on a politically powerful crime syndicate.
After being found wandering the streets of Los Angeles, a severely catatonic woman tells a doctor the complex story of how she wound up there.
A Turkish remake of Hard Times (1975).

1938. A group of American archaeologists are taken prisoners in the Castle of Wewelsburg. Indiana Jones with Sallah and Husani will travel to the Nazi Vatican, to discover the last and the darkest plan of the Third Reich.
A young desperate car thief suddenly finds herself in a snowballing hornets nest when she steals a car that just so happens to belong to the son of the Deputy Secretary of the NSA.
Public Security Bureau officer Li Xiao inflitrates a gang that is holding up trains in the 1980s.
When a beautiful photo model disappears, police track the photographer who last saw her. At his trial, the model herself tells her side of the story.
A hopelessly depressed woman's life turns around when she purchases a magic Black Velvet Pantsuit.
THE MEMBERS OF A SPECIAL COMMANDO TASK FORCE ARE SUBJECTED TO THE CONFLICTING FORCES OF FRIENDSHIP AND DUTY.
The mystical love story between Chonen, a poor Talmud student, and Lea, a girl from a wealthy family, depicts the traditional folk culture of Polish Jews before WW2.
A happily married couple's relationship is jeopardized when they discover a time travel portal in their attic that allows them to revisit their lives.
When Carl Pearson is wrongful accused of killing his brother, it's clear that he has been a pawn in a conspiracy to steal the blueprints to a new plane.
Jo the gangster has the formidable gift of bringing down the worst kind of catastrophes on the heads of his best friends. Thus everything would be perfect if Simon hadn't lent his car to Jo.

Mackenzie goes to Costa Rica with her best friend Ethan, to secure cacao for her work at a chocolate company. She hopes Ethan will see her through new eyes. When a tourist meets Mackenzie, his interest in her makes Ethan wake up.

Based on a true events about a community that comes together to organize a miracle for a teen battling an aggressive form of brain cancer while two men find their own restoration in his healing journey and a father finds his faith again.

When the country is in peril, Lord Tajima summons his son to retrieve the mystical Yagyu Scroll is order to save all of Japan. This time, Jubei must stop the evil plot of Lord Hayatonosho who secretly plans on overthrowing the Shogunate.
A sci-fi, rock 'n' roll, essay, fantasy film about art, music, fetish, creation, love, and records. Based on the LP "The Lost Record" by Escape-ism.
A grandfather and grandson's relationship is deepened by a detour into the woods.
In an effort to improve the circulation of his notorious scandal magazine, unscrupulous owner, editor and publisher H. R. Manley spares nobody.
A man descends into paranoia after trapping what he believes to be the devil in his basement, but things take a dark turn when his family unexpectedly arrive for Christmas.
Major Joe Nolan heads a rescue mission in the South Pacific to recover a downed atomic rocket. The crew crash lands on a mysterious island, and spends much time rock-climbing.
In 2040 when there's no more water, Michelle a 12 year old girl never loses hope. But hope is not the only thing that she needs to survive in the middle of a post-apocalyptic world.
The owner of a talking mule, now a horse-breeder, gets involved with gangsters.
An FBI agent posing as a combine driver becomes romantically involved with a Midwest farmer who lives a double life as a white supremacist.
Gunda is all about villans how they destroy people and kill them
When a couple of retired mercenaries meet again, they decide to take advantage of their past skills and plan to rob a casino.
A cropduster pilot finds himself caught between two women--one who loves him and the other, who doesn't handle rejection well, who's out to destroy him.
A father/daughter fishing trip goes bad when the store they are shopping in is taken hostage.
Professor Niels Klitgaard lecture in anatomy at the University. With external influences, the heart can beat the so-called Heart Bank faster, proclaiming the Professor.
After years abroad, a woman returns to her family home in Taiwan and begins to contemplate the meaning of life and home.
A dark fairytale about a missing persons detective who is forced to relive his worst nightmares as he searches the haunted forest for two lost children.
North korea man and South korea women meet in the room.
Two children enter a fantasy kingdom and are confronted by evil forces.
Cryptozookeepers try to capture a Baku, a dream-eating hybrid creature of legend, and start wondering if they should display these beasts or keep them hidden and unknown.
Three mysterious girls show up at canterlot high and cause trouble. With the magic of friendship, they want to defeat the mysterious girls.
Sequoyah and the old ways foretell the Trail of Tears. Romance rises in the darkest of hours. The rise, fall, and rebirth of the Cherokee Nation.

Thirty years after a boy's disappearance, a journalist revives interest in the case, which in turn compels the victim's brother to look for this woman's daughter in the snowy hinterlands of northern Japan.
Five former summer camp misfits who reconnect under some seriously suspicious circumstances, and soon discover that their worst nightmares were true.
An elderly couple are forced to live hundreds of miles apart when they lose their house and none of their five children will take both parents in.
MIDDLE is a 103 minute movie with a single shot. It tells of a folk singer who was forced to leave the city because of his life. On this afternoon, he said goodbye to his lover, friend and city.
Littlefinger (Spriditis) is having a hard time living with the evil stepmother and despite his grandmother's and Lienite's attempts to dissuade him, he goes out into the world to find happiness.
Set in the backdrop of Singareni coal mines near Godavarikhani of Telangana.
A story of an illicit relationship between a niece and an uncle.
A film about living and working conditions in the GDR of the 1960s, including a little love story, of course.
The end is nigh. What on earth will King Munchie do about his rebellious subjects?
A group of masked criminals terrorize a town.

A mother of a certain age, copes with a heart disease. As her conditions worsen her doctor gives her classified medicine she's not aware of. While his intentions are merely for organ trafficking, she only has her son to save her.
A notorious terrorist manipulates an Indian army major's jilted lover into helping him obtain a classified military code.
When a psychotic breaks, what do they see?

Chicago detective Jennifer Mueller is the perfect bait to catch a satanic killer, but when the covert sting goes wrong, her life is changed forever. As she goes back under the cult lures her to a small town where no one is what they seem.
A young man ventures into dangerous, hostile territory to look for his younger brother.
A chronicle of Ultimate Fighting Championship competitor "Lightning" Lee Murray's alleged criminal exploits, in which he is suspected of masterminding a record-breaking heist in 2006.
A man goes against a mafia gang to avenge his brother's death.
Loodhifa deals with current social issues in a society, and is told from the different perspectives of its characters.
Tales of mystery and terror intersect when Billy Pilgrim learns of his destiny to find the fabled River Child and bring her back to Shadow Falls.
Young and innocent Karen Palmer visits Hawaii and is seduced by a charming local man who sometimes turns into a shark-man and might want to eat her.
There's a magical door in Woody's closet that allows those who go through it to erase mistakes from their past. When he finds out where it goes, his life will be changed forever.
A reboot of Kamen Rider (1971) to celebrate its 50th anniversary.
Based on the middle grade novel of the same name.
A young filmmaker becomes involved with a gangster in Berlin.
As she travels through the UK with her boyfriend, Alex is bitten by a werewolf in this remake of the 1981 classic.
The Peanuts gang goes to summer camp, and they participate in a river-raft race against some cheating bullies.
A young man gets embroiled in a war against vampires.

Kathir (Bobby Simha) has an interest for Anbu (Tanya Ravichandran), but due to family situations, she gets hitched to Karuppan (Vijay Sethupathi). What does Kathir do, to separate Karuppan and Anbu, and does he finally get to marry Anbu?
It is the year 1938. Tension is in the air as China is in the throes of an impending war with Japan.
The retelling of the events that led a Chicago immigrant tavern owner to defend his pet goat by cursing the Chicago Cubs to never again win a World Series.

Edited version for theaters of the eponymous 1972 show, about Triton, a sole survivor who seeks vengeance against evil sea demigod Poseidon and his monsters who eradicated his clan of good mermen and usurped their throne.
A sexually repressed woman embraces her dark side, experiencing her wildest fantasy.
In the mist of the misadventures of Bill and his family, their luck and lives ultimately change when Bill's wife suddenly wins the lottery.

The neglected wife of a hot shot movie producer begins an affair with the married man who rescued her after her car broke down in the desert, but their romance is cut short when she is kidnapped by three thugs and her lover left for dead.

Unravel the cryptic prophecies of an enigmatic oracle and discover their implications for the realm. Accompany a group of brave heroes as they decipher the oracle's words confront destiny and challenge the forces that seek to alter the prophecy's outcome.
On a Mysterious Island Grand Masters of Martial Arts train the Greatest Warriors of all time to find who will become the ultimate Island Warrior

A little boy, with kung-fu skills, spends his time flying around on a magic gourd battling one, two and three headed dragons, bird men, a triclops and ape men who have the ability to fire laser beams from their eyes.
An ex-soldier falls for a vampire, though in order to be with her, he must take on her creator, who is protected by an army of monsters in the Hong Kong underworld.
Raggedy Ann and Andy leave their playroom to rescue Babette, a beautiful French doll kidnapped by pirates.
It follows a group of Australian immigrants who find themselves in a foreign land, building a new life together.

Aryan is a Syrian refugee trying to make his way into Hungary from Serbia, along with his father and many other wretched souls. They are all caught, and find themselves in a web of cynicism and corruption.
A thirty-something is still living with his parents until they hire an interventionist to help him graduate out of the house. That's when the fun begins.
A young man is kept distant from his lover by a strict and unforgiving society. He'd go through hell to be with her, but when a deal with the devil goes sour, hell comes to him instead.
After being discharged from the military, Sgt. Barnes finds his way back into society via a charismatic politician with a covert plan to eliminate an underground criminal element.
A very unorthodox police inspector is assigned to investigate a millionaire's mysterious death.
Professor Higgingbottom, an ardent member of the Whales, is offered a chance to invest $5,000 in a gold mine.
As a young man (Justin) returns from the War in Iraq and experiences the Physical and Mental difficulties of trying to re-adjust to the life he once knew.
As Sadie Hawkins Day approaches, Daisy Mae hopes to win the hand of Li'l Abner by catching him in the traditional race.
A family man with a gangster past is revisited by an old friend, luring him back to his old way of life. A remake of the French film, "Les Lyonnais."
A group of teenagers, in an attempt to rescue their friend from an evil corporation, end up inadvertently releasing a horde of bloodthirsty zombies.

This film about the stresses of growing up. Pressures are all around children as they grow up from parents, siblings, bullies, teachers, etc. Sometimes these stresses can have a tragic effect on a young person.
FBI agent, expert in martial arts, become the main target for a gangster, after she kills one of his closest employees.
A chambermaid plots to climb the social ladder by marrying a wealthy man.
Alice wakes up in the Raccoon City hospital after the area has been overrun by zombies, and must now make it out of the city before a nuclear bomb is dropped.
A radio broadcaster's intense attraction to a mysterious woman opens the door to a tidal wave of powerful emotions and desires.
A college student becomes a drug kingpin when all he really wanted was to pay for school.
A young and honest police officer comes to Hubli to put an end to the criminal activities. He finds it difficult to achieve his objective when he is confronted by a powerful family of gangsters.
A secret government agency recruits some of the most dangerous incarcerated super-villains to form a defensive task force. Their first mission: save the world from the apocalypse.

Delirium was a touring multimedia stage show by Cirque du Soleil featuring live music, video projections, and performances by acrobats and other circus performers. The production featured remixes of existing Cirque du Soleil music.
Based on the hit Comic book series - an unlikely alliance of six crime fighting vigilantes join forces to stop an indestructible warlord from gaining the ultimate power to destroy their city.
The story of a stewardess trying to convince her father to return to Europe with her and the foreman of a ranch that they are try to avoid from.
A local gang forms an unlikely alliance with the neighborhood superhero forcing them into a battle with the city's biggest crime lord.
A tuna fisherman marries a woman who doesn't love him.

Shahruz is a young addicted man who has recently released from the prison. He is escaping from his past and is determined to change his life once and forever. But this is his past that hunting him all the time.
A romantic triangle leads to complications on an archaeological expedition in Southern Mexico.

The film tells the story of a family whose uncle is murdered. The son gets everything because he's in the will. A detective is trying to find out who murdered the uncle while avoiding ending up dead as well.

The fictional British royal Prince George travels to Japan and falls in love with a local female tour guide named Sumi. He considers breaking the rules and staying with her there, but a Japanese gangster wants him dead.
A race of space vampires arrives in London and infects the populace, beginning an apocalyptic descent into chaos.

The peace of a middle-class family is shattered by the suicide of the elder daughter just a month after she is admitted to college. Coral, her younger sister, replaces her in the college to find out the circumstances her sister's death.
A scientist for the military turns himself into a cartoon-like superhero when a version of one of his own weapons is being used against enemies.
The 'Korean Madonna' now destroys her image of being clown.
After his own gang sets him up to kill a rival mobster, a hit man is forced to flee with his younger brother.
A teenage loner pushes his way into the underworld of a high school crime ring to investigate the disappearance of his ex-girlfriend.
It tells the story of a man and a woman trapped inside what appears to be a dream set in the labyrinthine hallways, mysterious rooms of a large hotel in the 30's, facing the sea.
A struggling MMA fighter is targeted by a band of ruthless criminals after rescuing a troubled call girl from a human trafficking ring.

Steve, a driven insurance executive in search of a big score, who finds it with a chain of video store. Sarah, his wife, bored and lonely in search of solace finds excitement and intrigue far beyond her expectations.
The trials & tribulations a computer repair company goes through when outside influences are trying to cause its demise
Music lessons crescendo with a love affair as a young Franz Schubert tutors a countess in Budapest.Then her fiance challenges the composer to a duel.
The bodyguard, Michael Bryce, continues his friendship with assassin, Darius Kincaid, as they try to save Darius' wife Sonia.

The movie tells the story of So Yeon, who has Gender Identity Disorder (GID). In the story, So Yeon falls in love with her roommate Yuki, while Yuki likes So Yeon's friend Hajime, who is in love with So Yeon.
A Cinderella story of a young country girl who comes to Hollywood and achieves movie stardom with the help of a publicity man.
Golmammad and Golnesa, a young Afghan couple, are illegal immigrants who are working in a traditional brick making kiln in Iran. Following the events happening to them, their lives undergo changes

In 19th century Russia, an 8 year-old boy is sent from his home village to the big city to go to school. On his long way there, he gets to witness the often harsh realities of life in the steppe. Based on allegorical novel by Chekhov.
When Naagkumari Sulochana refuses to marry Indradev, Naagraj curses her and she ends up marrying Ravanputra Meghnath.

Waking up on an uninhabited island, Laura struggles to remember who she is as she is trying to escape from it. But the more she remembers, the more she realizes that she is a tragic character in someone else's game.

Mano Negra envía un grupo de enanos a un laboratorio del gobierno para secuestrar al profesor Arego y obtener cierta fórmula, la cual descubren está dividida entre sus cuatro hijas. Una historia llena de mucha acción.

Hyeon-ki, nicknamed 'Oddball' by his classmates, is a highschool taekwondo expert. When a beautiful, but arrogant, rich girl requests his help, he at first refuses until he, in turn, needs help to save his sick friend.
A ruthless Viking seeks vengeance against his old enemy by kidnapping his daughters, but the plan is hindered by an unknown macabre presence from the legends.
Dirty secrets amid allure of show biz in Cannes.
Two girls in their preteens embark on a road trip with one of the girl's mother.

Martin Morel wants to spend Sylvester with both his wife and family and his girlfriend Agnes. So he asks his clumsy friend Bertin to pretend she'd be his wife. But the two can't stand each other... at first.

Simon is 8 and he's an orphan. His dream is to find a family willing to take him in. But Simon is not a child like the others, he has a secret power: he is able to take the appearance of every person he has ever touched.
Kabira, an orphan, is raised in the house of poor Muslim weavers. He's different from the rest of his lot because of his peaceful demeanour, which allows him to question religion and practices.
Sondra finds herself in the body of her secretary's dog Bella.

Dr. Meredith has been driven from civilization by the criminal activities of his twin brother Bradley. With his infant daughter, he settles in the African jungle. But the Masamba tribes possess vast diamond mines coveted by crooks.
Inspired by true events, when friends become the enemy, a falsely imprisoned man plots revenge.
Mack and Jack, two-bit hoods owe money to a European loan shark. When they flee back to their native NYC they soon learn that the road to hell is paved with not-so-good intentions.
Jess Lapid is back faster deadlier and more magnificent as Zigomar.
Convicted of a crime he didn't commit, Confederate soldier, Percy Harris escapes and makes his way home to find it's not possible to escape fate.

Shravan, a student, gets embroiled in the world of crime, after he is falsely accused of murdering his principal Shrivastav. He then decides to fight back for justice and change in the society, thus becoming 'Pandit' from 'Shravan'.
The story happens in an old house in an old city of Iran. Because of the wedding of the youngest sister, Pasandide, all of her sisters come to their old house to help their mother.
